tika-s0402t:6_1: Kañjito nibbattaṃ kañjiyaṃ, āranālaṃ, yaṃ bilaṅgantipi vuccati, taṃ yattha siñcati,
tika-s0402t:6_2: sā kañjiyaukkhalikā bilaṅgathālikā, taṃsadisaṃ kāraṇaṃ bilaṅgathālikaṃ. Sīsakaṭāhaṃ
tika-s0402t:6_3: uppāṭetvāti ayoguḷappavesappamāṇaṃ chiddaṃ katvā. Saṅkhamuṇḍakammakāraṇanti saṅkhaṃ
tika-s0402t:7_0: Jotimālikanti jotimālavantaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ. Hatthapajjotikanti hatthassa pajjotanakammakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:7_3: Taṃ karontā yathā gīvato paṭṭhāya vaddhe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti, evaṃ gopphakato
tika-s0402t:7_4: paṭṭhāya kantitvāpi kaṭiyameva ṭhapenti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kaṭito paṭṭhāya kantitvā
tika-s0402t:7_6: Ayavalayāni datvāti ayavalayāni paṭimuñcitvā. Ayasūlāni koṭṭentīti kapparajaṇṇukakoṭīsu
tika-s0402t:7_7: ayasūlāni pavesenti. Tanti taṃ tathākatakammakāraṇaṃ sattaṃ.
tika-s0402t:8_1: chindanakammakāraṇaṃ. Koṭṭentīti chindanti. Khārāpatacchikanti tacchetvā khārāpasiñcanakammakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:8_2: Palighaparivattikanti palighassa viya parivattanakammakāraṇaṃ. Ekābaddhaṃ karonti
tika-s0402t:8_3: ayasūlassa koṭṭanena. Palālapīṭhakanti palālapīṭhassa viya sarīrassa saṃvellanakammakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:8_4: Kāraṇikāti ghātanakārakā. Palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvāti yathā palālapīṭhaṃ karontā palālaṃ
tika-s0402t:8_5: vaṭṭiṃ katvā saṃvellanavasena puna veṭhenti, evaṃ karontīti attho. Chātakasunakhehīti
tika-s0402t:8_6: khuddakehi koleyyakasunakhehi. Te hi balavantā javayogā sūrā ca honti. Sahassabhaṇḍikanti sahassatthavikaṃ.
tika-s0402t:9: Yāhanti yaṃ ahaṃ. Yanti ca kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tenāha “yena aha”nti. Chinnamūlaketi taṇhāmūlassa ucchinnattā sañchinnamūlake.
tika-s0402t:12_1: Dānañca yuddhañca samānamāhūti ettha kathaṃ panīdamubhayaṃ samānaṃ? Jīvitavināsabhīruko
tika-s0402t:12_2: hi yujjhituṃ na sakkoti, bhogakkhayabhīruko dānaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti. “Jīvitañca rakkhissāmi,
tika-s0402t:12_3: yujjhissāmī”ti hi vadanto na yujjhati, jīvite pana ālayaṃ vissajjetvā “hatthapādādicchedo
tika-s0402t:12_4: vā hotu maraṇaṃ vā, gaṇhissāmetaṃ issariya”nti ussahantova yujjhati. “Bhoge ca rakkhissāmi,
tika-s0402t:12_5: dānañca dassāmī”ti vadantopi na dadāti, bhogesu pana ālayaṃ pissajjetvā “mahādānaṃ
tika-s0402t:12_6: dassāmī”ti ussahantova deti. Evaṃ dānañca yuddhañca samaṃ hoti. Kiñca bhiyyo – appāpi
tika-s0402t:12_7: santā bahuke jinanti, yathā ca yuddhe appakāpi vīrapurisā bahuke bhīrupurise jinanti,
tika-s0402t:12_8: evaṃ saddhādisampanno appakampi dānaṃ dadanto bahuvidhaṃ lobhadosaissāmacchariyadiṭṭhivicikicchādibhedaṃ
tika-s0402t:12_9: tappaṭipakkhaṃ abhibhavati, bahuñca dānavipākaṃ adhigacchati. Evampi dānañca yuddhañca
tika-s0402t:12_10: samānaṃ. Tenāha “appampi ce saddahāno dadāti, teneva so hoti sukhī paratthā”ti.
tika-s0402t:13_0: Agārassa hitaṃ kasigorakkhādi agāriyaṃ, taṃ natthi etthāti anagāriyaṃ, pabbajjāti
tika-s0402t:13_1: āha “agārassa…pe… anagāriyaṃ pabbajja”nti. Sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggatthāyāti ettha cattāro
tika-s0402t:13_2: upadhī – kāmupadhi, khandhupadhi, kilesupadhi, abhisaṅkhārupadhīti. Kāmāpi hi “yaṃ
tika-s0402t:13_3: pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti evaṃ vuttassa
tika-s0402t:13_4: sukhassa, tadassādanimittassa vā dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato upadhīyati ettha sukhanti
tika-s0402t:13_5: iminā vacanatthena “upadhī”ti vuccanti. Khandhāpi khandhamūlakassa dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato,
tika-s0402t:13_6: kilesāpi apāyadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, abhisaṅkhārāpi bhavadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-s0402t:13_7: “upadhī”ti vuccanti. Sabbesaṃ upadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggo pahānaṃ etthāti sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggaṃ,
tika-s0402t:16_0: 3. Tatiye tapanīyāti ettha kattuatthe anīya-saddoti āha “tapantīti tapanīyā”ti. Tapantīti
tika-s0402t:16_1: vibādhenti, viheṭhentīti attho. Tapanaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañca
tika-s0402t:16_2: tassa uppādanena ceva anubalappadānena ca hitāti tapanīyā. Atha vā tapanti tenāti
tika-s0402t:16_3: tapanaṃ, anutāpo, vippaṭisāroti attho. Tassa hetubhāvato hitāti tapanīyā. Anusocatīti
tika-s0402t:16_4: vippaṭisārī hutvā katākataṃ anugamma socati. Socanañhi katattā ca hoti akatattā ca.
tika-s0402t:16_5: Tathā ceva pāḷiyaṃ vibhattaṃ. Nandayakkhādīnaṃ vatthūni pākaṭānīti tāni adassetvā
tika-s0402t:16_6: dvebhātikavatthuṃ dassento “te kirā”ti ādimāha. Tattha teti dve bhātaro. Puna kiṃ
tika-s0402t:19_0: 5. Pañcame imañhi dhammadvayanti kusalesu dhammesu asantuṭṭhitā, padhānasmiṃ anosakkanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0402t:19_1: dhammadvayaṃ. Imināti “asantuṭṭhitā kusalesu dhammesū”ti vacanena. Imaṃ dīpetīti
tika-s0402t:19_2: “yāva so uppajjati, na tāvāhaṃ santuṭṭho ahosi”nti etaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā vakkhamānatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:19_4: Vīriyappavāhe vattamāne antarā eva paṭigamanaṃ nivattanaṃ paṭivānaṃ, tadassa atthīti
tika-s0402t:19_5: paṭivānī, na paṭivānī appaṭivānī, tassa bhāvo appaṭivānitā, anosakkanāti āha “appaṭivānitāti
tika-s0402t:20_0: Āgamanīyapaṭipadāti samathavipassanāsaṅkhātā pubbabhāgapaṭipatti. Sā hi āgacchanti
tika-s0402t:20_1: visesamadhigacchanti etāya, āgacchati vā visesādhigamo etāyāti āgamanīyā, sā eva
tika-s0402t:23_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe saṃyojanānaṃ hitā paccayabhāvenāti saṃyojaniyā, tebhūmakā dhammā. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:23_1: “dasannaṃ saṃyojanāna”ntiādi. Saṃyojaniye dhamme assādato anupassati sīlenāti assādānupassī,
tika-s0402t:23_2: tassa bhāvo assādānupassitā. Nibbidānupassitāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Ukkaṇṭhanavasenāti
tika-s0402t:23_3: saṃyojaniyesu tebhūmakadhammesu nibbindanavasena. Jananaṃ jāti, khandhānaṃ pātubhāvoti
tika-s0402t:23_4: āha “jātiyāti khandhanibbattito”ti, khandhānaṃ tattha tattha bhave aparāparaṃ nibbattitoti
tika-s0402t:23_6: khandhānaṃ bhedo idha maraṇanti āha “maraṇenāti khandhabhedato”ti. Antonijjhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:23_7: cittasantāpo. Paridevo nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa vācāvippalāpo. So ca sokasamuṭṭhānoti
tika-s0402t:23_8: āha “tannissitalālappitalakkhaṇehi paridevehī”ti. Lālappitaṃ vācāvippalāpo, so ca atthato saddoyeva.
tika-s0402t:24_0: Dukkhanti idha kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ adhippetanti āha “kāyapaṭipīḷanadukkhehī”ti. Manovighātadomanassehīti
tika-s0402t:24_1: manaso vighātakarehi domanassehi. Byāpādasampayogena manaso vihananarasañhi domanassaṃ.
tika-s0402t:24_2: Bhuso āyāso upāyāso yathā “bhusamādānaṃ upādāna”nti, so ca atthato ñātibyasanādīhi
tika-s0402t:24_3: phuṭṭhassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhāvito dosoyeva. Kāyacittānañhi āyāsanavasena dosasseva
tika-s0402t:24_4: pavattiākāro upāyāsoti vuccati saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno. Taṃ cuddasahi akusalacetasikehi
tika-s0402t:24_5: añño eko cetasikadhammoti eke. Yaṃ visādoti ca vadanti.
tika-s0402t:27_0: 7. Sattame yathā “kaṇhā gāvī”tiādīsu kāḷavaṇṇena samannāgatā “kaṇhā”ti vuccati, na
tika-s0402t:27_1: evaṃ kāḷavaṇṇatāya dhammā “kaṇhā”ti vuccanti, atha kho kaṇhābhijātinibbattihetuto
tika-s0402t:27_3: Kaṇhatāyāti kaṇhābhijātitāya. Kaṇhābhijātīti ca apāyā vuccanti manussesu ca dobhaggiyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:27_4: Sarasenāti sabhāvena. Na hirīyati na lajjatīti ahiriko, puggalo, cittaṃ, taṃ sampayuttadhammasamudāyo
tika-s0402t:27_5: vā. Tassa bhāvo ahirikkanti vattabbe ekassa ka-kārassa lopaṃ katvā ahirikanti vuttanti
tika-s0402t:27_6: āha “ahirikanti ahirikabhāvo”ti. Na ottappatīti anottāpī, puggalo, yathāvuttadhammasamudāyo
tika-s0402t:30_0: 8. Aṭṭhame “sukkaṃ vattha”ntiādīsu viya na vaṇṇasukkatāya dhammānaṃ sukkatā, atha
tika-s0402t:30_1: kho sukkābhijātihetuto pabhassarabhāvakaraṇato cāti dassento “na vaṇṇasukkatāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:30_2: Sukkatāyāti sukkābhijātitāya. Hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṃ viya passantī jigucchatīti āha
tika-s0402t:30_3: “pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī”ti. Ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya passantaṃ tato bhāyatīti
tika-s0402t:30_4: vuttaṃ “bhāyanalakkhaṇaṃ otappa”nti. Idañca hirottappaṃ aññamaññavippayogī pāpato
tika-s0402t:30_5: vimukhabhūtañca, tasmā nesaṃ idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ – ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:30_6: ottappaṃ. Attādhipati hirī, lokādhipati otappaṃ. Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ
tika-s0402t:31_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā,
tika-s0402t:31_1: vayaṃ, sūrabhāvaṃ, bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Kathaṃ? “Pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ na jātisampannānaṃ
tika-s0402t:31_2: kammaṃ, hīnajaccānaṃ kevaṭṭādīnaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kātuṃ na
tika-s0402t:31_3: yutta”nti evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā
tika-s0402t:31_4: “pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ daharehi kattabbaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kātuṃ
tika-s0402t:31_5: na yutta”nti evaṃ vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:31_6: nāmetaṃ dubbalajātikānaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti
tika-s0402t:31_7: evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakammaṃ
tika-s0402t:31_8: nāmetaṃ andhabālānaṃ kammaṃ, na paṇḍitānaṃ, mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahussutassa idaṃ
tika-s0402t:31_9: kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0402t:31_10: Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti, samuṭṭhāpento ca hiriṃ
tika-s0402t:32_0: Kathaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ? “Sace tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ karissasi, catūsu parisāsu
tika-s0402t:32_1: garahappatto bhavissasi, tato taṃ sīlavanto sabrahmacārī vivajjissantī”ti paccavekkhitvā
tika-s0402t:32_2: bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nissāya pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ.
tika-s0402t:33_0: Kathaṃ attādhipati hirī? Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā “mādisassa
tika-s0402t:33_1: saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutadharassa na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ kātu”nti pāpaṃ
tika-s0402t:33_2: na karoti. Evaṃ attādhipati hirī. Tenāha bhagavā “so attānaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā
tika-s0402t:33_3: akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhaṃ
tika-s0402t:34_0: Kathaṃ lokādhipati ottappaṃ? Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā
tika-s0402t:34_1: “sace kho tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ kareyyāsi, sabrahmacārino tāva taṃ jānissanti, mahiddhikā
tika-s0402t:34_2: mahānubhāvā loke ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā devatā ca, tasmā te na yuttaṃ pāpaṃ kātu”nti pāpakammaṃ
tika-s0402t:34_3: na karoti. Yathāha – “mahā kho panāyaṃ lokasannivāso, mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse
tika-s0402t:34_4: santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno. Te dūratopi passanti,
tika-s0402t:34_5: āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti, tepi maṃ evaṃ jānissanti ‘passatha,
tika-s0402t:34_6: bho, imaṃ kulaputtaṃ, saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati
tika-s0402t:34_7: pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti. Santi devatā iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduniyo,
tika-s0402t:34_8: tā dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti, tāpi maṃ jānissanti
tika-s0402t:34_9: ‘passatha, bho, imaṃ kulaputtaṃ, saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo
tika-s0402t:34_10: viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti…pe… so lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā akusalaṃ…pe…
tika-s0402t:35_0: Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitāti ettha lajjāti lajjanākāro, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitā hirī. Bhayanti
tika-s0402t:35_1: apāyabhayaṃ, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ pāpaparivajjane pākaṭaṃ
tika-s0402t:35_2: hoti. Tattha yathā dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito, eko uṇho āditto.
tika-s0402t:35_3: Tesu yathā sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto viññujātiko na gaṇhāti, itaraṃ ḍāhabhayena.
tika-s0402t:35_4: Evaṃ paṇḍito lajjāya jigucchanto pāpaṃ na karoti, ottappena apāyabhayabhīto pāpaṃ
tika-s0402t:35_5: na karoti, evaṃ lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ.
tika-s0402t:36_0: Kathaṃ sappatissavalakkhaṇā hirī, vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ? Ekacco
tika-s0402t:36_2: sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi tattha gāravena sappatissavalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:36_3: hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti. Ekacco attānuvādabhayaṃ, parānuvādabhayaṃ, daṇḍabhayaṃ,
tika-s0402t:36_4: duggatibhayanti evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi vajjato bhāyanto vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:36_5: ottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Ettha ca ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā hirottappānaṃ
tika-s0402t:36_6: tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā, na pana nesaṃ kadāci aññamaññavippayogo. Na hi
tika-s0402t:36_7: lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ, pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti. Evamettha vitthārato atthavaṇṇanā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:39_0: 9. Navame lokanti sattalokaṃ. Sandhārentīti ācārasandhāraṇavasena dhārenti. Ṭhapentīti
tika-s0402t:39_1: mariyādāyaṃ ṭhapenti. Rakkhantīti ācārasandhāraṇena mariyādāyaṃ ṭhapetvā rakkhanti.
tika-s0402t:39_2: Garucittīkāravasena na paññāyethāti garuṃ katvā citte karaṇavasena na paññāyetha,
tika-s0402t:39_3: ayamācāro na labbheyya. Mātucchāti vāti ettha iti-saddo ādyattho. Tena mātulānīti
tika-s0402t:39_4: vā ācariyabhariyāti vā garūnaṃ dārāti vāti ime saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha mātu bhaginī mātucchā.
tika-s0402t:39_5: Mātulabhariyā mātulānī. Garūnaṃ dārā mahāpitucūḷapitujeṭṭhabhātuādīnaṃ garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ
tika-s0402t:39_6: bhariyā. Yathā ajeḷakātiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā ajeḷakādayo tiracchānā hirottapparahitā
tika-s0402t:39_7: mātāti saññaṃ akatvā bhinnamariyādā sabbattha sambhedena vattanti, evamayaṃ manussaloko
tika-s0402t:39_8: yadi lokapāladhammā na bhaveyyuṃ, sabbattha sambhedena vatteyya. Yasmā panime lokapālakadhammā
tika-s0402t:42_0: 10. Dasame apaññattāti ananuññātā, avihitā vā. Vasseti vassārattaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-s0402t:42_1: utuvasseti hemantaṃ sandhāya. Ekindriyaṃ jīvaṃ viheṭhentāti rukkhalatādīsu jīvasaññitāya
tika-s0402t:42_2: evamāhaṃsu. Ekindriyanti ca kāyindriyaṃ atthīti maññamānā vadanti. Saṅghātaṃ āpādentāti
tika-s0402t:42_3: vināsaṃ āpādentā. Saṃkasāyissantīti appossukkā nibaddhavāsaṃ vasissanti. Aparajjugatāya
tika-s0402t:42_4: āsāḷhiyā upagantabbāti ettha aparajju gatāya assāti aparajjugatā, tassā aparajjugatāya
tika-s0402t:42_5: atikkantāya, aparasmiṃ divaseti attho, tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivase
tika-s0402t:42_6: upagantabbāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbāti māso gatāya
tika-s0402t:42_7: assāti māsagatā, tassā māsagatāya atikkantāya, māse paripuṇṇeti attho. Tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamato
tika-s0402t:42_8: parāya puṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivase upagantabbāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:46_0: 11. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame appaṭisaṅkhāne na kampatīti paṭisaṅkhānabalaṃ, upaparikkhanapaññāyetaṃ
tika-s0402t:46_1: nāmaṃ. Vīriyasīsena satta bojjhaṅge bhāventassa uppannaṃ balaṃ bhāvanābalaṃ. Vīriyupatthambhena
tika-s0402t:46_2: hi kusalabhāvanā balavatī thirā uppajjati, tathā uppannā balavatī kusalabhāvanā balavanto
tika-s0402t:46_3: satta bojjhaṅgātipi vuccanti. Atthato vīriyasambojjhaṅgasīsena satta bojjhaṅgā honti.
tika-s0402t:46_4: Vuttampi cetaṃ – “tattha katamaṃ bhāvanābalaṃ? Yā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanā bhāvanā
tika-s0402t:46_5: bahulīkammaṃ, idaṃ vuccati bhāvanābalaṃ. Sattapi bojjhaṅgā bhāvanābala”nti.
tika-s0402t:47_1: Anajjhomaddanaṭṭhenāti adhibhavitvā anavamaddanaṭṭhena. Etānīti etāni yathāvuttāni
tika-s0402t:47_2: dvepi balāni. Etadaggaṃ nāgatanti “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ balānaṃ yadidaṃ
tika-s0402t:48_0: 12. Dutiye vivekaṃ nissitanti vivekanissitaṃ, yathā vā vivekavasena pavattaṃ jhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:48_2: daṭṭhabbo. Nissayaṭṭho ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ veditabbo, asatipi
tika-s0402t:48_3: vā pubbāparabhāve “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ettha paccayena samuppādanaṃ viya avinābhāvidhammabyāpārā
tika-s0402t:48_6: sambojjhaṅgānaṃ vuttattā. Bhāvitabojjhaṅgassa hi sacchikātabbā balabojjhaṅgā, tesaṃ
tika-s0402t:48_8: Yadipi hi vipassanākkhaṇe saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ, saṅkhāresu pana ādīnavaṃ disvā
tika-s0402t:48_9: tappaṭipakkhe nibbāne ninnatāya ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissito hoti uṇhābhibhūtassa
tika-s0402t:49_0: “Pañcavidhavivekanissitampīti eke”ti vatvā tattha yathāvuttavivekattayato aññaṃ vivekadvayaṃ
tika-s0402t:49_1: uddharitvā dassetuṃ “te hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha jhānakkhaṇe tāva kiccato vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:49_3: anuttaraṃ vimokkhaṃ upasampajja viharissāmī”ti tattha ninnajjhāsayatāya. Tenāha “tasmā
tika-s0402t:49_4: tesaṃ matenā”tiādi. Heṭṭhā kasiṇajjhānaggahaṇena āruppānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:49_5: tasmā “etesaṃ jhānāna”nti imināpi tesaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo. Yasmā pahānavinayo viya
tika-s0402t:49_6: virāganirodhāpi idhādhippetavivekena atthato nibbisiṭṭhā, tasmā vuttaṃ “esa nayo
tika-s0402t:50_0: Vossagga-saddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā. Vossajjanañhi
tika-s0402t:50_1: pahānaṃ vissaṭṭhabhāvena nirodhanapakkhandanampi ca. Tasmā vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena
tika-s0402t:50_2: maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena paṭipakkhassa pahānaṃ vossaggo, tathā vipassanākkhaṇe
tika-s0402t:50_3: tanninnabhāvena, maggakkhaṇe ārammaṇakaraṇena vissaṭṭhasabhāvatā vossaggoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:50_4: Tenevāha “tattha pariccāgavossaggo”tiādi. Ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgoti ayaṃ missakavasena
tika-s0402t:50_6: tanninnatadārammaṇappakārena ca. Pubbe vossaggavacanasseva atthassa vuttattā āha
tika-s0402t:50_8: Pariṇatanti maggakkhaṇe samucchedatadārammaṇappakārena pariṇataṃ. Pariṇāmo nāma idha
tika-s0402t:50_9: paripākoti āha “paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcā”ti. Paripāko ca āsevanalābhena laddhasāmatthiyassa
tika-s0402t:50_10: kilese pariccajituṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandituṃ tikkhavisadabhāvo. Tenāha “ayañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:50_11: Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ nayo “vivekanissita”ntiādinā satisambojjhaṅge vutto, sesesu dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīsupi
tika-s0402t:50_12: eseva nayo, evaṃ tattha netabbanti attho.
tika-s0402t:51_1: dassento “idha panā”tiādimāha. Tattha sabbasaṅkhatehīti sabbehi paccayasamuppannadhammehi.
tika-s0402t:51_2: Sabbesanti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ. Vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ vivekaṃ
tika-s0402t:51_3: ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Tañca khoti tadeva satisambojjhaṅgaṃ.
tika-s0402t:52_1: attho. Cittekaggatāsīsena hi diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro vutto. Sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavānaṃ
tika-s0402t:52_2: vasena hetaṃ vuttaṃ. Te hi samāpajjitvā “ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ viharissāmā”ti
tika-s0402t:52_3: icceva kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti. Vipassanāpādakatthāyātiādīsu
tika-s0402t:52_4: pana sekkhaputhujjanā “samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassāmā”ti nibbattentā
tika-s0402t:53_0: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito
tika-s0402t:53_1: vuṭṭhāya “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti,
tika-s0402t:53_2: te abhiññāpādakatthāya bhāventi. Ye aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0402t:53_3: samāpajjitvā “sattāhaṃ acittā hutvā diṭṭheva dhamme nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ
tika-s0402t:53_4: viharissāmā”ti nibbattenti, te nirodhapādakatthāya bhāventi. Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo
tika-s0402t:53_5: nibbattetvā “aparihīnajjhānā brahmaloke uppajjissāmā”ti nibbattenti, te bhavavisesatthāya bhāventi.
tika-s0402t:54_0: Yuttaṃ tāva cittekaggatāya bhavavisesatthatā viya vipassanāpādakatthatāpi catukkajjhānasādhāraṇāti
tika-s0402t:54_1: tesaṃ vasena “cattāri jhānānī”ti vacanaṃ, abhiññāpādakatthatā pana nirodhapādakatthatā
tika-s0402t:54_2: ca catutthasseva jhānassa āveṇikā, sā kathaṃ catukkajjhānasādhāraṇā vuttāti? Paramparādhiṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:54_3: Padaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānampi hi padaṭṭhānanti vuccati kāraṇakāraṇanti yathā “tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddha”nti.
tika-s0402t:55_0: 14. Catutthe sasakassa uppatanaṃ viya hotīti pathavijigucchanasasakassa uppatanaṃ
tika-s0402t:55_1: viya hoti. Tatthāyaṃ atthasallāpikā upamā – pathavī kira sasakaṃ āha – “he sasakā”ti.
tika-s0402t:55_2: Sasako āha – “ko eso”ti. Kasmā mameva upari sabbairiyāpathe kappento uccārapassāvaṃ
tika-s0402t:55_3: karonto maṃ na jānāsīti? Suṭṭhu tayā ahaṃ diṭṭho, mayā akkantaṭṭhānañhi aṅgulaggehi
tika-s0402t:55_4: phuṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ viya hoti, vissaṭṭhaudakaṃ appamattakaṃ, karīsaṃ kaṭakaphalamattaṃ,
tika-s0402t:55_5: hatthiassādīhi pana akkantaṭṭhānampi mahantaṃ, passāvopi nesaṃ ghaṭamatto, uccāropi
tika-s0402t:55_6: pacchimatto hoti, alaṃ mayhaṃ tayāti uppatitvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne patito. Tato naṃ pathavī
tika-s0402t:55_7: āha – “aho dūraṃ gatopi nanu mayhaṃyeva upari patitosī”ti? So puna taṃ jigucchanto
tika-s0402t:55_8: uppatitvā aññattha patito. Evaṃ vassasahassampi uppatitvā uppatitvā patamāno sasako
tika-s0402t:55_9: neva pathaviyā antaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti. Na koṭinti na pubbakoṭiṃ. Itaresanti vipañcitaññuneyyapadaparamānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:56_0: 15. Pañcame samathehi adhikarīyati vūpasammatīti adhikaraṇaṃ, aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni
tika-s0402t:56_1: nissāya uppanno vivādoyeva vivādādhikaraṇaṃ. “Idha bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ anuvadanti sīlavipattiyā
tika-s0402t:56_2: vā”tiādinā catasso vipattiyo nissāya uppanno anuvādoyeva anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ. Pañcapi
tika-s0402t:56_4: āpattiyeva āpattādhikaraṇaṃ. “Yā saṅghassa kiccayatā karaṇīyatā apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ
tika-s0402t:56_5: ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakamma”nti evamāgataṃ catubbidhaṃ saṅghakiccaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti
tika-s0402t:57_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe apākaṭanāmoti “selo, kūṭadanto”tiādinā anabhiññāto. Yena vā kāraṇenāti
tika-s0402t:57_1: hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Hetuattho hi kiriyākāraṇaṃ, na karaṇaṃ viya kiriyattho,
tika-s0402t:57_3: ajjhenena vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthamevetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ, na karaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:57_4: tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”ti. Avibhāgato satataṃ pavattitaniratisayasāduvipulāmatarasasaddhammaphalatāya
tika-s0402t:57_6: hi rukkhassa sāduphalatā gahitāti. Upasaṅkamīti upasaṅkanto. Sampattakāmatāya hi
tika-s0402t:57_7: kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami, upasaṅkantoti ca vattabbataṃ
tika-s0402t:57_8: labhati. Tenāha “gatoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti, upagatoti attho. Upasaṅkamitvāti pubbakālakiriyāniddesoti
tika-s0402t:57_9: āha “upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpana”nti. Tatoti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto “upasaṅkamī”ti vutto,
tika-s0402t:58_0: Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchantoti yathā bhagavā “kacci te, brāhmaṇa, khamanīyaṃ, kacci
tika-s0402t:58_1: yāpanīya”ntiādinā khamanīyādīni pucchanto tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ samappavattamodo
tika-s0402t:58_2: ahosi pubbabhāsitāya, evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo tadanukaraṇena bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo
tika-s0402t:58_3: ahosīti yojanā. Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi
tika-s0402t:58_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha sammoditanti saṃsanditaṃ. Ekībhāvanti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ.
tika-s0402t:58_5: Khamanīyanti “idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato
tika-s0402t:58_6: dussahaṃ, kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyya”nti pucchati. Yāpanīyanti āhārādippaṭibaddhavuttikaṃ
tika-s0402t:58_7: cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sīsarogādiābādhābhāvena
tika-s0402t:58_8: kacci appābādhaṃ. Dukkhajīvikābhāvena kacci appātaṅkaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya
tika-s0402t:58_9: kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ. Tadanurūpabalayogato kacci balaṃ. Sukhavihārasambhavena kacci
tika-s0402t:58_10: phāsuvihāro atthīti sabbattha kacci-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:59_0: Balappattā pīti pītiyeva. Taruṇapīti pāmojjaṃ. Sammodaṃ janeti karotīti sammodanīkaṃ,
tika-s0402t:59_1: tadeva sammodanīyaṃ. Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti imaṃ pana atthaṃ dassetuṃ “sammodituṃ
tika-s0402t:59_3: dīghaṃ katvā “sāraṇīya”nti vuttaṃ. Suyyamānasukhatoti āpāthagatamadhurataṃ āha, anussariyamānasukhatoti
tika-s0402t:59_5: vacanacāturiyamāha. Atthaparisuddhatāyāti atthassa nirupakkilesataṃ. Anekehi pariyāyehīti anekehi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0402t:60_0: Atidūraaccāsannappaṭikkhepena nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ nāma gahitaṃ, taṃ pana avakaṃsato
tika-s0402t:60_1: ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthāsaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gīvaṃ pasāretvāti gīvaṃ parivaṭṭanavasena pasāretvā.
tika-s0402t:61_0: Etadavocāti etaṃ “ko nu kho, bhante, hetū”tiādipucchāvacanaṃ avoca. Teneva “etadavocā”ti
tika-s0402t:61_1: padaṃ uddharitvā duvidhā hi pucchātiādinā pucchāvibhāgaṃ dasseti. Tattha agāre niyutto
tika-s0402t:61_2: agāriko, tassa pucchā agārikapucchā. Agārikato añño anagāriko pabbajjūpagato, tassa
tika-s0402t:61_3: pucchā anagārikapucchā. Kiñcāpi aññattha “janako hetu, paggāhako paccayo. Asādhāraṇo
tika-s0402t:61_4: hetu, sādhāraṇo paccayo. Sabhāgo hetu, asabhāgo paccayo. Pubbakāliko hetu, sahapavatto
tika-s0402t:61_5: paccayo”tiādinā hetupaccayā vibhajja vuccanti. Idha pana “cattāro kho, bhikkhave,
tika-s0402t:61_6: mahābhūtā hetu cattāro mahābhūtā paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”tiādīsu viya
tika-s0402t:61_7: hetupaccayasaddā samānatthāti dassento “ubhayampetaṃ kāraṇavevacanamevā”ti āha. Visamacariyāti
tika-s0402t:62_0: Abhikkantāti atikkantā, vigatāti atthoti āha “khaye dissatī”ti. Tathā hi “nikkhanto
tika-s0402t:62_1: paṭhamo yāmo”ti upari vuttaṃ. Abhikkantataroti ativiya kantataro manoramo, tādiso
tika-s0402t:62_2: ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha “sundare dissatī”ti. Koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu
tika-s0402t:62_3: ko katamo? Meti mama. Pādānīti pāde. Iddhiyāti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. Yasasāti
tika-s0402t:62_4: iminā edisena parivārena paricchedena ca. Jalanti vijjotamāno. Abhikkantenāti ativiya
tika-s0402t:62_5: kantena kamanīyena abhirūpena. Vaṇṇenāti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. Sabbā obhāsayaṃ
tika-s0402t:62_6: disāti dasa disā pabhāsento, cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti
tika-s0402t:63_0: “Coro, coro; sappo, sappo”tiādīsu bhaye āmeḍitaṃ. “Vijjha, vijjha; pahara, paharā”tiādīsu
tika-s0402t:63_1: kodhe. “Sādhu, sādhū”tiādīsu pasaṃsāyaṃ. “Gaccha, gaccha; lunāhi, lunāhī”tiādīsu
tika-s0402t:63_2: turite. “Āgaccha, āgacchā”tiādīsu kotūhale. “Buddho, buddhoti cintento”tiādīsu acchare.
tika-s0402t:63_4: ekaputtakā”tiādīsu soke. “Aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”ntiādīsu pasāde. Ca-saddo avuttasamuccayatto.
tika-s0402t:63_5: Tena garahāasammānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha “pāpo, pāpo”tiādīsu garahāyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:64_0: Nayidaṃ āmeḍitavasena dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho atthadvayavasenāti dassento “atha
tika-s0402t:64_1: vā”tiādimāha. “Abhikkanta”nti vacanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakavasena vuttaṃ, taṃ pana
tika-s0402t:64_2: bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammassa desanāti katvā tathā vuttaṃ “bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā”ti.
tika-s0402t:64_3: Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Dosanāsanatoti rāgādikilesavidhamanato. Guṇādhigamanatoti
tika-s0402t:64_4: sīlādiguṇānaṃ sampāpanato. Ye guṇe desanā adhigameti, tesu padhānabhūte tāva dassetuṃ
tika-s0402t:64_5: “saddhājananato paññājananato”ti vuttaṃ. Saddhāpamukhā hi lokiyā guṇā, paññāpamukhā lokuttarā.
tika-s0402t:65_7: ca vīmaṃsiyamānahitato. Evamādīhīti ādi-saddena saṃsāracakkanivattanato, saddhammacakkappavattanato,
tika-s0402t:66_0: Adhomukhaṭṭhapitanti kenaci adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Heṭṭhāmukhajātanti sabhāveneva heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ.
tika-s0402t:66_1: Uparimukhanti uddhaṃmukhaṃ. Ugghāṭeyyāti vivaṭaṃ kareyya. Hatthe gahetvāti “puratthābhimukho
tika-s0402t:66_2: uttarābhimukho vā gacchā”tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā “nissandehaṃ esa maggo, evaṃ
tika-s0402t:67_0: Nikkujjitaṃ ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya.
tika-s0402t:67_2: evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ, na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. Kāmaṃ kāmacchandādayopi
tika-s0402t:67_3: paṭicchādakā nīvaraṇabhāvato, micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikā satte micchābhinivesanavasenāti
tika-s0402t:67_5: vajjaṃ vadāmī”ti. Sabbo apāyagāmimaggo kummaggo “kucchito maggo”ti katvā. Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:67_6: ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggo. Teneva hi
tika-s0402t:67_8: padīpo na tathā ujjalo, yathā telasannissayoti telapajjotaggahaṇaṃ. Etehi pariyāyehīti
tika-s0402t:68_0: Pasannakāranti pasannehi kātabbaṃ sakkāraṃ. Saraṇanti paṭisaraṇaṃ. Tenāha “parāyaṇa”nti.
tika-s0402t:68_1: Parāyaṇabhāvo ca anatthanisedhanena atthasampaṭipādanena ca hotīti āha “aghassa,
tika-s0402t:68_2: tātā, hitassa ca vidhātā”ti. Aghassāti dukkhatoti vadanti, pāpatoti pana attho yutto.
tika-s0402t:68_3: Nissakke cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Ettha ca nāyaṃ gami-saddo nī-saddādayo viya dvikammako,
tika-s0402t:68_4: tasmā yathā “ajaṃ gāmaṃ netī”ti vuccati, evaṃ “bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vattuṃ
tika-s0402t:68_5: na sakkā. “Saraṇanti gacchāmī”ti pana vattabbaṃ. Iti-saddo cettha luttaniddiṭṭho.
tika-s0402t:68_6: Tassa cāyamattho – gamanañca tadadhippāyena bhajanaṃ jānanaṃ vāti dassento “iti iminā
tika-s0402t:68_7: adhippāyenā”tiādimāha. Tattha bhajāmītiādīsu purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ
tika-s0402t:68_8: atthavacanaṃ. Bhajanaṃ vā saraṇādhippāyena upasaṅkamanaṃ. Sevanaṃ santikāvacaratā.
tika-s0402t:68_9: Payirupāsanaṃ vattappaṭivattakaraṇena upaṭṭhānanti evaṃ sabbathāpi anaññasaraṇataṃyeva
tika-s0402t:68_10: dīpeti. “Gacchāmī”ti padassa bujjhāmīti ayamattho kathaṃ labbhatīti āha “yesaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:69_0: Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodheti padadvayenapi phalaṭṭhā eva dassitā, na maggaṭṭhāti
tika-s0402t:69_1: te dassento “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā”ti āha. Nanu ca kalyāṇaputhujjanopi
tika-s0402t:69_2: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjatīti vuccatīti? Kiñcāpi vuccati, nippariyāyena pana maggaṭṭhā
tika-s0402t:69_3: eva tathā vattabbā, na itare sammattaniyāmokkamanābhāvato. Tathā hi te eva vuttā
tika-s0402t:69_5: Akkhāyatīti ettha iti-saddo ādyattho, pakārattho vā. Tena “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā
tika-s0402t:69_6: saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti suttapadaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, “vitthāro”ti
tika-s0402t:69_7: vā iminā. Ettha ca ariyamaggo niyyānikatāya, nibbānaṃ tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyāti
tika-s0402t:69_8: ubhayameva nippariyāyena dhammoti vutto. Nibbānañhi ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ labhitvā
tika-s0402t:69_9: ariyamaggo tadatthasiddhiyā saṃvattati, tathāpi yasmā ariyaphalānaṃ “tāya saddhāya
tika-s0402t:69_11: niyyānānuguṇatāya niyyānapariyosānatāya ca. Pariyattidhammassa pana niyyānikadhammasamadhigamahetutāyāti
tika-s0402t:69_12: iminā pariyāyena vuttanayena dhammabhāvo labbhati eva. Svāyamattho pāṭhāruḷho evāti
tika-s0402t:70_0: Kāmarāgo bhavarāgoti evamādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati pahīyati etenāti rāgavirāgoti
tika-s0402t:70_1: maggo kathito. Ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa sokassa ca taduppattiyaṃ
tika-s0402t:70_2: sabbaso parikkhīṇattā anejamasokanti phalaṃ kathitaṃ. Appaṭikūlanti avirodhadīpanato
tika-s0402t:70_3: kenaci aviruddhaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ paṇītanti vā attho. Paguṇarūpena pavattitattā, pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato
tika-s0402t:71_0: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenāti “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
tika-s0402t:71_1: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā, “yāni tāni
tika-s0402t:71_2: sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni
tika-s0402t:71_3: samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti ca evaṃ vuttānaṃ
tika-s0402t:71_4: sīlānañca saṃhatabhāvena, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññenāti attho. Saṃhatoti ghaṭito, sametoti
tika-s0402t:71_5: attho. Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatā
tika-s0402t:71_6: eva. Aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā teti te purisayugavasena cattāropi puggalavasena
tika-s0402t:71_7: aṭṭheva ariyadhammassa paccakkhadassāvitāya dhammadasā. Tīṇi vatthūni saraṇanti gamanena
tika-s0402t:71_8: tikkhattuṃ gamanena ca tīṇi saraṇagamanāni. Paṭivedesīti attano hadayagataṃ vācāya pavedesi.
tika-s0402t:72_0: Saraṇagamanassa visayappabhedaphalasaṃkilesabhedānaṃ viya kattuvibhāvanā tattha kosallāya
tika-s0402t:72_1: hotīti saraṇagamanesu atthakosallatthaṃ “saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ, yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0402t:72_2: saraṇagamanappabhedo, saraṇagamanaphalaṃ, saṃkileso, bhedoti ayaṃ vidhi veditabbo”ti
tika-s0402t:72_3: vuttaṃ tena vinā saraṇagamanasseva asambhavato. Kasmā panettha vodānaṃ na gahitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:72_4: nanu vodānavibhāvanāpi tattha kosallāya hotīti? Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana saṃkilesaggahaṇena
tika-s0402t:72_5: atthato dīpitaṃ hotīti na gahitaṃ. Yāni hi nesaṃ saṃkilesakāraṇāni aññāṇādīni, tesaṃ
tika-s0402t:72_6: sabbena sabbaṃ anuppannānaṃ anuppādanena, uppannānañca pahānena vodānaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0402t:73_0: Hiṃsatthassa dhātusaddassa vasenetaṃ padaṃ daṭṭhabbanti “hiṃsatīti saraṇa”nti vatvā
tika-s0402t:73_1: taṃ pana hiṃsanaṃ kesaṃ, kathaṃ, kassa vāti codanaṃ sodhento “saraṇagatāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:73_2: Tattha bhayanti vaṭṭabhayaṃ. Santāsanti cittutrāsaṃ. Teneva cetasikadukkhassa gahitattā
tika-s0402t:73_3: dukkhanti kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ. Duggatiparikilesanti duggatipariyāpannaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:73_4: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ parato phalakathāya āvi bhavissati. Etanti saraṇanti padaṃ. Evaṃ avisesato
tika-s0402t:73_5: saraṇasaddassa padatthaṃ dassetvā idāni visesato dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:73_6: Hite pavattanenāti “sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharathā”tiādinā atthe niyojanena.
tika-s0402t:73_7: Ahitā nivattanenāti “pāṇātipātassa kho pāpako vipāko abhisamparāya”ntiādinā ādīnavadassanādimukhena
tika-s0402t:73_8: anatthato nivattanena. Bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti hitāhitesu appavattippavattihetukaṃ byasanaṃ
tika-s0402t:73_9: appavattikaraṇena vināseti buddho. Bhavakantārā uttāraṇena maggasaṅkhāto dhammo.
tika-s0402t:73_10: Itaro assāsadānena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti yojanā. Kārānanti dānavasena pūjāvasena
tika-s0402t:73_11: ca upanītānaṃ sakkārānaṃ. Vipulaphalappaṭilābhakaraṇena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati saṅgho
tika-s0402t:73_12: anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Imināpi pariyāyenāti imināpi vibhajitvā vuttena kāraṇena.
tika-s0402t:74_0: “Sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti evaṃ pavatto tattha
tika-s0402t:74_1: ratanattaye pasādo tappasādo, tadeva rattanattayaṃ garu etassāti taggaru, tabbhāvo
tika-s0402t:74_2: taggarutā, tappasādo ca taggarutā ca tappasādataggarutā. Tāhi tappasādataggarutāhi.
tika-s0402t:74_4: parāyaṇaṃ gati tāṇaṃ leṇanti evaṃ pavattiyā tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo
tika-s0402t:74_5: saraṇagamanaṃ saraṇanti gacchati etenāti. Taṃsamaṅgīti tena yathāvuttacittuppādena
tika-s0402t:74_6: samannāgato. Evaṃ upetīti evaṃ bhajati sevati payirupāsati, evaṃ vā jānāti bujjhatīti
tika-s0402t:75_0: Ettha ca pasādaggahaṇena lokiyasaraṇagamanamāha. Tañhi pasādappadhānaṃ. Garutāgahaṇena
tika-s0402t:75_1: lokuttaraṃ. Ariyā hi ratanattayaguṇābhiññatāya pāsāṇacchattaṃ piya garuṃ katvā passanti,
tika-s0402t:75_2: tasmā tappasādena vikkhambhanavasena vihatakileso, taggarutāya samucchedavasenāti
tika-s0402t:75_3: yojetabbaṃ agāravakaraṇahetūnaṃ samucchindanato. Tapparāyaṇatā panettha taggatikatāti
tika-s0402t:75_4: tāya catubbidhampi vakkhamānaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avisesena vā pasādagarutā
tika-s0402t:75_5: jotitāti pasādaggahaṇena aveccappasādassa itarassa ca gahaṇaṃ, tathā garutāgahaṇenāti
tika-s0402t:76_0: Maggakkhaṇe ijjhatīti yojanā. Nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvāti etena atthato catusaccādhigamo
tika-s0402t:76_1: eva lokuttarasaraṇagamananti dasseti. Tattha hi nibbānadhammo sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena,
tika-s0402t:76_3: buddhaguṇā pana sāvakagocarabhūtā pariññābhisamayavasena, tathā ariyasaṅghaguṇā.
tika-s0402t:76_4: Tenāha “kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhatī”ti. Ijjhantañca saheva ijjhati, na lokiyaṃ
tika-s0402t:76_5: viya paṭipāṭiyā asammohappaṭivedhena paṭividdhattāti adhippāyo. Ye pana vadanti “na
tika-s0402t:76_6: saraṇagamanaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā pavattati, maggassa adhigatattā pana adhigatameva
tika-s0402t:76_7: hoti ekaccānaṃ tevijjādīnaṃ lokiyavijjādayo viyā”ti, tesaṃ lokiyameva saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0402t:76_8: siyā, na lokuttaraṃ, tañca ayuttaṃ duvidhassapi icchitabbattā.
tika-s0402t:77_2: lokiyāvabodhavaseneva sammā ñāyena dassanato. Saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhīti etena
tika-s0402t:77_3: saddhūpanissayā yathāvuttalakkhaṇā paññā lokiyasaraṇagamananti dasseti. Tenāha “diṭṭhijukammanti
tika-s0402t:77_4: vuccatī”ti. Diṭṭhiyeva attano paccayehi uju karīyatīti katvā, diṭṭhi vā uju karīyati
tika-s0402t:77_5: etenāti diṭṭhijukammaṃ, tathāpavatto cittuppādo. Evañca katvā “tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto
tika-s0402t:77_6: cittuppādo”ti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti, saddhāpubbaṅgamasammādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:77_7: pana cittuppādassa tappadhānatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddhāpaṭilābhoti iminā mātādīhi
tika-s0402t:77_8: ussāhitadārakādīnaṃ viya ñāṇavippayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ dasseti, sammādiṭṭhīti iminā
tika-s0402t:78_0: Tayidaṃ lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ. Attā sanniyyātīyati appīyati pariccajīyati etenāti
tika-s0402t:78_1: attasanniyyātanaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ diṭṭhijukammaṃ. Taṃ ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:78_2: etassāti tapparāyaṇo, puggalo cittuppādo vā, tassa bhāvo tapparāyaṇatā, yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:78_3: diṭṭhijukammameva. Saraṇanti adhippāyena sissabhāvaṃ antevāsikabhāvaṃ upagacchati
tika-s0402t:78_4: etenāti sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ. Saraṇagamanādhippāyeneva paṇipatati etenāti paṇipāto.
tika-s0402t:78_5: Sabbattha yathāvuttadiṭṭhijukammavaseneva attho veditabbo. Attapariccajananti saṃsāradukkhanissaraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:78_6: attano atthabhāvassa pariccajanaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Buddhādīnaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:78_7: attasanniyyātanādīsupi tattha tattha vattabbaṃ. Evañhi tadaññanivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:79_0: Evaṃ attasanniyyātanādīni ekena pakārena dassetvā idāni aparehipi pakārehi dassetuṃ
tika-s0402t:79_1: “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tena pariyāyantarehipi attasanniyyātanaṃ katameva hoti atthassa
tika-s0402t:79_2: abhinnattāti dasseti. Āḷavakādīnanti ādi-saddena sātāgirihemavatādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:79_3: Nanu cete āḷavakādayo maggeneva āgatasaraṇagamanā, kathaṃ tesaṃ tapparāyaṇatāsaraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0402t:79_4: vuttanti? Maggenāgatasaraṇagamanehipi “so ahaṃ vicarissāmi…pe… sudhammataṃ. Te mayaṃ
tika-s0402t:79_5: vicarissāma, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ…pe… sudhammata”nti ca tehi tapparāyaṇatākārassa
tika-s0402t:80_0: So panesa ñāti…pe… vasenāti ettha ñātivasena, bhayavasena, ācariyavasena, dakkhiṇeyyavasenāti
tika-s0402t:80_1: paccekaṃ “vasenā”ti padaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tattha ñātivasenāti ñātibhāvavasena. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-s0402t:80_2: Dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātenāti dakkhiṇeyyatāhetukena paṇipatanenāti attho. Itarehīti ñātibhāvādivasappavattehi
tika-s0402t:80_3: tīhi paṇipātehi. Itarehītiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi
tika-s0402t:80_4: vuttaṃ. Vandatīti paṇipātassa lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Evarūpanti diṭṭhadhammikaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0402t:80_5: vadati. Samparāyikañhi niyyānikaṃ vā aniyyānikaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ paccāsīsanto dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātameva
tika-s0402t:81_0: Ariyamaggo eva lokuttaraṃ saraṇagamananti āha “cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphala”nti.
tika-s0402t:81_1: Sabbadukkhakkhayoti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa anuppādanirodho. Etanti “cattāri ariyasaccāni,
tika-s0402t:81_2: sammappaññāya passatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ dassanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:82_0: Niccato anupagamanādivasenāti niccanti aggahaṇādivasena. Aṭṭhānanti hetuppaṭikkhepo.
tika-s0402t:82_1: Anavakāsoti paccayappaṭikkhepo. Ubhayenapi kāraṇameva paṭikkhipati. Yanti yena kāraṇena.
tika-s0402t:82_2: Diṭṭhisampannoti maggadiṭṭhiyā samannāgato sotāpanno. Kañci saṅkhāranti catubhūmakesu
tika-s0402t:82_3: saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārampi. Niccato upagaccheyyāti niccoti gaṇheyya. Sukhato
tika-s0402t:82_4: upagaccheyyāti “ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena
tika-s0402t:82_5: sukhato gāhaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhivippayuttacittena pana ariyasāvako pariḷāhavūpasamanatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:82_6: mattahatthiparitāsito viya cokkhabrāhmaṇo ukkārabhūmiṃ kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagacchati.
tika-s0402t:82_8: Imesupi ṭhānesu catubhūmakavaseneva paricchedo veditabbo tebhūmakavaseneva vā. Yaṃ
tika-s0402t:82_9: yañhi puthujjano gāhavasena gaṇhāti, tato tato ariyasāvako gāhaṃ viniveṭheti.
tika-s0402t:83_0: Mātarantiādīsu janikā mātā, janako pitā, manussabhūto khīṇāsavo arahāti adhippeto.
tika-s0402t:83_1: Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako aññaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti? Etampi aṭṭhānaṃ, puthujjanabhāvassa
tika-s0402t:83_2: pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca phaladassanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:83_3: Paduṭṭhacittoti vadhakacittena paduṭṭhacitto. Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre
tika-s0402t:83_4: khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya. Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ
tika-s0402t:83_5: samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ saṅghaṃ “kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā”ti
tika-s0402t:83_6: evaṃ vuttehi pañcahi kāraṇehi bhindeyya. Aññaṃ satthāranti aññaṃ titthakaraṃ “ayaṃ
tika-s0402t:83_7: me satthā”ti evaṃ gaṇheyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti attho.
tika-s0402t:84_0: Na te gamissanti apāyanti te buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā tannimittaṃ apāyaṃ na gamissanti,
tika-s0402t:84_1: devakāyaṃ pana paripūressantīti attho. Dasahi ṭhānehīti dasahi kāraṇehi. Adhigaṇhantīti adhibhavanti.
tika-s0402t:85_2: caturāsītiyā hatthisahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā assasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:85_3: caturāsītiyā dhenusahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā kaññāsahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:85_4: caturāsītiyā vatthakoṭisahassānaṃ, aparimāṇassa ca khajjabhojjādibhedassa āhārassa
tika-s0402t:85_5: pariccajanavasena sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni nirantaraṃ pavattavelāmamahādānato
tika-s0402t:85_6: ekassa sotāpannassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ. Tato sataṃ sotāpannānaṃ dinnadānato
tika-s0402t:85_7: ekassa sakadāgāmino, tato ekassa anāgāmino, tato ekassa arahato, tato ekassa paccekabuddhassa,
tika-s0402t:85_8: tato sammāsambuddhassa, tato buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ,
tika-s0402t:85_9: tato cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa vihārakaraṇaṃ, tato saraṇagamanaṃ mahapphalatara”nti
tika-s0402t:85_10: imamatthaṃ pakāsentassa velāmasuttassa vasena. Vuttañhetaṃ “yaṃ, gahapati, velāmo
tika-s0402t:85_11: brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ, yo ekaṃ diṭṭhisampannaṃ bhojeyya, idaṃ tato mahapphalatara”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:86_0: Aññāṇaṃ vatthuttayassa guṇānaṃ ajānanaṃ tattha sammoho, “buddho nu kho, na nu kho”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:86_1: vicikicchā saṃsayo. Micchāñāṇaṃ tassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena viparītaggāho.
tika-s0402t:86_2: Ādi-saddena anādarāgāravādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Na mahājutikanti na ujjalaṃ, aparisuddhaṃ
tika-s0402t:86_3: apariyodātanti attho. Na mahāvipphāranti anuḷāraṃ. Sāvajjoti diṭṭhitaṇhādivasena
tika-s0402t:86_4: sadoso. Lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ viya aggahitakālaparicchedaṃ jīvitapariyantameva
tika-s0402t:86_5: hoti, tasmā tassa khandhabhedena bhedoti āha “anavajjo kālakiriyāyā”ti. Soti anavajjo
tika-s0402t:86_6: saraṇagamanabhedo. Satipi anavajjatte iṭṭhaphalopi na hotīti āha “aphalo”ti. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:87_0: Ko upāsakoti sarūpapucchā, tasmā “kiṃlakkhaṇo upāsako”ti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmāti hetupucchā.
tika-s0402t:87_1: Tena kena pavattinimittena upāsakasaddo tasmiṃ puggale niruḷhoti dasseti. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:87_2: “kasmā upāsakoti vuccatī”ti. Saddassa abhidheyyo pavattinimittaṃ tadatthassa tabbhāvakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:87_3: Kimassa sīlanti kīdisaṃ assa upāsakassa sīlaṃ, kittakena sīlenāyaṃ sīlasampanno nāma
tika-s0402t:87_4: hotīti attho. Ko ājīvoti ko assa sammāājīvo? So pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena
tika-s0402t:87_5: hotīti sopi vibhajīyatīti. Kā vipattīti kā sīlassa, ājīvassa vā vipatti. Anantarassa
tika-s0402t:87_6: hi vidhi vā paṭisedho vāti. Kā sampatīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:88_0: Yo kocīti khattiyādīsu yo koci. Tena saraṇagamanamevettha kāraṇaṃ, na jātiādivisesoti
tika-s0402t:88_1: dasseti. Upāsanatoti teneva saraṇagamanena tattha ca sakkaccakiriyāya ādaragāravabahumānādiyogena
tika-s0402t:88_2: payirupāsanato. Veramaṇiyoti veraṃ vuccati pāṇātipātādidussīlyaṃ, tassa maṇanato
tika-s0402t:88_3: hananato vināsanato veramaṇiyo, pañca viratiyo viratippadhānattā tassa sīlassa. Tenevāha
tika-s0402t:89_0: Micchāvaṇijjāti na sammāvaṇijjā ayuttavaṇijjā asāruppavaṇijjā. Pahāyāti akaraṇeneva
tika-s0402t:89_1: pajahitvā. Dhammenāti dhammato anapetena. Tena aññampi adhammikaṃ jīvikaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0402t:89_2: Samenāti avisamena. Tena kāyavisamādiduccaritaṃ vajjetvā kāyasamādinā sucaritena
tika-s0402t:89_3: ājīvaṃ dasseti. Satthavaṇijjāti āyudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā vā kāretvā vā yathākataṃ vā paṭilabhitvā
tika-s0402t:89_4: tassa vikkayo. Sattavaṇijjāti manussavikkayo. Maṃsavaṇijjāti sūnakārādayo viya migasūkarādike
tika-s0402t:89_5: posetvā maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo. Majjavaṇijjāti yaṃ kiñci majjaṃ yojetvā tassa
tika-s0402t:89_6: vikkayo. Visavaṇijjāti visaṃ yojetvā visaṃ gahetvā vā tassa vikkayo. Tattha satthavaṇijjā
tika-s0402t:89_7: paroparodhanimittatāya akaraṇīyā vuttā. Sattavaṇijjā abhujissabhāvakaraṇato, maṃsavisavaṇijjā
tika-s0402t:90_0: Tassevāti pañcaveramaṇilakkhaṇassa sīlassa ceva pañcamicchāvaṇijjālakkhaṇassa ājīvassa
tika-s0402t:90_1: ca. Vipattīti bhedo pakopo ca. Yāyāti yāya paṭipattiyā. Caṇḍāloti upāsakacaṇḍālo.
tika-s0402t:90_2: Malanti upāsakamalaṃ. Paṭikuṭṭhoti upāsakanihīno. Buddhādīsu kammakammaphalesu ca
tika-s0402t:90_3: saddhāvipariyāyo assaddhiyaṃ micchādhimokkho, yathāvuttena assaddhiyena samannāgato
tika-s0402t:90_5: nāma maṅgalaṃ hotī”ti – evaṃ bālajanaparikappitakotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena
tika-s0402t:90_6: samannāgato kotūhalamaṅgaliko. Maṅgalaṃ paccetīti diṭṭhamaṅgalādibhedaṃ maṅgalameva
tika-s0402t:90_7: pattiyāyati. No kammanti kammassakataṃ no pattiyāyati. Ito bahiddhāti ito sabbaññubuddhasāsanato
tika-s0402t:90_8: bahiddhā bāhirakasamaye. Dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesatīti duppaṭipannaṃ dakkhiṇārahasaññī
tika-s0402t:90_9: gavesati. Pubbakāraṃ karotīti dānamānanādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ paṭhamataraṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:90_10: Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapariyesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:91_0: Vipattiyaṃ vuttavipariyāyena sampatti veditabbā. Ayaṃ pana viseso – catunnampi parisānaṃ
tika-s0402t:92_0: Ādimhīti ādiatthe. Koṭiyanti pariyantakoṭiyaṃ. Vihāraggenāti ovarakakoṭṭhāsena, “imasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:92_1: gabbhe vasantānaṃ idaṃ nāma phalaṃ pāpuṇātī”tiādīnā taṃ taṃ vasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti
tika-s0402t:93_0: Pāṇehi upetanti iminā tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ dassento “yāva me jīvitaṃ
tika-s0402t:93_1: pavattatī”tiādīni vatvā puna jīvitenapi taṃ vatthuttayaṃ paṭipūjento saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0402t:93_2: rakkhāmīti uppannaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa adhippāyaṃ vibhāvento “ahañhī”tiādimāha. Pāṇehi
tika-s0402t:93_3: upetanti hi yāva me pāṇā dharanti, tāva saraṇaṃ upetaṃ. Upento ca na vācāmattena
tika-s0402t:93_4: na ekavāraṃ cittuppādamattena, atha kho pāṇānaṃ pariccajanavasenapi yāvajīvaṃ upetanti
tika-s0402t:94_0: 17-19. Sattame jāṇussoṇīti netaṃ tassa mātāpitūhi kataṃ nāmaṃ, apica kho ṭhānantarappaṭilābhaladdhanti
tika-s0402t:94_1: dassento āha “jāṇussoṇīti ṭhānantaraṃ kirā”tiādi. Ekaṃ ṭhānantaranti ekaṃ purohitaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:94_2: Uṇhīsaādikakudhabhaṇḍehi saddhiṃ laddhaṃ tathā cassa raññā dinnanti vadanti. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:94_3: “rañño santike ca laddhajāṇussoṇisakkārattā”ti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aṭṭhamanavamesu natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:95_0: 20-21. Dasame dunnikkhittanti duṭṭhu nikkhittaṃ padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ katvā manasi ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:95_1: Pajjati ñāyati attho etenāti padaṃ, atthaṃ byañjayati pakāsetīti byañjanaṃ, padameva.
tika-s0402t:95_3: pāḷi nāma natthīti āha “ubhayametaṃ pāḷiyāva nāma”nti. Pakaṭṭhānañhi vacanappabandhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:95_4: āḷiyeva pāḷīti vuccati. Sesamettha ekādasamañca uttānatthameva.
tika-s0402t:99: 25. Catutthe netabboti aññato āharitvā bodhetabbo, ñāpetabboti attho.
tika-s0402t:100_0: 27. Chaṭṭhe no cepi paṭicchādetvā karontīti pāṇātipātādīni karonto sacepi appaṭicchādetvā
tika-s0402t:100_1: karonti. Paṭicchannamevāti viññūhi garahitabbabhāvato paṭicchādanārahattā paṭicchannamevāti
tika-s0402t:100_2: vuccati. Avīciādayo padesavisesā tatthūpapannā sattā ca nirayaggahaṇena gahitāti
tika-s0402t:100_3: āha “nirayoti sahokāsakā khandhā”ti. Tiracchānayoni nāma visuṃ padesaviseso natthīti
tika-s0402t:101_0: 31. Dasame attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso, hetūti āha “atthavaseti
tika-s0402t:101_2: hi saṇḍabhūte rukkhasamūhepi vattatīti araññaggahaṇaṃ. Vanīyati vivekakāmehi bhajīyati,
tika-s0402t:101_3: vanute vā te attasampattiyā vasanatthāya yācanto viya hotīti vanaṃ, patiṭṭhahanti
tika-s0402t:101_4: ettha vivekakāmā yathādhippetavisesādhigamenāti patthaṃ, vanesu patthaṃ gahanaṭṭhāne
tika-s0402t:101_5: senāsanaṃ vanapatthaṃ. Kiñcāpīti anujānanasambhāvanatthe nipāto. Kiṃ anujānāti? Nippariyāyato
tika-s0402t:101_6: araññabhāvaṃ gāmato bahi araññanti. Tenāha “nippariyāyenā”tiādi. Kiṃ sambhāveti?
tika-s0402t:101_7: Āraññakaṅganipphādakattaṃ. Yañhi āraññakaṅganipphādakaṃ, taṃ visesato araññanti vattabbanti.
tika-s0402t:101_8: Tenāha “yaṃ taṃ pañcadhanusatika”ntiādi. Nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlāti indakhīlato
tika-s0402t:101_9: bahi nikkhamitvā, tato bahi paṭṭhāyāti attho. Bahi indakhīlāti vā yattha dve tīṇi
tika-s0402t:101_10: indakhīlāni, tattha bahiddhā indakhīlato paṭṭhāya. Yattha taṃ natthi, tadarahaṭṭhānato
tika-s0402t:101_11: paṭṭhāyāti vadanti. Gāmantanti gāmasamīpaṃ. Anupacāraṭṭhānanti niccakiccavasena na
tika-s0402t:101_12: upacaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha “yattha na kasīyati na vapīyatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:102_0: Attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti etena satthā attano vivekābhiratiṃ pakāseti.
tika-s0402t:102_1: Tattha diṭṭhadhammo nāma ayaṃ paccakkho attabhāvo, sukhavihāro nāma catunnaṃ iriyāpathavihārānaṃ
tika-s0402t:102_2: phāsutā. Ekakassa hi araññe antamaso uccāravassāvakiccaṃ upādāya sabbe iriyāpathā
tika-s0402t:102_3: phāsukā honti, tasmā diṭṭhadhamme sukhavihāraṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti evaṃ vā
tika-s0402t:103_0: Pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamānoti kathaṃ araññavāsena pacchimā janatā anukampitā
tika-s0402t:103_1: hoti? Saddhāpabbajitā hi kulaputtā bhagavato araññavāsaṃ disvā “bhagavāpi nāma araññasenāsanāni
tika-s0402t:103_2: na muñcati, yassa nevatthi pariññātabbaṃ na pahātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ na sacchikātabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:103_3: kimaṅgaṃ pana maya”nti cintetvā tattha vasitabbameva maññissanti, evaṃ khippameva
tika-s0402t:103_4: dukkhassantakarā bhavissanti. Evaṃ pacchimā janatā anukampitā hoti. Etamatthaṃ dassento
tika-s0402t:104_0: 32. Ekādasame vijjaṃ bhajantīti vijjābhāgiyā, vijjābhāge vijjākoṭṭhāse vattantītipi
tika-s0402t:104_1: vijjābhāgiyā. Padaṃ pacchindatīti maggacittassa patiṭṭhaṃ upacchindati, maggacittaṃ
tika-s0402t:104_2: patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na detīti attho. Ubbaṭṭetvāti samucchedavasena samūlaṃ uddharitvā.
tika-s0402t:104_3: Aṭṭhasu ṭhānesūti buddhādīsu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu. Rāgassa khayavirāgenāti rāgassa khayasaṅkhātena
tika-s0402t:107_0: 33. Catutthassa paṭhame bhavanti ettha patiṭṭhahantīti bhūmi, asappurisānaṃ bhūmi
tika-s0402t:107_1: asappurisabhūmi. Sappurisabhūmiyampi eseva nayo. Kataṃ na jānātīti akataññū, asamatthasamāsoyaṃ
tika-s0402t:107_2: gamakattā “asūriyapassā”tiādīsu viya. Tenāha “kataṃ na jānātī”ti. Akatavedīti etthāpi
tika-s0402t:107_3: eseva nayo. Pākaṭaṃ katvā na jānātīti “idañcidañca mayhaṃ iminā kata”nti saṅghamajjhagaṇamajjhādīsu
tika-s0402t:107_4: pākaṭaṃ katvā na jānāti, na pakāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaññātanti thomanāvasena upagantvā
tika-s0402t:108_0: 34. Dutiye vassasataparimāṇamāyu assāti vassasatāyuko, vassasatāyukatañca vassasatāyukakāle
tika-s0402t:108_1: jātasseva hoti, nāññassāti āha “vassasatāyukakāle jāto”ti. Vassasataṃ jīvati sīlenāti
tika-s0402t:108_2: vassasatajīvī. Vassasatanti ca accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Tenāha “sakalaṃ vassasataṃ
tika-s0402t:108_3: jīvanto”ti. Mātāpitūnaṃ mātāva bahūpakāratarāti tassāyeva padhānabhāvena paṭikātabbattā
tika-s0402t:108_4: dakkhiṇaṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ vadanti. Hadayalohitaṃ pāyetvāti khīraṃ sandhāya vadati. Lohitañhi
tika-s0402t:108_5: khīrabhāvena pariṇāmaṃ gacchati. Tyāssāti te assa. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:109_0: 35. Tatiye tenupasaṅkamīti ettha yenādhippāyena so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami,
tika-s0402t:109_1: taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “so hi brāhmaṇo”tiādimāha. Virajjhanapañhanti yaṃ pañhaṃ
tika-s0402t:109_2: puṭṭho virajjhitvā kathesi, aviparītaṃ katvā sampādetuṃ na sakkoti, tādisaṃ pañhanti
tika-s0402t:109_3: attho. Ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhanti ubhohi koṭīhi yuttaṃ pañhaṃ. “Kiṃvādī bhavaṃ gotamo”ti
tika-s0402t:109_4: hi puṭṭho “kiriyavādimhī”ti vā vadeyya “akiriyavādimhī”ti vā, tasmā imassa pañhassa
tika-s0402t:109_6: ayaṃ pañho. Uggilitunti dve koṭiyo mocetvā kathetuṃ asakkonto bahi nīharituṃ atthato
tika-s0402t:109_7: apanetuṃ na sakkhissati. Dve koṭiyo mocento hi taṃ bahi nīharati nāma. Niggilitunti
tika-s0402t:109_8: pucchāya dosaṃ datvā hāretuṃ asakkonto pavesetuṃ na sakkhissati. Tattha dosaṃ datvā
tika-s0402t:109_9: hārento hi gilitvā viya adassanaṃ gamento paveseti nāma. Kiṃladdhikoti kiṃddiṭṭhiko.
tika-s0402t:109_10: Vadanti etenāti vādo, diṭṭhi. Ko vādo etassāti kiṃvādī. Kimakkhāyīti kimabhidhāyī,
tika-s0402t:109_11: kīdisī dhammakathā. Tenāha “kiṃ nāma…pe… pucchatī”ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:110: 36. Catutthe dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti dakkhiṇeyyā. Āhunaṃ vuccati dānaṃ, taṃ arahantīti āhuneyyā.
tika-s0402t:111_0: 37. Pañcame kathamayaṃ migāramātā nāma jātāti āha “sā hī”tiādi. Sabbajeṭṭhakassa
tika-s0402t:111_1: puttassāti attano puttesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ jātassa puttassa. Ayyakaseṭṭhinova samānanāmakattāti
tika-s0402t:111_2: migāraseṭṭhinā eva sadisanāmakattā. Tassā kira sabbajeṭṭhassa puttassa nāmaggahaṇadivase
tika-s0402t:111_3: ayyakassa migāraseṭṭhisseva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Anibaddhavāso hutvāti ekasmiṃyeva vihāre
tika-s0402t:111_4: nibaddhavāso ahutvā. Dhuvaparibhogānīti niyataparibhogāni. Nanu bhagavā kadāci cārikampi
tika-s0402t:111_5: pakkamati, kathaṃ tāni senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogena paribhuñjīti āha “utuvassaṃ cārikaṃ
tika-s0402t:111_6: caritvāpī”tiādi. Tattha utuvassanti hemantagimhe sandhāya vadati. Maggaṃ ṭhapetvāti
tika-s0402t:111_7: therassa āgamanamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā. Uṇhavalāhakāti uṇhautuno paccayabhūtameghamālāsamuṭṭhāpakā
tika-s0402t:111_8: devaputtā. Tesaṃ kira tathācittuppādasamakālameva yathicchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ uṇhaṃ pharamānā,
tika-s0402t:111_9: valāhakamālā nātibahalā ito cito nabhaṃ chādentī vidhāvati. Esa nayo sītavalāhakavassavalāhakāsu.
tika-s0402t:111_10: Abbhavalāhakā pana devatā sītuṇhavassehi vinā kevalaṃ abbhapaṭalasseva samuṭṭhāpakā
tika-s0402t:111_11: veditabbā. Kevalaṃ vā vātasseva, teneva devatā vātavalāhakā.
tika-s0402t:112_0: Ettha ca yaṃ vassāne ca sisire ca abbhaṃ uppajjati, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pākatikameva.
tika-s0402t:112_1: Yaṃ pana abbhamhiyeva atiabbhaṃ sattāhampi candasūriye chādetvā ekandhakāraṃ karoti,
tika-s0402t:112_2: yañca cittavesākhamāsesu abbhaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena uppannaṃ abbhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:112_3: Yo ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ utumhi uttaradakkhiṇādipakativāto hoti, ayaṃ utusamuṭṭhāno. Vātepi
tika-s0402t:112_4: vanarukkhakkhandhādippadālano ativāto nāma atthi. Ayañceva, yo ca aññopi akālavāto,
tika-s0402t:112_5: ayañca devatānubhāvena nibbatto. Yaṃ gimhāne uṇhaṃ, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānikaṃ pākatimeva.
tika-s0402t:112_6: Yaṃ pana uṇhepi atiuṇhaṃ sītakāle ca uppannaṃ uṇhaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena nibbattaṃ.
tika-s0402t:112_7: Yaṃ vassāne ca hemante ca sītaṃ hoti, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānameva. Yaṃ pana sītepi atisītaṃ,
tika-s0402t:112_8: gimhe ca uppannaṃ sītaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena nibbattaṃ. Yaṃ vassike cattāro māse
tika-s0402t:112_9: vassaṃ, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānameva, yaṃ pana vasseyeva ativassaṃ, yañca cittavesākhamāsesu
tika-s0402t:113_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira vassavalāhakadevaputto tagarakūṭavāsikhīṇāsavattherassa
tika-s0402t:113_1: santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Thero – “kosi tva”nti pucchi. Ahaṃ, bhante, vassavalāhako
tika-s0402t:113_2: devaputtoti. Tumhākaṃ kira cittena devo vassatīti? Āma, bhanteti. Passitukāmā mayanti.
tika-s0402t:113_3: Temissatha, bhanteti. Meghasīsaṃ vā gajjitaṃ vā na paññāyati, kathaṃ temissāmāti?
tika-s0402t:113_4: Bhante, amhākaṃ cittena devo vassati, tumhe paṇṇasālaṃ pavisathāti. Sādhu devaputtāti
tika-s0402t:113_5: pāde dhovitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi. Devaputto tasmiṃ pavisanteyeva ekaṃ gītaṃ gāyitvā
tika-s0402t:113_6: hatthaṃ ukkhipi, samantā tiyojanaṭṭhānaṃ ekameghaṃ ahosi. Thero aḍḍhatinto paṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhoti.
tika-s0402t:114_0: Kāmaṃ heṭṭhā vuttāpi devatā cātumahārājikāva, tā pana tena tena visesena vatvā idāni
tika-s0402t:114_1: tadaññe paṭhamabhūmike kāmāvacaradeve sāmaññato gaṇhanto “cātumahārājikā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:114_3: te sinerussa pabbatassa vemajjhe honti. Tesu pabbataṭṭhakāpi atthi ākāsaṭṭhakāpi.
tika-s0402t:114_4: Tesaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā. Khiḍḍāpadosikā manopadosikā candimā devaputto
tika-s0402t:114_5: sūriyo devaputtoti ete sabbepi cātumahārājikadevalokaṭṭhā eva.
tika-s0402t:115_0: Tāvatiṃsāti tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ nāmaṃ, tepi atthi pabbataṭṭhakā, atthi ākāsaṭṭhakā,
tika-s0402t:115_1: tesaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā. Tathā yāmādīnaṃ. Ekadevalokepi hi devānaṃ
tika-s0402t:115_2: paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ appattā nāma natthi. Tattha maghena māṇavena saddhiṃ
tika-s0402t:115_3: macalagāme kālaṃ katvā tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti taṃ sahacāritaṃ
tika-s0402t:115_4: ṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ, tadeva tāvatiṃsaṃ, taṃ nivāso etesanti tāvatiṃsāti vadanti. Yasmā
tika-s0402t:115_5: pana sesacakkavāḷesupi chakāmāvacaradevalokā atthi. Vuttampi cetaṃ “sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ
tika-s0402t:115_6: sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsāna”nti. Tasmā nāmapaṇṇattiyevesā tassa devalokassāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:115_7: Dukkhato yātā apayātāti yāmā. Attano sirisampattiyā tusaṃ itā gatāti tusitā. Nimmāne
tika-s0402t:115_8: rati etesanti nimmānaratino. Vasavattī devatāti paranimmitavasavattino devā. Paranimmitesu
tika-s0402t:116_0: Brūhito parivuddho tehi tehi jhānādīhi visiṭṭhehi guṇehīti brahmā. Vaṇṇavantatāya
tika-s0402t:116_1: ceva dīghāyukatāya ca brahmapārisajjādīhi mahanto brahmāti mahābrahmā. Tassa parisāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:116_2: bhavā paricārikāti brahmapārisajjā. Tasseva purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti brahmapurohitā.
tika-s0402t:116_3: Ābhassarehi parittā ābhā etesanti parittābhā. Appamāṇā ābhā etesanti appamāṇābhā.
tika-s0402t:116_4: Dīpikāya acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī viya sarati vissaratīti
tika-s0402t:116_5: ābhassarā, yathāvuttappabhāya ābhāsanasīlā vā ābhassarā. Subhāti sobhanā pabhā. Subhāti
tika-s0402t:116_6: hi ekagghanā niccalā sarīrābhā vuccati, sā parittā subhā etesanti parittasubhā. Appamāṇā
tika-s0402t:116_7: subhā etesanti appamāṇasubhā. Subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā, subhena sarīrappabhāvaṇṇena
tika-s0402t:116_9: Tattha sobhanāya pabhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇāti vattabbe bhā-saddassa rassattaṃ antima
tika-s0402t:116_10: ṇa-kārassa ha-kārañca katvā “subhakiṇhā”ti vuttaṃ. Vipulaphalā vehapphalā. Vipulaphalāti
tika-s0402t:116_11: ca vipulasantasukhavaṇṇādiphalā. Appakena kālena attano ṭhānaṃ na vijahantīti avihā.
tika-s0402t:116_12: Kenaci na tapanīyāti atappā. Akicchena sukhena passitabbā manuññarūpatāyāti sudassā.
tika-s0402t:116_13: Suparisuddhadassanatāya sammā passanti sīlenāti sudassī. Ukkaṭṭhasampattīhi yogato
tika-s0402t:117: Kāyasakkhīhīti nāmakāyena desanāya sampaṭicchanavasena sakkhibhūtehi. Halāhalanti kolāhalaṃ. Mahaggatacittenāti catutthajjhānapādakena abhiññācittena.
tika-s0402t:118_0: Nanu ca “ajjhattanti kāmabhavo, bahiddhāti rūpārūpabhavo”ti ca ayuttametaṃ? Yasmiñhi
tika-s0402t:118_1: bhave sattā bahutaraṃ kālaṃ vasanti, so nesaṃ ajjhattaṃ. Yasmiñca appataraṃ kālaṃ
tika-s0402t:118_2: vasanti, so nesaṃ bahiddhāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ. Rūpārūpabhave ca sattā cirataraṃ vasanti,
tika-s0402t:118_3: appataraṃ kāmabhave, tasmā “ajjhattanti kāmabhavo, bahiddhāti rūpārūpabhavo”ti kasmā
tika-s0402t:118_4: vuttanti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Catutthameva koṭṭhāsanti vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyisaṅkhātaṃ catutthaṃ
tika-s0402t:118_6: Ālayoti saṅgo. Patthanāti “kathaṃ nāma tatrūpapannā bhavissāmā”ti abhipatthanā. Abhilāsoti
tika-s0402t:119_0: Etthāyaṃ adhippāyo – kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kenacipi pakārena vikkhambhanamattenapi
tika-s0402t:119_1: avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattaggāhassa visesapaccayoti
tika-s0402t:119_2: ajjhattaṃ nāma. Tattha bandhanaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ, tena saṃyutto ajjhattasaṃyojano.
tika-s0402t:120_0: Chandarāgavaseneva ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ bahiddhāsaṃyojanañca puggalaṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-s0402t:120_2: vuccati kāmadhātu, paṭisandhiyā paccayabhāvena taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni.
tika-s0402t:120_3: Tattha ca kammunā vipākaṃ sattena ca dukkhaṃ saṃyojentīti saṃyojanāni, sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsakāmarāgapaṭighā.
tika-s0402t:120_4: Uddhaṃ vuccati rūpārūpadhātu, vuttanayenetaṃ uddhaṃ bhajantīti uddhambhāgiyāni, saṃyojanāni.
tika-s0402t:120_5: Rūparāgārūparāgamānuddhaccāvijjā. Atha vā orambhāgo vuccati kāmadhātu rūpārūpabhavato
tika-s0402t:120_6: heṭṭhābhūtattā, tatrūpapattiyā paccayabhāvato orambhāgassa hitānīti orambhāgiyāni
tika-s0402t:120_7: yathā “vacchāyogo duhako”ti. Uddhambhāgo nāma mahaggatabhāvo, tassa hitāni uddhambhāgiyāni.
tika-s0402t:120_8: Pādesu baddhapāsāṇo viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni heṭṭhā ākaḍḍhamānākārāni honti.
tika-s0402t:120_9: Hatthehi gahitarukkhasākhā viya pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni upari ākaḍḍhamānākārāni.
tika-s0402t:120_10: Yesañhi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni appahīnāni, te bhavaggepi nibbatte etāni ākaḍḍhitvā kāmabhaveyeva
tika-s0402t:120_11: pātenti, tasmā etāni pañca gacchantaṃ vārenti, gataṃ puna ānenti. Rūparāgādīni pañca
tika-s0402t:120_12: gacchantaṃ na vārenti, āgantuṃ pana na denti.
tika-s0402t:121_1: agaṇanūpagāni hontīti labbhamānānampi puthujjanānaṃ vasena avibhajitvā ariyānaṃ yogavasena
tika-s0402t:121_3: sandhāya vadati. Dvedhā paricchinnoti kāmasugatirūpārūpabhavavasena dvīhi pakārehi paricchinno.
tika-s0402t:122_0: Vacchakasālopamaṃ uttānatthameva. Opammasaṃsandane pana kassaci kilesassa avikkhambhitattā,
tika-s0402t:122_1: kathañcipi avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayattā, imesaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-s0402t:122_2: abbhantaraṭṭhena anto nāma. Rūpārūpabhavo tabbipariyāyato bahi nāma. Tathā hi yassa
tika-s0402t:122_3: orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, so ajjhattasaṃyojano vutto. Yassa tāni pahīnāni,
tika-s0402t:122_4: so bahiddhāsaṃyojano. Tasmā anto asamucchinnabandhanatāya bahi ca pavattamānabhavaṅgasantānatāya
tika-s0402t:122_5: antobaddho bahisayito nāma. Nirantarappavattabhavaṅgasantānavasena hi sayitavohāro.
tika-s0402t:122_6: Kāmaṃ nesaṃ bahibandhanampi asamucchinnaṃ, antobandhanassa pana mūlatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:122_7: Tenāha “saṃyojanaṃ pana tesaṃ kāmāvacarūpanibaddhamevā”ti. Iminā nayena sesattayepi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:123_0: Ettāvatā ca kirāti kira-saddo arucisaṃsūcanattho. Tenettha ācariyavādassa attano
tika-s0402t:123_2: tañca catubbidhanti ācariyatthero “catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā”ti āha. Tatthāti
tika-s0402t:123_4: niddese viya uddesepi pātimokkhasaṃvarova therena vutto “sīlavā”ti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:123_6: Tattha avadhāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tathā
tika-s0402t:123_7: hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu ca sikkhāpadavītikkame gilānapaccayassa apaccavekkhitaparibhoge
tika-s0402t:123_8: ca āpatti vihitāti. Tīṇīti indriyasaṃvarasīlādīni. Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti
tika-s0402t:123_9: sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kiṃ atthi yathā “pātimokkhasaṃvaro”ti?
tika-s0402t:123_10: Ācariyassa sammukhatāya appaṭikkhipanto upacārena pucchanto viya vadati. Tenāha “ananujānanto”ti.
tika-s0402t:123_12: Itaradvayepi eseva nayo. Paccayuppattimattakanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti. Uppādanahetukā
tika-s0402t:123_13: hi paccayānaṃ uppatti. Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti
tika-s0402t:123_14: adhippāyo. Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa paripālanavasena
tika-s0402t:123_15: pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti. Idāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasseva padhānabhāvaṃ
tika-s0402t:123_16: byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yassā”tiādimāha. Tattha so pātimokkhasaṃvaro.
tika-s0402t:124_0: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti yo hi naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi
tika-s0402t:124_1: dukkhehīti pātimokkhanti laddhanāmena sikkhāpadasīlena pihitakāyavacīdvāro. So pana
tika-s0402t:124_2: yasmā evaṃbhūto tena samannāgato nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “pātīmokkhasaṃvarena samannāgato”ti.
tika-s0402t:125_0: Aparo nayo – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato, pāpakiriyāya ca sukarabhāvato, puññakiriyāya
tika-s0402t:125_1: ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya
tika-s0402t:125_2: vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanato
tika-s0402t:125_3: gamanasīloti pātī, maraṇavasena tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīlo vā
tika-s0402t:125_4: pātī, sattasantāno, cittameva vā. Taṃ pātiṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:125_5: Cittassa hi vimokkhena satto vimuttoti vuccati. Vuttañhi “cittavodānā visujjhantī”ti,
tika-s0402t:126_0: Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti, “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ
tika-s0402t:126_1: sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ, tassa pātino sattassa
tika-s0402t:126_2: taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. “Kaṇṭhekāḷo”tiādīnaṃ viyassa samāsasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:127: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0402t:129: Tassa pātino mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti, taṇhādisaṃkileso. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0402t:130: “Taṇhā janehi purisaṃ, taṇhādutiyo puriso”ti ca ādi;
tika-s0402t:132: Atha vā patati etthāti pāti, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0402t:135: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti pātimokkho.
tika-s0402t:136_0: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā “patī”ti vuccati, muccati etenāti
tika-s0402t:136_1: mokkho, patino mokkho patimokkho tena paññattattāti, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Sabbaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0402t:136_2: vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttaṭṭhena mokkho cāti patimokkho, patimokkho
tika-s0402t:136_3: eva pātimokkho. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti ādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.
tika-s0402t:137_0: Atha vā pa-iti pakāre, atīti accantatthe nipāto, tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti
tika-s0402t:137_1: pātimokkho. Idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena, samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena,
tika-s0402t:137_2: samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkho. Pati pati mokkhoti vā
tika-s0402t:137_3: patimokkho, tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho. Patimokkho eva pātimokkho.
tika-s0402t:137_4: Mokkho vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa patibimbabhūtoti patimokkho. Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa
tika-s0402t:137_5: aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato
tika-s0402t:138: Atha vā mokkhaṃ pati vattati, mokkhābhimukhanti vā patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evamettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:139_1: gocarena sampanno, sampannaācāragocaroti attho. Appamattakesūti parittakesu anāpattigamanīyesu.
tika-s0402t:139_2: “Dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattesū”ti apare. Vajjesūti gārayhesu. Te pana ekantato akusalasabhāvā
tika-s0402t:139_3: hontīti āha “akusaladhammesū”ti. Bhayadassīti bhayato dassanasīlo, paramāṇumattampi
tika-s0402t:139_4: vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā bhāyanasīlo. Sammā ādiyitvāti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ
tika-s0402t:139_5: sabbasova ādiyitvā. Sikkhāpadesūti niddhāraṇe bhummanti samudāyato avayavaniddhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:139_6: dassento “sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhatī”ti atthamāha, sikkhāpadameva
tika-s0402t:139_7: hi samādātabbaṃ sikkhitabbañcāti adhippāyo. Yaṃ kiñci sikkhāpadesūti sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu
tika-s0402t:139_9: Yaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ, taṃ pana dvāravasena duvidhamevāti āha “kāyikaṃ
tika-s0402t:139_10: vā vācasikaṃ vā”ti. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe sikkhāpadesūti ādhāre bhummaṃ sikkhābhāgesu
tika-s0402t:140: Aññataraṃ devaghaṭanti aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ. Āgāmī hotīti paṭisandhivasena āgamanasīlo hoti. Āgantāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Iminā aṅgenāti iminā kāraṇena.
tika-s0402t:142_0: Cittassa sukhumabhāvo idha sukhamattabhāvamāpannena daṭṭhabboti āha “sabbāpi hi tā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:142_1: Tantivasenāti kevalaṃ tantiṭṭhapanavasena, na pana therassa kassaci maggassa vā phalassa
tika-s0402t:142_2: vā uppādanatthāya, nāpi sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ yojanatthāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:143_0: 38. Chaṭṭhe mahākaccānoti gihikāle ujjenirañño purohitaputto abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko
tika-s0402t:143_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ca. Varaṇā nāma rukkho, tassa avidūre bhavattā nagarampi varaṇasaddena
tika-s0402t:143_2: vuccatīti āha “varaṇā nāma ekaṃ nagara”nti. Dvandapadassa paccekaṃ abhisambandho
tika-s0402t:143_3: hotīti hetusaddaṃ paccekaṃ yojetvā dassento “kāmarāgābhinivesahetū”tiādimāha. Hetusaddena
tika-s0402t:143_4: sambandhe sati yo attho sambhavati, taṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0402t:143_5: kāmarāgena abhiniviṭṭhattāti etena kāmarāgābhinivesahetūti imassa atthaṃ dīpeti,
tika-s0402t:143_6: tathā vinibaddhattātiādīhi kāmarāgavinibaddhahetūtiādīnaṃ. Tato mukhoti tadabhimukho.
tika-s0402t:144_0: 39. Sattame madhurāyanti uttaramadhurāyaṃ. Gundāvaneti kaṇhagundāvane, kāḷapippalivaneti
tika-s0402t:144_1: attho. Jarājiṇṇeti jarāya jiṇṇe, na byādhiādīnaṃ vasena jiṇṇasadise nāpi akālikena
tika-s0402t:144_2: jarāya abhibhūte. Vayovuddheti jiṇṇattā eva cassa vayovuddhippattiyā vuddhena sīlādivuddhiyā.
tika-s0402t:144_3: Jātimahallaketi jātiyā mahantatāya cirarattatāya mahallake, na bhogaparivārādīhīti
tika-s0402t:144_4: attho. Addhagateti ettha addha-saddo dīghakālavācīti āha “dīghakāladdhānaṃ atikkante”ti.
tika-s0402t:144_5: Vayoti purimapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha “pacchimavaya”nti, vassasatassa tatiyakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0402t:145_0: Bhavati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti bhūmi, kāraṇanti āha “yena kāraṇenā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:145_1: Paripakkoti pariṇato, vuddhibhāvaṃ pattoti attho. Moghajiṇṇoti anto thirakaraṇānaṃ
tika-s0402t:145_2: dhammānaṃ abhāvena tucchajiṇṇo nāma. Bāladārakopi daharoti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:145_3: “yuvā”ti vuttaṃ. Atikkantapaṭhamavayā eva sattā sabhāvena palitasirā hontīti paṭhamavaye
tika-s0402t:145_4: ṭhitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “susukāḷakeso”ti vuttaṃ. Bhadrenāti laddhakena. Ekacco hi daharopi
tika-s0402t:145_5: samāno kāṇo vā hoti kuṇiādīnaṃ vā aññataro, so na bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato
tika-s0402t:145_6: nāma hoti. Yo pana abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko sabbasampattisampanno yaṃ yadeva
tika-s0402t:145_7: alaṅkāraparihāraṃ icchati, tena tena alaṅkato devaputto viya carati, ayaṃ bhadrena
tika-s0402t:145_8: yobbanena samannāgato nāma hoti. Tenevāha “yena yobbanena samannāgato”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:146_0: Yamhi saccañca dhammo cāti yamhi puggale soḷasahākārehi paṭividdhattā catubbidhaṃ
tika-s0402t:146_1: saccaṃ, ñāṇena sacchikatattā navavidhalokuttaradhammo ca atthi. Ahiṃsāti desanāmattametaṃ,
tika-s0402t:146_2: yamhi pana catubbidhāpi appamaññābhāvanā atthīti attho. Saṃyamo damoti sīlañceva
tika-s0402t:146_3: indriyasaṃvaro ca. Vantamaloti maggañāṇena nīhaṭamalo. Dhīroti dhitisampanno. Theroti
tika-s0402t:146_4: so imehi thirabhāvakāraṇehi samannāgatattā theroti pavuccatīti attho.
tika-s0402t:147_0: 40. Aṭṭhame “corā balavanto hontī”ti padaṃ uddharitvā yehi kāraṇehi te balavanto
tika-s0402t:147_1: honti, tesaṃ sabbhāvaṃ dassento “pakkhasampannā”tiādimāha. Tattha nivāsaṭṭhānasampannatā
tika-s0402t:147_2: giriduggādisabbhāvato. Atiyātunti anto yātuṃ, gantuṃ pavisitunti attho. Taṃ pana
tika-s0402t:147_3: antopavisanaṃ kenaci kāraṇena bahigatassa hotīti āha “bahiddhā janapadacārikaṃ caritvā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:147_4: Niyyātunti bahi nikkhamituṃ. Tañca bahinikkhamanaṃ bahiddhākaraṇīye sati sambhavatīti
tika-s0402t:147_5: āha “corā janapadaṃ vilumpantī”tiādi. Anusaññātunti anusañcarituṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:148_0: 41. Navame micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetūti ettha adhi-saddo anatthakoti āha “micchāpaṭipattiyā
tika-s0402t:148_1: karaṇahetū”ti. Na ārādhakoti na sampādako na paripūrako. Ñāyati paṭivijjhanavasena
tika-s0402t:148_2: nibbānaṃ gacchatīti ñāyo, so eva taṃsamaṅginaṃ vaṭṭadukkhapātato dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti
tika-s0402t:148_3: ñāyo dhammo, ariyamaggo. So panettha saha vipassanāya adhippetoti āha “sahavipassanakaṃ
tika-s0402t:148_4: magga”nti. Ārādhanaṃ nāma saṃsiddhi, sā pana yasmā sampādanena paripūraṇena icchitā,
tika-s0402t:149_0: 42. Dasame duggahitehīti atthato byañjanato ca duṭṭhu gahitehi, ūnādhikaviparītapadapaccābhaṭṭhādivasena
tika-s0402t:149_1: vilometvā gahitehīti attho. Uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitehīti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ duggahassa
tika-s0402t:152_0: 43. Pañcamassa paṭhame uddhaccena samannāgatāti akappiye kappiyasaññitāya, kappiye
tika-s0402t:152_1: akappiyasaññitāya, avajje vajjasaññitāya, vajje avajjasaññitāya uddhaccappakatikā.
tika-s0402t:152_2: Ye hi vinaye apakataññuno saṃkilesavodāniyesu dhammesu na kusalā sakiñcanakārino
tika-s0402t:152_3: vippaṭisārabahulā, tesaṃ anuppannañca uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, uppannañca bhiyyobhāvaṃ
tika-s0402t:152_4: vepullaṃ āpajjati. Sārābhāvena tucchattā naḷo viyāti naḷo, mānoti āha “unnaḷāti uggatanaḷā”ti.
tika-s0402t:152_5: Tenāha “uṭṭhitatucchamānā”ti. Māno hi seyyassa seyyoti sadisoti ca pavattiyā visesato
tika-s0402t:152_6: tuccho. Cāpallenāti capalabhāvena, taṇhāloluppenāti attho. Mukhakharāti mukhena pharusā,
tika-s0402t:153_1: Vissaṭṭhasatinoti sativirahitā. Paccayavekallena vijjamānāyapi satiyā satikiccaṃ
tika-s0402t:153_2: kātuṃ asamatthatāya evaṃ vuttā. Na sampajānantīti asampajānā, taṃyoganivattiyaṃ cāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:153_3: akāro “ahetukā dhammā, abhikkhuko āvāso”tiādīsu viyāti āha “nippaññā”ti, paññārahitāti
tika-s0402t:153_4: attho. Pāḷiyaṃ vibbhantacittāti ubbhantacittā. Samādhivirahena laddhokāsena uddhaccena
tika-s0402t:153_5: tesaṃ samādhivirahānaṃ cittaṃ nānārammaṇesu paribbhamati vanamakkaṭo viya vanasākhāsu.
tika-s0402t:153_6: Pākatindriyāti saṃvarābhāvena gihikāle viya vivaṭaindriyā. Tenāha “pakatiyā ṭhitehī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:154_0: 44. Dutiye bhaṇḍanaṃ vuccati kalahassa pubbabhāgoti kalahassa hetubhūtā paribhāsā
tika-s0402t:154_1: taṃsadisī ca aniṭṭhakiriyā bhaṇḍanaṃ nāma. Kalahajātāti hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakappatto
tika-s0402t:154_2: kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Viruddhavādanti “ayaṃ
tika-s0402t:154_3: dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo”tiādinā viruddhavādabhūtaṃ vivādaṃ. Mukhasannissitatāya vācā
tika-s0402t:154_4: idha “mukha”nti adhippetāti āha “dubbhāsitā vācā mukhasattiyoti vuccantī”ti. Catubbidhampi
tika-s0402t:154_5: saṅghakammaṃ sīmāparicchinnehi pakatattehi bhikkhūhi ekato kattabbattā ekakammaṃ
tika-s0402t:154_6: nāma. Pañcavidhopi pātimokkhuddeso ekato uddisitabbattā ekuddeso nāma. Paññattaṃ
tika-s0402t:154_7: pana sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato samasikkhatā nāma.
tika-s0402t:154_8: Pāḷiyaṃ khīrodakībhūtāti yathā khīrañca udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati, visuṃ na
tika-s0402t:154_9: hoti, ekattaṃ viya upeti. Satipi hi ubhayesaṃ kalāpānaṃ paramatthato bhede pacurajanehi
tika-s0402t:154_10: pana duviññeyyanānattaṃ khīrodakaṃ samoditaṃ accantameva saṃsaṭṭhaṃ viya hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:154_11: evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattūpagatacittuppādā viyāti khīrodakībhūtāti evamettha attho
tika-s0402t:154_12: daṭṭhabbo. Mettācakkhūhīti mettācittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā olokanacakkhūhi. Tāni hi
tika-s0402t:155_0: 45. Tatiye aggavatīti ettha agga-saddo uttamapariyāyo, tena visiṭṭhassa puggalassa,
tika-s0402t:155_1: visiṭṭhāya vā paṭipattiyā gahaṇaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “aggavatīti uttamapuggalavatī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:155_2: Avigatataṇhatāya taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahuṃ lanti ādiyantīti bahulā, bahulā eva
tika-s0402t:155_3: bāhulikā yathā “venayiko”ti. Te pana yasmā paccayabahubhāvāya yuttappayuttā nāma
tika-s0402t:155_4: honti, tasmā āha “cīvarādibāhullāya paṭipannā”ti. Sikkhāya ādaragāravābhāvato sithilaṃ
tika-s0402t:155_5: adaḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti sāthalikāti vuttaṃ. Sithilanti ca bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, sithilasaddena
tika-s0402t:155_6: vā samānatthassa sāthalasaddassa vasena sāthalikāti padasiddhi veditabbā. Avagamanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0402t:155_8: upadhivivitte. Oropitadhurāti ujjhitussāhā. Duvidhampi vīriyanti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca vīriyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:156_0: 46. Catutthe idaṃ dukkhanti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa paccakkhato aggahitabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:156_1: vuttaṃ. Ettakameva dukkhanti tassa paricchijja aggahitabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Ito uddhaṃ
tika-s0402t:156_2: dukkhaṃ natthīti anavasesetvā aggahitabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Yathāsabhāvato nappajānantīti
tika-s0402t:156_3: sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena asammohato nappaṭivijjhanti. Asammohapaṭivedho ca yathā
tika-s0402t:156_4: tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte paccā dukkhassa rūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā pavatti.
tika-s0402t:156_5: Accantakkhayoti accantakkhayanimittaṃ nibbānaṃ. Asamuppattīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:156_6: Yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma tadubhayampi nirujjhati,
tika-s0402t:156_7: taṃ tesaṃ asamuppatti nibbānaṃ dukkhanirodhoti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:157_1: “Kasaṭaparisā”ti hi vattabbe “parisākasaṭo”ti vuttaṃ. Parisāmaṇḍoti etthāpi eseva
tika-s0402t:158_0: 48. Chaṭṭhe gambhīrāti agādhā dukkhogāḷhā. Pāḷivasenāti iminā yo dhammapaṭisambhidāya
tika-s0402t:158_1: visayo gambhīrabhāvo, tamāha. Dhammappaṭivedhassa hi dukkarabhāvato dhammassa pāḷiyā
tika-s0402t:158_3: vuttaṃ tassa “animittamanaññāta”ntiādinā pāḷivasena gambhīratāya labbhanato. Tathā
tika-s0402t:158_4: hi tattha tā gāthā duviññeyyarūpā tiṭṭhanti. Duviññeyyañhi ñāṇena dukkhogāḷhanti
tika-s0402t:158_5: katvā “gambhīra”nti vuccati. Pubbāparampettha kāsañci gāthānaṃ duviññeyyatāya dukkhogāḷhameva,
tika-s0402t:158_6: tasmā taṃ “pāḷivasena gambhīrā”ti vuttaṃ. Imināva nayena “atthavasena gambhīrā”ti
tika-s0402t:158_7: etthāpi attho veditabbo. Mahāvedallasuttassa atthavasena gambhīratā suviññeyyāva.
tika-s0402t:158_8: Lokaṃ uttaratīti lokuttaro, navavidho appamāṇadhammo. So atthabhūto etesaṃ atthīti
tika-s0402t:159_0: Sattasuññaṃ dhammamattamevāti sattena attanā suññaṃ kevalaṃ dhammamattameva. Uggahetabbaṃ
tika-s0402t:159_1: pariyāpuṇitabbanti liṅgavacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha “uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe
tika-s0402t:159_2: cā”ti. Kavino kammaṃ kavitā. Yaṃ panassa kammaṃ, taṃ tena katanti vuccatīti āha “kavitāti
tika-s0402t:159_3: kavīhi katā”ti. Itaranti kāveyyāti padaṃ, kābyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Kābyanti ca kavinā
tika-s0402t:159_4: vuttanti attho. Tenāha “tasseva vevacana”nti. Vicitraakkharāti vicittākārakkharā
tika-s0402t:159_5: viññāpanīyā. Sāsanato bahibhūtāti na sāsanāvacarā. Tesaṃ sāvakehīti buddhānaṃ sāvakāti
tika-s0402t:159_6: apaññātānaṃ yesaṃ kesañci sāvakehi. Na ceva aññamaññaṃ paṭipucchantīti ye vācenti,
tika-s0402t:159_7: ye ca suṇanti, te aññamaññaṃ atthādiṃ nappaṭipucchanti, kevalaṃ vācanasavanamatteneva
tika-s0402t:159_8: parituṭṭhā honti. Cārikaṃ na vicarantīti asukasmiṃ ṭhāne atthādiṃ jānantā atthīti
tika-s0402t:159_9: pucchanatthāya cārikaṃ na gacchanti tādisassa puggalassa abhāvato tassa ca pubbāparavirodhato.
tika-s0402t:159_10: Kathaṃ ropetabbanti kena pakārena nikkhipitabbaṃ. Attho nāma sabhāvato anusandhito
tika-s0402t:159_11: sambandhato pubbāparato ādipariyosānato ca ñāto sammāñāto hotīti āha “ko attho”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:160_0: 49. Sattame kilesehī āmasitabbato āmisaṃ, cattāro paccayā. Tadeva garu garukātabbaṃ
tika-s0402t:160_1: etesaṃ, na dhammoti āmisagarū. Tenāha “lokuttaradhammaṃ lāmakato gahetvā ṭhitaparisā”ti.
tika-s0402t:160_2: Ubhato bhāgato vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto. Dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimutto. Paññāya
tika-s0402t:160_3: vimuttoti samathasannissayena vinā aggamaggapaññāya vimutto. Tenāha “sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavo”ti.
tika-s0402t:160_4: Kāyenāti nāmakāyena. Jhānaphassaṃ phusitvāti aṭṭhasamāpattisaññitaṃ jhānaphassaṃ
tika-s0402t:160_5: adhigamavasena phusitvā. Pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ yathā ālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti
tika-s0402t:160_6: kāyasakkhī. Na tu vimutto ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā. Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti diṭṭhassa
tika-s0402t:160_7: anto anantaro kālo diṭṭhanto, dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ
tika-s0402t:160_8: pattoti attho. Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippatto. Tenāha “ime
tika-s0402t:161_0: Saddahanto vimuttoti etena sabbathā avimuttassa saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvadassanena
tika-s0402t:161_1: saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvameva vibhāveti. Saddhāvimuttoti vā saddhāya avimuttoti
tika-s0402t:161_2: attho. Chasu ṭhānesūti paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu. Dhammaṃ anussaratīti
tika-s0402t:161_3: paṭhamamaggapaññāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ anussarati. Saddhaṃ anussaratīti etthāpi eseva
tika-s0402t:161_4: nayo. Ubhopi hete sotāpattimaggaṭṭhāyeva. Imaṃ kasmā gaṇhantīti evaṃ ekantapāsaṃsesu
tika-s0402t:161_5: ariyesu gayhamānesu imaṃ ekantaninditaṃ lāmakaṃ dussīlaṃ kasmā gaṇhanti. Sabbesu
tika-s0402t:161_6: sabbatā sadisesu labbhamānopi viseso na paññāyati, visabhāge pana sati eva paññāyati
tika-s0402t:161_7: paṭabhāvena viya cittapaṭassāti āha “ekaccesu panā”tiādi. Ganthitāti avabaddhā. Mucchitāti
tika-s0402t:161_8: mucchaṃ sammohaṃ āpannā. Chandarāgaapakaḍḍhanāyāti chandarāgassa apanayanatthaṃ.
