tika-s0402t:162_0: Paññādhurenāti vipassanābhinivesena. Abhiniviṭṭhoti vipassanāmaggaṃ otiṇṇo. Tasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:162_1: khaṇeti sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe. Dhammānusārī nāma paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena ariyamaggasotassa
tika-s0402t:162_2: anussaraṇato. Kāyasakkhī nāma nāmakāyena sacchikātabbassa nibbānassa sacchikaraṇato.
tika-s0402t:162_3: Vikkhambhanasamucchedānaṃ vasena dvikkhattuṃ. Arūpajjhānehi rūpakāyato, aggamaggena
tika-s0402t:162_4: sesakāyatoti dvīhi bhāgehi nissakkavacanañcetaṃ. Diṭṭhantaṃ patto, diṭṭhattā vā pattoti
tika-s0402t:162_5: diṭṭhippatto. Tattha diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa
tika-s0402t:162_6: anantaraṃ pattoti attho. Diṭṭhattāti catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya paññāya nirodhassa
tika-s0402t:162_7: diṭṭhattā. Jhānaphassarahitāya sātisayāya paññāya eva vimuttoti paññāvimutto. Sesaṃ
tika-s0402t:163_0: 50. Aṭṭhame na samāti visamā. Kāyakammādīnaṃ visamattā tato eva tattha pakkhalanaṃ
tika-s0402t:163_2: dhammato apetāni. Ubbinayānīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:164: 51. Navame adhammikāti adhamme niyuttā. Tenāha “niddhammā”ti, dhammarahitāti attho.
tika-s0402t:165_0: 52. Dasame gaṇhantīti pavattenti. Na ceva aññamaññaṃ saññāpentīti mūlato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0402t:165_1: taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ yathā vūpasammati, evaṃ aññamaññaṃ itarītare na sammā jānāpenti.
tika-s0402t:165_2: Saññāpanatthaṃ sannipāte sati tattha yuttapattakaraṇena saññattiyā bhavitabbaṃ, te
tika-s0402t:165_3: pana saññāpanatthaṃ na sannipatanti. Na pekkhāpentīti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0402t:165_4: aññamaññaṃ na pekkhāpenti. Asaññattiyeva attanā gahitapakkhassa balaṃ etesanti asaññattibalā.
tika-s0402t:165_5: Na tathā mantentīti sandiṭṭhiparāmāsiādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggibhāvena tathā na mantenti.
tika-s0402t:170_0: 53. Dutiyapaṇṇāsakassa paṭhame hitaggahaṇena mettā vuttā hoti, na karuṇā, anukampāgahaṇena
tika-s0402t:170_1: pana karuṇāti cakkavattinā saddhiṃ gahitattā “lokānukampāyā”ti na vuttaṃ. Nippariyāyato
tika-s0402t:170_2: lokānukampā nāma sammāsambuddhādhīnāti. Dveti manussadevasampattivasena dve sampattiyo.
tika-s0402t:171: 54. Dutiye bahuso loke na ciṇṇā na pavattā manussāti āciṇṇamanussā. Kadācideva hi nesaṃ loke nibbatti abhūtapubbā bhūtāti abbhutamanussā.
tika-s0402t:172: 55. Tatiye dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu anutāpaṃ karoti tassa ekabuddhakhettabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:173: 56. Catutthe thūpassa yuttāti dhātuyo pakkhipitvā thūpakaraṇassa yuttā.
tika-s0402t:174: 57. Pañcame attano ānubhāvenāti sayambhuñāṇena. Buddhāti buddhavanto.
tika-s0402t:175_0: 58. Chaṭṭhe pahīnattā na bhāyatīti attasinehābhāvato na bhāyati. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiggahaṇañcettha
tika-s0402t:175_1: nidassanamattaṃ, attasinehassa paṭighassa tadekaṭṭhasammohassa ca vasena bhāyanaṃ
tika-s0402t:175_2: hotīti tesampi pahīnattā na bhāyati, aññathā sotāpannādīnaṃ abhayena bhavitabbaṃ
tika-s0402t:175_3: siyā. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavattāti ettha ahaṃkārasammohanatādīnampi balavattāti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:176: 59. Sattame assājānīyoti likhanti, usabhājānīyoti pana pāṭhoti.
tika-s0402t:177_0: 61. Navame tatthāti antarāpaṇe. Ekoti dvīsu kinnaresu eko. Ambilikāphalañca addasāti
tika-s0402t:177_1: ānetvā sambandho. Ambilikāphalanti tintiṇīphalanti vadanti, caturambilanti apare.
tika-s0402t:177_2: Dve attheti pāḷiyaṃ vutte dve atthe.
tika-s0402t:178: 62. Dasame yathāāraddhe kicce vattamāne antarā eva paṭigamanaṃ paṭivānaṃ, natthi etassa paṭivānanti appaṭivāno. Tattha asaṃkocappatto. Tenāha “anukkaṇṭhito”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:179_0: 63. Ekādasame sannivāsanti sahavāsaṃ. Yathā asappurisā saha vasantā aññamaññaṃ agāravena
tika-s0402t:179_1: anādariyaṃ karonti, tappaṭikkhepena sappurisānaṃ sagāravappaṭipattidassanaparamidaṃ suttaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:180_0: 64. Dvādasame dvīsupi pakkhesūti vivādāpannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dvīsupi pakkhesu. Saṃsaramānāti
tika-s0402t:180_1: pavattamānā. Diṭṭhipaḷāsoti diṭṭhisannissayo paḷāso yugaggāho. Āghātentoti āhananto
tika-s0402t:180_2: bādhento. Anabhirādhanavasenāti yassa uppajjati, tassa tadaññesañca atthassa anabhirādhanavasena.
tika-s0402t:180_3: Sabbampetanti vacīsaṃsāroti sabbampetaṃ. Attano citte parisāya ca citteti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0402t:183: 65. Dutiyassa paṭhame sabbakāmanipphattimūlakaṃ sukhanti anavasesaupabhogaparibhogavatthunipphattihetukaṃ kāmasukhaṃ. Pabbajjāmūlakaṃ sukhanti pabbajjāhetukaṃ pavivekasukhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:184_0: 66. Dutiye kāmeti pañca kāmaguṇe, sabbepi vā tebhūmake dhamme. Vuttañhetaṃ “sabbepi
tika-s0402t:184_1: tebhūmakā dhammā kamanīyaṭṭhena kāmā”ti. Nekkhammaṃ vuccati pabbajjā gharabandhanato
tika-s0402t:188: 67. Tatiye upadhī vuccanti pañcupādānakkhandhā, tannissitaṃ sukhaṃ upadhisukhaṃ. Tappaṭipakkhato nirupadhisukhaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:189: 68. Catutthe vaṭṭapariyāpannaṃ sukhaṃ vaṭṭasukhaṃ. Nibbānārammaṇaṃ sukhaṃ vivaṭṭasukhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:190: 69. Pañcame saṃkilesanti saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ. Tenāha “vaṭṭagāmisukha”nti. Vivaṭṭasukhanti maggaphalasahagataṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:191: 70. Chaṭṭhe ariyānameva sukhaṃ ariyasukhaṃ, ariyañca taṃ sukhañcātipi ariyasukhaṃ. Anariyānameva sukhaṃ anariyasukhaṃ. Anariyañca taṃ sukhañcātipi anariyasukhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:193_0: 72. Aṭṭhame saha pītiyā vattatīti sappītikaṃ, pītisahagataṃ sukhaṃ. Sabhāvato virāgato
tika-s0402t:193_1: ca natthi etassa pītīti nippītikaṃ sukhaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panettha jhānasukhameva
tika-s0402t:193_2: uddhaṭaṃ, tathā ca “lokiyasappītikasukhato lokiyanippītikasukhaṃ agga”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:193_3: Lokiyanippītikampi hi aggaṃ labbhatevāti bhūmantaraṃ bhinditvā aggabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:194_0: 73. Navame sātasabhāvameva sukhaṃ sātasukhaṃ, na upekkhāsukhaṃ viya asātasabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0402t:194_1: Kāmañcettha kāyaviññāṇasahagatampi sātasukhameva, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “tīsu jhānesu sukha”nteva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:195: 74. Dasame samādhisampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ samādhisukhaṃ. Na samādhisampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ asamādhisukhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:197_0: 77. Terasame rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ uttarapadalopena, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ etassāti rūpārammaṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:197_1: Catutthajjhānaggahaṇaṃ pana yadassa paṭiyogī, tena samānayogakkhamadassanaparaṃ.
tika-s0402t:197_2: Yaṃ kiñci rūpanti yaṃ kiñci ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ. Tappaṭikkhepena arūpaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:200_0: 78-79. Tatiyassa paṭhame nimīyati ettha phalaṃ avasesapaccayehi pakkhipīyati viyāti
tika-s0402t:200_1: nimittaṃ, kāraṇanti āha “sanimittāti sakāraṇā”ti. Dutiyādīsūti dutiyasuttādīsu. Eseva
tika-s0402t:200_2: nayoti iminā nidānādipadānampi kāraṇapariyāyameva dīpeti. Nidadāti phalanti nidānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:200_3: hinoti phalaṃ patiṭṭhāti etenāti hetu, saṅkharoti phalanti saṅkhāro, paṭicca etasmā
tika-s0402t:200_4: phalaṃ etīti paccayo, ruppati niruppati phalaṃ etthāti rūpanti evaṃ nidānādipadānampi
tika-s0402t:202_0: 87. Dasame samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katoti saṅkhato, saṅkhato dhammo ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:202_1: etesanti saṅkhatārammaṇā. Maggakkhaṇe na honti nāma pahīyantīti katvā. Nāhesunti
tika-s0402t:202_2: ettha “vuccantī”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ. Yāva arahattā desanā desitā taṃtaṃsuttapariyosāne
tika-s0402t:205: 88. Catutthassa paṭhame phalasamādhīti catūsupi ariyaphalesu samādhi. Tathā phalapaññā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:206: 89. Dutiye sampayuttadhamme pariggaṇhātīti paggāho. Na vikkhipatīti avikkhepo.
tika-s0402t:207: 90. Tatiye namanaṭṭhena nāmaṃ. Ruppanaṭṭhena rūpaṃ. Sammasanacārassa adhippetattā “cattāro arūpakkhandhā”tveva vuttaṃ. Tenāha “dhamma-koṭṭhāsaparicchedañāṇaṃ nāma kathita”nti.
tika-s0402t:209_0: 92. Pañcame bhavo nāma sassataṃ sadā bhāvato, sassatavasena uppajjanadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0402t:209_1: Vibhavo nāma ucchedo vināsanaṭṭhena, vibhavavasena uppajjanadiṭṭhi vibhavadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0402t:210_0: 95. Aṭṭhame dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vippaṭikūlagāhimhi vipaccanīkasāte anādare puggaleti
tika-s0402t:210_1: dubbaco, tassa kammaṃ dovacassaṃ, tassa dubbacassa puggalassa anādariyavasena pavattā
tika-s0402t:210_2: cetanā. Tassa bhāvo dovacassatā. Tassa bhāvoti ca tassa yathāvuttassa dovacassassa
tika-s0402t:210_3: atthibhāvo, atthato dovacassameva. Vitthārato panesā “tattha katamā dovacassatā?
tika-s0402t:210_4: Sahadhammike vuccamāne dovacassāya”nti abhidhamme āgatā. Sā atthato saṅkhārakkhandho
tika-s0402t:210_5: hoti. Catunnaṃ vā khandhānaṃ etenākārena pavattānaṃ etaṃ adhivacananti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:211_0: Pāpayogato pāpā assaddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti pāpamitto, tassa bhāvo pāpamittatā.
tika-s0402t:211_1: Vitthārato panesā “tattha katamā pāpamittatā? Ye te puggalā assaddhā dussīlā appassutā
tika-s0402t:211_2: maccharino duppaññā. Yā tesaṃ sevanā nisevanā saṃsevanā bhajanā sambhajanā bhatti
tika-s0402t:211_3: sambhatti taṃsampavaṅkatā”ti evaṃ āgatā. Sāpi atthato dovacassatā viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:211_4: Yāya hi cetanāya puggalo pāpasampavaṅko nāma hoti, sā cetanā cattāropi vā arūpino
tika-s0402t:212_0: 96. Navame sukhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ padakkhiṇagāhimhi anulomasāte sādare puggaleti subbacotiādinā,
tika-s0402t:212_1: kalyāṇā saddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti kalyāṇamittotiādinā vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:213_0: 97. Dasame pathavīdhātuādayo sukhadhātukāmadhātuādayo ca etāsveva antogadhāti etāsu
tika-s0402t:213_1: kosalle dassite tāsupi kosallaṃ dassitameva hotīti “aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:213_2: Dhātūti jānananti iminā aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ sabhāvaparicchedikā savanadhāraṇasammasanappaṭivedhapaññā
tika-s0402t:213_3: vuttā. Tattha dhātūnaṃ savanadhāraṇapaññā sutamayā, itarā bhāvanāmayā. Tatthāpi sammasanapaññā
tika-s0402t:213_4: lokiyā. Vipassanā hi sā, itarā lokuttarā. Lakkhaṇādivasena aniccādivasena ca manasikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:213_5: manasikāro, tattha kosallaṃ manasikārakusalatā. Aṭṭhārasannaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ sammasanappaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇapaññā
tika-s0402t:213_6: manasikārakusalatā, sā ādimajjhapariyosānavasena tidhā bhinnā. Tathā hi sammasanapaññā
tika-s0402t:213_7: tassā ādi, paṭivedhapaññā majjhe, paccavekkhaṇapaññā pariyosānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:214_0: 98. Ekādasame āpattiyova āpattikkhandhā. Tā pana antarāpattīnaṃ aggahaṇena pañca,
tika-s0402t:214_1: tāsaṃ gahaṇena satta hontīti āha “pañcannañca sattannañca āpattikkhandhāna”nti. Jānananti
tika-s0402t:214_2: “imā āpattiyo, ettakā āpattiyo, evañca tāsaṃ āpajjanaṃ hotī”ti jānanaṃ. Evaṃ tippakārena
tika-s0402t:214_3: jānanapaññā hi āpattikusalatā nāma. Āpattito vuṭṭhāpanappayogatāya kammabhūtā vācā
tika-s0402t:214_4: kammavācā, tathābhūtā anussāvanavācā. “Imāya kammavācāya ito āpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:214_5: hontañca paṭhame, tatiye vā anussāvane yya-kāraṃ patte, ‘saṃvarissāmī’ti vā pade
tika-s0402t:214_6: pariyosite hotī”ti evaṃ taṃ taṃ āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaparicchedajānanapaññā āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā.
tika-s0402t:214_7: Vuṭṭhānanti ca yathāpannāya āpattiyā yathā tathā anantarāyatāpādanaṃ. Evaṃ vuṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0402t:217_0: 99. Pañcamassa paṭhame anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahatīti attano asampattaṃ bhāraṃ vahati.
tika-s0402t:217_1: Atherova samāno therehi vahitabbaṃ bījanaggāhadhammajjhesanādibhāraṃ vahatīti evamettha
tika-s0402t:217_2: attho daṭṭhabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā sammajjanādinavavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ āṇatteneva
tika-s0402t:217_3: kātabbaṃ, pātimokkhañca āṇatteneva uddisitabbaṃ, tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ vinā āṇattiyā karonto
tika-s0402t:217_4: anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati nāmāti dassetuṃ “sammajjanī padīpo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yañhi “anujānāmi,
tika-s0402t:217_5: bhikkhave, uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitu”ntiādinā nayena pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu ca –
tika-s0402t:222_0: Evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ dassitaṃ, taṃ akatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ na
tika-s0402t:222_1: vaṭṭati. Tasmā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunā navaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetu”nti
tika-s0402t:222_2: vacanato therena āṇattena agilānena bhikkhunā uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitabbaṃ, pānīyaṃ
tika-s0402t:222_3: paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetabbaṃ, āsanaṃ paññāpetabbaṃ, padīpo kātabbo, akaronto dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0402t:223_0: Therenapi patirūpaṃ ñatvā āṇāpetabbaṃ, āṇāpentenapi yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ karonto vā sadā
tika-s0402t:223_1: kālameva eko vā bhāranittharaṇako vā sarabhāṇakadhammakathikādīsu vā aññataro na
tika-s0402t:223_2: uposathāgārasammajjanatthaṃ āṇāpetabbo, avasesā pana vārena āṇāpetabbā. Sace āṇatto
tika-s0402t:223_3: sammajjaniṃ tāvakālikampi na labhati, sākhābhaṅgaṃ kappiyaṃ kāretvā sammajjitabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:223_4: tampi alabhantassa laddhakappiyaṃ hoti. Padīpakaraṇepi vuttanayeneva āṇāpetabbo,
tika-s0402t:223_5: āṇāpentena ca “amukasmiṃ nāma okāse telaṃ vā kapallikā vā atthi, taṃ gahetvā karohī”ti
tika-s0402t:223_6: vattabbo. Sace telādīni natthi, pariyesitabbāni. Pariyesitvā alabhantassa laddhakappiyaṃ
tika-s0402t:223_7: hoti. Api ca kapāle aggi jāletabbo. Āsanapaññāpanāṇattiyampi vuttanayeneva āṇāpetabbo,
tika-s0402t:223_8: āṇattena ca sace uposathāgāre āsanāni natthi, saṅghikāvāsato āharitvā paññāpetvā
tika-s0402t:223_9: puna āharitabbāni, āsanesu asati kaṭasārakepi taṭṭikāyopi paññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, tāsupi
tika-s0402t:223_10: asati sākhābhaṅgāni kappiyaṃ kāretvā paññāpetabbāni. Kappiyakārakaṃ alabhantassa
tika-s0402t:224_0: Chandapārisuddhīti ettha uposathakaraṇatthaṃ sannipatite saṅghe bahi uposathaṃ katvā
tika-s0402t:224_1: āgatena sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kāyasāmaggiṃ adentena chando dātabbo. Yopi gilāno
tika-s0402t:224_2: vā kiccappasuto vā, tena pārisuddhiṃ dentena chando dātabbo. Kathaṃ dātabbo? Ekassa
tika-s0402t:224_3: bhikkhuno santike “chandaṃ dammi, chandaṃ me hara, chandaṃ me ārocehī”ti ayamattho
tika-s0402t:224_4: kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo. Evaṃ dinno hoti chando. Akatūposathena
tika-s0402t:224_5: pana gilānena vā kiccappasutena vā pārisuddhi dātabbā. Kathaṃ dātabbā? Ekassa bhikkhuno
tika-s0402t:224_6: santike “pārisuddhiṃ dammi, pārisuddhiṃ me hara, pārisuddhiṃ me ārocehī”ti ayamattho
tika-s0402t:224_7: kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo. Evaṃ dinnā hoti pārisuddhi. Taṃ pana
tika-s0402t:224_8: dentena chandopi dātabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe
tika-s0402t:224_9: pārisuddhiṃ dentena chandampi dātuṃ, santi saṅghassa karaṇīya”nti. Tattha pārisuddhidānaṃ
tika-s0402t:224_10: saṅghassapi attanopi uposathakaraṇaṃ sampādeti, na avasesaṃ saṅghakiccaṃ. Chandadānaṃ
tika-s0402t:224_11: saṅghasseva uposathakaraṇañca sesakiccañca sampādeti, attano pana uposatho akatoyeva
tika-s0402t:224_12: hoti, tasmā pārisuddhiṃ dentena chandopi dātabbo.
tika-s0402t:225_0: Utukkhānanti “hemantādīnaṃ utūnaṃ ettakaṃ atikkantaṃ, ettakaṃ avasiṭṭha”nti evaṃ
tika-s0402t:225_1: utūnaṃ ācikkhanaṃ. Bhikkhugaṇanāti “ettakā bhikkhū uposathagge sannipatitā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0402t:225_2: gaṇanā. Idampi ubhayaṃ katvāva uposatho kātabbo. Ovādoti bhikkhunovādo. Na hi bhikkhūnīhi
tika-s0402t:225_3: yācitaṃ ovādaṃ anārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhuniyo hi “sve uposatho”ti
tika-s0402t:225_4: āgantvā “ayaṃ uposatho cātuddaso, pannaraso”ti pucchitvā puna uposathadivase āgantvā
tika-s0402t:225_5: “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya, bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati,
tika-s0402t:225_6: labhatu kira, ayya, bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti evaṃ ovādaṃ yācanti. Taṃ
tika-s0402t:225_7: ṭhapetvā bālagilānagamiye añño sacepi āraññako hoti, appaṭiggahetuṃ na labhati, tasmā
tika-s0402t:225_8: yena so paṭiggahito, tena bhikkhunā uposathagge pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu evaṃ vattabbo
tika-s0402t:225_9: “bhikkhunisaṅgho, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati,
tika-s0402t:226_0: Pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbaṃ – “atthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato”ti. Sace
tika-s0402t:226_1: hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, tato tena so vattabbo – “itthannāmako
tika-s0402t:226_2: bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho upasaṅkamatū”ti. Sace natthi,
tika-s0402t:226_3: tato tena pucchitabbaṃ – “ko āyasmā ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”nti. Sace koci ussahati,
tika-s0402t:226_4: sopi ca aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato, taṃ tattheva sammannitvā ovādappaṭiggāhako vattabbo
tika-s0402t:226_5: – “itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho upasaṅkamatū”ti.
tika-s0402t:226_6: Sace pana na koci ussahati, pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbaṃ – “natthi koci bhikkhu
tika-s0402t:226_7: bhikkhunovādako sammato, pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṅgho sampādetū”ti. Ettāvatā hi sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ
tika-s0402t:226_8: sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ ārocitaṃ hoti. Tena bhikkhunā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pāṭipade bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:226_9: ārocetabbaṃ. Pātimokkhampi “na, bhikkhave, anajjhiṭṭhena pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:226_10: yo uddiseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato anāṇattena na uddisitabbaṃ. “Therādheyyaṃ
tika-s0402t:226_11: pātimokkha”nti hi vacanato saṅghatthero vā pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-s0402t:226_12: yo tattha bhikkhu byatto paṭibalo, tassādheyyaṃ pātimokkha”nti vacanato navakataro
tika-s0402t:227_0: 109. Ekādasame na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyatīti na kukkuccāyituṃ yuttakaṃ kukkuccāyati.
tika-s0402t:227_2: kukkuccāyati, na paribhuñjatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ migamaṃsaṃ “dīpimaṃsa”nti, kāle
tika-s0402t:227_3: santeyeva “kālo natthī”ti, appavāretvā “pavāritomhī”ti, patte rajasmiṃ apatiteyeva
tika-s0402t:227_4: “patita”nti, attānaṃ uddissa macchamaṃse akateyeva “maṃ uddissa kata”nti kukkuccāyati.
tika-s0402t:227_5: Kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyatīti kukkuccāyituṃ yuttaṃ na kukkuccāyati. Acchamaṃsaṃ
tika-s0402t:227_7: na kukkuccāyati, madditvā vītikkamatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ dīpimaṃsaṃ migamaṃsanti…pe…
tika-s0402t:227_8: attānaṃ uddissa macchamaṃse kate “maṃ uddissa kata”nti na kukkuccāyatīti evamettha
tika-s0402t:227_9: attho daṭṭhabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “na kukkuccāyitabbanti saṅghabhogassa apaṭṭhapanaṃ
tika-s0402t:227_10: avicāraṇaṃ na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ nāma, taṃ kukkuccāyati. Kukkuccāyitabbanti tasseva
tika-s0402t:227_11: paṭṭhapanaṃ vicāraṇaṃ, taṃ na kukkuccāyatī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅghabhogassāti
tika-s0402t:227_13: ca saṅghassa bhogassa. Apaṭṭhapananti asaṃvidahanaṃ. Tenāha “avicāraṇa”nti. Tassevāti
tika-s0402t:232_0: 119. Tatiyapaṇṇāsakassa paṭhame dukkhena pajahitabbāti duppajahā. Duccajātiādīsupi
tika-s0402t:232_1: eseva nayo. Dvinnaṃ āsānaṃ duccajabhāvo kathaṃ jānitabboti paṭhamaṃ tāva lābhāsāya
tika-s0402t:232_2: duccajabhāvaṃ vibhāveti “lābhāsāyā”tiādinā. Ubhatobyūḷhanti yuddhatthāya ubhato sannipatitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:232_3: Pakkhandantīti anuppavisanti. Jīvitāsāya duppajahattātiādinā jīvitāsāya duccajabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0402t:233_0: 120. Dutiye dullabhāti na sulabhā. Iṇaṃ demīti saññaṃ karotīti evaṃ saññaṃ karonto
tika-s0402t:233_1: viya hotīti attho. Ettha ca “pubbakārīti paṭhamaṃ upakārassa kārako. Kataññū katavedīti
tika-s0402t:233_2: tena kataṃ ñatvā pacchā kārako. Tesu pubbakārī ‘iṇaṃ demī’ti saññaṃ karoti, pacchā
tika-s0402t:233_3: kārako ‘iṇaṃ jīrāpemī’ti saññaṃ karotī”ti ettakameva idha vuttaṃ. Puggalapaṇṇattisaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana –
tika-s0402t:234_0: “Pubbakārīti paṭhamameva kārako. Katavedīti kataṃ vedeti, viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:234_1: Te agāriyānagāriyehi dīpetabbā. Agārikesu hi mātāpitaro pubbakārino nāma, puttadhītaro
tika-s0402t:234_2: pana mātāpitaro paṭijaggantā abhivādanādīni tesaṃ kurumānā katavedino nāma. Anagāriyesu
tika-s0402t:234_3: ācariyupajjhāyā pubbakārino nāma, antevāsikasaddhivihārikā ācariyupajjhāye paṭijaggantā
tika-s0402t:234_4: abhivādanādīni ca tesaṃ kurumānā katavedino nāma. Tesaṃ āvibhāvatthāya upajjhāyaposakasoṇattherādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:235_0: “Aparo nayo – parena akateyeva upakāre attani kataṃ upakāraṃ anapekkhitvā kārako
tika-s0402t:235_1: pubbakārī, seyyathāpi mātāpitaro ceva ācariyupajjhāyā ca. So dullabho sattānaṃ taṇhābhibhūtattā.
tika-s0402t:235_2: Parena katassa upakārassa anurūpappavattiṃ attani kataṃ upakāraṃ upakārato jānanto
tika-s0402t:235_3: vediyanto kataññukatavedī seyyathāpi mātāpituācariyupajjhāyesu sammāpaṭipanno. Sopi
tika-s0402t:235_4: dullabho sattānaṃ avijjābhibhūtattā. Apica akāraṇavacchalo pubbakārī, sakāraṇavacchalo
tika-s0402t:235_6: me’ti evamādikāraṇasāpekkhakiriyo kataññukatavedī. Tamojotiparāyaṇo pubbakārī, jotijotiparāyaṇo
tika-s0402t:235_7: kataññukatavedī. Desetā pubbakārī, paṭipajjitā kataññukatavedī. Sadevake loke arahaṃ
tika-s0402t:236_0: Tattha kāraṇena vinā pavattahitacitto akāraṇavacchalo. Anāgatamhi payojanaṃ apekkhamāno
tika-s0402t:236_1: “karissati me”tiādinā cittena paṭhamaṃ gahitaṃ tādisaṃ kataṃ upādāya kataññū eva
tika-s0402t:236_2: nāma hoti, na pubbakārīti adhippāyena “karissati meti evamādikāraṇasāpekkhakiriyo
tika-s0402t:236_3: kataññukatavedī”ti vuttaṃ. Tamojotiparāyaṇo puññaphalāni anupajīvanto eva puññāni
tika-s0402t:236_4: karotīti “pubbakārī”ti vutto. Puññaphalaṃ upajīvanto hi kataññupakkhe tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0402t:237_0: 121. Tatiye tittoti suhito pariyosito niṭṭhitakiccatāya nirussukko. Guṇapāripūriyā
tika-s0402t:237_1: hi paripuṇṇo yāvadattho idha titto vutto. Tappetāti aññesampi tittikaro. Paccekabuddho
tika-s0402t:237_2: ca tathāgatasāvako ca khīṇāsavo tittoti ettha paccekabuddho navalokuttaradhammehi
tika-s0402t:237_3: sayaṃ titto paripuṇṇo, aññaṃ pana tappetuṃ na sakkoti. Tassa hi dhammakathāya abhisamayo
tika-s0402t:237_4: na hoti, sāvakānaṃ pana dhammakathāya aparimāṇānaṃ devamanussānaṃ abhisamayo hoti.
tika-s0402t:237_5: Evaṃ santepi yasmā te dhammaṃ desentā na attano vacanaṃ katvā kathenti, buddhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:237_6: vacanaṃ katvā kathenti, sotuṃ nisinnaparisāpi – “ayaṃ bhikkhu na attanā paṭividdhaṃ
tika-s0402t:237_7: dhammaṃ kathetī”ti cittīkāraṃ karoti. Iti so cittīkāro buddhānaṃyeva hoti. Evaṃ tattha
tika-s0402t:237_8: sammāsambuddhova tappetā nāma. Yathā hi “asukassa nāma idañcidañca dethā”ti raññā
tika-s0402t:237_9: āṇatte kiñcāpi ānetvā denti, atha kho rājāva tattha dāyako. Yehipi laddhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:237_10: te “raññā amhākaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ dinnaṃ, issariyavibhavo dinno”tveva gaṇhanti, na “rājapurisehī”ti
tika-s0402t:238_0: 122. Catutthe duttappayāti atappayā, na sakkā kenaci tappetuṃ. Yo hi upaṭṭhākakulaṃ
tika-s0402t:238_1: vā ñātikulaṃ vā nissāya vasamāno cīvare jiṇṇe tehi dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipati, na
tika-s0402t:238_2: paribhuñjati. Punappunaṃ dinnampi gahetvā nikkhipateva. Yo ca teneva nayena laddhaṃ
tika-s0402t:238_3: laddhaṃ vissajjeti, parassa deti, punappunaṃ laddhampi tatheva karoti. Ime dve puggalā
tika-s0402t:238_4: sakaṭehipi paccaye upanentena tappetuṃ na sakkāti duttappayā.
tika-s0402t:239_0: 123. Pañcame na vissajjetīti attano akatvā parassa na deti, atireke pana sati na
tika-s0402t:239_1: nikkhipati, parassa deti. Tenevāha “sabbaṃyeva paresaṃ na detī”tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:239_2: hoti “yo bhikkhu upaṭṭhākakulā vā ñātikulā vā jiṇṇacīvaro sāṭakaṃ labhitvā cīvaraṃ
tika-s0402t:239_3: katvā paribhuñjati na nikkhipati, aggaḷaṃ datvā pārupantopi punapi diyyamāne sahasā
tika-s0402t:239_4: nappaṭiggaṇhāti. Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ attanā paribhuñjati, paresaṃ na deti. Ime
tika-s0402t:243_0: 131. Saddho bhikkhūti saddhāya samannāgato bhikkhu. Yo bhikkhu sāriputtamoggallānehi
tika-s0402t:243_1: sadisabhāvaṃ pattheti, so yehi guṇehi sāriputtamoggallānā etadagge ṭhapitā, te guṇe
tika-s0402t:243_2: attano abhikaṅkheyyāti āha “yādiso sāriputtatthero paññāyā”tiādi. Ito uttari patthento
tika-s0402t:243_3: micchā pattheyyāti sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ ye paññādayo guṇā upalabbhanti, tato uttari
tika-s0402t:243_4: patthento micchā pattheyya. Aggasāvakaguṇaparamā hi sāvakaguṇamariyādā. Tesaṃ sāvakaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0402t:243_5: yadidaṃ aggasāvakaguṇā, na tato paraṃ sāvakaguṇā nāma atthi. Tenevāha “yaṃ natthi,
tika-s0402t:244_0: 135. Pañcame yassa guṇā khatā upahatā ca, so khato upahato nāma hotīti āha “guṇānaṃ
tika-s0402t:244_1: khatattā”tiādi. Khatattāti chinnattā. Upahatattāti naṭṭhattā. Tenāha “chinnaguṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:244_2: naṭṭhaguṇanti attho”ti. Apuññassa pasavo nāma atthato paṭilābhoti āha “pasavatīti
tika-s0402t:244_3: paṭilabhatī”ti, attano santāne uppādetīti attho. Ananupavisitvāti ñāṇena anogāhetvā.
tika-s0402t:247_0: 142. Tatiyassa paṭhame dīyatīti dānaṃ, deyyadhammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Dīyati anenāti
tika-s0402t:247_1: vā dānaṃ, pariccāgacetanāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ayaṃ duvidhopi attho idhādhippetoti āha
tika-s0402t:251_0: 152. Catutthassa paṭhame āmisassa ca dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa ca antare
tika-s0402t:251_1: sambhavantassa chiddassa vivarassa bhedassa santharaṇaṃ pidahanaṃ saṅgaṇhanaṃ santhāro.
tika-s0402t:251_2: Ayañhi lokasannivāso alabbhamānena āmisena dhammena cāti dvīhi chiddo. Tassa taṃ
tika-s0402t:251_3: chiddaṃ yathā na paññāyati, evaṃ pīṭhassa viya paccattharaṇena āmisena dhammena ca
tika-s0402t:251_4: santharaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhanaṃ santhāroti vuccati. Ettha ca āmisena saṅgaho āmisasanthāro
tika-s0402t:251_5: nāma. Taṃ karontena mātāpitūnaṃ bhikkhugatikassa veyyāvaccakarassa rañño corānañca
tika-s0402t:251_6: aggaṃ aggahetvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Āmasitvā dinnehi rājāno ca corā ca anatthampi karonti,
tika-s0402t:251_7: jīvitakkhayampi pāpenti. Anāmasitvā dinnena attamanā honti, coranāgavatthuādīni cettha
tika-s0402t:251_8: vatthūni kathetabbāni. Tāni samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthāritāni. Sakkaccaṃ
tika-s0402t:251_9: uddesadānaṃ pāḷivaṇṇanā dhammakathākathananti evaṃ dhammena saṅgaho dhammasanthāro nāma.
tika-s0402t:255_0: 164. Pañcamassa paṭhame “ito pubbe parikammaṃ pavattaṃ, ito paraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ majjhe
tika-s0402t:255_1: samāpattī”ti evaṃ saha parikammena appanāparicchedappajānanā paññā samāpattikusalatā.
tika-s0402t:255_2: Vuṭṭhāne kusalabhāvo vuṭṭhānakusalatā. Pageva vuṭṭhānaparicchedakañāṇanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:256_0: 165. Dutiye ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ, ajimhatā akuṭilatā avaṅkatāti attho. Abhidhammepi
tika-s0402t:256_1: vuttaṃ – “tattha katamo ajjavo? Yā ajjavatā ajimhatā akuṭilatā avaṅkatā, ayaṃ vuccati
tika-s0402t:256_2: ajjavo”ti. Anajjavañca ajjavappaṭikkhepena veditabbaṃ. Gomuttavaṅkatā, candalekhāvaṅkatā,
tika-s0402t:256_3: naṅgalakoṭivaṅkatāti hi tayo anajjavā. Ekacco hi bhikkhu paṭhamavaye majjhima-pacchimavaye
tika-s0402t:256_4: ca ekavīsatiyā anesanāsu chasu ca agocaresu carati, ayaṃ gomuttavaṅkatā nāma, ādito
tika-s0402t:256_5: paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā paṭipattiyā vaṅkabhāvato. Eko paṭhamavaye pacchimavaye ca
tika-s0402t:256_6: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pūreti, lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo hoti, majjhimavaye purimasadiso,
tika-s0402t:256_7: ayaṃ candalekhāvaṅkatā nāma, paṭipattiyā majjhaṭṭhāne vaṅkabhāvāpattito. Eko paṭhamavayepi
tika-s0402t:256_8: majjhimavayepi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pūreti, lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo hoti, pacchimavaye
tika-s0402t:256_9: purimasadiso, ayaṃ naṅgalakoṭivaṅkatā nāma, pariyosāne vaṅkabhāvāpattito. Eko sabbampetaṃ
tika-s0402t:256_10: vaṅkataṃ pahāya tīsu vayesu pesalo lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo hoti, tassa yo so
tika-s0402t:256_11: ujubhāvo, idaṃ ajjavaṃ nāma, sabbattha ujubhāvasiddhito.
tika-s0402t:257_0: Maddavanti ettha “lajjava”ntipi paṭhanti. Evaṃ panettha attho – “tattha katamo lajjavo?
tika-s0402t:257_1: Yo hirīyati hirīyitabbena hirīyati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā, ayaṃ
tika-s0402t:257_2: vuccati lajjavo”ti evaṃ vutto lajjibhāvo lajjavaṃ nāma. Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ
tika-s0402t:257_3: – lajjatīti lajjo, hirimā, tassa bhāvo lajjavaṃ, hirīti attho. Lajjā etassa atthīti
tika-s0402t:257_4: lajjī yathā “mālī māyī”ti, tassa bhāvo lajjibhāvo, sā eva lajjā.
tika-s0402t:258_0: 166. Tatiye adhivāsanakhantīti ettha adhivāsanaṃ vuccati khamanaṃ. Tañhi paresaṃ
tika-s0402t:258_1: dukkaṭaṃ duruttañca paṭivirodhākaraṇena attano upari āropetvā vāsanato “adhivāsana”nti
tika-s0402t:258_2: vuccati. Adhivāsanalakkhaṇā khanti adhivāsanakhanti. Sucisīlatā soraccaṃ. Sā hi sobhanakammaratatā.
tika-s0402t:258_3: Suṭṭhu vā pāpato oratabhāvo viratatāti āha “suratabhāvo”ti. Teneva abhidhammepi –
tika-s0402t:259: “Tattha katamaṃ soraccaṃ? Yo kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo, idaṃ vuccati soraccaṃ, sabbopi sīlasaṃvaro soracca”nti – āgato.
tika-s0402t:260_0: 167. Catutthe sakhilo vuccati saṇhavāco, tassa bhāvo sākhalyaṃ, saṇhavācatā. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:261_0: “Tattha katamaṃ sākhalyaṃ? Yā sā vācā aṇḍakā kakkasā parakaṭukā parābhisajjanī kodhasāmantā
tika-s0402t:261_1: asamādhisaṃvattanikā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ pahāya yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā
tika-s0402t:261_2: hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti, yā
tika-s0402t:261_3: tattha saṇhavācatā sakhilavācatā apharusavācatā, idaṃ vuccati sākhalya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:262_0: Tattha aṇḍakāti sadose savaṇe rukkhe niyyāsapiṇḍo, ahicchattādīni vā uṭṭhitāni aṇḍakānīti
tika-s0402t:262_1: vadanti, pheggurukkhassa pana kuthitassa aṇḍāni viya uṭṭhitā cuṇṇapiṇḍiyo vā gaṇṭhiyo
tika-s0402t:262_2: vā aṇḍakā. Idha pana byāpajjanakakkasādisabhāvato kaṇṭakappaṭibhāgena vācā aṇḍakāti
tika-s0402t:262_3: vuttā. Padumanāḷaṃ viya sotaṃ ghaṃsayamānā pavisantī kakkasā daṭṭhabbā. Kodhena nibbattā
tika-s0402t:262_4: tassa parivārabhūtā kodhasāmantā. Pure saṃvaddhanārī porī. Sā viya sukumārā mudukā
tika-s0402t:262_5: vācā porī viyāti porī. Saṇhavācatātiādinā taṃ vācaṃ pavattamānaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:263_0: 168. Pañcame “avihiṃsāti karuṇāpubbabhāgo”ti ettakameva idha vuttaṃ, dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0402t:263_1: saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “avihiṃsāti karuṇāpi karuṇāpubbabhāgopī”ti vuttaṃ. Abhidhammepi
tika-s0402t:263_2: “tattha katamā avihiṃsā? Yā sattesu karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti,
tika-s0402t:263_3: ayaṃ vuccati avihiṃsā”ti āgataṃ. Etthāpi hi yā kāci karuṇā “karuṇā”ti vuttā, karuṇācetovimutti
tika-s0402t:264_0: Sucisaddato bhāve yakāraṃ ikārassa ca ukārādesaṃ katvā ayaṃ niddesoti āha “socabyaṃ
tika-s0402t:264_1: sucibhāvo”ti. Ettha ca socabyanti sīlavasena sucibhāvoti vuttaṃ. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0402t:264_2: saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “soceyyanti mettāya ca mettāpubbabhāgassa ca vasena sucibhāvo”ti
tika-s0402t:264_3: vuttaṃ. Teneva abhidhammepi “tattha katamaṃ socabyaṃ? Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā
tika-s0402t:264_4: mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti, idaṃ vuccati socabya”nti niddeso kato. Etthāpi hi
tika-s0402t:264_5: “mettī”tiādinā yā kāci mettā vuttā, mettācetovimutti pana appanāppattāva.
tika-s0402t:266: 172. Navame kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvopi balaṭṭho eva, paṭipakkhehi pana akampanīyataṃ sātisayaṃ balaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ “muṭṭhassacce akampanenā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:267_0: 173. Dasame paccanīkadhammasamanato samatho, samādhīti āha “samathoti cittekaggatā”ti.
tika-s0402t:267_1: Aniccādinā vividhenākārena dassanato passanato vipassanā, paññāti āha “saṅkhārapariggāhakañāṇa”nti.
tika-s0402t:268_0: 174. Ekādasame dussīlyanti samādinnassa sīlassa bhedakaro vītikkamo. Diṭṭhivipattīti
tika-s0402t:268_1: “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā dūsikā micchādiṭṭhīti āha “diṭṭhivipattīti micchādiṭṭhī”ti.
tika-s0402t:269_0: 175. Dvādasame sīlasampadāti sabbabhāgato tassa anūnatāpatti paripuṇṇabhāvo sīlasampadā.
tika-s0402t:270_0: 176. Terasame sīlavisuddhīti visuddhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthaṃ sīlaṃ, cittavisuddhiādiuparivisuddhiyā
tika-s0402t:270_1: paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ visuddhasīlanti vuttaṃ hoti. Suvisuddhameva hi sīlaṃ tassā
tika-s0402t:270_2: padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tenāha “sīlavisuddhīhi visuddhisampāpakaṃ sīla”nti. Etthāpi visuddhisampāpakanti
tika-s0402t:270_3: cittavisuddhiādiuparivisuddhiyā sampāpakanti attho daṭṭhabbo. Abhidhamme panāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:270_4: “tattha katamā sīlavisuddhi? Kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko
tika-s0402t:270_5: avītikkamo, ayaṃ vuccati sīlavisuddhī”ti evaṃ vibhattā.
tika-s0402t:271_0: Diṭṭhivisuddhīti visuddhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthaṃ dassanañāṇaṃ dassanavisuddhi, paramatthavisuddhiṃ
tika-s0402t:271_1: nibbānañca pāpetuṃ upanetuṃ samatthaṃ kammassakatañāṇādi sammādassananti attho. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:271_4: evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Abhidhamme panāyaṃ “tattha katamā diṭṭhivisuddhi? Kammassakatañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:271_5: saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, maggassa maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ, phalasamaṅgissa ñāṇa”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:272_0: Ettha ca idaṃ akusalakammaṃ no sakaṃ, idaṃ pana kammaṃ sakanti evaṃ byatirekato anvayato
tika-s0402t:272_1: ca kammassakatajānanañāṇaṃ kammassakatañāṇaṃ. Tividhaduccaritañhi attanā katampi
tika-s0402t:272_2: parena katampi no sakakammaṃ nāma hoti atthabhañjanato, sucaritaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma
tika-s0402t:272_3: atthajananato. Vipassanāñāṇaṃ pana vacīsaccañca anulometi, paramatthasaccañca na
tika-s0402t:272_4: vilometīti saccānulomikañāṇanti vuttaṃ. Vipassanāñāṇañhi lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhanatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:272_5: ārambhakāle “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti pavattaṃ vacīsaccañca anulometi, tatheva paṭivijjhanato
tika-s0402t:272_6: paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānañca na vilometi na virādheti ekanteneva sampāpanato.
tika-s0402t:273_0: 177. Cuddasame diṭṭhivisuddhīti paṭhamamaggasammādiṭṭhi vuttā. Yathādiṭṭhissa ca
tika-s0402t:273_2: ñāṇadassanaṃ kathitaṃ. Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti taṃsampayuttameva vīriya”nti
tika-s0402t:273_3: vuttaṃ. Ettha hi ñāṇadassananti ñāṇabhūtaṃ dassanaṃ. Tena dassanamaggaṃ vadati. Taṃsampayuttameva
tika-s0402t:273_4: vīriyanti paṭhamamaggasampayuttavīriyamāha. Apica diṭṭhivisuddhīti sabbāpi maggasammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0402t:273_5: Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti taṃsampayuttameva vīriyaṃ. Teneva dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:273_6: “apica purimapadena catumaggañāṇaṃ, pacchimapadena taṃsampayuttaṃ vīriya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:274_0: Atha vā diṭṭhīvisuddhīti kammassakatañāṇādisaṅkhātā sabbāpi sammādiṭṭhi vuttā. Yathādiṭṭhissa
tika-s0402t:274_1: ca padhānanti yo cetasiko vīriyārambho…pe… sammāvāyāmoti. Ayameva pāḷiyā sameti.
tika-s0402t:274_2: Abhidhamme hi “diṭṭhivisuddhi kho panāti yā paññā pajānanā…pe… amoho dhammavicayo
tika-s0402t:274_3: sammādiṭṭhi. Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti yo cetasiko vīriyārambho…pe… sammāvāyāmo”ti
tika-s0402t:274_4: evamayaṃ duko vibhatto. Teneva abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yā paññā pajānanātiādīhi heṭṭhā
tika-s0402t:274_5: vuttāni kammassakatañāṇādīneva cattāri ñāṇāni vibhattāni. ‘Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho’tiādīhi
tika-s0402t:274_6: padehi niddiṭṭhaṃ vīriyaṃ gahitaṃ paññāya lokiyaṭṭhāne lokiyaṃ, lokuttaraṭṭhāne lokuttara”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:275_0: Idhāpi visuddhisampāpikā catumaggasammādiṭṭhi, pañcavidhāpi vā sammādiṭṭhi diṭṭhivisuddhīti
tika-s0402t:275_2: vīriyanti idaṃ pana “yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti paṭhamamaggasampayuttaṃ vīriyanti
tika-s0402t:275_3: vutta”nti adhippāyena vadati. Ettha ca taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ matabhedenāyaṃ vaṇṇanābhedoti
tika-s0402t:275_4: na aṭṭhakathāvacanānaṃ aññamaññavirodho saṅkitabbo. Atha yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti
tika-s0402t:275_5: heṭṭhimamaggasampayuttameva vīriyaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha “tañhi tassā diṭṭhiyā anurūpattā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:275_6: Tattha tassā diṭṭhiyāti heṭṭhimamaggasampayuttāya diṭṭhiyā. Yathādiṭṭhissāti anurūpadiṭṭhissa
tika-s0402t:276_0: 178. Pannarasame samattaṃ tussanaṃ titti santuṭṭhi, natthi etassa santuṭṭhīti asantuṭṭhi,
tika-s0402t:276_1: asantuṭṭhissa bhāvo asantuṭṭhitā. Yā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asantuṭṭhassa
tika-s0402t:276_2: bhiyyokamyatā, tassā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tāya hi samaṅgibhūto puggalo sīlaṃ pūretvā
tika-s0402t:276_3: jhānaṃ uppādeti, jhānaṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhati, āraddhavipassako arahattaṃ
tika-s0402t:276_4: aggahetvā antarā vosānaṃ nāpajjati, “alamettāvatā katamettāvatā”ti saṅkocaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0402t:276_5: Tenāha “aññatra arahattamaggā kusalesu dhammesu asantuṭṭhibhāvo”ti. Tatra aññatra
tika-s0402t:276_6: arahattamaggāti arahattamaggasampattaṃ vināti attho. “Appaṭivānitā ca padhānasmi”nti
tika-s0402t:276_7: idaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti na vibhattaṃ.
tika-s0402t:277_0: 179. Soḷasame muṭṭhā naṭṭhā sati etassāti muṭṭhassati, tassa bhāvo muṭṭhassaccanti
tika-s0402t:277_1: āha “muṭṭhassaccanti muṭṭhassatibhāvo”ti. Muṭṭhassatibhāvoti ca satippaṭipakkho dhammo,
tika-s0402t:277_2: na satiyā abhāvamattaṃ. Asampajaññanti “tattha katamaṃ asampajaññaṃ? Yaṃ aññāṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:277_3: adassanaṃ…pe… avijjālaṅghī moho akusalamūla”nti evaṃ vuttā avijjāyeva. Tathā hi vijjāpaṭipakkho
tika-s0402t:277_4: avijjā vijjāya pahātabbato, evaṃ sampajaññappaṭipakkho asampajaññaṃ. Yasmā pana sampajaññappaṭipakkhe
tika-s0402t:277_5: sati tassa vasena ñāṇassa abhāvo hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “aññāṇabhāvo”ti.
tika-s0402t:278_0: 180. Sattarasame apilāpanalakkhaṇā satīti udake lābu viya yena cittaṃ ārammaṇe pilavitvā
tika-s0402t:278_1: viya tiṭṭhati, na ogāhati, taṃ pilāpanaṃ. Na pilāpanaṃ apilāpanaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:282_0: 181. Ito paresu kodhavaggādīsu upanandhanalakkhaṇoti kujjhanavasena “akkocchi maṃ
tika-s0402t:282_1: avadhi ma”ntiādinā cittapariyonandhanalakkhaṇo. Pubbakālikaṃ kodhaṃ upanayhati bandhati,
tika-s0402t:282_2: kujjhanākāraṃ pabandhati ghaṭeti. Āghātavatthunā cittaṃ bandhantī viya hotīti aparakālo
tika-s0402t:282_3: kodho upanāho. Suṭṭhu kataṃ kāraṇaṃ upakāro sukatakāraṇaṃ, tassa pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa
tika-s0402t:282_4: guṇassa makkhanaṃ udakapuñchaniyā viya sarīrānugatassa udakassa puñchanaṃ vināsanaṃ
tika-s0402t:282_5: lakkhaṇametassāti sukatakaraṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo. Tathā hi so paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanaṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:282_6: makkhoti vuccati. Bahussutepi puggale ajjhotthariṃsu, “īdisassa ca bahussutassa aniyatā
tika-s0402t:282_7: gahitā, tava ca mama ca ko viseso”tiādinā nayena uppajjamāno yugaggāhī palāsoti āha
tika-s0402t:282_8: “yugaggāhalakkhaṇo palāso”ti. Tattha yugaggāho nāma samadhuraggāho, asamampi attanā
tika-s0402t:282_9: samaṃ katvā gaṇhanaṃ. Palāsatīti palāso, paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā dantehi viya chinditvā
tika-s0402t:283_0: Usūyanalakkhaṇāti paresaṃ sakkārādīni khiyyanalakkhaṇā. Maccherassa bhāvo macchariyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:283_2: Maccharāyanalakkhaṇanti attano sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇabhāve asahanalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:283_4: sāṭheyyanti āha “kerāṭikalakkhaṇaṃ sāṭheyya”nti. Aññathā attano pavedanapuggalo kerāṭiko
tika-s0402t:283_5: nekatikavāṇijoti vadanti. Kerāṭiko hi puggalo ānandamaccho viya hoti.
tika-s0402t:284: 187. Yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ nirayeti yathā ābhataṃ kañci āharitvā ṭhapito, evaṃ attano kammunā nikkhitto niraye ṭhapitoyevāti attho.
tika-s0402t:286: 191-200. Dukkhassa vaḍḍhi etesanti dukkhavaḍḍhikā. Ye hi dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhenti, punappunaṃ uppādenti, dukkhassa vaḍḍhi tesaṃ atthīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sukhavaḍḍhikāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:288_0: 201. Atthavaseti vuddhivisese ānisaṃsavisese. Tesaṃ pana sikkhāpadapaññattikāraṇattā
tika-s0402t:288_1: āha “dve kāraṇāni sandhāyā”ti. Atthoyeva vā atthavaso, dve atthe dve kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:288_2: hoti. Atha vā attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso, kāraṇanti
tika-s0402t:288_3: evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yathā “anabhijjhā dhammapada”nti vutte anabhijjhā eko
tika-s0402t:288_4: dhammakoṭṭhāsoti attho hoti. Evamidhāpi sikkhāpadanti sikkhākoṭṭhāso sikkhāya eko
tika-s0402t:288_5: padesoti ayamettha attho daṭṭhabboti āha “sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti sikkhākoṭṭhāso ṭhapito”ti.
tika-s0402t:289_0: Saṅghasuṭṭhu nāma saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvo “suṭṭhu devā”ti āgataṭṭhāne viya “suṭṭhu,
tika-s0402t:289_2: Dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyāti dummaṅkū nāma dussīlapuggalā. Ye maṅkutaṃ āpādiyamānāpi
tika-s0402t:289_3: dukkhena āpajjanti, vītikkamaṃ karontā vā katvā vā na lajjanti, tesaṃ niggahatthāya.
tika-s0402t:289_4: Te hi sikkhāpade asati “kiṃ tumhehi diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ sutaṃ, kiṃ amhehi kataṃ, katarasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:289_5: vatthusmiṃ katamaṃ āpattiṃ ropetvā amhe niggaṇhathā”ti saṅghaṃ viheṭhessanti, sikkhāpade
tika-s0402t:289_6: pana sati tesaṃ saṅgho sikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggahessati.
tika-s0402t:290_0: Pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyāti pesalānaṃ piyasīlānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya.
tika-s0402t:290_1: Piyasīlā hi bhikkhū kattabbākattabbaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādaṃ ajānantā sikkhattayapāripūriyā
tika-s0402t:290_2: ghaṭamānā kilamanti, ubbāḷhā honti, kattabbākattabbaṃ pana sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ
tika-s0402t:290_3: mariyādañca ñatvā sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭentā na kilamanti, na ubbāḷhā honti.
tika-s0402t:290_4: Tena tesaṃ sikkhāpadappaññāpanā phāsuvihārāya saṃvattati. Yo vā dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0402t:290_5: niggaho, sveva etesaṃ phāsuvihāro. Dussīlapuggale nissāya hi uposatho na tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:290_6: pavāraṇā na tiṭṭhati, saṅghakammāni nappavattanti, sāmaggī na hoti, bhikkhū anekaggā
tika-s0402t:290_7: uddesaparipucchākammaṭṭhānādīni anuyuñjituṃ na sakkonti. Dussīlesu pana niggahitesu
tika-s0402t:290_8: sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti, tato pesalā bhikkhū phāsu viharanti. Evaṃ “pesalānaṃ
tika-s0402t:290_9: bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyā”ti ettha dvidhā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:291: “Na vo ahaṃ, cunda, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
tika-s0402t:294: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
tika-s0402t:295_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhanādayo
tika-s0402t:295_1: ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā āsavāti āha – “diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃyeva
tika-s0402t:295_2: attabhāve vītikkamapaccayā paṭiladdhabbāna”ntiādi. Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na
tika-s0402t:295_4: diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā, ye ca tannimittameva nirayādīsu nibbattassa paññavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena
tika-s0402t:295_5: mahādukkhānubhavanappakārā anatthā, te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ
tika-s0402t:295_6: saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho
tika-s0402t:295_7: attabhāvo, tattha bhavā diṭṭhadhammikā. Samparetabbato pecca gantabbato samparāyo,
tika-s0402t:296_1: puggalesu pana uppajjamānāni verāni. Te eva vā dukkhadhammāti heṭṭhā vuttā vadhabandhanādayo.
tika-s0402t:296_2: Tesaṃ pakkhupacchedanatthāyāti tesaṃ pāpicchānaṃ pakkhupacchedāya gaṇabhojanasadisaṃ
tika-s0402t:296_3: sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ. Paṇḍitamanussānanti lokiyaparikkhakajanānaṃ. Te hi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
tika-s0402t:296_4: sati sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ ñatvā vā yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū disvā vā –
tika-s0402t:296_5: “yāni vata loke mahājanassa rajjanadussanamuyhanaṭṭhānāni, tehi ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā
tika-s0402t:296_6: ārakā viharanti, dukkaraṃ vata karonti, bhāriyaṃ vata karontī”ti pasādaṃ āpajjanti
tika-s0402t:296_7: vinayapiṭake potthakaṃ disvā micchādiṭṭhikatavedibrāhmaṇo viya. Uparūparipasādabhāvāyāti
tika-s0402t:296_8: bhiyyo bhiyyo pasāduppādanatthaṃ. Yepi hi sāsane pasannā kulaputtā, tepi sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ
tika-s0402t:296_9: vā ñatvā yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū vā disvā “aho, ayyā, dukkarakārino,
tika-s0402t:296_10: ye yāvajīvaṃ ekabhattaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vinayasaṃvaraṃ anupālentī”ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdanti.
tika-s0402t:297_1: tividhassapi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ. Tattha piṭakattayasaṅgahitaṃ sabbampi
tika-s0402t:297_2: buddhavacanaṃ pariyattisaddhammo nāma. Terasa dhutaguṇā, cuddasa khandhakavattāni,
tika-s0402t:297_3: dveasīti mahāvattāni, sīlasamādhivipassanāti ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma. Cattāro
tika-s0402t:297_4: ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañcāti ayaṃ adhigamasaddhammo nāma. So
tika-s0402t:297_5: sabbo yasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati bhikkhū sikkhāpadañca tassa vibhaṅgañca tadatthajotanatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:297_6: aññañca buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, yathāpaññattañca paṭipajjamānā paṭipattiṃ pūretvā
tika-s0402t:297_7: paṭipattiyā adhigantabbaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigacchanti, tasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
tika-s0402t:298_0: Pañcavidhassapi vinayassāti tadaṅgavinayādivasena pañcappakārassa vinayassa. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:298_1: pana sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati saṃvaravinayo ca pahānavinayo ca samathavinayo ca
tika-s0402t:298_2: paññattivinayo cāti catubbidhopi vinayo anuggahito hoti upatthambhito supatthambhito.
tika-s0402t:298_3: Tena vuttaṃ “vinayānuggahāyā”ti. Tattha saṃvaravinayoti sīlasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro,
tika-s0402t:298_4: ñāṇasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidhopi saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ
tika-s0402t:298_5: vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, vinayanato vinayoti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:298_7: nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidhampi pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ, vinayanaṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:298_8: vinayo, tasmā pahānavinayoti vuccati. Samathavinayoti satta adhikaraṇasamathā. Paññattivinayoti
tika-s0402t:298_9: sikkhāpadameva. Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato sikkhāpadasaṅkhāto
tika-s0402t:299_1: bhikkhūnaṃ uddesā. Bhikkhunīnaṃ cattāroti bhikkhūnaṃ vuttesu aniyatuddesaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā cattāro.
tika-s0402t:300_0: Ehibhikkhūpasampadāti “ehi bhikkhū”ti vacanamattena paññattaupasampadā. Bhagavā hi
tika-s0402t:300_1: ehibhikkhubhāvāya upanissayasampannaṃ puggalaṃ disvā rattapaṃsukūlantarato suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:300_2: dakkhiṇahatthaṃ nīharitvā brahmaghosaṃ nicchārento “ehi bhikkhu, cara brahmacariyaṃ
tika-s0402t:300_3: sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti vadati. Tassa saheva bhagavato vacanena gihiliṅgaṃ
tika-s0402t:300_4: antaradhāyati, pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ruhati, bhaṇḍu kāsāvavasano hoti – ekaṃ
tika-s0402t:300_5: nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃse ṭhapetvā vāmaaṃsakūṭe āsattanīluppalavaṇṇamattikāpatto.
tika-s0402t:301: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
tika-s0402t:303: Evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi parikkhārehi sarīre paṭimukkehiyeva vassasatikatthero viya iriyāpathasampanno buddhācariyako buddhupajjhāyako sammāsambuddhaṃ vandamānoyeva tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0402t:304_0: Saraṇagamanūpasampadāti “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”tiādinā nayena tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ
tika-s0402t:304_1: bhinditvā vuttehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi anuññātaupasampadā. Ovādūpasampadāti ovādappaṭiggahaṇaupasampadā.
tika-s0402t:304_2: Sā ca “tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘tibbaṃ me hirottappaṃ, paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0402t:304_3: bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesū’ti. Evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha
tika-s0402t:304_4: te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ suṇissāmi kusalūpasaṃhitaṃ, sabbaṃ
tika-s0402t:304_5: taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karitvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇissāmī’ti,
tika-s0402t:304_6: evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘sātasahagatā
tika-s0402t:304_7: ca me kāyagatāsati na vijahissatī’ti, evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba”nti iminā ovādappaṭiggahaṇena
tika-s0402t:305_0: Pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā nāma sopākassa anuññātaupasampadā. Bhagavā kira pubbārāme
tika-s0402t:305_1: anucaṅkamantaṃ sopākasāmaṇeraṃ “uddhumātakasaññāti vā, sopāka, rūpasaññāti vā ime
tika-s0402t:305_2: dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā, udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti dasa asubhanissite
tika-s0402t:305_3: pañhe pucchi. So byākāsi. Bhagavā tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “kativassosi, tvaṃ sopākā”ti
tika-s0402t:305_4: pucchi. Sattavassohaṃ bhagavāti. Sopāka, tvaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā
tika-s0402t:305_5: pañhe byākāsīti āraddhacitto upasampadaṃ anujāni. Ayaṃ pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā.
tika-s0402t:306_0: Ñatticatutthaupasampadā nāma bhikkhūnaṃ etarahi upasampadā. Garudhammūpasampadāti
tika-s0402t:306_1: garudhammappaṭiggahaṇena upasampadā. Sā ca mahāpajāpatiyā aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇena
tika-s0402t:306_2: anuññātā. Ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā nāma bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghato ñatticatutthena,
tika-s0402t:306_3: bhikkhusaṅghato ñatticatutthenāti imehi dvīhi kammehi anuññātā aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā.
tika-s0402t:306_4: Dūtena upasampadā nāma aḍḍhakāsiyā gaṇikāya anuññātā upasampadā.
tika-s0402t:307_0: Ñattikammaṃ nava ṭhānāni gacchatīti katamāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ, nissāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:307_1: uposatho, pavāraṇā, sammuti, dānaṃ, paṭiggahaṃ, paccukkaḍḍhanaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva
tika-s0402t:307_2: navamanti evaṃ vuttāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati. Tattha “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-s0402t:307_3: itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, anusiṭṭho so mayā, yadi saṅghassa
tika-s0402t:307_4: pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo āgaccheyya, āgacchāhīti vattabbo”ti evaṃ upasampadāpekkhassa
tika-s0402t:308_0: “Suṇantu me, āyasmantā, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dhammakathiko, imassa neva suttaṃ
tika-s0402t:308_1: āgacchati, no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati.
tika-s0402t:308_2: Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:308_3: vūpasameyyāmā”ti evaṃ ubbāhikavinicchaye dhammakathikassa bhikkhuno nissāraṇā nissāraṇā nāma.
tika-s0402t:309: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajjuposatho pannaraso. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti uposatho nāma.
tika-s0402t:310: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajja pavāraṇā pannarasī. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ pavāraṇākammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti pavāraṇā nāma.
tika-s0402t:311_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho. Yadi
tika-s0402t:311_1: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ anusāseyya”nti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
tika-s0402t:311_2: itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ anusāseyyā”ti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ
tika-s0402t:311_3: antarāyike dhamme puccheyya”nti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ
tika-s0402t:311_4: antarāyike dhamme puccheyyā”ti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ
tika-s0402t:311_5: puccheyya”nti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyā”ti,
tika-s0402t:311_6: “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti, “yadi
tika-s0402t:311_7: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyā”ti evaṃ
tika-s0402t:311_8: attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā sammannituṃ ṭhapitā ñatti sammuti nāma.
tika-s0402t:312_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa
tika-s0402t:312_1: nissaṭṭhaṃ. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-s0402t:312_2: dadeyyā”ti, “yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-s0402t:312_3: dadeyyu”nti evaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvarapattādīnaṃ dānaṃ dānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:313_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ
tika-s0402t:313_1: karoti deseti. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti,
tika-s0402t:313_2: “yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpatiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti,
tika-s0402t:313_3: tena vattabbo “passasī”ti? Āma passāmīti. “Āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti evaṃ āpattippaṭiggaho paṭiggaho nāma.
tika-s0402t:314_0: “Suṇantu me, āyasmantā āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma,
tika-s0402t:314_1: pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāma, āgame kāle pavāreyyāmā”ti, te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā
tika-s0402t:314_2: kalahakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā taṃ kālaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ, āvāsikena bhikkhunā byattena
tika-s0402t:314_3: paṭibalena āvāsikā bhikkhū ñāpetabbā “suṇantu me, āyasmantā āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ
tika-s0402t:314_4: pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāma, āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti
tika-s0402t:315_0: Sabbeheva ekajjhaṃ sannipatitabbaṃ, sannipatitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho
tika-s0402t:315_1: ñāpetabbo “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, amhākaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ
tika-s0402t:315_2: viharataṃ bahu assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ. Sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi
tika-s0402t:315_3: aññamaññaṃ kāressāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvatteyya.
tika-s0402t:315_4: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyya
tika-s0402t:315_5: ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ, ṭhapetvā gihipaṭisaṃyutta”nti evaṃ tiṇavatthārakasamathe katā
tika-s0402t:316_0: Ñattidutiyaṃ kammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti katamāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:316_1: nissāraṇaṃ, sammuti, dānaṃ, uddharaṇaṃ, desanaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamanti evaṃ
tika-s0402t:316_2: vuttāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati. Tattha vaḍḍhassa licchavino pattanikkujjanavasena
tika-s0402t:316_3: khandhake vuttā nissāraṇā, tasseva pataukkujjanavasena vuttā osāraṇā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:316_7: vasena sammuti veditabbā. Kaṭhinacīvaradānamatakacīvaradānavasena dānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:316_9: veditabbā. Yā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathe sabbasaṅgāhikañattiñca ekekasmiṃ pakkhe
tika-s0402t:316_10: ekekaṃ ñattiñcāti tissopi ñattiyo ṭhapetvā puna ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekā, ekasmiṃ pakkhe
tika-s0402t:316_11: ekāti dvepi ñattidutiyakammavācā vuttā. Tāsaṃ vasena kammalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:317_0: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti katamāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:317_1: nissāraṇaṃ, sammuti, dānaṃ, niggahaṃ, samanubhāsanaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamanti
tika-s0402t:317_2: evaṃ vuttāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati. Tattha tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ
tika-s0402t:317_3: vasena nissāraṇā, tesaṃyeva ca kammānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena osāraṇā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:317_5: veditabbaṃ. Mūlāyapaṭikassanakammavasena niggaho veditabbo. Ukkhittānuvattakā, aṭṭha
tika-s0402t:317_6: yāvatatiyakā, ariṭṭho, caṇḍakāḷī ca imete yāvatatiyakāti imāsaṃ ekādasannaṃ samanubhāsanānaṃ
tika-s0402t:317_7: vasena samanubhāsanā veditabbā. Upasampadakammaabbhānakammavasena kammalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:318_0: Dhammasammukhatātiādīsu yena dhammena, yena vinayena, yena satthusāsanena saṅgho
tika-s0402t:318_1: kammaṃ karoti, ayaṃ dhammasammukhatā, vinayasammukhatā, satthusāsanasammukhatā. Tattha
tika-s0402t:318_2: dhammoti bhūtavatthu. Vinayoti codanā ceva sāraṇā ca. Satthusāsanaṃ nāma ñattisampadā
tika-s0402t:318_3: ceva anusāvanasampadā ca. Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ
tika-s0402t:318_4: chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā nappaṭikkosanti, ayaṃ saṅghasammukhatā. Yassa saṅgho
tika-s0402t:318_5: kammaṃ karoti, tassa sammukhībhāvo puggalasammukhatā. Sesamettha vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
tika-s0402t:327_0: 1. Tikanipātassa paṭhame bhayanti bhīti cetaso byadhoti āha “cittutrāso”ti. Upaddavoti
tika-s0402t:327_1: antarāyo. Tassa pana vikkhepakāraṇattā vuttaṃ “anekaggatākāro”ti. Upasaggoti upasajjanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:327_2: devatopapīḷādinā appaṭikāravighātāpatti. Sā pana yasmā paṭikārābhāvena vihaññamānassa
tika-s0402t:327_3: kiñci kātuṃ asamatthassa osīdanakāraṇaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “tattha tattha lagganākāro”ti.
tika-s0402t:327_4: Yathāvutte divase anāgacchantesūti vañcetvā āgantuṃ niyamitadivase anāgacchantesu.
tika-s0402t:327_5: Dvāre aggiṃ datvāti bahi anikkhamanatthāya dvāre aggiṃ datvā.
tika-s0402t:328_0: Naḷehi channapaṭicchannāti naḷehi tiṇacchadanasaṅkhepena upari chādetvā tehiyeva
tika-s0402t:328_1: dārukuṭikaniyāmena paritopi chāditā. Eseva nayoti iminā tiṇehi channataṃ sesasambhārānaṃ
tika-s0402t:329: Vidhavaputteti antabhāvopalakkhaṇaṃ. Te hi nippitikā avinītā asaṃyatā yaṃ kiñci kārino. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:332_0: 2. Dutiye lakkhīyati bālo ayanti ñāyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, kammaṃ lakkhaṇametassāti
tika-s0402t:332_1: kammalakkhaṇoti āha “kāyadvārādipavattaṃ kamma”ntiādi. Apadīyanti dosā etena rakkhīyanti,
tika-s0402t:332_2: lūyanti chijjanti vāti apadānaṃ, sattānaṃ sammā, micchā vā pavattappayogo. Tena sobhatīti
tika-s0402t:332_3: apadānasobhanī. Tenāha “paññā nāmā”tiādi. Attano caritenevāti attano cariyāya eva.
tika-s0402t:335_0: 3-4. Tatiye etehīti duccintitacintitādīhi. Etena lakkhaṇasaddassa saraṇatthatamāha.
tika-s0402t:335_1: Tānevāti lakkhaṇāni eva. Assāti bālassa. Bālo ayanti nimīyati sañjānīyati etehīti
tika-s0402t:335_2: bālanimittāni. Apadānaṃ vuccati, vikhyātaṃ kammaṃ, duccintitacintitādīni ca bāle
tika-s0402t:335_3: vikhyātāni asādhāraṇabhāvena. Tasmā “bālassa apadānānī”ti. Abhijjhādīhi duṭṭhaṃ dūsitaṃ
tika-s0402t:335_4: cintitaṃ duccintitaṃ, taṃ cintetīti duccintitacintī. Lobhādīhi duṭṭhaṃ bhāsitaṃ musāvādādiṃ
tika-s0402t:335_5: bhāsatīti dubbhāsitabhāsī. Tesaṃyeva vasena kattabbato dukkaṭakammaṃ pāṇātipātādiṃ
tika-s0402t:335_7: vuttassa atthavacanassa “paṇḍito ayanti etehi lakkhīyatī”tiādinā anussaraṇena. Manosucaritādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:335_9: manosucaritādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ vasena yojetabbāni. Catutthaṃ vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
tika-s0402t:338_0: 5-10. Pañcame kati nu kho anussatiṭṭhānānītiādi chakke āvi bhavissatīti. Evaṃ cintitanti
tika-s0402t:338_1: ayoniso cintitaṃ. Apañhameva pañhanti kathesīti apañhameva pañho ayanti maññamāno
tika-s0402t:340: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
tika-s0402t:342_0: Tattha ṭhānakaraṇāni sithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ sithilaṃ, tāniyeva dhanitāni
tika-s0402t:342_1: asithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ dhanitaṃ. Dvimattakālaṃ dīghaṃ, ekamattakālaṃ
tika-s0402t:342_2: rassaṃ. Garukanti dīghameva, yaṃ vā “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassā”ti saṃyogaparaṃ
tika-s0402t:342_3: katvā vuccati, lahukanti rassameva, yaṃ vā “āyasmato buddharakkhitatherassā”ti evaṃ
tika-s0402t:342_4: visaṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati. Niggahītanti yaṃ karaṇāni niggahetvā avissajjetvā avivaṭena
tika-s0402t:342_5: mukhena sānunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ. Sambandhanti yaṃ parapadena sambandhitvā “tuṇhassā”ti
tika-s0402t:342_6: vuccati. Vavatthitanti yaṃ parapadena asambandhaṃ katvā vicchinditvā “tuṇhī assā”ti
tika-s0402t:342_7: vuccati. Vimuttanti yaṃ karaṇāni aniggahetvā vissajjetvā vivaṭena mukhena sānunāsikaṃ
tika-s0402t:342_8: akatvā vuccati. Dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedoti evaṃ sithilādivasena byañjanabuddhiyā
tika-s0402t:342_9: akkharuppādakacittassa dasappakārena pabhedo. Sabbāni hi akkharāni cittasamuṭṭhānāni
tika-s0402t:343: “Aṭṭhānaṃ kho etaṃ, āvuso sāriputtā”tiādi pañcake āvi bhavissati. “Kati nu kho, ānanda, anussatiṭṭhānānī”tiādi pana chakke āvi bhavissati. Chaṭṭhādīsu natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:348_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame ñātoyeva paññātoti āha “ñāto paññāto”ti. Kassa ananulomiketi
tika-s0402t:348_1: āha “sāsanassā”ti, sāsanassa ananulomike appatirūpeti attho. Idāni ananulomikasaddassa
tika-s0402t:348_2: nibbacanaṃ dassento “na anulometīti ananulomika”nti āha. Sāsanassāti vā sāsananti
tika-s0402t:348_3: attho. Sāsanaṃ na anulometīti ananulomikanti evamettha sambandho daṭṭhabbo. Sabhāgavisabhāganti
tika-s0402t:348_4: liṅgato sabhāgavisabhāgaṃ. “Viyapuggale”ti āhāti liṅgasabhāgehi avisesetvā āha. Ummādaṃ
tika-s0402t:348_5: pāpuṇīti so kira sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pihitadvāragabbhe sayanapiṭṭhe nisīditvā bhariyaṃ
tika-s0402t:348_6: ārabbha mettaṃ bhāvento mettāmukhena uppannena rāgena andhīkato bhariyāya santikaṃ
tika-s0402t:348_7: gantukāmo dvāraṃ asallakkhetvā bhittiṃ bhinditvāpi nikkhamitukāmatāya bhittiṃ paharanto
tika-s0402t:351_1: catupārisuddhisīlampi samādinnameva hotīti dasseti. Maggasannissitāneva hontīti maggādhigamatthāya
tika-s0402t:351_2: paṭipajjitabbattā kasiṇaparikammādīni maggasannissitāneva honti, tasmā maggaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0402t:351_3: tesampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, tehi vinā maggādhigamassa asambhavatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:352_0: Aggamaggādhigamena asammohappaṭivedhassa sikhāpattattā maggadhammesu viya phaladhammesupi
tika-s0402t:352_1: sātisayo asammohoti “sayaṃ abhiññā”ti vuttaṃ, sāmaṃ jānitvāti attho. Tathā jānanā
tika-s0402t:352_3: abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā”ti. Tathā sacchikiriyā cassa attani paṭilābhoti
tika-s0402t:355_0: 13. Tatiye santoti ettha santa-saddo “dīghaṃ santassa yojana”ntiādīsu kilantabhāve
tika-s0402t:355_1: āgato. “Ayañca vitakko, ayañca vicāro santo honti samitā”tiādīsu niruddhabhāve. “Adhigato
tika-s0402t:355_2: kho myāyaṃ dhammo, gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto”tiādīsu santañāṇagocaratāyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:355_3: “Upasantassa sadā satimato”tiādīsu kilesavūpasame. “Santo have sabbhi pavedayantī”tiādīsu
tika-s0402t:355_4: sādhūsu. “Pañcime, bhikkhave, mahācorā santo saṃvijjamānā”tiādīsu atthibhāve. Idhāpi
tika-s0402t:355_5: atthibhāveyevāti āha “santoti atthi upalabbhantī”ti. Tattha atthīti lokasaṅketavasena
tika-s0402t:355_6: saṃvijjanti. Atthibhāvo hettha puggalasambandhena vuttattā lokasamaññāvaseneva veditabbo,
tika-s0402t:355_7: na paramatthavasena. Atthīti cetaṃ nipātapadaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0402t:356_0: Saṃvijjamānāti upalabbhamānā. Yañhi saṃvijjati, taṃ upalabbhati. Tenāha “saṃvijjamānāti
tika-s0402t:356_1: tasseva vevacana”nti. Anāsoti patthanārahito. Tenāha “apatthano”ti. Āsaṃsati patthetīti
tika-s0402t:356_2: āsaṃso. Veṇuvettādivilīvehi suppādibhājanakārakā vilīvakārakā. Migamacchādīnaṃ nisādanato
tika-s0402t:356_3: nesādā, māgavikamacchabandhādayo. Rathesu cammena nahanakaraṇato rathakārā, dhammakārā.
tika-s0402t:356_4: Puiti karīsassa nāmaṃ, taṃ kusenti apanentīti pukkusā, pupphacchaḍḍakā.
tika-s0402t:357_0: Dubbaṇṇoti virūpo. Okoṭimakoti ārohābhāvena heṭṭhimako, rassakāyoti attho. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:357_1: “lakuṇḍako”ti. Laku viya ghaṭikā viya ḍeti pavattatīti hi lakuṇḍako, rasso. Kaṇati
tika-s0402t:357_2: nimīlatīti kāṇo. Taṃ panassa nimīlanaṃ ekena akkhinā dvīhipi cāti āha “ekakkhikāṇo
tika-s0402t:357_3: vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā”ti. Kuṇanaṃ kuṇo, hatthavekallaṃ. Taṃ etassa atthīti kuṇī. Khañjo
tika-s0402t:357_4: vuccati pādavikalo. Heṭṭhimakāyasaṅkhāto sarīrassa pakkho padeso hato assāti pakkhahato.
tika-s0402t:357_5: Tenāha “pīṭhasappī”ti. Padīpe padīpane etabbaṃ netabbanti padīpeyyaṃ, telādiupakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:358: Āsaṃ na karotīti rajjābhiseke kaniṭṭho patthanaṃ na karoti jeṭṭhe sati kaniṭṭhassa anadhikārattā. Abhisekaṃ arahatīti abhisekāraho, na abhisekāraho kāṇakuṇiādidosasamannāgato.
tika-s0402t:359_0: Sīlassa duṭṭhu nāma natthi, tasmā abhāvattho idha du-saddoti āha “nissīlo”ti. “Pāpaṃ
tika-s0402t:359_1: pāpena sukara”ntiādīsu viya pāpa-saddo nihīnapariyāyoti āha “lāmakadhammo”ti. Sīlavipattiyā
tika-s0402t:359_2: vā dussīlo. Diṭṭhivipattiyā pāpadhammo. Kāyavācāsaṃvarabhedena vā dussīlo, manosaṃvarabhedena,
tika-s0402t:359_3: satisaṃvarādibhedena vā pāpadhammo. Asuddhappayogatāya dussīlo, asuddhāsayatāya pāpadhammo.
tika-s0402t:359_4: Kusalasīlavirahena dussīlo, akusalasīlasamannāgamena pāpadhammo. Asucīhīti aparisuddhehi.
tika-s0402t:359_5: Saṅkāhi saritabbasamācāroti “imassa maññe idaṃ kamma”nti evaṃ parehi saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
tika-s0402t:359_6: Tenāha “kiñcidevā”tiādi. Attanāyeva vā saṅkāhi saritabbasamācāroti etenapi kammasādhanataṃyeva
tika-s0402t:359_7: saṅkassarasaddassa dasseti. Attano saṅkāya paresaṃ samācārakiriyaṃ sarati āsaṅkati
tika-s0402t:359_8: vidhāvatītipi saṅkassarasamācāroti evamettha kattusādhanatāpi daṭṭhabbā. Tassa hi
tika-s0402t:359_9: dve tayo jane kathente disvā “mama dosaṃ maññe kathentī”ti tesaṃ samācāraṃ saṅkāya sarati dhāvati.
tika-s0402t:360_0: Evaṃpaṭiññoti salākaggahaṇādīsu “kittakā vihāre samaṇā”ti gaṇanāya āraddhāya “ahampi
tika-s0402t:360_1: samaṇo, ahampi samaṇo”ti paṭiññaṃ datvā salākaggahaṇādīni karotīti samaṇo ahanti
tika-s0402t:360_2: evaṃsamaṇappaṭiñño. Sumbhakapattadhareti mattikāpattadhare. Pūtinā kammenāti saṃkiliṭṭhakammena,
tika-s0402t:360_3: nigguṇatāya vā guṇasāravirahitattā antopūti. Kasambukacavaro jāto sañjāto assāti
tika-s0402t:360_4: kasambujātoti āha “sañjātarāgādikacavaro”ti. Atha vā kasambu vuccati tintakuṇapakasaṭaṃ
tika-s0402t:360_5: udakaṃ, imasmiñca sāsane dussīlo nāma jigucchanīyattā tintakuṇapaudakasadiso, tasmā
tika-s0402t:360_6: kasambu viya jātoti kasambujāto. Lokuttaradhammaupanissayassa natthitāyāti yattha
tika-s0402t:360_7: patiṭṭhitena sakkā bhaveyya arahattaṃ laddhuṃ, tassā patiṭṭhāya bhinnattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:360_8: Mahāsīlasmiṃ paripūrakāritāyāti yattha patiṭṭhitena sakkā bhaveyya arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
tika-s0402t:363_1: catūhi saṅgahakāraṇehi. Cakkaṃ vattetīti āṇācakkaṃ pavatteti. Cakkanti vā idha ratanacakkaṃ
tika-s0402t:363_2: veditabbaṃ. Ayañhi cakkasaddo sampattiyaṃ, lakkhaṇe, rathaṅge, iriyāpathe, dāne,
tika-s0402t:363_3: ratanadhammakhuracakkādīsu ca dissati. “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ
tika-s0402t:363_4: devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi sampattiyaṃ dissati. “Pādatalesu cakkāni jātānī”ti ettha
tika-s0402t:363_5: lakkhaṇe. “Cakkaṃva vahato pada”nti ettha rathaṅge. “Catucakkaṃ navadvāra”nti ettha
tika-s0402t:363_6: iriyāpathe. “Dadaṃ bhuñja mā ca pamādo, cakkaṃ vattaya sabbapāṇina”nti ettha dāne.
tika-s0402t:363_7: “Dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pāturahosī”ti ettha ratanacakke. “Mayā pavattitaṃ cakka”nti
tika-s0402t:363_8: ettha dhammacakke. “Icchāhatassa posassa, cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti ettha khuracakke.
tika-s0402t:364_0: Kittāvatā panāyaṃ cakkavattī nāma hoti? Ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi cakkaratanaṃ ākāsaṃ
tika-s0402t:364_1: abbhuggantvā pavattati. Sabbacakkavattīnañhi nisinnāsanato uṭṭhahitvā cakkaratanasamīpaṃ
tika-s0402t:364_2: gantvā hatthisoṇḍasadisapanāḷiṃ suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ ukkhipitvā udakena abbhukkiritvā
tika-s0402t:364_3: “abhivijinātu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti vacanasamanantarameva vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā cakkaratanaṃ
tika-s0402t:364_4: pavattatīti. Yassa pavattisamakālameva, so rājā cakkavattī nāma hoti.
tika-s0402t:365_0: Dhammoti dasakusalakammapathadhammo, dasavidhaṃ vā cakkavattivattaṃ. Dasavidhe vā
tika-s0402t:365_1: kusaladhamme agarahite vā rājadhamme niyuttoti dhammiko. Tena ca dhammena sakalalokaṃ
tika-s0402t:365_2: rañjetīti dhammarājā. Dhammena vā laddharajjattā dhammarājā. Cakkavattīhi dhammena
tika-s0402t:365_3: ñāyena rajjaṃ adhigacchati, na adhammena. Dasavidhena cakkavattivattenāti dasappabhedena
tika-s0402t:366: Kiṃ pana taṃ dasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattanti? Vuccate –
tika-s0402t:367_0: “Katamaṃ pana taṃ, deva, ariyaṃ cakkavattivattanti? Tena hi tvaṃ, tāta, dhammaṃyeva
tika-s0402t:367_1: nissāya dhammaṃ sakkaronto dhammaṃ garuṃ karonto dhammaṃ mānento dhammaṃ pūjento
tika-s0402t:367_2: dhammaṃ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ
tika-s0402t:367_3: saṃvidahassu antojanasmiṃ balakāyasmiṃ khattiyesu anuyantesu brāhmaṇagahapatikesu
tika-s0402t:367_4: negamajānapadesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu migapakkhīsu. Mā ca te, tāta, vijite adhammakāro
tika-s0402t:367_5: pavattittha. Ye ca te, tāta, vijite adhanā assu, tesañca dhanamanuppadeyyāsi. Ye
tika-s0402t:367_6: ca te, tāta, vijite samaṇabrāhmaṇā madappamādā paṭiviratā khantisoracce niviṭṭhā
tika-s0402t:367_7: ekamattānaṃ damenti, ekamattānaṃ samenti, ekamattānaṃ parinibbāpenti. Te kālena kālaṃ
tika-s0402t:367_8: upasaṅkamitvā paripuccheyyāsi pariggaṇheyyāsi – ‘kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ kiṃ akusalaṃ,
tika-s0402t:367_9: kiṃ sāvajjaṃ kiṃ anavajjaṃ, kiṃ sevitabbaṃ kiṃ na sevitabbaṃ, kiṃ me kariyamānaṃ
tika-s0402t:367_10: dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya assa, kiṃ vā pana me kariyamānaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya
tika-s0402t:367_11: sukhāya assā’ti. Tesaṃ sutvā yaṃ akusalaṃ, taṃ abhinivajjeyyāsi, yaṃ kusalaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0402t:367_12: samādāya vatteyyāsi. Idaṃ kho, tāta, taṃ ariyaṃ cakkavattivatta”nti –
tika-s0402t:368_0: Evaṃ cakkavattisutte āgatanayena antojanasmiṃ balakāye ekaṃ, khattiyesu ekaṃ, anuyantesu
tika-s0402t:368_1: ekaṃ, brāhmaṇagahapatikesu ekaṃ, negamajānapadesu ekaṃ, samaṇabrāhmaṇesu ekaṃ, migapakkhīsu
tika-s0402t:368_2: ekaṃ, adhammakārappaṭikkhepo ekaṃ, adhanānaṃ dhanānuppadānaṃ ekaṃ, samaṇabrāhmaṇe
tika-s0402t:368_3: upasaṅkamitvā pañhapucchanaṃ ekanti evamevaṃ taṃ cakkavattivattaṃ dasavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:368_4: Gahapatike pana pakkhijāte ca visuṃ katvā gaṇhantassa dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:369_0: Aññathā vattituṃ adento so dhammo adhiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti tadadhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tena tadadhiṭṭhānena
tika-s0402t:369_1: cetasā. Sakkarontoti ādarakiriyāvasena karonto. Tenāha “yathā”tiādi. Garuṃ karontoti
tika-s0402t:369_2: pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukaraṇavasena garuṃ karonto. Tenevāha “tasmiṃ gāravuppattiyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:369_4: attabhāvesu sakkaccaṃ samupacitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Dhammavaseneva ca sabbakiriyānaṃ
tika-s0402t:369_6: Assāti rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā. Paraṃ rakkhantoti aññaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādianatthato rakkhanto.
tika-s0402t:369_7: Teneva pararakkhasādhanena khantiādiguṇena attānaṃ tato eva rakkhati. Mettacittatāti
tika-s0402t:370_0: Antojanasminti abbhantarabhūte puttadārādijane. Sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhāpentoti iminā
tika-s0402t:370_1: rakkhaṃ dasseti. Vatthagandhamālādīni cassa dadamānoti iminā āvaraṇaṃ, itarena guttiṃ.
tika-s0402t:370_2: Sampadānenapīti pi-saddena sīlasaṃvaresu patiṭṭhāpanādīnaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Esa nayo paresupi
tika-s0402t:370_3: pi-saddaggahaṇe. Nigamo nivāso etesanti negamā. Evaṃ jānapadāti āha “tathā nigamavāsino”tiādinā.
tika-s0402t:371_0: Rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā kāyakammādīsu saṃvidahanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ nāma tadupadesoyevāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:371_1: “kathetvā”ti. Etesūti pāḷiyaṃ vuttesu samaṇādīsu. Paṭivattetuṃ na sakkā khīṇānaṃ
tika-s0402t:374_0: 15. Pañcame isayo patanti sannipatanti etthāti isipatananti āha “buddhapaccekabuddhasaṅkhātāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:374_1: Sabbūpakaraṇāni sajjetvāti sabbāni rukkhassa chedanatacchanādisādhanāni upakaraṇāni
tika-s0402t:374_2: raññā āṇattadivaseyeva sajjetvā. Nānā karīyati etenāti nānākaraṇaṃ, nānābhāvoti āha
tika-s0402t:374_3: “nānatta”nti. Nesanti saralopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha “na esa”nti. Tathā atthesanti etthāpīti
tika-s0402t:374_4: āha “atthi esa”nti. Pavattanatthaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ abhisaṅkhāro, tassa gati vegasā
tika-s0402t:375_1: Tenāha “pūtisārenā”tiādi. Evaṃ guṇapatanena patitāti yathā taṃ cakkaṃ nābhiaranemīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:375_2: sadosatāya na patiṭṭhāsi, evamekacce puggalā kāyavaṅkādivasena sadosatāya guṇapatanena
tika-s0402t:375_3: patitā sakaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhanti. Ettha ca pharusavācādayopi apāyagamanīyā sotāpattimaggeneva
tika-s0402t:378_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe virajjhanakiriyā nāma pacchā samādātabbatāya apaṇṇakappayogasamādānā
tika-s0402t:378_1: viya hoti, avirajjhanakiriyā pana pacchā asamādātabbatāya anūnāti taṃsamaṅgipuggalo
tika-s0402t:378_2: apaṇṇako, tassa bhāvo apaṇṇakatāti āha “apaṇṇakapaṭipadanti aviraddhapaṭipada”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:378_3: Yasmā sā adhippetatthasādhanena ekaṃsikā vaṭṭato niyyānāvahā, tattha ca yuttiyuttā
tika-s0402t:378_4: asārāpagatā aviruddhatāya apaccanīkā anulomikā anudhammabhūtā ca, tasmā vuttaṃ “ekaṃsapaṭipada”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:378_5: Na takkaggāhena vā nayaggāhena vāti takkaggāhena vā paṭipanno na hoti nayaggāhena
tika-s0402t:378_6: vā apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno. Tattha takkaggāhena vāti ācariyaṃ alabhitvā “evaṃ
tika-s0402t:378_7: me sugati, nibbānaṃ vā bhavissatī”ti attano takkaggahaṇamattena. Nayaggāhenāti paccakkhato
tika-s0402t:378_8: adisvā nayato anumānato gahaṇena. Evaṃ gahetvā paṭipannoti takkamattena, nayaggāhena
tika-s0402t:378_9: vā paṭipanno. Paṇḍitasatthavāho viya sampattīhi na parihāyatīti yojanā.
tika-s0402t:379_0: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttanti parihānañca aparihānañca sandhāya jātake vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha
tika-s0402t:379_1: gāthāya atthayojanā – apaṇṇakaṃ ṭhānaṃ aviraddhakāraṇaṃ niyyānikakāraṇaṃ eke bodhisattappamukhā
tika-s0402t:379_2: paṇḍitamanussā gaṇhiṃsu. Ye pana te bālasatthavāhaputtappamukhā takkikā āhu, te dutiyaṃ
tika-s0402t:379_3: sāparādhaṃ anekaṃsikaṃ ṭhānaṃ aniyyānikaṃ kāraṇaṃ aggahesuṃ, te kaṇhapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā.
tika-s0402t:379_4: Tattha sukkapaṭipadā aparihānipaṭipadā, kaṇhapaṭipadā parihānipaṭipadā, tasmā ye
tika-s0402t:379_5: sukkapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā, te aparihīnā sotthibhāvaṃ pattā. Ye pana kaṇhapaṭipadaṃ
tika-s0402t:379_6: paṭipannā, te parihīnā anayabyasanaṃ āpannāti imamatthaṃ bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikassa
tika-s0402t:379_7: gahapatino vatvā uttari idamāha “etadaññāya medhāvī, taṃ gaṇhe yadapaṇṇaka”nti.
tika-s0402t:380_0: Tattha etadaññāya medhāvīti medhāti laddhanāmāya visuddhāya uttamāya paññāya samannāgato
tika-s0402t:380_1: kulaputto etaṃ apaṇṇakaṃ ṭhānaṃ dutiyañcāti dvīsu atakkaggāhatakkaggāhasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0402t:380_2: ṭhānesu guṇadosaṃ vuddhihāniṃ atthānatthaṃ ñatvāti attho. Taṃ gaṇhe yadapaṇṇakanti
tika-s0402t:380_4: tadeva gaṇheyya. Kasmā? Ekaṃsikādibhāvatoyeva. Itaraṃ pana na gaṇheyya. Kasmā? Anekaṃsikādibhāvatoyeva.
tika-s0402t:381_0: Yavanti tāya sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā viya hontīti yoni. Sā pana atthato
tika-s0402t:381_2: yoni nāmā”ti. Kāraṇaṃ yoni nāma, yonīti taṃ taṃ phalaṃ anupacitañāṇasambhārehi duravagādhabhedatāya
tika-s0402t:381_3: missitaṃ viya hotīti. Yato ekattanayena so evāyanti bālānaṃ micchāgāho. Passāvamaggo
tika-s0402t:381_4: yoni nāma yavanti tāya sattā yonisambandhena missitā hontīti. Paggahitā anuṭṭhānena,
tika-s0402t:382_1: kiñcāpi kusalādīnaṃ pavatti atthi, kāmāsavādayo eva pana vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharanakaasucibhāvena
tika-s0402t:382_2: sandanti, tasmā te eva “āsavā”ti vuccanti. Tattha hi paggharanakaasucimhi āsavasaddo
tika-s0402t:382_3: niruḷhoti. Dhammato yāva gotrabhūti tato paraṃ maggaphalesu appavattanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:382_4: Ete hi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena dhamme gacchantā tato paraṃ na gacchanti. Nanu tato paraṃ
tika-s0402t:382_5: bhavaṅgādīnipi gacchantīti ce? Na, tesampi pubbe ālambitesu lokiyadhammesu sāsavabhāvena
tika-s0402t:382_6: antogadhattā tato paratābhāvato. Ettha ca gotrabhuvacanena gotrabhuvodānaphalasamāpattipurecārikaparikammāni
tika-s0402t:382_7: vuttānīti veditabbāni. Paṭhamamaggapurecārikameva vā gotrabhu avadhinidassanabhāvena
tika-s0402t:382_8: gahitaṃ, tato paraṃ pana maggaphalasamānatāya aññesu maggesu maggavīthiyaṃ samāpattivīthīyaṃ
tika-s0402t:382_9: nirodhānantarañca pavattamānesu phalesu nibbāne ca āsavānaṃ pavatti nivāritāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:382_10: Savantīti gacchanti, ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattantīti attho. Avadhiattho ā-kāro,
tika-s0402t:382_11: avadhi ca mariyādābhividhibhedato duvidho. Tattha mariyādaṃ kiriyaṃ bahi katvā pavattati
tika-s0402t:382_12: yathā “āpāṭalīputtaṃ vuṭṭho devo”ti. Abhividhi pana kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavattati yathā
tika-s0402t:382_13: “ābhavaggaṃ bhagavato yaso pavattatī”ti. Abhividhiattho cāyamā-kāro idha gahitoti
tika-s0402t:383_0: Madirādayoti ādi-saddena sindhavakādambarikāpotikādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭho
tika-s0402t:383_1: ciraparivuṭṭhatā purāṇabhāvo. Avijjā nāhosītiādīti ettha ādi-saddena “purimā, bhikkhave,
tika-s0402t:383_2: koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāyā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Avijjāsavabhavāsavānaṃ
tika-s0402t:383_3: ciraparivuṭṭhatāya dassitāya tabbhāvabhāvino kāmāsavassa ciraparivuṭṭhatā dassitāva
tika-s0402t:383_4: hoti. Aññesu ca yathāvutte dhamme okāsañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānesu mānādīsu
tika-s0402t:383_6: ca etesaṃyeva, na aññesanti etesveva āsavasaddo niruḷhoti daṭṭhabbo. Āyataṃ anādikālikattā.
tika-s0402t:383_7: Pasavantīti phalanti. Na hi kiñci saṃsāradukkhaṃ atthi, yaṃ āsavehi vinā uppajjeyya.
tika-s0402t:383_8: Purimāni cetthāti etesu catūsu atthavikappesu purimāni tīṇi. Yatthāti yesu suttābhidhammappadesesu.
tika-s0402t:383_9: Tattha yujjanti kilesesuyeva yathāvuttassa atthattayassa sambhavato. Pacchimaṃ kammepīti
tika-s0402t:383_10: pacchimaṃ “āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantī”ti vuttanibbacanaṃ kammepi
tika-s0402t:384_0: Diṭṭhadhammā vuccanti paccakkhabhūtā khandhā, diṭṭhadhamme bhavā diṭṭhadhammikā.
tika-s0402t:384_2: Yena devūpapatyassāti yena kammakilesappakārena āsavena devesu upapatti nibbatti
tika-s0402t:384_3: assa mayhanti sambandho. Gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo ākāsacārī assanti vibhattiṃ vipariṇāmetvā
tika-s0402t:384_4: yojetabbaṃ. Ettha ca yakkhagandhabbavinimuttā sabbā devatā devaggahaṇena gahitā.
tika-s0402t:384_5: Naḷo vuccati mūlaṃ, tasmā vinaḷīkatāti vigatanaḷā vigatamūlā katāti attho. Avasesā
tika-s0402t:384_6: ca akusalā dhammāti akusalakammato avasesā akusalā dhammā āsavāti āgatāti sambandho.
tika-s0402t:385_0: Paṭighātāyāti paṭisedhanāya. Parūpavāda…pe… upaddavāti idaṃ yadi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-s0402t:385_2: parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā, ye ca tannimittameva nirayādīsu
tika-s0402t:385_3: nibbattassa pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavādippakārā anatthā, te sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:386_1: Yatthāti yasmiṃ vinayādipāḷippadese. Yathāti yena duvidhādippakārena avasesesu ca
tika-s0402t:386_2: suttantesu tidhā āgatāti sambandho. Nirayaṃ gamentīti nirayagāminiyā. Chakkanipāteti
tika-s0402t:386_3: chakkanipāte āhuneyyasutte. Tattha hi āsavā chadhā āgatā.
tika-s0402t:387_0: Sarasabhedoti khaṇikanirodho. Khīṇākāroti accantāya khīṇatā. Āsavā khīyanti pahīyanti
tika-s0402t:387_1: etenāti āsavakkhayo, maggo. Āsavānaṃ khayante uppajjanato āsavakkhayo, phalaṃ. Āsavakkhayena
tika-s0402t:387_2: pattabbato āsavā khīyanti etthāti āsavakkhayo, nibbānaṃ. Visuddhimagge vitthārito,
tika-s0402t:387_3: tasmā tattha, taṃ saṃvaṇṇanāya ca vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:388_0: Tathāti iminā visuddhimagge vitthāritataṃ upasaṃharati. Kusalappavattiṃ āvaranti
tika-s0402t:388_1: nivārentīti āvaraṇīyā. Purimappavattivasenāti niddokkamanato pubbe kammaṭṭhānassa
tika-s0402t:388_2: pavattivasena. Ṭhapetvāti hatthagataṃ kiñci ṭhapento viya kammaṭṭhānaṃ satisampajaññavasena
tika-s0402t:388_3: ṭhapetvā kammaṭṭhānameva manasikaronto niddaṃ okkamati, jhānasamāpanno viya yathāparicchinneneva
tika-s0402t:388_4: kālena pabujjhamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhāne gaṇhantoyeva pabujjhati nāma. Tena
tika-s0402t:388_5: vuttaṃ “tasmā…pe… nāma hotī”ti. Mūlakammaṭṭhāneti ādito paṭṭhāya parihariyamānakammaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0402t:388_7: So pana dhātumanasikāravasena icchitabboti dassetuṃ “ayaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:391: 17. Sattame byābādhanaṃ dukkhāpananti āha “attabyābādhāyāti attadukkhāyā”ti. Maggaphalacittuppādāpi kāyasucaritādisaṅgaho evāti āha “avāritānevā”ti.
tika-s0402t:394: 18. Aṭṭhame itīti padasandhibyañjanasiliṭṭhatāti purimapadānaṃ pacchimapadehi atthato sahitatāya byañjanānaṃ vākyānaṃ siliṭṭhatāya dīpane nipāto.
tika-s0402t:397_0: 19. Navame ugghāṭetvāti āsanadvārañceva bhaṇḍapasibbake ca vivaritvā. Nādhiṭṭhātīti
tika-s0402t:397_1: taṃtaṃkayavikkaye attanā voyogaṃ nāpajjati. Divākāleti majjhanhikasamaye. Assāmiko
tika-s0402t:397_2: hoti tīsupi kālesu laddhabbalābhassa alabhanato. Apativātābādhaṃ rattiṭṭhānaṃ. Chāyudakasampannaṃ
tika-s0402t:397_3: divāṭṭhānaṃ. Vipassanāpi vaṭṭati vipassanākammikoyeva. Tenapi hi navadhā indriyānaṃ
tika-s0402t:397_4: tikkhattaṃ āpādentena samādhinimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ, vipassanānimittaṃ samāhitākārasallakkhaṇāya.
tika-s0402t:400_2: Nikkhittadhanenāti nidahitvā ṭhapitadhanavasena. Vaḷañjanakavasenāti divase divase
tika-s0402t:400_4: Nipatantīti nipātenti, attano dhanaggahena nipātavuttike karonti. Tenāha “nimantentī”ti.
tika-s0402t:401_0: Ñāṇathāmenāti ñāṇassa thirabhāvena. Ñāṇaparakkamenāti ñāṇasahitena vīriyena. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthabhedañhi
tika-s0402t:401_1: yena sutena ijjhati, taṃ sutaṃ nāma. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena dassento “ekanikāya…pe… bahussutā”ti
tika-s0402t:401_2: āha. Āgatoti suppavattibhāvena svāgato. Tenāha “paguṇo pavattito”ti. Abhidhamme āgatā
tika-s0402t:401_4: vuttaṃ. Na hi ābhidhammikabhāvena vinā nippariyāyato suttantapiṭakaññutā sambhavati.
tika-s0402t:401_6: yuttaṃ. Paripucchatīti sabbabhāgena pucchitabbaṃ pucchati. Tenāha “atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:402_0: Na evaṃ attho daṭṭhabboti evaṃ desanānukkamena attho na gahetabbo. Añño hi desanākkamo
tika-s0402t:402_1: veneyyajjhāsayavasena pavattanato, añño paṭipattikkamo. Heṭṭhimena vā paricchedoti
tika-s0402t:402_2: sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātesu tīsu bhāgesu katthaci heṭṭhimanayena desanāya paricchedaṃ
tika-s0402t:402_3: veditabbaṃ sīlena, katthaci uparimena bhāgena paññāya, katthaci dvīhipi bhāgehi sīlapaññāvasena.
tika-s0402t:402_4: Idha pana sutte uparimena bhāgena paricchedo veditabboti vatvā taṃ dassento “tasmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:402_5: Yasmā vā bhagavā veneyyajjhāsayavasena paṭhamaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ dassento arahattaṃ
tika-s0402t:402_6: pavedetvā “tayidaṃ arahattaṃ imāya āraddhavīriyatāya hotī”ti dassento vīriyārambhaṃ
tika-s0402t:402_7: pavedetvā “svāyaṃ vīriyārambho iminā kalyāṇamittasannissayena bhavatī”ti dassento
tika-s0402t:407_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame ruccatīti kāyasakkhiādīsu puggalesu ativiya sundaratarapaṇītatarabhāvena
tika-s0402t:407_1: te cittassa abhiruciuppādako katamoti pucchati. Saddhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi saddhādhuraṃ
tika-s0402t:407_2: maggavuṭṭhānanti katvā, sesindriyāni pana kathanti āha “sesānī”tiādi. Paṭividdhamaggovāti
tika-s0402t:407_3: tīhipi therehi attano attano paṭividdhaarahattamaggo eva kathito, tasmā na sukaraṃ
tika-s0402t:407_4: ekaṃsena byākātuṃ “ayaṃ…pe… paṇītataro cā”ti. Bhummantareneva kathesi “tīsupi puggalesu
tika-s0402t:410_0: 22. Dutiye hitānīti bhabyāni. Vuddhikarānīti ārogyādivuddhikarāni. Anucchavikanti
tika-s0402t:410_1: upaṭṭhānakiriyāya anurūpaṃ. Vātāpamārarogenāti vātarogena ca apamārarogena ca, vātanidānena
tika-s0402t:410_2: vā apamārarogena. Niṭṭhappattagilānoti “iminā rogena na cirasseva marissatī”ti niṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0402t:410_3: patto gilāno. Khipitakaṃ nāma vamathurogo. Kacchūti thullakacchuābādho. Tiṇapupphakajaro
tika-s0402t:410_4: visamavātasamphassajarogo. Yesanti yesaṃ rogānaṃ. Paṭijagganenāti paṭikāramattena.
tika-s0402t:410_6: paṇḍito, paṭikārakiriyāya yuttakāritāya dakkho, uṭṭhānavīriyasampattiyā analaso.
tika-s0402t:411_0: Padaparamo puggalo kathito sammattaniyāmokkamanassa ayoggabhāvato. Alabhantova tathāgatappaveditaṃ
tika-s0402t:411_1: dhammavinayaṃ savanāya okkamati niyāmaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ paccekabodhiṃ.
