tika-s0402t:1042_6: vucceyya, na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi. Yadapi vuttaṃ – “ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1042_7: geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā”ti, tadapi na, aññato. Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā.
tika-s0402t:1042_8: Ato na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti. Evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0402t:1042_9: saṅkarābhāvo veditabbo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0402t:1042_10: sāratthadīpaniyā amhehi pakāsito, icchantehi tatoyeva gahetabbo.
tika-s0402t:1043_0: Na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotīti aṭṭhakathāñca pāḷiñca
tika-s0402t:1043_1: jānitvā lokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno na hotīti
tika-s0402t:1043_2: evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Tenevāha “na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyāti aṭṭhakathañca
tika-s0402t:1046_1: tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ vinayaṃ upetā. Vesārajjenāti sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1046_2: vigamanato vesārajjena, sārajjarahitenāti attho. Tepiṭakavasena bahu sutaṃ etesanti
tika-s0402t:1046_3: bahussutā. Tameva pariyattidhammaṃ dhārenti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya
tika-s0402t:1046_4: vinassantaṃ akatvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena hadaye ṭhapentīti dhammadharā. Edisā
tika-s0402t:1046_5: ca attanā sutassa dhammassa ādhārabhūtā nāma hontīti āha “sutadhammānaṃ ādhārabhūtā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1049_0: 8. Aṭṭhame byāmohavasena saraṇapariyesanaṃ sārajjanaṃ sārado, byāmohabhayaṃ. Vigato
tika-s0402t:1049_1: sārado etassāti visārado, tassa bhāvo vesārajjaṃ. Taṃ pana ñāṇasampadaṃ, pahānasampadaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1049_2: desanāvisesasampadaṃ khemañca nissāya pavattaṃ catubbidhapaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:1049_3: “catūsu ṭhānesū”tiādi. Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbaññutapaṭijānanavasena
tika-s0402t:1049_4: abhimukhaṃ gacchanti, aṭṭha vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti āsabhā, pubbabuddhā. Idaṃ panāti
tika-s0402t:1049_5: buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbaññutameva vadati. Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti
tika-s0402t:1050_0: Aṭṭhasu parisāsūti “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, anekasataṃ khattiyaparisaṃ
tika-s0402t:1050_2: tāvatiṃsaparisaṃ, māraparisaṃ, brahmaparisaṃ upasaṅkamitā, tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva
tika-s0402t:1050_3: sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpajjitapubbā. Tatra vata maṃ ‘bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ
tika-s0402t:1050_4: vā okkamissatī’ti nimittametaṃ, sāriputta, na samanupassāmī”ti evaṃ vuttaparisāsu.
tika-s0402t:1050_5: Abhītanādaṃ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena visārado ahanti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0402t:1051_2: vā vuttā. Ādi-saddena tattha ca cakkasaddassa gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vicakkasaṇṭhānā
tika-s0402t:1051_3: asani eva asanivicakkaṃ. Uracakkādīsūti ādi-saddena āṇāsamūhādīsupi cakkasaddassa
tika-s0402t:1051_4: pavatti veditabbā. “Saṅghabhedaṃ karissāma cakkabheda”ntiādīsu hi āṇā “cakka”nti
tika-s0402t:1052_0: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1052_1: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti
tika-s0402t:1052_2: “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe… phalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ
tika-s0402t:1052_3: pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1053_0: Dassitadhammesūti vuttadhammesu. Vacanamattameva hi tesaṃ, na pana dassanaṃ tādisasseva
tika-s0402t:1053_1: dhammassa abhāvato. Bhagavato eva vā “ime dhammā anabhisambuddho”ti parassa vacanavasena
tika-s0402t:1053_3: “sahadhammenāti sahetunā”ti. Hetūti ca upapattisādhanahetu veditabbo, na kārako,
tika-s0402t:1053_4: sampāpako vā. Nimittanti codanāya kāraṇaṃ. Tattha codako codanaṃ karotīti kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1053_5: dhammo codanaṃ karoti etenāti kāraṇaṃ. Tenāha “puggalopī”tiādi. Khemanti kenaci appaṭibāhiyabhāvena anupaddutaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1054_0: Antarāyo etesaṃ atthi, antarāye vā niyuttāti antarāyikā. Evaṃbhūtā pana te yasmā
tika-s0402t:1054_1: antarāyakarā nāma honti, tasmā āha “antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā”ti. Asañcicca
tika-s0402t:1054_2: vītikkame nātisāvajjāti katvā vuttaṃ “sañcicca vītikkantā”ti. Satta āpattikkhandhātiādi
tika-s0402t:1054_3: nidassanamattaṃ itaresampi catunnaṃ “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṃ tabbhāve byabhicārābhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1054_4: Idha pana methunadhammo adhippetoti idaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena vuttaṃ ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ
tika-s0402t:1054_5: viya. Yasmā taṃkhaṇampi kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā virato hoti ce, visesaṃ adhigacchati,
tika-s0402t:1054_6: na kāmesu āsatto, tasmā vuttaṃ “methuna…pe…antarāyo hotī”ti. Tattha yassa kassacīti
tika-s0402t:1054_7: na kevalaṃ pabbajitasseva, atha kho yassa kassaci. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “methunamanuyuttassa,
tika-s0402t:1055: Tasmiṃ aniyyānikadhammeti tasmiṃ parehi parikappitaaniyyānikadhammanimittaṃ. Nimittatthe hi idaṃ kammasaṃyoge bhummaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1056: Upanibaddhāti viracitā. Tenāha “abhisaṅkhatā”ti. Puthubhāvanti bahubhāvaṃ. Puthūhi vā sitāti bahūhi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi sitā upanibaddhā.
tika-s0402t:1059_0: 9. Navame bhavati etena ārogyanti bhavo, gilānapaccayo. Parivuddho bhavo abhavo.
tika-s0402t:1059_1: Vuddhiattho hi ayamakāro yathā “saṃvarāsaṃvaro, phalāphala”nti ca. Sappinavanītādīnīti
tika-s0402t:1059_3: sabbassapi gilānapaccayassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Bhavābhavoti vā khuddako ceva mahanto
tika-s0402t:1059_4: ca upapattibhavo veditabbo. Tenevāha “sampattibhavesū”tiādi. Bhavoti vā sampatti,
tika-s0402t:1059_5: abhavoti vipatti. Bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Taṃnimittañca taṇhā uppajjatīti
tika-s0402t:1060_0: Taṇhādutiyoti taṇhāsahāyo. Taṇhā hi nirudakakantāre marīcikāya udakasaññā viya pipāsābhibhūtaṃ
tika-s0402t:1060_1: tasitaṃ sattaṃ assāsadassanavasena sahāyakiccaṃ karontī bhavādīsu anibbinnaṃ katvā
tika-s0402t:1060_2: paribbhamāpeti. Tathā hi taṃ papātakaṃ acintetvā madhuggaṇhanakaluddakā viya anekādīnavākulesu
tika-s0402t:1060_3: bhavesu ānisaṃsameva dassentī anatthajāle sā paribbhamāpeti, tasmā taṇhā “purisassa
tika-s0402t:1060_4: dutiyā”ti vuttā. Nanu ca aññepi kilesādayo bhavanibbattipaccayāti? Saccametaṃ, na
tika-s0402t:1060_5: pana tathā visesapaccayo, yathā taṇhā. Tathā hi sā kusalehi vinā akusalehi, kāmāvacarādikusalehi
tika-s0402t:1060_6: ca vinā rūpāvacarādikusalehi bhavanibbattiyā visesapaccayo. Yato samudayasaccanti
tika-s0402t:1060_7: vuccatīti. Itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti itthabhāvo ca aññathābhāvo ca itthabhāvaññathābhāvo,
tika-s0402t:1060_8: so etassa atthīti itthabhāvaññathābhāvo, saṃsāro, taṃ itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0402t:1060_9: itthabhāvo manussattaṃ, aññathābhāvo tato avasiṭṭhasattāvāsā. Itthabhāvo vā tesaṃ
tika-s0402t:1060_10: tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppanno attabhāvo, aññathābhāvo anāgatattabhāvo. Evarūpo vā aññopi
tika-s0402t:1060_11: attabhāvo itthabhāvo, na evarūpo aññathābhāvo. Tenevāha “itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti
tika-s0402t:1060_12: ettha itthabhāvo nāma ayaṃ attabhāvo”tiādi. Saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsāro.
tika-s0402t:1063: Tenāha “khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ paṭipāṭi”nti, khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ hetuphalabhāvena aparāparappavattinti attho.
tika-s0402t:1064_0: Evamādīnavaṃ ñatvāti ettha etamādīnavaṃ ñatvātipi paṭhanti, etaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa
tika-s0402t:1064_1: sambhavaṃ samudayaṃ taṇhaṃ ādīnavaṃ ñatvāti attho. Atha vā evamādīnavaṃ ñatvāti etaṃ
tika-s0402t:1064_2: yathāvuttaṃ saṃsārānativattanaādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā. Niggahaṇoti caturūpādānasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0402t:1064_3: sabbassa gahaṇassa paṭinissajjanena niggahaṇo, khandhaparinibbānena saṅkhārappavattito
tika-s0402t:1064_4: apagaccheyyāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1067_0: 10. Dasame yojentīti kammaṃ vipākena bhavādiṃ, bhavantarādīhi dukkhena sattaṃ yojenti
tika-s0402t:1067_1: ghaṭentīti yogā. Kāmanaṭṭhena kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena yogo cāti kāmayogo. Bhavayogo
tika-s0402t:1067_2: nāma bhavarāgoti dassetuṃ “rūpārūpabhavesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamo upapattibhavesu
tika-s0402t:1067_3: rāgo, dutiyo kammabhavesu, tatiyo bhavadiṭṭhisahagato yathā rajjanaṭṭhena rāgo, evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1067_4: yujjanaṭṭhena yogoti vutto. Catūsu saccesu aññāṇanti idaṃ suttantanayaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1068_0: Samudayanti dve samudayā khaṇikasamudayo paccayasamudayo ca. Uppādakkhaṇo khaṇikasamudayo,
tika-s0402t:1068_1: paccayova paccayasamudayo. Samudayate samudayanaṃ samudayo, samudeti etasmāti samudayoti
tika-s0402t:1068_2: evaṃ ubhinnaṃ samudayānaṃ saddatthatopi bhedo veditabbo. Paccayasamudayaṃ pajānantopi
tika-s0402t:1068_3: bhikkhu khaṇikasamudayaṃ pajānāti, khaṇikasamudayaṃ pajānantopi paccayasamudayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1068_4: pajānāti. Paccayato hi saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ passato khaṇato ca nesaṃ udayadassanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1068_5: sukhaṃ hoti, khaṇato ca nesaṃ udayaṃ passato pageva paccayānaṃ suggahitattā paccayato
tika-s0402t:1068_6: dassanaṃ sukhena ijjhati. Idha pana khaṇikasamudayaṃ dassento āha “samudayanti uppatti”nti.
tika-s0402t:1069_0: Atthaṅgamopi duvidho accantatthaṅgamo, bhedatthaṅgamoti. Accantatthaṅgamo appavattinirodho,
tika-s0402t:1069_1: nibbānanti keci. Bhedatthaṅgamo khaṇikanirodho. Tadubhayaṃ pubbabhāge uggahaparipucchādivasena
tika-s0402t:1069_2: passato aññataradassanena itaradassanampi siddhameva hoti. Pubbabhāgeyeva ārammaṇavasena
tika-s0402t:1069_3: khayato vayato sammasanādikāle bhedatthaṅgamaṃ passanto byatirekavasena anussavādito
tika-s0402t:1069_4: accantatthaṅgamaṃ passati, maggakkhaṇe pana ārammaṇato accantatthaṅgamaṃ passanto
tika-s0402t:1069_5: asammohato itarampi passati. Idha pana bhedatthaṅgamaṃ dassento āha “atthaṅgamanti
tika-s0402t:1069_6: bheda”nti. Kāmānaṃ uppattibhedaggahaṇeneva cettha yathā kāmānaṃ paṭiccasamuppannatā
tika-s0402t:1069_7: vibhāvitā, evaṃ kāmavatthunopīti ubhayesampi aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā ca vibhāvitāti
tika-s0402t:1069_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Madhurabhāvanti iminā kāmasannissitaṃ sukhaṃ somanassaṃ dasseti. “Yaṃ
tika-s0402t:1069_9: kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ kāmānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1069_10: assādo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Amadhurabhāvanti iminā pana kāmahetukaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1070_0: Phassāyatanānanti chadvārikassa phassassa kāraṇabhūtānaṃ cakkhādiāyatanānaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:1070_2: mano-saddassa viya ca purimapadassa okārantatā daṭṭhabbā. Punobhavo sīlametesanti
tika-s0402t:1070_3: ponobhavikā. Atha vā sīlatthena ikasaddena gamitatthattā kiriyāvācakasaddassa adassanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1070_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā apūpabhakkhanasīlo āpūpiko. Atha vā punabbhavaṃ denti, punabbhavāya
tika-s0402t:1070_5: saṃvattanti, punappunabbhave nibbattentīti ponobhavikā. “Taddhitā”ti hi bahuvacananiddesā
tika-s0402t:1070_6: vicittattā vā taddhitānaṃ abhidhānalakkhaṇattā vā “punabbhavaṃ dentī”tiādīsupi atthesu
tika-s0402t:1071: Visaṃyojenti paṭipannaṃ puggalaṃ kāmayogādito viyojentīti visaṃyogā, asubhajjhānādīni visaṃyojanakāraṇāni. Tenāha “visaṃyogāti visaṃyojanakāraṇānī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1076_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame caratoti gacchantassa, caṅkamantassa vā. Uppajjati kāmavitakko
tika-s0402t:1076_1: vāti vatthukāmesu avītarāgatāya tādise paccaye kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko uppajjati
tika-s0402t:1076_2: ce, yadi uppajjati. Byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vāti āghātavinaye visesena cittassa
tika-s0402t:1076_3: adamitattā āghātanimitte byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko, leḍḍudaṇḍādīti parahiṃsanavasena
tika-s0402t:1076_4: vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko uppajjati ceti sambandho. Taṃ ce bhikkhu adhivāsetīti
tika-s0402t:1076_5: taṃ yathāvuttaṃ kāmavitakkādiṃ yathāpaccayaṃ attano citte uppannaṃ “itipāyaṃ vitakko
tika-s0402t:1076_6: pāpako, itipi akusalo, itipi sāvajjo, so ca kho attabyābādhāya saṃvattatī”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:1076_7: nayena paccavekkhaṇāya abhāvato adhivāseti attano cittaṃ āropetvā vāseti. Adhivāsentoyeva
tika-s0402t:1076_8: ca nappajahati tadaṅgādippahānavasena na paṭinissajjati. Tato eva ca na vinodeti
tika-s0402t:1076_9: attano cittasantānato na nudati na nīharati. Tathā avinodanato na byantīkaroti na
tika-s0402t:1076_10: vigatantaṃ karoti. Ātāpī pahitatto yathā tesaṃ antopi nāvasissati antamaso bhaṅgamattampi,
tika-s0402t:1076_11: evaṃ karoti, ayaṃ pana tathā na karotīti attho. Tathābhūto pana na anabhāvaṃ gameti
tika-s0402t:1076_12: anu anu abhāvaṃ na gameti. Na pajahati ce, na vinodeti ceti itiādinā ce-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1077_0: Evaṃbhūtoti evaṃ kāmavitakkādīhi pāpavitakkehi samaṅgibhūto. Anātāpīti kilesānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1077_1: ātāpayikassa vīriyassa abhāvena anātāpī. Pāputrāsalakkhaṇassa ottappassa abhāvena
tika-s0402t:1077_2: anottāpī. Satataṃ samitaṃ sabbakālaṃ nirantaraṃ. Kusīto hīnavīriyoti kusalehi dhammehi
tika-s0402t:1077_3: parihāpayitvā akusalapakkhe kucchitaṃ sīdanato kosajjasamannāgamena ca kusīto, sammappadhānavīriyābhāvena
tika-s0402t:1077_4: hīnavīriyo vīriyavirahitoti vuccati kathīyati. Ṭhitassāti gamanaṃ upacchinditvā tiṭṭhato.
tika-s0402t:1077_5: Sayanairiyāpathassa visesato kosajjapakkhikattā yathā taṃsamaṅgino bhāvitattā sambhavanti,
tika-s0402t:1078_0: Sukkapakkhe tañce bhikkhu nādhivāsetīti āraddhavīriyassapi viharato anādimati saṃsāre
tika-s0402t:1078_1: cirakālabhāvitattā tathārūpapaccayasamāyoge satisammosena vā kāmavitakkādi uppajjati
tika-s0402t:1078_2: ce, taṃ bhikkhu attano cittaṃ āropetvā na vāseti, abbhantare na vāsetīti attho. Anadhivāsento
tika-s0402t:1078_3: kiṃ karoti? Pajahati chaḍḍeti. Kiṃ kacavaraṃ viya piṭakenāti? Na, apica kho taṃ vinodeti
tika-s0402t:1078_4: nudati nīharati. Kiṃ balibaddaṃ viya patodenāti? Na, atha kho byantīkaroti vigatantaṃ
tika-s0402t:1078_5: karoti, yathā tesaṃ antopi nāvasissati antamaso bhaṅgamattampi, tathā te karoti.
tika-s0402t:1078_6: Kathaṃ pana te tathā karoti? Anabhāvaṃ gameti anu anu abhāvaṃ gameti, vikkhambhanappahānena
tika-s0402t:1078_7: yathā suvikkhambhitā honti, tathā ne karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1079_0: Evaṃbhūtotiādīsu evaṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ anadhivāsena suvisuddhāsayo samāno tāya ca
tika-s0402t:1079_1: āsayasampattiyā tannimittāya ca payogasampattiyā parisuddhasīlo indriyesu guttadvāro
tika-s0402t:1079_2: bhojane mattaññū satisampajaññena samannāgato jāgariyaṃ anuyutto tadaṅgādivasena
tika-s0402t:1079_3: kilesānaṃ ātāpanalakkhaṇena vīriyena samannāgatattā ātāpī. Sabbaso pāputrāsena samannāgatattā
tika-s0402t:1079_4: ottāpī satataṃ rattindivaṃ. Samitaṃ nirantaraṃ samathavipassanānuyogavasena catubbidhasammappadhānasiddhiyā
tika-s0402t:1079_5: āraddhavīriyo pahitatto. Nibbānaṃ pati pesitacittoti vuccati kathīyatīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1080_0: Gāthāsu gehanissitanti ettha gehavāsīhi apariccattattā gehavāsisabhāvattā gehadhammattā
tika-s0402t:1080_1: vā gehaṃ vuccati vatthukāmo. Atha vā gehappaṭibaddhabhāvato, kilesakāmānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-s0402t:1080_2: vā gehāti vuccanti, taṃvatthukattā kāmavitakkādi gehanissitaṃ nāma. Kummaggapaṭipannoti
tika-s0402t:1080_3: yasmā ariyamaggassa uppathabhāvato abhijjhādayo tadekaṭṭhadhammā ca kummaggo, tasmā
tika-s0402t:1080_5: rūpādīsu mucchito sammatto ajjhopanno. Sambodhinti ariyamaggañāṇaṃ. Phuṭṭhanti phusituṃ
tika-s0402t:1080_6: pattuṃ pāpo so tādiso micchāsaṅkappagocaro puggalo abhabbo, na kadāci taṃ pāpuṇātīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1081_0: Vitakkaṃ samayitvānāti yathāvuttaṃ micchāvitakkaṃ paṭisaṅkhānabhāvanābalena vūpasametvā.
tika-s0402t:1081_1: Vitakkūpasame ratoti navannampi mahāvitakkānaṃ accantūpasamabhūte arahatte, nibbāne
tika-s0402t:1081_2: eva vā ajjhāsayena rato abhirato. Bhabbo soti so yathāvutto sammāpaṭipajjamāno puggalo
tika-s0402t:1081_3: pubbabhāge samathavipassanābalena sabbavitakke yathārahaṃ tadaṅgādivasena vūpasametvā
tika-s0402t:1081_4: ṭhito vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātañca
tika-s0402t:1081_5: anuttaraṃ sambodhiṃ phuṭṭhuṃ adhigantuṃ bhabbo arahā. Evamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1084: 12. Dutiye sampannasīlāti ettha tividhaṃ sampannaṃ paripuṇṇasamaṅgimadhuravasena. Tattha –
tika-s0402t:1086: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe”ti. –
tika-s0402t:1087_0: Idaṃ paripuṇṇasampannaṃ nāma. “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato
tika-s0402t:1087_1: samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato”ti idaṃ samaṅgisampannaṃ nāma. “Imissā,
tika-s0402t:1087_2: bhante, mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatalaṃ sampannaṃ, seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ anīlakaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1087_3: evamassāda”nti idaṃ madhurasampannaṃ nāma. Idha paripuṇṇasampannavasena atthaṃ dassento
tika-s0402t:1087_5: tasmā sampannasīlāti paripuṇṇasīlā hutvātipi sīlasamaṅgino hutvātipi evamettha attho
tika-s0402t:1087_6: daṭṭhabbo. Tattha sīlassa anavasesasamādānena akhaṇḍādibhāvappattiyā paripuṇṇasīlā,
tika-s0402t:1087_7: samādānato paṭṭhāya avicchindanato sīlasamaṅgino. Samādānavato hi accantavirodhidhammānuppattiyā
tika-s0402t:1087_8: sīlasamaṅgitā veditabbā, cetanādīnaṃ pana sīlanalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ pavattilakkhaṇena
tika-s0402t:1088_0: Tattha “paripuṇṇasīlā”ti iminā atthena khettadosavigamena khettapāripūrī viya sīladosavigamena
tika-s0402t:1088_1: sīlapāripūrī vuttā hoti. Yathā hi khettaṃ bījakhaṇḍaṃ, vappakhaṇḍaṃ, udakakhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1088_2: ūsakhaṇḍanti catudosasamannāgataṃ aparipūraṃ hoti. Tattha bījakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha
tika-s0402t:1088_3: antarantarā bījāni khaṇḍāni vā pūtīni vā honti, tāni yattha patanti, tattha sassaṃ
tika-s0402t:1088_4: na uṭṭheti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti, aparipūraṃ hotīti attho. Vappakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha
tika-s0402t:1088_5: akusalo bījāni vapanto antarantarā nipāteti. Evañhi sabbattha sassaṃ na uṭṭheti,
tika-s0402t:1088_6: khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti. Udakakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha katthaci udakaṃ atibahuṃ vā hoti,
tika-s0402t:1088_7: na vā hoti. Tatrāpi hi sassāni na uṭṭhenti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti. Ūsakhaṇḍaṃ nāma
tika-s0402t:1088_8: yattha kassako kismiñci padese naṅgalena bhūmiṃ cattāro pañca vāre kasanto atigambhīraṃ
tika-s0402t:1088_9: karoti, tato ūsaṃ uppajjati. Tatrāpi hi sassaṃ na uṭṭheti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1088_10: tādisañca khettaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti na mahānisaṃsaṃ. Tatrāpi bahumpi vapitvā appaṃ
tika-s0402t:1088_11: labhati. Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ dosānaṃ vigamā khettaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, tādisañca khettaṃ
tika-s0402t:1088_12: mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ. Evameva khaṇḍaṃ, chiddaṃ, sabalaṃ, kammāsanti catudosasamannāgataṃ
tika-s0402t:1088_13: sīlaṃ aparipūraṃ hoti, tādisañca sīlaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti na mahānisaṃsaṃ. Imesaṃ
tika-s0402t:1088_14: pana catunnaṃ dosānaṃ vigamā sīlaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, tādisañca sīlaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1089_0: “Sīlasamaṅgino”ti iminā panatthena sīlena samaṅgibhūtā samodhānagatā samannāgatā
tika-s0402t:1089_1: hutvā viharathāti idameva vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha dvīhi kāraṇehi sampannasīlatā hoti
tika-s0402t:1089_2: sīlavipattiyā ādīnavadassanena, sīlasampattiyā ca ānisaṃsadassanena. Tadubhayampi
tika-s0402t:1089_3: visuddhimagge vitthāritaṃ. Tattha “sampannasīlāti ettāvatā ca kira bhagavā catupārisuddhisīlaṃ
tika-s0402t:1089_4: uddisitvā ‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā’ti iminā tattha jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ vitthāretvā dassetī”ti
tika-s0402t:1089_5: divāvihāravāsī sumatthero āha. Antevāsiko panassa tepiṭakacūḷanāgatthero āha – “ubhayatthāpi
tika-s0402t:1089_6: pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā vutto, pātimokkhasaṃvaroyeva hi sīlaṃ, itarāni pana tīṇi
tika-s0402t:1089_7: sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”ti vatvā taṃ ananujānanto āha – “indriyasaṃvaro nāma
tika-s0402t:1089_10: Nippariyāyena pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlaṃ. Yassa so bhinno, ayaṃ chinnasīso viya puriso
tika-s0402t:1089_11: hatthapāde, sesāni rakkhissatīti na vattabbo. Yassa pana so arogo, ayaṃ acchinnasīso
tika-s0402t:1089_12: viya puriso jīvitaṃ, sesāni puna pākatikāni katvā rakkhituṃ sakkoti. Tasmā ‘sampannasīlā’ti
tika-s0402t:1089_13: iminā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ uddisitvā ‘sampannapātimokkhā’ti tasseva vevacanaṃ vatvā
tika-s0402t:1090_0: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena saṃvutāti yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi
tika-s0402t:1090_1: dukkhehīti pātimokkhanti laddhanāmena sikkhāpadasīlena pihitakāyavacīdvārā. Evaṃbhūtā
tika-s0402t:1090_2: ca tena upetā samannāgatā nāma hontīti āha “upetā hutvā”ti. Ācārena ca gocarena ca
tika-s0402t:1090_4: gocarena ca sampannā, sampannaācāragocarāti attho. Aṇuppamāṇesūti atiparittakesu
tika-s0402t:1090_5: anāpattigamanīyesu. Dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattesūti apare. Dosesūti gārayhesu akusaladhammesu.
tika-s0402t:1090_6: Bhayato dassanasīlāti paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā bhāyanasīlā.
tika-s0402t:1090_8: Taṃ taṃ samādātabbaṃ samādāyāti yaṃ kiñci sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu mūlapaññattiādibhedesu
tika-s0402t:1090_9: sikkhitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūritabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vācasikaṃ vā sīlaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sammā
tika-s0402t:1090_10: ādāya, sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso ca ādiyitvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1091_0: Udayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passatīti “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:1091_1: rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Taṇhāsamudayā…pe… kammasamudayā…pe… āhārasamudayā
tika-s0402t:1091_2: rūpasamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1091_3: passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni
tika-s0402t:1091_4: pañca lakkhaṇāni passati. Tathā avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:1091_5: vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Taṇhāsamudayā…pe… kammasamudayā…pe… phassasamudayā
tika-s0402t:1091_6: vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1091_7: passantopi vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni
tika-s0402t:1091_8: pañca lakkhaṇāni passatī”tiādinā nayena ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañca pañca katvā vuttāni
tika-s0402t:1092_0: Vayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passatīti “avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:1092_1: rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Taṇhānirodhā…pe… kammanirodhā…pe… āhāranirodhā rūpanirodhoti
tika-s0402t:1092_2: paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi
tika-s0402t:1092_3: rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni
tika-s0402t:1092_4: passati. Avijjānirodhā…pe… taṇhānirodhā…pe… phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:1092_5: vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa
tika-s0402t:1092_6: vayaṃ passatī. Vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:1092_7: nayena ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañca pañca katvā vuttāni pañcavīsati vayalakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-s0402t:1092_8: Pesitattoti nibbānaṃ pati pesitacitto. Kathayantīti tathāvidhaṃ bhikkhuṃ buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti.
tika-s0402t:1093_0: Yataṃ careti vāyamamāno careyya, caṅkamanādivasena gamanaṃ kappentopi “anuppannānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1093_1: pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī”tiādinā nayena
tika-s0402t:1093_2: vuttappadhānavīriyaṃ karonto ghaṭento vāyamanto yathā akusaladhammā pahīyanti, kusaladhammā
tika-s0402t:1093_3: bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, evaṃ gamanaṃ kappeyyāti attho. Esa nayo sesesupi. Yatamenaṃ
tika-s0402t:1093_4: pasārayeti etaṃ pasāretabbaṃ hatthapādādiṃ yataṃ yatamāno yathāvuttavīriyasamaṅgī
tika-s0402t:1093_5: hutvā pasāreyya, sabbattha padhānaṃ na jaheyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:1094_0: Idāni yathā paṭipajjanto yataṃ yatanto nāma hoti, taṃ paṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ “uddha”ntiādi
tika-s0402t:1094_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha uddhanti upari. Tiriyanti parito, puratthimadisādivasena samantato
tika-s0402t:1094_2: disābhāgesūti attho. Apācīnanti heṭṭhā. Yāvatā jagato gatīti yattakā sattasaṅkhārabhedassa
tika-s0402t:1094_3: lokassa pavatti, tattha sabbatthāti attho. Ettāvatā anavasesatā sammasanañāṇassa
tika-s0402t:1094_4: visayaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti. Samavekkhitāti samā hetunā ñāyena avekkhitā, aniccādivasena
tika-s0402t:1094_5: vipassitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammānanti sattasuññānaṃ. Khandhānanti rūpādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ
tika-s0402t:1094_6: khandhānaṃ. Udayabbayanti udayañca vayañca. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – upari tiriyaṃ adhoti
tika-s0402t:1094_7: tidhā saṅgahite sabbasmiṃ loke atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1094_9: ākārehi udayaṃ, pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi vayaṃ samavekkhitā samanupassitā bhaveyyāti.
tika-s0402t:1095_2: bhāventaṃ ñāṇaparamparā nibbattentaṃ. Sadāti sabbakālaṃ rattiñceva divā ca. Satanti
tika-s0402t:1095_3: catusampajaññasamannāgatāya satiyā satokārī. Evampettha gāthāvaṇṇanā daṭṭhabbā. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t:1098_0: 13. Tatiye uttamavīriyānīti seṭṭhavīriyāni visiṭṭhassa atthassa sādhanato. Māro dhiyyati
tika-s0402t:1098_1: etthāti māradheyyaṃ, kilesamārassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ, taṃ tebhūmakavaṭṭanti āha
tika-s0402t:1098_3: jātimaraṇameva vā bhayahetuto bhayanti jātimaraṇabhayaṃ. Tenāha “jātiñca maraṇañca…pe…
tika-s0402t:1101_0: 14. Catutthe saṃvarādīnaṃ sādhanavasena padahati etehīti padhānāni. Saṃvarantassa
tika-s0402t:1101_1: uppannavīriyanti yathā abhijjhādayo na uppajjanti, evaṃ satiyā upaṭṭhāne cakkhādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1101_2: pidahane analasassa uppannavīriyaṃ. Pajahantassāti vinodentassa. Uppannavīriyanti
tika-s0402t:1101_3: tasseva pahānassa sādhanavasena pavattavīriyaṃ. Bhāventassa uppannavīriyanti etthāpi
tika-s0402t:1101_4: eseva nayo. Samādhinimittanti samādhi eva. Purimuppannasamādhi hi parato uppajjanakasamādhissa
tika-s0402t:1102_0: Upadhivivekattāti khandhūpadhiādiupadhīhi vivittattā vinissaṭattā. Taṃ āgammāti taṃ
tika-s0402t:1102_1: nibbānaṃ maggena adhigamahetu. Rāgādayo virajjanti ettha, etenāti virāgo. Evaṃ nirodhopi
tika-s0402t:1102_2: daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā idha bojjhaṅgamissakavasena icchitā, tasmā “ārammaṇavasena vā adhigantabbavasena
tika-s0402t:1102_3: vā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha adhigantabbavasenāti tanninnatāvasena. Vossaggapariṇāminti vossaggavasena
tika-s0402t:1102_4: pariṇāmitaṃ pariccajanavasena ceva pakkhandanavasena ca pariṇāmanasīlaṃ. Tenāha “dve
tika-s0402t:1102_5: vossaggā”tiādi. Khandhānaṃ pariccajanaṃ nāma tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānavasenāti yenākārena
tika-s0402t:1102_6: vipassanā kilese pajahati, tenevākārena tannimittakkhandhe ca pajahatīti vattabbataṃ
tika-s0402t:1102_7: arahatīti āha “vipassanā…pe… pariccajatī”ti. Yasmā vipassanā vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvaṃ
tika-s0402t:1102_8: pāpuṇantī ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena ekaṃsato nibbānaṃ pakkhandatīti vattabbataṃ labhati,
tika-s0402t:1102_9: maggo ca samucchedavasena kilese khandhe ca rāgaṃ pariccajati, tasmā yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0402t:1102_11: pariccāgavossaggatthāya ceva pakkhandanavossaggatthāya ca. Pariṇamatīti pariccajati.
tika-s0402t:1102_12: Taṃ pana pariṇāmanaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvappattiyā ceva ariyamaggabhāvappattiyā ca
tika-s0402t:1103_0: Bhaddakanti abhaddakānaṃ nīvaraṇādipāpadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena rāgavigamanena ekantahitattā
tika-s0402t:1103_1: dullabhattā ca bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ. Na hi aññaṃ samādhinimittaṃ evaṃ dullabhaṃ rāgassa
tika-s0402t:1103_2: ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ atthi. Anurakkhatīti ettha anurakkhanā nāma adhigatasamādhito
tika-s0402t:1103_3: yathā parihāni na hoti, evaṃ paṭipattisāsana-tappaṭipakkhavigamanenāti āha “samādhī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1103_4: Aṭṭhikasaññādikāti aṭṭhikajjhānādikā. Saññāsīsena hi jhānaṃ vadati. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1106_0: 15. Pañcame attabhāvo etesaṃ atthīti attabhāvino, tesaṃ attabhāvīnaṃ. Tenāha “attabhāvavantāna”nti.
tika-s0402t:1106_1: Yāva chattiṃsāya indānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, tāva paṇīte kāme paribhuñjīti mandhāturājā
tika-s0402t:1106_2: kira ekadivasaṃ attano pariṇāyakaratanaṃ pucchi – “atthi nu kho manussalokato ramaṇīyataraṃ
tika-s0402t:1106_3: ṭhāna”nti. Kasmā deva evaṃ bhaṇasi, kiṃ na passasi candimasūriyānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ, nanu
tika-s0402t:1106_4: etesaṃ ṭhānaṃ ito ramaṇīyataranti? Rājā cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā tattha agamāsi.
tika-s0402t:1107_0: Cattāro mahārājāno “mandhātumahārājā āgato”ti sutvā “tāvamahiddhiko mahārājā na sakkā
tika-s0402t:1107_1: yuddhena paṭibāhitu”nti sakarajjaṃ niyyātesuṃ. So taṃ gahetvā puna pucchi – “atthi
tika-s0402t:1107_2: nu kho ito ramaṇīyataraṃ ṭhāna”nti. Athassa tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ kathayiṃsu. “Tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1107_3: deva, ramaṇīyaṃ, tattha sakkassa devarañño ime cattāro mahārājāno pāricārikā dovārikabhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1107_4: tiṭṭhanti. Sakko devarājā mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo. Tassimāni upabhogaṭṭhānāni – yojanasahassubbedho
tika-s0402t:1107_6: tathā erāvaṇo hatthī, dibbarukkhasahassappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nandanavanaṃ, cittalatāvanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1107_7: phārusakavanaṃ, yojanasatubbedho pāricchattako koviḷāro, tassa heṭṭhā saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā
tika-s0402t:1107_9: yassā mudutāya sakkassa nisīdato upaḍḍhakāyo anuppavisatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1108_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tattha gantukāmo cakkaratanaṃ abbhukkiri. Taṃ ākāse uṭṭhahi saddhiṃ
tika-s0402t:1108_1: caturaṅginiyā senāya. Atha dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ vemajjhato cakkaratanaṃ otaritvā pathaviyā
tika-s0402t:1108_2: āsanne ṭhāne aṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ pariṇāyakaratanappamukhāya caturaṅginiyā senāya. Rājā
tika-s0402t:1108_3: ekakova attano ānubhāvena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ agamāsi. Sakko “mandhātā āgato”ti sutvā
tika-s0402t:1108_4: tassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā “svāgataṃ, mahārāja, sakaṃ, te mahārāja, anusāsa mahārājā”ti
tika-s0402t:1108_5: vatvā saddhiṃ nāṭakehi rajjaṃ dve bhāge katvā ekaṃ bhāgamadāsi. Rañño tāvatiṃsabhavane
tika-s0402t:1108_8: pāturahosi. Tassa sakkena saddhiṃ paṇḍukambalasilāya nisinnassa akkhinimisanamattena
tika-s0402t:1108_9: nānattaṃ paññāyati. Taṃ asallakkhentā devā sakkassa ca tassa ca nānatte muyhanti.
tika-s0402t:1108_10: So tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno tadā manussānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāya yāva chattiṃsa
tika-s0402t:1108_11: sakkā upapajjitvā cutā, tāva sakkarajjaṃ kāretvā “kiṃ me iminā upaḍḍharajjenā”ti
tika-s0402t:1108_12: atitto kāmehi tato cavitvā attano uyyāne patito manussaloke utukakkhaḷatāya vātātapena
tika-s0402t:1108_13: phusitagatto kālamakāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “devaloke pana yāva chattiṃsāya indānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1111_2: avasavattanena aññato jānitvā. Saṅkhārā hi “mā bhijjiṃsū”ti icchitāpi bhijjanteva,
tika-s0402t:1111_3: tasmā te avasavattitāya pare nāma. Sā ca nesaṃ paratā aniccadassane pākaṭā hotīti
tika-s0402t:1111_4: vuttaṃ “iminā hi padena aniccānupassanā kathitā”ti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1114_0: 17-20. Sattame chandāgatinti ettha sandhivasena saralopoti dassento āha “chandena
tika-s0402t:1114_1: agati”nti. Chandāti hetumhi nissakkavacananti āha “chandenā”ti, pemenāti attho. Chandasaddo
tika-s0402t:1114_2: hettha taṇhāpariyāyo, akusalacchandapariyāyo vā. Sesesūti “dosāgatiṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu.
tika-s0402t:1115_0: Ettha ca yo “ayaṃ me mittoti vā, sandiṭṭhoti vā, ñātakoti vā, lañcaṃ vā pana me detī”ti
tika-s0402t:1115_1: chandavasena assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ chandena akattabbaṃ karoti nāma. Yo “ayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1115_2: me verī”ti cirakālānubaddhaveravasena vā, taṅkhaṇuppannakodhavasena vā sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ
tika-s0402t:1115_3: karoti, ayaṃ dosena akattabbaṃ karoti nāma. Yo pana mandattā momūhattā yaṃ vā taṃ
tika-s0402t:1115_4: vā ayuttaṃ akāraṇaṃ vatvā assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ mohena akattabbaṃ karoti
tika-s0402t:1115_5: nāma. Yo pana “ayaṃ rājavallabhoti vā visame corādike visamāni vā kāyaduccaritādīni
tika-s0402t:1115_6: samādāya vattanena visamanissito vā, anatthampi me kareyyā”ti bhīto assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ
tika-s0402t:1115_7: karoti, ayaṃ bhayena akattabbaṃ karoti nāma.
tika-s0402t:1116_0: Yo pana kiñci bhājento “ayaṃ me sandiṭṭho vā sambhatto vā”ti pemavasena atirekaṃ
tika-s0402t:1116_1: deti, “ayaṃ me verī”ti dosavasena ūnakaṃ deti, yo muyhanto dinnādinnaṃ ajānamāno
tika-s0402t:1116_2: kassaci ūnaṃ, kassaci adhikaṃ deti, “ayaṃ imasmiṃ adīyamāne mayhaṃ anatthampi kareyyā”ti
tika-s0402t:1116_3: sīto kassaci atirekaṃ deti, so catubbidhopi yathānukkamena chandāgatiādīni gacchanto
tika-s0402t:1117_0: Nihīyati tassa yasoti tassa agatigāmino kittiyasopi parivārayasopi nihīyati parihāyati.
tika-s0402t:1117_1: Yassati tena kittīyatīti hi yaso, kitti thutighoso. Yassati tena purecarānucarabhāvena
tika-s0402t:1121_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame mahāvelā viya mahāvelā, vipulavālikapuñjatāya mahanto velātaṭo
tika-s0402t:1121_1: viyāti attho. Tenāha “mahāvālikarāsīti attho”ti. Uru, maru, sikatā, vālukā, vaṇṇu,
tika-s0402t:1121_2: vālikāti ime saddā samānatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Tenāha “urūti vālikā vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1122_0: Najjāti nadati saddāyatīti nadī, tassā najjā, nadiyā ninnagāyāti attho. Nerañjarāyāti
tika-s0402t:1122_1: “nelañjalāyā”ti vattabbe la-kārassa ra-kāraṃ katvā “nerañjarāyā”ti vuttaṃ, kaddamasevālapaṇakādidosarahitasalilāyāti
tika-s0402t:1122_2: attho. Keci “nīlaṃ-jalāyāti vattabbe nerañjarāyā”ti vadanti. Nāmameva vā etaṃ tassā
tika-s0402t:1122_3: nadiyāti veditabbaṃ. Tassā nadiyā tīre yattha bhagavā vihāsi, taṃ dassetuṃ “ajapālanigrodhe”ti
tika-s0402t:1122_4: vuttaṃ. Kasmā panāyaṃ ajapālanigrodho nāma jātoti āha “tassā”tiādi. Keci pana “yasmā
tika-s0402t:1122_5: tattha vede sajjhāyituṃ asamatthā mahallakabrāhmaṇā pākāraparikkhepayuttāni nivesanāni
tika-s0402t:1122_6: katvā sabbe vasiṃsu, tasmāssa ajapālanigrodhoti nāmaṃ jāta”nti vadanti. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1122_7: vacanattho – na japantīti ajapā, mantānaṃ anajjhāyakāti attho. Ajapālanti ādiyanti
tika-s0402t:1122_8: nivāsaṃ etthāti ajapāloti. Apare pana vadanti “yasmā majjhanhikasamaye antopaviṭṭhe
tika-s0402t:1122_9: aje attano chāyāya pāleti rakkhati, tasmā ‘ajapālo’tissa nāmaṃ ruḷha”nti. Sabbatthāpi
tika-s0402t:1123_0: Paṭhamābhisambuddhoti paṭhamaṃ abhisambuddho, anunāsikalopenāyaṃ niddeso. Tenevāha
tika-s0402t:1123_1: “sambuddho hutvā paṭhamamevā”ti. Paṭhamanti ca bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, tasmā abhisambuddho
tika-s0402t:1123_2: hutvā paṭhamaṃ ajapālanigrodhe viharāmīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Ayaṃ vitakkoti
tika-s0402t:1123_3: ayaṃ “kinnu khvāhaṃ…pe… vihareyya”nti evaṃ pavattavitakko. Hatthī ca vānaro ca tittiro
tika-s0402t:1124_0: Ye vuddhamapacāyantīti jātivuddho, vayovuddho, guṇavuddhoti tayo vuddhā. Tesu jātisampanno
tika-s0402t:1124_1: jātivuddho nāma, vaye ṭhito vayovuddho nāma, guṇasampanno guṇavuddho nāma. Tesu guṇasampanno
tika-s0402t:1124_2: vayovuddho imasmiṃ ṭhāne vuddhoti adhippeto. Apacāyantīti jeṭṭhāpacāyikākammena pūjenti.
tika-s0402t:1124_3: Dhammassa kovidāti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammassa kovidā kusalā. Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva
tika-s0402t:1124_4: attabhāve. Pāsaṃsāti pasaṃsārahā. Samparāye ca suggatīti samparetabbe imaṃ lokaṃ
tika-s0402t:1124_5: hitvā gantabbe paralokepi tesaṃ sugatiyeva. Ayaṃ panettha piṇḍattho – khattiyā vā
tika-s0402t:1124_6: hontu brāhmaṇā vā vessā vā suddā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā tiracchānagatā vā, ye
tika-s0402t:1124_7: keci sattā jeṭṭhāpacitikammena sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ vayovuddhānaṃ apacitiṃ karonti,
tika-s0402t:1124_8: te imasmiñca attabhāve jeṭṭhāpacitikārakāti pasaṃsaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ thomanaṃ labhanti,
tika-s0402t:1125_0: Aññasminti parasmiṃ. Attā na hotīti añño, paro. So panettha na yo koci adhippeto,
tika-s0402t:1125_1: atha kho garuṭṭhāniyo. Tenāha “kañci garuṭṭhāne aṭṭhapetvā”ti. Patissati garuno āṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1125_2: sampaṭicchatīti patisso, na patisso appatisso, patissayarahito, garupassayarahitoti attho.
tika-s0402t:1126_0: Sadevaketi avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho. Sadevakaggahaṇena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1126_1: pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā. Samārakaggahaṇena chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1126_2: paccāsattiñāyena. Tattha hi māro jāto tannivāsī ca hoti. Sabrahmakavacanena brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1126_5: vacanena gahitattā. Kāmaṃ “sadevake”tiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti
tika-s0402t:1126_6: viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ, “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana atulyayoge
tika-s0402t:1126_7: ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1127_0: Devabhāvasāmaññena mārabrahmesu gahitesupi itarehi tesaṃ labbhamānavisesadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1127_1: visuṃ gahaṇanti dassento “māro nāmā”tiādimāha. Māro brahmānampi vicakkhukammāya pahotīti
tika-s0402t:1127_2: āha “sabbesa”nti. Uparīti uparibhāge. Brahmāti dasasahassibrahmānaṃ sandhāyāha. Tathā
tika-s0402t:1127_3: cāha “dasahi aṅgulīhī”tiādi. Idha dīghanikāyādayo viya bāhirakānampi ganthanikāyo
tika-s0402t:1127_4: labbhatīti āha “ekanikāyādivasenā”ti. Vatthuvijjādīti ādi-saddena vijjāṭṭhānāni saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0402t:1127_5: Yathāsakaṃ kammakilesehi pajātattā nibbattattā pajā, sattanikāyo, tassā pajāya. Sadevamanussāyāti
tika-s0402t:1128_0: Evaṃ bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni abhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1128_1: dassetuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Lokavasena vuttāni “lokīyanti ettha kammaṃ kammaphalānī”ti
tika-s0402t:1128_2: katvā. Pajāvasena “hetupaccayehi pajātā”ti katvā. Sīlasampannataranti ettha paripuṇṇasampannatā
tika-s0402t:1128_3: adhippetā “sampannaṃ sālikedāra”ntiādīsu viya. Tenāha “adhikataranti attho”ti. Paripuṇṇañhi
tika-s0402t:1128_4: adhikataranti vattuṃ arahati. Kāraṇanti yuttiṃ. Atthanti aviparītatthaṃ. Vaḍḍhinti ativaḍḍhinimittaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1129_0: Iminā vacanenāti imasmiṃ sutte anantaraṃ vuttavacanena. Na kevalaṃ imināva, suttantarampi
tika-s0402t:1129_1: ānetvā paṭibāhitabboti dassento “na me ācariyo atthī”tiādimāha. Tattha na me ācariyo
tika-s0402t:1129_2: atthīti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi. Kiñcāpi lokiyadhammānampi yādiso
tika-s0402t:1129_3: lokanāthassa adhigamo, na tādiso adhigamo parūpadeso atthi. Lokuttaradhamme panassa
tika-s0402t:1129_4: lesopi natthi. Natthi me paṭipuggaloti mayhaṃ sīlādīhi guṇehi paṭinidhibhūto puggalo
tika-s0402t:1129_5: nāma natthi. Saranti karaṇe etaṃ paccattavacananti āha “sarantenā”ti, saranti vā
tika-s0402t:1130_0: Yatoti bhummatthe tosaddoti āha “yasmiṃ kāle”ti. Rattiyo jānantīti rattaññū, attano
tika-s0402t:1130_1: pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bahū rattiyo jānanti, cirapabbajitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Rattaññūnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1130_2: mahantabhāvo rattaññumahantaṃ. Bhāvappadhāno esa niddeso. “Rattaññumahatta”nti vā
tika-s0402t:1130_3: pāṭho. Esa nayo sesesupi. Theranavamajjhimānaṃ vasena vipulabhāvo vepullamahantaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1130_5: Visiṭṭhassa paccayalābhassa vipulabhāvo lābhaggamahantaṃ. Catubbidhena mahantenāti
tika-s0402t:1130_6: catubbidhena mahantabhāvena. Mahāpajāpatiyā dussayugadānakāleti bhagavato saṅghe
tika-s0402t:1130_7: gāravassa pākaṭakāladassanamattaṃ. Na hi bhagavā tato pubbe saṅghe gāravarahito vihāsi.
tika-s0402t:1133_0: 22. Dutiye huhuṅkajātikenāti so kira diṭṭhamaṅgaliko mānavasena kodhavasena ca “huhu”nti
tika-s0402t:1133_1: karonto vicarati, tasmā huhuṅkajātikoti vuccati. “Huhukkajātiko”tipi paṭhanti, tena
tika-s0402t:1133_2: saddhiṃ āgatāti attho. Jarājiṇṇāti jarāya khaṇḍadantapalitakesādibhāvaṃ āpāditā.
tika-s0402t:1133_3: Vayovuddhāti aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ vuddhimariyādappattā. Jātimahallakāti upapattiyā mahallakabhāvena
tika-s0402t:1133_4: samannāgatā. Mahattaṃ lanti gaṇhantīti mahallakā, jātiyā mahallakā, na vibhavādināti
tika-s0402t:1133_5: jātimahallakā. Vayoanuppattāti pacchimavayaṃ sampattā, pacchimavayo nāma vassasatassa
tika-s0402t:1133_6: pacchimo tatiyo bhāgo. Jiṇṇāti vā porāṇā, cirakālappavattakulanvayāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1133_7: Vuddhāti sīlācārādiguṇavuddhiyuttā. Mahallakāti vibhavamahantatāya samannāgatā. Mahaddhanāti
tika-s0402t:1133_8: mahābhogā. Addhagatāti maggappaṭipannā brāhmaṇānaṃ vatacariyādimariyādaṃ avītikkamma
tika-s0402t:1133_9: caramānā. Vayoanuppattāti jātivuddhabhāvaṃ antimavayaṃ anuppattā. Sutaṃ netanti ettha
tika-s0402t:1133_10: sutaṃ no etanti padacchedo. Noti ca karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Tenāha “amhehi suta”nti.
tika-s0402t:1134_0: Akāleti ayuttakāle. Asabhāvaṃ vadatīti yaṃ natthi, taṃ vadati. Anatthaṃ vadatīti
tika-s0402t:1134_1: akāraṇanissitaṃ vadati. Akāraṇanissitanti ca nipphalanti attho. Phalañhi kāraṇanissitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1134_2: Akāraṇanissitatā ca tadavinābhāvato akāraṇe nissitaṃ, nipphalaṃ samphanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:1134_3: hoti. Avinayaṃ vadatīti na saṃvaravinayappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vadati, attano suṇantassa
tika-s0402t:1134_4: ca na saṃvaravinayāvahaṃ vadatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Na hadaye nidhetabbayuttakanti ahitasaṃhitattā
tika-s0402t:1134_5: cittaṃ anuppavesetvā nidhetuṃ ayuttaṃ. Kathetuṃ ayuttakālenāti dhammaṃ kathentena
tika-s0402t:1134_6: yo attho yasmiṃ kāle vattabbo, tato pubbe pacchā ca tassa akālo, tasmiṃ ayuttakāle
tika-s0402t:1134_7: vattā. Apadesarahitanti suttāpadesarahitaṃ. Sāpadesaṃ sakāraṇaṃ katvā na kathetīti
tika-s0402t:1134_8: “bhagavatā asuke sutte evaṃ vutta”nti evaṃ sāpadesaṃ kāraṇasahitaṃ katvā na katheti.
tika-s0402t:1135_0: Pariyantarahitanti paricchedarahitaṃ, suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā tassa anuyogaṃ
tika-s0402t:1135_1: upamaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā āharitvā yaṃ suttaṃ jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitaṃ, tassa sarīrabhūtaṃ
tika-s0402t:1135_2: kathaṃ anāmasitvā bāhirakathaṃyeva katheti, nikkhittaṃ nikkhittamattameva hoti, “suttaṃ
tika-s0402t:1135_3: nu kho katheti jātakaṃ nu kho, nāssa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā passāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0402t:1135_4: Yathā vaṭarukkhasākhānaṃ gatagataṭṭhāne pārohā otaranti, otiṇṇo-tiṇṇaṭṭhāne viruḷhiṃ
tika-s0402t:1135_5: āpajjitvā puna vaḍḍhantiyeva, evaṃ aḍḍhayojanampi yojanampi gacchatiyeva. Gacchante
tika-s0402t:1135_6: gacchante pana mūlarukkho vinassati, anujātapārohamūlāniyeva tiṭṭhanti, evaṃ ayampi
tika-s0402t:1135_7: nigrodhadhammakathiko nāma hoti. Nikkhittaṃ nikkhittameva katvā passeneva pariharanto
tika-s0402t:1135_8: gacchati. Yo pana bahumpi bhaṇanto “etadatthamidaṃ vutta”nti nikkhittasuttato aññampi
tika-s0402t:1135_9: anuyogūpamāvatthuvasena tadupayogīnaṃ āharitvā āharitvā jānāpetuṃ sakkoti, tathārūpassa
tika-s0402t:1135_10: dhammakathikassa bahumpi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Na lokiyalokuttaraatthanissitanti attano
tika-s0402t:1136_0: Pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttivasena ca buddhādīhi
tika-s0402t:1136_1: bhāsitattā pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti pāḷi, pariyattidhammo. Purimassa
tika-s0402t:1136_2: atthassa pacchimena atthena anusandhānaṃ anusandhi, atthamukhena pana pāḷippadesānampi
tika-s0402t:1136_4: catubbidho, taṃtaṃdesanānaṃ pana pubbāparapāḷivasena anusandhivasena pubbāparavasenāti
tika-s0402t:1136_5: paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Uggahitanti byañjanaso atthaso ca uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gahitaṃ, pariyāpuṇanavasena
tika-s0402t:1136_6: ceva paripucchāvasena ca hadayena gahitanti attho. Vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi sotabbato
tika-s0402t:1136_7: sutaṃ, pariyattidhammo. Taṃ dhāretīti sutadharo. Yo hi sutadharo, sutaṃ tasmiṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1136_8: hoti suppatiṭṭhitaṃ arogikaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “sutassa ādhārabhūto”ti. Tenāha “yassa
tika-s0402t:1136_9: hī”tiādi. Ekaṃ padaṃ ekakkharampi avinaṭṭhaṃ hutvā sannicīyatīti sannicayo, sutaṃ
tika-s0402t:1136_10: sannicayo etasminti sutasannicayo. Ajjhosāyāti anuppavisitvā. Tiṭṭhatīti na sammussati.
tika-s0402t:1137_0: Paguṇāti vācuggatā. Niccalikanti aviparivattaṃ. Saṃsanditvāti aññehi saṃsanditvā.
tika-s0402t:1137_1: Samanuggāhitvāti paripucchāvasena atthaṃ ogāhitvā. Pabandhassa vicchedābhāvato gaṅgāsotasadisaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1137_2: “Bhavaṅgasotasadisa”nti vā pāṭho, akittimaṃ sukhappavattīti attho. Suttekadesassa
tika-s0402t:1137_3: suttamattassa ca vacasā paricayo idha nādhippeto, vaggādivasena pana adhippetoti
tika-s0402t:1137_5: sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitāti attho. Manasā anu anu pekkhitā bhāgaso nijjhāyitā
tika-s0402t:1137_6: cintitā manasānupekkhitā. Rūpagataṃ viya paññāyatīti rūpagataṃ viya cakkhussa vibhūtaṃ
tika-s0402t:1137_7: hutvā paññāyati. Suppaṭividdhāti nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvato paṭividdhā.
tika-s0402t:1138_0: Adhikaṃ cetoti abhiceto, upacārajjhānacittaṃ. Tassa pana adhikatā pākatikakāmāvacaracittehi
tika-s0402t:1138_1: sundaratāya, sā paṭipakkhato suddhiyāti āha “abhikkantaṃ visuddhaṃ citta”nti. Adhicittanti
tika-s0402t:1138_2: samādhimāha. Sopi upacārasamādhi daṭṭhabbo. Vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ, samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1138_3: apītijaṃ kāyasukhaṃ, satipārisuddhijaṃ ñāṇasukhanti catubbidhampi jhānasukhaṃ paṭipakkhato
tika-s0402t:1138_4: nikkhantataṃ upādāya nekkhammasukhanti vuccatīti āha “nekkhammasukhaṃ vindatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1138_5: Icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjituṃ samatthoti iminā tesu jhānesu samāpajjanavasībhāvamāha.
tika-s0402t:1138_6: Nikāmalābhīti pana vacanato āvajjanādhiṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇavasiyopi vuttā evāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1138_7: Sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvāti etena tesaṃ jhānānaṃ sukhappaṭipadataṃ
tika-s0402t:1139_0: Vipulānanti vepullaṃ pāpitānaṃ jhānānaṃ. Vipulatā nāma subhāvitabhāvena ciratarappavattiyā,
tika-s0402t:1139_1: sā ca paricchedānurūpāva icchitabbāti “vipulāna”nti vatvā “yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhātuṃ
tika-s0402t:1139_2: samatthoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha. Paricchedakālañhi appatvāva vuṭṭhahanto akasiralābhī
tika-s0402t:1139_3: na hoti yāvadicchitaṃ pavattetuṃ asamatthattā. Idāni yathāvutte samāpajjanādivasībhāve
tika-s0402t:1139_4: byatirekavasena vibhāvetuṃ “ekacco hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha lābhīyeva hotīti idaṃ
tika-s0402t:1139_5: paṭiladdhamattassa jhānassa vasena vuttaṃ. Tathāti icchiticchitakkhaṇe. Pāripanthiketi
tika-s0402t:1139_6: vasībhāvassa paccanīkadhamme. Jhānādhigamassa pana paccanīkadhammā pageva vikkhambhitā,
tika-s0402t:1139_7: aññathā jhānādhigamo eva na siyā. Kicchena vikkhambhetīti kicchena visodheti. Kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi
tika-s0402t:1139_8: kāmacchandādīnaṃ viya aññesampi samādhipāripanthikānaṃ dūrasamussāraṇaṃ idha vikkhambhanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1140_0: Aṭṭhapitasaṅkappoti na sammāpaṇihitasaṅkappo. Abhiññāpāragūti sabbesaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhammānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1140_1: abhiññāya pāraṃ gato, sabbadhamme abhivisiṭṭhāya aggamaggapaññāya jānitvā ṭhitoti
tika-s0402t:1140_2: attho. Pariññāpāragūti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ pariññāya pāraṃ gato, pañcakkhandhe parijānitvā
tika-s0402t:1140_3: ṭhitoti attho. Bhāvanāpāragūti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ bhāvanāya pāraṃ gato, cattāro magge
tika-s0402t:1140_4: bhāvetvā ṭhitoti attho. Pahānapāragūti sabbakilesānaṃ pahānena pāraṃ gato, sabbakilese
tika-s0402t:1140_5: pajahitvā ṭhitoti attho. Sacchikiriyāpāragūti nirodhasacchikiriyāya pāraṃ gato, nirodhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1140_6: sacchikatvā ṭhitoti attho. Samāpattipāragūti sabbasamāpattīnaṃ samāpajjanena pāraṃ
tika-s0402t:1140_7: gato, sabbā samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā ṭhitoti attho. Brahmacariyassa kevalīti yaṃ
tika-s0402t:1140_8: brahmacariyassa kevalaṃ sakalabhāvo, tena samannāgato, sakalacatumaggabrahmacariyavāsoti
tika-s0402t:1140_9: attho. Tenāha “sakalabrahmacariyo”ti, paripuṇṇamaggabrahmacariyoti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t:1143_0: 23. Tatiye lokoti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko. Atthato purimasmiṃ ariyasaccadvayaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1143_1: idha pana dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tenāha “lokoti dukkhasacca”nti. Visaṃyuttoti
tika-s0402t:1143_2: visaṃsaṭṭho na paṭibaddho, sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ sammadeva samucchinnattā tato vippamuttoti
tika-s0402t:1143_3: attho. Lokasamudayoti suttantanayena taṇhā, abhidhammanayena pana abhisaṅkhārehi
tika-s0402t:1143_4: saddhiṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ. Lokanirodhoti nibbānaṃ. Sacchikatoti attapaccakkho
tika-s0402t:1143_5: kato. Lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
tika-s0402t:1143_6: So hi lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati, tadatthaṃ ariyehi paṭipajjīyati
tika-s0402t:1144: Ettāvatā tathāni abhisambuddho yāthāvato gatoti tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti. Cattāri hi ariyasaccāni tathāni nāma. Yathāha –
tika-s0402t:1145: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Katamāni cattāri? Idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti vitthāro.
tika-s0402t:1146_0: Apica tathāya gatoti tathāgato, gatoti ca avagato atīto patto paṭipannoti attho.
tika-s0402t:1146_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā bhagavā sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya aviparītāya
tika-s0402t:1146_2: gato avagato, tasmā loko tathāgatena abhisambuddhoti tathāgato. Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya
tika-s0402t:1146_3: tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti
tika-s0402t:1146_4: tathāgato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgatoti.
tika-s0402t:1146_5: Evaṃ imissā pāḷiyā tathāgatabhāvadīpanavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1147_0: Iti bhagavā catusaccābhisambodhavasena attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tattha
tika-s0402t:1147_2: pana “catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ tathāgatasaddabuddhasaddānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1147_3: atthato ninnānākaraṇataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā ceva hi pāḷi pavattāti. Diṭṭhanti
tika-s0402t:1147_4: rūpāyatanaṃ daṭṭhabbato. Tena yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ yaṃ dissati, yaṃ dakkhati, yaṃ samavāye
tika-s0402t:1147_5: passeyya, taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhanteva gahitaṃ kālavisesassa anāmaṭṭhabhāvato yathā “duddha”nti
tika-s0402t:1147_6: dasseti. Sutantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Sutanti saddāyatanaṃ sotabbato. Mutanti sanissaye
tika-s0402t:1147_7: indriye nissayaṃ muñcitvā pāpuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ. Tenāha “patvā gahetabbato”ti. Viññātanti
tika-s0402t:1147_8: vijānitabbaṃ. Taṃ pana diṭṭhādivinimuttaṃ viññeyyanti āha “sukhadukkhādi dhammārammaṇa”nti.
tika-s0402t:1147_9: Pattanti yathā tathā patvā hatthagataṃ, adhigatanti attho. Tenāha “pariyesitvā vā
tika-s0402t:1147_10: apariyesitvā vā”ti. Pariyesitanti pattiyā atthaṃ pariyiṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ pana pattaṃ vā
tika-s0402t:1147_11: siyā appattaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi pariyesitamevāti āha “pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā”ti. Dvayenapi
tika-s0402t:1147_12: dvippakārampi pattaṃ dvippakārampi pariyesitaṃ tena tena pakārena tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti
tika-s0402t:1147_13: dasseti. Cittena anusañcaritanti te pana apāpetvā citteneva anu anu sañcaritaṃ, viparitakkitanti attho.
tika-s0402t:1148_0: Pītakantiādīti ādisaddena lohitaodātādisabbaṃ rūpārammaṇabhāgaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sumanoti
tika-s0402t:1148_1: rāgavasena lobhavasena saddhādivasena vā sumano. Dummanoti byāpādavitakkavasena vā
tika-s0402t:1148_2: vihiṃsāvitakkavasena vā dummano. Majjhattoti aññāṇavasena, ñāṇavasena vā majjhatto.
tika-s0402t:1148_3: Esa nayo sabbattha. Tattha ādisaddena saṅkhasaddo, paṇavasaddo, pattagandho, pupphagandho,
tika-s0402t:1148_4: puppharaso, phalaraso, upādinnaṃ, anupādinnaṃ, majjhattavedanā kusalakammaṃ akusalakammanti
tika-s0402t:1148_5: evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Appattanti ñāṇena asampattaṃ, aviditanti attho. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:1148_6: “ñāṇena asacchikata”nti. Lokena gatanti lokena ñātaṃ. Tatheva gatattāti tatheva ñātattā
tika-s0402t:1148_7: abhisambuddhattā, gatasaddena ekattaṃ buddhiatthanti attho. Gatiattho hi dhātavo
tika-s0402t:1149_0: Yañca, bhikkhave, ratiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhatīti yassañca
tika-s0402t:1149_1: visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃ tathāāgatattādiatthena tathāgato bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke
tika-s0402t:1149_2: nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā uttaritarābhāvato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
tika-s0402t:1149_3: āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigacchati. Yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya
tika-s0402t:1149_4: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyatīti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃyeva kusinārāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1149_5: upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati.
tika-s0402t:1149_6: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānadhātūnaṃ majjhe
tika-s0402t:1149_8: yaṃ suttageyyādippabhedaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsati nidassanavasena, lapati uddisanavasena,
tika-s0402t:1149_9: niddisati pariniddisanavasena. Sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hotīti taṃ etthantare desitaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-s0402t:1149_10: suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthato byañjanato ca anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1149_11: rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamadanimmadanaṃ mohamadanimmadanaṃ, natthi tattha vālaggamattampi
tika-s0402t:1149_12: avakkhalitaṃ, ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekāya nāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1149_13: viya ca taṃ tatheva hoti yassatthāya bhāsitaṃ, ekanteneva tassa sādhanato, no aññathā,
tika-s0402t:1149_14: tasmā tathaṃ avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ. Etena tathāvāditāya tathāgatoti dasseti. Gadaattho
tika-s0402t:1149_15: ayaṃ gatasaddo da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā, tasmā tathaṃ gadatīti tathāgatoti attho.
tika-s0402t:1149_16: Atha vā āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tato aviparīto āgado assāti da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ
tika-s0402t:1150_0: Yathāvādīti ye dhamme bhagavā “ime dhammā akusalā sāvajjā viññugarahitā samattā samādinnā
tika-s0402t:1150_1: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī”ti paresaṃ dhammaṃ desento vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva
tika-s0402t:1150_2: sayaṃ pahāsi. Ye pana dhamme bhagavā – “ime dhammā kusalā anavajjā viññuppasatthā
tika-s0402t:1150_3: samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī”ti vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1150_4: upasampajja viharati, tasmā yathāvādī bhagavā tathākārīti veditabbo. Tathā sammadeva
tika-s0402t:1150_5: sīlādiparipūraṇavasena sammāpaṭipadāyaṃ yathākārī bhagavā, tatheva dhammadesanāya
tika-s0402t:1150_6: paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena tathāvādī. Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi,
tika-s0402t:1150_7: kāyassapi vācā, tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṃbhūtassa
tika-s0402t:1150_8: ca yathā vācā, kāyopi tathā gato pavatto. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1151_0: Abhibhū anabhibhūtoti upari bhavaggaṃ, heṭṭhā avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1151_1: aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu bhagavā sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi
tika-s0402t:1151_2: vimuttiyāpi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi. Asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo
tika-s0402t:1151_3: appaṭipuggalo atulo appameyyo anuttaro dhammarājā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1151_4: atibrahmā, tato eva ayaṃ na kenaci abhibhūto. Dakkhatīti sabbaṃ passati. Visesavacanicchāyapi
tika-s0402t:1151_5: abhāvato anavasesavisayo dasasaddo. Tena yaṃ kiñci neyyaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale
tika-s0402t:1151_6: āmalakaṃ viya passatīti dīpeti. Aviparītaṃ āsayādiavabodhena hitūpasaṃhārādinā ca
tika-s0402t:1151_7: satte, bhāvaññatthattūpanayavasena saṅkhāre, sabbākārena suciṇṇavasitāya samāpattiyo,
tika-s0402t:1151_8: cittañca vase vattetīti vasavattīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1152: Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi visaṃyutto. Tenāha “catunnaṃ yogānaṃ pahānena visaṃyutto”ti. Taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi virahitoti sabbasmimpi loke taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātehi upayehi virahito.
tika-s0402t:1153_0: Abhibhavitvā ṭhitoti tabbisayakilesappahānena abhibhuyya atikkamitvā ṭhito. Cattāropi
tika-s0402t:1153_1: ganthe mocetvā ṭhitoti sabbe abhijjhākāyaganthādike sakasantānato mocetvā ṭhito.
tika-s0402t:1153_2: Veneyyasantāne vā attano desanāvilāsena tesaṃ pamocanoti sabbaganthappamocano. Phuṭṭhassa
tika-s0402t:1153_3: paramā santīti assa anena khīṇāsavena buddhena paramā santi ñāṇaphusanena phuṭṭhāti
tika-s0402t:1153_4: evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Tenāha “phuṭṭhassā”tiādi. Nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthīti
tika-s0402t:1153_5: kutoci bhayakāraṇato nibbāne bhayaṃ natthi asaṅkhatabhāvena sabbaso khemattā. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:1153_6: bhagavā – “khemañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi khemagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:1153_7: Nibbānappattassa vā kutoci bhayaṃ natthīti nibbānaṃ akutobhayanti evamettha attho
tika-s0402t:1153_8: daṭṭhabbo, na kutoci bhayaṃ ettha etasmiṃ adhigateti akutobhayaṃ, nibbānanti evamettha
tika-s0402t:1154_0: Anīgho niddukkho. Sabbakammakkhayaṃ pattoti sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1154_1: accantabhāvaṃ patto. Upadhī sammadeva khīyanti etthāti upadhisaṅkhayo, nibbānanti
tika-s0402t:1154_2: āha “upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne”ti. Cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ. Pavattayīti teparivaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0402t:1154_3: dvādasākāraṃ pavattesi. Mahantehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatattā mahantaṃ. Vītasāradanti
tika-s0402t:1157_0: 24. Catutthe bāḷhaṃ kho ne pasaṃsasīti ne samaṇe bāḷhaṃ katvā pasaṃsasi vaṇṇayasi.
tika-s0402t:1157_1: Kīdisaṃ sīlaṃ etesanti kiṃsīlā. Ko samācāro etesanti kiṃsamācārā. Guṇamaggasaṇṭhitāti
tika-s0402t:1157_2: guṇaggasaṇṭhitā. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro, aggaguṇe patiṭṭhitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Santindriyā
tika-s0402t:1157_3: santamānasā, “santaṃ tesaṃ gataṃ ṭhita”ntipi paṭhanti. Ekakiyāti ekakā, catūsu iriyāpathesu
tika-s0402t:1157_4: ekakā hutvā viharantīti adhippāyo. Tenevāha “adutiyā”ti. Tādisā samaṇā mamātīti ettha
tika-s0402t:1161: Puṇṇā suddhehi dhammehi, tādisā samaṇā mama.
tika-s0402t:1171_0: “Dūre santo”tiādigāthāya ayamattho. Santoti rāgādīnaṃ santatāya buddhādayo santo
tika-s0402t:1171_1: nāma, idha pana pubbabuddhesu katādhikārā ussannakusalamūlā bhāvitabhāvanā sattā
tika-s0402t:1171_2: santoti adhippetā. Pakāsantīti dūre ṭhitāpi buddhānaṃ ñāṇapathaṃ āgacchantā pākaṭā
tika-s0402t:1171_3: honti. Himavantovāti yathā tiyojanasahassavitthato pañcayojanasatubbedho caturāsītiyā
tika-s0402t:1171_4: kūṭasahassehi paṭimaṇḍito himavantapabbato dūre ṭhitānampi abhimukhe ṭhito viya pakāsati,
tika-s0402t:1171_5: evaṃ pakāsantīti attho. Asantettha na dissantīti lābhagarukā, vitthiṇṇaparalokā,
tika-s0402t:1171_6: āmisacakkhukā, jīvikatthāya pabbajitā, bālapuggalā asanto nāma. Te ettha buddhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1171_7: dakkhiṇassa jāṇumaṇḍalassa santike nisinnāpi na dissanti na paññāyanti. Rattiṃ khittā
tika-s0402t:1171_8: yathā sarāti rattiṃ caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre khittā sarā viya tathārūpassa
tika-s0402t:1171_9: upanissayabhūtassa pubbahetuno abhāvena na paññāyantīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1172: Brahmadeyyanti seṭṭhadeyyaṃ, yathā dinnaṃ na puna gahetabbaṃ hoti nissaṭṭhaṃ pariccattaṃ, evaṃ dinnanti attho.
tika-s0402t:1173_0: Diṭṭhaṃ na maññatīti ettha diṭṭhanti maṃsacakkhunāpi diṭṭhaṃ, dibbacakkhunāpi diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1173_1: rūpāyatanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yañhi cakkhudvayena katadassanakiriyāsamāpanaṃ, yaṃ
tika-s0402t:1173_2: cakkhudvayaṃ passati apassi passissati, samavāye passeyya, taṃ sabbaṃ kālavisesavacanicchāya
tika-s0402t:1174: Lābhepi tādī, alābhepi tādīti yathā alābhakāle lābhassa laddhakālepi tathevāti tādiso. Yasepīti yase satipi mahāparivārakālepi. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1177_0: 25. Pañcame nayidanti ettha na-iti paṭisedhe nipāto, tassa “vussatī”ti iminā sambandho
tika-s0402t:1177_1: “na vussatī”ti, ya-kāro padasandhikaro. Idaṃ-saddo “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1177_2: ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharāmi subhagavane sālarājamūle”tiādīsu nipātamattaṃ, “idaṃ kho taṃ,
tika-s0402t:1177_3: bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ sīlamattaka”ntiādīsu yathāvutte āsannapaccakkhe āgato.
tika-s0402t:1180: Ādīsu vakkhamāne āsannapaccakkhe. Idhāpi vakkhamāneyeva āsannapaccakkhe daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1196: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti. –
tika-s0402t:1198: “Evaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti imasmiṃ tittirajātake pañcasikkhāpadasīle.
tika-s0402t:1199: “Taṃ kho pana me, pañcasikha, brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya…pe… yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti imasmiṃ mahāgovindasutte brahmavihāre.
tika-s0402t:1200: “Pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti, mayamettha brahmacārī bhavissāmā”ti imasmiṃ sallekhasutte methunaviratiyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1204: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. –
tika-s0402t:1206: “Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritā, tapassī sudaṃ homī”ti lomahaṃsasutte vīriye.
tika-s0402t:1210: “Idaṃ kho pana me, pañcasikha, brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya…pe… ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti mahāgovindasutteyeva ariyamagge.
tika-s0402t:1211_0: “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāva
tika-s0402t:1211_1: devamanussehi suppakāsita”nti pāsādikasutte sikkhattayasaṅgahite sakalasmiṃ sāsane.
tika-s0402t:1212_0: Vussatīti vusīyati, carīyatīti attho. Janakuhanatthanti “aho ayyo sīlavā vattasampanno
tika-s0402t:1212_1: appiccho santuṭṭho mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”tiādinā janassa sattalokassa vimhāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1212_3: tividhena kuhanavatthunā kuhakabhāvena janassa vimhāpanattha”nti vadanti. Idhāpi
tika-s0402t:1212_4: ayamevattho dassito. Tenevāha “tīhi kuhanavatthūhi janassa kuhanatthāyā”ti, janassa
tika-s0402t:1212_5: vimhāpanatthāyāti attho. Janalāpanatthanti “evarūpassa nāma ayyassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ
tika-s0402t:1212_7: paṭhanti, tassa pāpicchassa sato paccayatthaṃ parikathobhāsādivasena lapanabhāvena
tika-s0402t:1212_8: upalāpakabhāvena janassa lapanatthanti attho. Tenevāha “na janalapanatthanti na janassa upalāpanattha”nti.
tika-s0402t:1213_1: Tattha yvāyaṃ “ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘lābhī assaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna’nti,
tika-s0402t:1213_2: sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti sīlānisaṃsabhāvena vutto catupaccayalābho ca. Catunnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1213_3: paccayānaṃ sakkaccadānasaṅkhāto ādarabahumānagarukaraṇasaṅkhāto ca sakkāro, yo ca
tika-s0402t:1213_5: siloko brahmacariyaṃ vasantānaṃ diṭṭhadhammiko ānisaṃso, tadatthanti attho. Keci
tika-s0402t:1214_0: Na iti maṃ jano jānātūti evaṃ brahmacariyavāse sati “sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:1214_1: maṃ loko jānātu sambhāvetūti attano santaguṇavasena sambhāvanatthampi na idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1214_2: vussatīti sambandho. Keci pana “pāpicchassa sato asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyena ‘iti
tika-s0402t:1214_3: evaṃguṇoti maṃ loko jānātū’ti na idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti evamettha atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1214_4: Sabbatthāpi panettha purimo purimoyeva atthavikappo sundarataro.
tika-s0402t:1215_0: Atha khoti ettha athāti aññatthe nipāto, khoti avadhāraṇe. Tena kuhanādito aññadatthaṃyeva
tika-s0402t:1215_1: idaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti dasseti. Idāni taṃ payojanaṃ dassento “saṃvaratthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1215_2: pahānattha”nti āha. Tattha pañcavidho saṃvaro – pātimokkhasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro,
tika-s0402t:1215_3: khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti. “Iti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:1215_4: nayena āgato ayaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaro, sīlasaṃvarotipi vuccati. “Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1215_5: cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti āgato ayaṃ satisaṃvaro.
tika-s0402t:1218: Āgato ayaṃ ñāṇasaṃvaro. “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”tiādinā nayena āgato ayaṃ khantisaṃvaro.
tika-s0402t:1219: “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā nayena āgato ayaṃ vīriyasaṃvaro.
tika-s0402t:1220_0: Atthato pana pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pajahanavasena vattappaṭivattānaṃ pūraṇavasena ca pavattā
tika-s0402t:1220_1: cetanā ceva virati ca. Saṅkhepato sabbo kāyavacīsaṃyamo, vitthārato sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1220_2: avītikkamo sīlasaṃvaro. Sati eva satisaṃvaro, satippadhānā vā kusalā khandhā. Ñāṇameva
tika-s0402t:1220_3: ñāṇasaṃvaro. Adhivāsanavasena adoso, adosappadhānā vā tathāpavattā kusalā khandhā
tika-s0402t:1220_4: khantisaṃvaro, paññāti eke. Kāmavitakkādīnaṃ abhibhavanavasena pavattaṃ vīriyameva
tika-s0402t:1220_5: vīriyasaṃvaro. Tesu paṭhamo kāyaduccaritādīsu dussīlassa saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, dutiyo
tika-s0402t:1220_6: muṭṭhassaccassa, tatiyo aññāṇassa, catuttho akkhantiyā, pañcamo kosajjassa saṃvaraṇato
tika-s0402t:1220_7: pidahanato saṃvaroti veditabbo. Evametassa saṃvarassa atthāya saṃvaratthaṃ saṃvaranipphādanatthanti attho.
tika-s0402t:1221_0: Tīhi pahānehīti tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedasaṅkhātehi tīhi pahānehi. Pañcavidhappahānampi
tika-s0402t:1221_2: Tattha yaṃ dīpālokeneva tamassa paṭipakkhabhāvato alobhādīhi lobhādikassa nāmarūpaparicchedādivipassanāñāṇehi
tika-s0402t:1221_3: tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – pariccāgena lobhādimalassa, sīlena
tika-s0402t:1221_7: amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā, vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā,
tika-s0402t:1221_8: bhayadassanena sabhaye abhayasaññāya, ādīnavadassanena assādasaññāya, nibbidānupassanena
tika-s0402t:1221_10: anulomena dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ nibbāne ca paṭilomabhāvassa, gotrabhunā saṅkhāranimittaggāhassa
tika-s0402t:1222_0: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe
tika-s0402t:1222_1: sevālassa, tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ, etaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:1222_2: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1222_3: pahānāyā”tiādinā nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagahaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena
tika-s0402t:1222_4: samucchindanaṃ, etaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1222_5: kilesānaṃ, etaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭattā pahīnasabbasaṅkhataṃ
tika-s0402t:1222_6: nibbānaṃ, etaṃ nissaraṇappahānaṃ nāma. Tassa pañcavidhassapi tathā tathā rāgādikilesānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1222_7: paṭinissajjanaṭṭhena samatikkamanaṭṭhena vā pahānassa atthāya, pahānasādhanatthanti
tika-s0402t:1223_0: Tattha saṃvarena kilesānaṃ cittasantāne pavesanivāraṇaṃ pahānena ca pavesanivāraṇameva
tika-s0402t:1223_1: samugghāto cāti vadanti. Ubhayenapi pana yathārahaṃ ubhayaṃ sampajjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1223_2: Sīlādidhammā eva hi saṃvaraṇato saṃvaraṃ, pajahanato pahānanti.
tika-s0402t:1224_0: Anītihanti ītiyo vuccanti upaddavā diṭṭhadhammikā samparāyikā ca. Ītiyo hantīti ītihaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1224_1: anu ītihanti anītihaṃ, sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca. Atha vā ītīhi anatthehi
tika-s0402t:1224_2: saddhiṃ hananti gacchanti pavattantīti ītihā, taṇhādiupakkilesā. Natthi ettha ītihāti
tika-s0402t:1224_3: anītihaṃ. Ītihā vā yathāvuttenatthena titthiyasamayā, tappaṭipakkhato idaṃ anītihaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1224_5: itihaṃ nāma, sammāsambuddhappaveditattā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ nikkaṅkhabhāvasādhanato
tika-s0402t:1224_6: ca natthi ettha itihanti anitihaṃ, aparapattiyanti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ “paccattaṃ
tika-s0402t:1224_8: dīghaṃ katvā paṭhanti. Pacchimaṃ panettha atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ “itihaparivajjita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1225_0: Nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ogadhaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ pāraṃ gacchatīti nibbānogadhagāmī, vimuttirasattā
tika-s0402t:1225_1: ekanteneva nibbānasampāpakoti attho, taṃ nibbānogadhagāminaṃ brahmacariyaṃ. Nibbānogadhoti
tika-s0402t:1225_2: vā ariyamaggo vuccati tena vinā nibbānāvagāhaṇassa asambhavato tassa ca nibbānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1225_3: anālambitvā appavattanato, tañcetaṃ ekantasampādanena gacchatīti nibbānogadhagāmī.
tika-s0402t:1225_4: Atha vā nibbānogadhagāminanti nibbānassa antogāminaṃ. Maggabrahmacariyañhi nibbānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1225_5: ārammaṇaṃ karitvā tassa anto eva pavattatīti. Imameva ca atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ “nibbānassa
tika-s0402t:1225_6: antogāmina”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Soti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā
tika-s0402t:1225_7: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, so bhagavā adesayi desesi. Mahantehīti mahāātumehi
tika-s0402t:1225_8: uḷārajjhāsayehi. Mahantaṃ nibbānaṃ, mahante vā sīlakkhandhādike esanti gavesantīti
tika-s0402t:1225_9: mahesino, buddhādayo ariyā. Tehi anuyāto paṭipanno.
tika-s0402t:1226_0: Yathā buddhena desitanti yathā abhiññeyyādibhāvena sammāsambuddhena mayā desitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1226_1: evaṃ ye etaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadatthaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyañca paṭipajjanti. Te
tika-s0402t:1226_2: diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsantassa satthu mayhaṃ sāsanakārino
tika-s0402t:1226_3: ovādappaṭikarā sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ pariyantaṃ appavattiṃ karissanti, dukkhassa
tika-s0402t:1229_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe kuhakāti sāmantajappanādinā kuhanavatthunā kuhakā, asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya
tika-s0402t:1229_1: kohaññaṃ katvā paresaṃ viddhaṃsakāti attho. Thaddhāti “kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo,
tika-s0402t:1229_2: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyatī”ti evaṃ vuttena
tika-s0402t:1229_3: kodhena ca, “dubbaco hoti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgato akkhamo appadakkhiṇaggāhī
tika-s0402t:1229_4: anusāsani”nti. Evaṃ vuttena dovacassena ca, “jātimado, gottamado, lābhamado, ārogyamado,
tika-s0402t:1229_5: yobbanamado, jīvitamado”ti evaṃ vuttajātimadādibhedena mānena ca garukātabbesu garūsupi
tika-s0402t:1229_6: nipaccakāraṃ akatvā ayosalākaṃ gilitvā ṭhitā viya anonatā hutvā vicaraṇakā. Tenāha “kodhena cā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1230_0: Upalāpakāti micchājīvavasena kulasaṅgaṇhakā. Lapāti paccayatthaṃ payuttavācāvasena
tika-s0402t:1230_1: nippesikatāvasena lapakāti attho. Siṅganti siṅgāraṃ. Tañhi kusalassa vijjhanato suṭṭhu
tika-s0402t:1230_2: āsevitatāya sīse parikkhittaṃ sunibbattaṃ visāṇaṃ viya thirattā ca siṅgaṃ viyāti
tika-s0402t:1230_3: siṅgaṃ, nāgarikabhāvasaṅkhātassa kilesasiṅgassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Siṅgārabhāvo siṅgāratā,
tika-s0402t:1230_4: siṅgārakaraṇakaākāro vā. Cāturabhāvo cāturatā. Tathā cāturiyaṃ. Parikkhatabhāvo parikkhatatā,
tika-s0402t:1230_5: parikhaṇitvā ṭhapitasseva daḷhasiṅgārassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1231_0: Uggatanaḷāti naḷasadisaṃ tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā vicaraṇakā. Tenāha “tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā
tika-s0402t:1231_1: ṭhitā”ti. Yasmā te kuhanādiyogato na sammāpaṭipannā, tasmā “mama santakā na hontī”ti
tika-s0402t:1231_2: vuttaṃ. Apagatāti yadipi te mama sāsane pabbajitā, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ pana appaṭipajjanato
tika-s0402t:1231_3: apagatā eva imasmā dhammavinayā, ito te suvidūre ṭhitāti dasseti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0402t:1236: Sabbattha patthaṭatāya vepullaṃ pāpuṇantīti sabbattha patthaṭabhāvena sīlādidhammakkhandhapāripūriyā vepullaṃ pāpuṇanti.
tika-s0402t:1239_1: ca. Tattha sulabhatāya pariyesanadukkhassa abhāvo dassito, appatāya pariharaṇadukkhassapi
tika-s0402t:1239_2: abhāvo dassito, anavajjatāya agarahitabbatāya bhikkhusāruppabhāvo dassito hoti. Appatāya
tika-s0402t:1239_3: vā parittāsassa avatthutā, sulabhatāya gedhādīnaṃ avatthutā, anavajjatāya ādīnavadassananissaraṇapaññānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1239_4: atthitā dassitā hoti. Appatāya vā lābhena na somanassaṃ janayanti, alābhena na domanassaṃ
tika-s0402t:1239_5: janayanti, anavajjatāya vippaṭisāranimittaṃ aññāṇupekkhaṃ na janayanti avippaṭisāravatthubhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1240_0: Paṃsukūlanti saṅkārakūṭādīsu yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:1240_1: paṃsukūlaṃ viyāti paṃsukūlaṃ, paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlanti
tika-s0402t:1240_2: evaṃ laddhanāmaṃ rathikādīsu patitanantakāni uccinitvā katacīvaraṃ. Rukkhamūlanti
tika-s0402t:1240_3: vivekānurūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci rukkhasamīpaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci muttanti yaṃ kiñci gomuttaṃ. Keci
tika-s0402t:1240_5: vissaṭṭhaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ apariggahitaṃ yaṃ kiñci bhesajjaṃ pūtimuttanti adhippeta”nti apare.
tika-s0402t:1241_0: Yato khoti paccatte nissakkavacanaṃ, yaṃ khoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tena tuṭṭho hotīti vuttakiriyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1241_1: parāmasati. Tuṭṭhoti santuṭṭho. Idamassāhanti yvāyaṃ catubbidhena yathāvuttena paccayena
tika-s0402t:1241_2: appena sulabhena santoso, idaṃ imassa bhikkhuno sīlasaṃvarādīsu aññataraṃ ekaṃ sāmaññaṅgaṃ
tika-s0402t:1241_3: samaṇabhāvakāraṇanti ahaṃ vadāmi. Santuṭṭhassa hi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1241_4: hoti, samathavipassanā ca bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. Atha vā sāmaññaṃ nāma ariyamaggo,
tika-s0402t:1241_5: tassa saṅkhepato dve aṅgā bāhiraṃ ajjhattikanti. Tattha bāhiraṃ sappurisūpanissayo
tika-s0402t:1241_6: saddhammassavanañca. Ajjhattikaṃ pana yonisomanasikāro dhammānudhammappaṭipatti ca.
tika-s0402t:1241_7: Tesu yasmā yathārahaṃ dhammānudhammappaṭipattibhūtā tassa mūlabhūtā cete dhammā,
tika-s0402t:1241_8: yadidaṃ appicchatā santuṭṭhitā pavivittatā asaṃsaṭṭhatā āraddhavīriyatāti evamādayo,
tika-s0402t:1242_0: Senāsanamārabbhāti vihārādiṃ mañcapīṭhādiñca senāsanaṃ nissāya. Cīvaraṃ pānabhojananti
tika-s0402t:1242_2: sambandho. Vighātoti vighātabhāvo, cittassa dukkhaṃ na hotīti yojanā. Ayañhettha
tika-s0402t:1242_3: saṅkhepattho – “amukasmiṃ nāma āvāse paccayā sulabhā”ti labhitabbaṭṭhānagamanena
tika-s0402t:1242_4: vā “mayhaṃ pāpuṇāti, na tuyha”nti vivādāpajjanena vā navakammakaraṇādivasena vā senāsanādīni
tika-s0402t:1242_5: pariyesantānaṃ asantuṭṭhānaṃ icchitālābhādinā yo vighāto cittassa hoti, so tattha
tika-s0402t:1242_6: santuṭṭhassa na hoti. Disā nappaṭihaññatīti santuṭṭhiyā cātuddisabhāvena disā na
tika-s0402t:1242_7: paṭihanati. Vuttañhetaṃ “cātuddiso appaṭigho ca hoti, santussamāno itarītarenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1243_1: vā anucchavikā appicchatādayo. Tuṭṭhacittassa bhikkhunoti tuṭṭhacittena bhikkhunā.
tika-s0402t:1243_2: Adhiggahitā hontīti paṭipakkhadhamme abhibhavitvā gahitā honti. Antogatāti abbhantaragatā.
tika-s0402t:1246: 28. Aṭṭhame vaṃsa-saddo “piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdatī”tiādīsu dvinnaṃ gopānasīnaṃ sandhānaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbadaṇḍake āgato.
tika-s0402t:1251_0: Ādīsu kaṭṭhake. “Bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddo vaṃsatālasaddo”tiādīsu tūriyavisese, veṇūtipi
tika-s0402t:1251_1: vuccati. “Bhinnena piṭṭhivaṃsena mato hatthī”tiādīsu hatthiādīnaṃ piṭṭhivemajjhe
tika-s0402t:1251_4: pabandhe daṭṭhabbo. Tassa pana vaṃsassa kulanvayaṃ guṇanvayañca nidassanavasena dassetuṃ
tika-s0402t:1251_5: “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha khattiyavaṃsoti khattiyakulavaṃso. Esa nayo sesapadesupi.
tika-s0402t:1251_6: Samaṇavaṃso pana samaṇatanti samaṇapaveṇī. Mūlagandhādīnanti ādi-saddena yathā sāragandhādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1251_7: saṅgaho, evamettha gorasādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, dutiyena pana ādi-sadena kāsikavatthasappimaṇḍādīnaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1252_0: Ariya-saddo amilakkhesupi manussesu pavattati, yesaṃ nivasanaṭṭhānaṃ ariyaṃ āyatananti
tika-s0402t:1252_1: vuccati. Yathāha “yāvatā, ānanda, ariyaṃ āyatana”nti. Lokiyasādhujanesupi “ye hi
tika-s0402t:1252_2: vo ariyā parisuddhakāyasamācārā, tesaṃ ahaṃ aññataro”tiādīsu. Idha pana ye “ārakā
tika-s0402t:1252_3: kilesehī”tiādinā laddhanibbacanā paṭividdhaariyasaccā, te eva adhippetāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0402t:1252_4: “ke pana te ariyā”ti pucchaṃ katvā “ariyā vuccantī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ye mahāpaṇidhānakappato
tika-s0402t:1252_5: paṭṭhāya yāvāyaṃ kappo, etthantare uppannā sammāsambuddhā. Te tāva sarūpato dassetvā
tika-s0402t:1252_6: tadaññepi sammāsambuddhe paccekabuddhe buddhasāvake ca saṅgahetvā anavasesato ariye
tika-s0402t:1252_7: dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yāva sāsanaṃ antaradhāyati, tāva satthā dharati
tika-s0402t:1252_8: eva nāmāti imameva bhagavantaṃ. Ye cetarahi buddhasāvakā, te ca sandhāya paccuppannaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1252_9: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle te te paccuppannāti ce, atītānāgataggahaṇaṃ na kattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-s0402t:1253_0: Idāni yathā bhagavā “dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1253_1: pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1253_2: pakāsessāmi, yadidaṃ cha chakkānī”ti chachakkadesanāya aṭṭhahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
tika-s0402t:1253_3: Evaṃ mahāariyavaṃsadesanāya ariyānaṃ vaṃsaṃ “cattārome, bhikkhave, ariyavaṃsā aggaññā
tika-s0402t:1253_4: rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā, asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṃkīyanti na saṃkīyissanti,
tika-s0402t:1253_5: appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti yehi navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, tāni
tika-s0402t:1253_6: tāva ānetvā thomanāvaseneva vaṇṇento “te kho panete”tiādimāha. Aggāti jānitabbā sabbavaṃsehi
tika-s0402t:1254_0: Rattaññā cirarattāti jānitabbā rattaññūhi buddhādīhi tehi ca tathā anuṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0402t:1254_1: Vaṃsāti jānitabbāti buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti jānitabbā. Porāṇāti purātanā. Na
tika-s0402t:1254_2: adhunappattikāti na adhunātanā. Avikiṇṇāti na khittā na chaḍḍitā. Tenāha “anapanītā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1254_3: Na apanītapubbāti na chaḍḍitapubbā, tissannampi sikkhānaṃ paripūraṇūpāyabhāvato na
tika-s0402t:1254_4: pariccattapubbā. Tato eva idānipi na apanīyanti, anāgatepi na apanīyissantiyeva.
tika-s0402t:1254_5: Dhammasabhāvassa vijānanena viññū. Samitapāpā samaṇā ceva bāhitapāpā brāhmaṇā ca.
tika-s0402t:1254_6: Tehi appaṭikuṭṭhā appaṭikkhittā. Ye hi na paṭikkositabbā, te aninditabbā. Agarahitabbā
tika-s0402t:1255_0: Santuṭṭhoti ettha yathādhippetasantosameva dassentena paccayasantosavasena santuṭṭhoti
tika-s0402t:1255_1: vuttaṃ, jhānavipassanādivasenapi idha bhikkhuno santuṭṭhatā hotīti. Itarītarenāti
tika-s0402t:1255_2: itarena itarena. Itarasaddo aniyamavacano dvikkhattuṃ vuccamāno yaṃ-kiñcisaddehi
tika-s0402t:1255_3: samānattho hotīti vuttaṃ “yena kenacī”ti. Svāyaṃ aniyamavācitāya eva yathā thūlādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1255_4: aññataravacano, evaṃ yathāladdhādīnampi aññataravacanoti. Tattha dutiyapakkhasseva
tika-s0402t:1255_5: idha icchitabhāvaṃ dassento “atha kho”tiādimāha. Nanu ca yathāladdhādayopi thūlādayo
tika-s0402t:1255_6: eva? Saccametaṃ, tathāpi atthi viseso. Yo hi yathāladdhesu thūlādīsu santoso, so
tika-s0402t:1255_7: yathālābhasantosova, na itaro. Na hi so paccayamattasannissayo icchito, atha kho
tika-s0402t:1255_8: attano kāyabalasāruppabhāvasannissayopi. Thūladukādayo tayopi cīvare labbhanti, majjhimo
tika-s0402t:1255_9: catupaccayasādhāraṇo, pacchimo pana cīvare senāsane ca labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ime
tika-s0402t:1255_10: tayo santoseti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikanayena vuttaṃ. Ye hi parato gilānapaccayaṃ piṇḍapāte
tika-s0402t:1255_11: eva pakkhipitvā cīvare vīsati, piṇḍapāte pannarasa, senāsane pannarasāti samapaññāsa
tika-s0402t:1255_12: santosā vuccanti, te sabbepi yathārahaṃ imesu eva tīsu santosesu saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchantīti.
tika-s0402t:1256_0: Cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti “idaṃ nāma cīvaraṃ kappiya”nti jātito cīvaraṃ jānitabbaṃ. Cīvarakhettanti
tika-s0402t:1256_2: cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti attho. Cīvarasantosoti cīvare labbhamāno sabbo santoso jānitabbo.
tika-s0402t:1256_3: Cīvarappaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni jānitabbāni, yāni gopento cīvarasantosena sammadeva
tika-s0402t:1256_4: santuṭṭho hotīti. Khomakappāsikakoseyyakambalasāṇabhaṅgāni khomādīni. Tattha khomaṃ
tika-s0402t:1256_5: nāma khomasuttehi vāyitaṃ khomapaṭṭacīvaraṃ. Tathā sesānipi. Sāṇanti sāṇavākasuttehi
tika-s0402t:1256_6: katacīvaraṃ. Bhaṅganti pana khomasuttādīni sabbāni, ekaccāni vā missetvā katacīvaraṃ.
tika-s0402t:1256_7: Bhaṅgampi vākamayamevāti keci. Chāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Yadi evaṃ ito aññā vatthajāti
tika-s0402t:1256_8: natthīti? No natthi. Sā pana etesaṃ anulomāti dassetuṃ “dukūlādīnī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1256_9: Ādi-saddena pattuṇṇaṃ, somārapaṭṭaṃ, cīnapaṭṭaṃ, iddhijaṃ, devadinnanti tesaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0402t:1256_10: Tattha dukūlaṃ sāṇassa anulomaṃ vākamayattā. Pattuṇṇadese sañjātavatthaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1256_11: “Koseyyaviseso”ti hi abhidhānakose vuttaṃ. Somāradese cīnadese ca jātavatthāni somāracīnapaṭṭāni.
tika-s0402t:1256_12: Pattuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā. Iddhijaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1256_13: puññiddhiyā nibbattacīvaraṃ, taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ eva anulomaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1256_14: Devatāhi dinnacīvaraṃ devadinnaṃ, taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya
tika-s0402t:1256_15: anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ, tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1257_0: Imānīti antogadhāvadhāraṇavacanaṃ, imāni evāti attho. Buddhādīnaṃ paribhogayoggatāya
tika-s0402t:1257_1: kappiyacīvarāni. Idāni avadhāraṇena nivattitāni ekadesena dassetuṃ “kusacīra”ntiādi
tika-s0402t:1257_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha kusatiṇehi aññehi vā tādisehi tiṇehi katacīvaraṃ kusacīraṃ. Akkavākādīhi
tika-s0402t:1257_3: vākehi katacīvaraṃ vākacīraṃ. Catukkoṇehi tikoṇehi vā phalakehi katacīvaraṃ phalakacīraṃ.
tika-s0402t:1257_4: Manussānaṃ kesehi katakambalaṃ kesakambalaṃ. Cāmarivālaassavālādīhi kataṃ vālakambalaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1257_5: Makacitantūhi vāyito potthako. Cammanti migacammādi yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ. Ulūkapakkhehi
tika-s0402t:1257_6: ganthitvā katacīvaraṃ ulūkapakkhaṃ. Bhujapattatacādimayaṃ rukkhadussaṃ. Tirīṭakanti
tika-s0402t:1257_7: attho. Sukhumatarāhi latāhi latāvākehi vā vāyitaṃ latādussaṃ. Erakavākehi kataṃ erakadussaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1257_8: Tathā kadalidussaṃ. Sukhumehi veḷuvilīvehi kataṃ veḷudussaṃ. Ādi-saddena vakkalādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1258_0: Aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ vasenāti “sīmāya deti, katikāya detī”tiādinā āgatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-s0402t:1258_2: “aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā”tiādinā mātikā ṭhapitā. Mātikāti hi mātaro cīvaruppattijanikāti.
tika-s0402t:1259_0: Sosānikanti susāne patitaṃ. Pāpaṇikanti āpaṇadvāre patitaṃ. Rathiyanti puññatthikehi
tika-s0402t:1259_1: vātapānantarena rathikāya chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ. Saṅkārakūṭakanti saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1259_2: Sinānanti nahānacoḷakaṃ, yaṃ bhūtavejjehi sasīsaṃ nahāyitvā kālakaṇṇicoḷanti chaḍḍetvā
tika-s0402t:1259_3: gacchanti. Titthanti titthacoḷaṃ, sinānatitthe chaḍḍitapilotikā. Aggidaḍḍhanti agginā
tika-s0402t:1259_4: daḍḍhappadesaṃ. Tañhi manussā chaḍḍenti. Gokhāyitādīni pākaṭāneva. Tānipi hi manussā
tika-s0402t:1259_5: chaḍḍenti. Dhajaṃ ussāpetvāti nāvaṃ ārohantehi vā yuddhaṃ pavisantehi vā dhajayaṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0402t:1259_6: ussāpetvā, tattha baddhaṃ vātena ānītaṃ tehi chaḍḍitanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:1260_1: ekamāsamattaṃ vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati, na tato paranti adhippāyo. Sabbassapi hi taṇhāniggahatthā
tika-s0402t:1260_2: sāsane paṭipattīti. Paṃsukūliko addhamāseneva karoti aparappaṭibaddhattā paṭilābhassa,
tika-s0402t:1260_3: itarassa pana parappaṭibaddhattā māsamattaṃ anuññātaṃ. Idaṃ māsaḍḍhamāsamattaṃ…pe…
tika-s0402t:1260_4: vitakkasantoso vitakkentassa parimitakālikattā. Mahātheraṃ tattha attano sahāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1260_5: icchantopi garugāravena “gāmadvāraṃ, bhante, gamissāmi”iccevāha. Theropi tassa ajjhāsayaṃ
