tika-s0402t:1260_6: ñatvā “ahampāvuso, gamissāmī”ti āha. “Imassa bhikkhuno vitakkassa avasaro mā hotū”ti
tika-s0402t:1260_7: pañhaṃ pucchamāno gāmaṃ pāvisi. Uccārapalibuddhoti uccārena pīḷito. Tadā bhagavato
tika-s0402t:1260_9: kilesānaṃ vikkhambhitattā tasmiṃyeva…pe… tīṇi phalāni patto.
tika-s0402t:1261_0: Kattha labhissāmīti cintanāpi lābhāsāpubbikāti tathā “acintetvā”ti vuttaṃ. “Sundaraṃ
tika-s0402t:1261_1: labhissāmi, manāpaṃ labhissāmī”tievamādicintanāya kā nāma kathā, kathaṃ pana gantabbanti
tika-s0402t:1261_2: āha “kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gamana”nti. Tena cīvaraṃ paṭicca kiñcipi na cintetabbamevāti
tika-s0402t:1261_3: dasseti. Apesalo appatirūpāyapi pariyesanāya paccayo bhaveyyāti “pesalaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-s0402t:1261_4: gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Āhariyamānanti susānādīsu patitaṃ vatthaṃ “ime bhikkhū paṃsukūlapariyesanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1261_5: carantī”ti ñatvā kenaci purisena tato ānīyamānaṃ. Evaṃ laddhaṃ gaṇhantassapīti evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1261_6: paṭilābhasantosaṃ akopetvā laddhaṃ gaṇhantassapi. Attano pahonakamattenevāti yathāladdhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1261_7: paṃsukūlānaṃ ekapaṭṭadupaṭṭānaṃ atthāya attano pahonakappamāṇeneva. Avadhāraṇena
tika-s0402t:1261_8: upari paccāsaṃ nivatteti. Gāme bhikkhāya āhiṇḍantena sapadānacārinā viya dvārappaṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0402t:1262_0: Yāpetunti attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ. Dhovanupagenāti dhovanayoggena. Paṇṇānīti ambajambādipaṇṇāni.
tika-s0402t:1262_1: Akopetvāti santosaṃ akopetvā. Pahonakanīhārenevāti antaravāsakādīsu yaṃ kātukāmo,
tika-s0402t:1262_2: tassa pahonakaniyāmeneva yathāladdhaṃ thūlasukhumādiṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ. Timaṇḍalappaṭicchādanamattassevāti
tika-s0402t:1262_3: nivāsanaṃ ce nābhimaṇḍalaṃ, jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ, itarañce galavāṭamaṇḍalaṃ, jāṇumaṇḍalanti
tika-s0402t:1262_4: timaṇḍalappaṭicchādanamattasseva karaṇaṃ. Taṃ pana atthato tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ heṭṭhimantena
tika-s0402t:1263: Kusibandhanakāleti maṇḍalāni yojetvā sibbanakāle. Satta vāreti satta sibbanavāre. Kappabinduapadesena kassaci vikārassa akaraṇaṃ kappasantoso.
tika-s0402t:1264_0: Sītappaṭighātanādi atthāpattito sijjhatīti mukhyameva cīvaraparibhoge payojanaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0402t:1264_2: Vaṭṭati, na tāvatā santoso kuppati sambhārānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ alābhato. Sāraṇīyadhamme
tika-s0402t:1264_3: ṭhatvāti sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇabhogibhāve ṭhatvā. Itītiādinā paṭhamasseva
tika-s0402t:1264_5: ime dhammā aññamaññassa samuṭṭhāpakā upatthambhakā cā”ti dīpeti. Esa nayo ito paresu.
tika-s0402t:1265_0: Santuṭṭho hoti vaṇṇavādīti ettha catukkoṭikaṃ sambhavati. Tattha catutthoyeva pakkho
tika-s0402t:1265_1: vaṇṇitathomitoti tathā desanā katā. Eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti
tika-s0402t:1265_2: seyyathāpi thero nāḷako. Eko na santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi
tika-s0402t:1265_3: upanando sakyaputto. Eko neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi
tika-s0402t:1265_4: thero lāḷudāyi. Eko santuṭṭho ceva hoti, santosassa ca vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi thero mahākassapo.
tika-s0402t:1266_0: Anesananti ayuttaṃ esanaṃ. Tenāha “appatirūpa”nti, sāsane ṭhitānaṃ appatirūpaṃ ayoggaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1266_1: Kohaññaṃ karontoti cīvaruppādananimittaṃ paresaṃ kuhanaṃ vimhāpanaṃ karonto. Uttasatīti
tika-s0402t:1266_2: taṇhāsantāsena uparūpari tasati. Paritassatīti parito tassati. Yathā sabbe kāyavacippayogā
tika-s0402t:1266_3: tadatthā eva jāyanti, evaṃ sabbabhāgehi tasati. Gadhitaṃ vuccati giddho, so cettha
tika-s0402t:1266_4: abhijjhālakkhaṇo adhippeto. Gadhitaṃ etassa natthīti agadhitoti āha “vigatalobhagiddho”ti.
tika-s0402t:1266_5: Mucchanti taṇhāvasena muyhanaṃ. Tassa samussayassa adhigataṃ anāpanno anupagato.
tika-s0402t:1266_6: Anotthato anajjhotthato. Apariyonaddhoti taṇhacchadanena acchādito. Ādīnavaṃ passamānoti
tika-s0402t:1266_7: diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca dosaṃ passanto. Gadhitaparibhogato nissarati etenāti
tika-s0402t:1266_8: nissaraṇaṃ, idamaṭṭhikatā. Taṃ pajānātīti nissaraṇapañño. Tenāha “yāvadeva…pe… jānanto”ti.
tika-s0402t:1267_0: Nevattānukkaṃsetīti attānaṃ neva ukkaṃseti na ukkhipati na ukkaṭṭhato dahati. Ahantiādi
tika-s0402t:1267_1: ukkaṃsanākāradassanaṃ. Na vambheti na hīḷeti na nihīnato dahati. Tasmiṃ cīvarasantoseti
tika-s0402t:1267_2: tasmiṃ yathāvutte vīsatividhe cīvarasantose. Kāmañcettha vuttappakārasantosaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0402t:1267_3: cīvarahetu anesanāpajjanādipi gahitameva tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato, asati ca abhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1267_4: Vaṇṇavāditāattukkaṃsanaparavambhanāni pana gahitāni na hontīti “vaṇṇavādādīsu vā”ti
tika-s0402t:1267_5: vikappo vutto. Ettha ca dakkhotiādi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ vasenassa yathāvuttasantosādī
tika-s0402t:1267_6: ijjhanti, taṃdassanaṃ. Tattha dakkhoti iminā tesaṃ samuṭṭhāpanapaññaṃ dasseti. Analasoti
tika-s0402t:1267_7: iminā paggaṇhanavīriyaṃ, sampajānoti iminā pārihāriyapaññaṃ, paṭissatoti iminā tattha
tika-s0402t:1268_0: Piṇḍapāto jānitabboti pabhedato piṇḍapāto jānitabbo. Piṇḍapātakkhettanti piṇḍapātassa
tika-s0402t:1268_2: Idha bhesajjampi piṇḍapātagatikameva. Āharitabbato hi sappiādīnampi gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0402t:1269_0: Piṇḍapātakkhettaṃ piṇḍapātassa uppattiṭṭhānaṃ khettaṃ viya khettaṃ. Uppajjati ettha,
tika-s0402t:1269_1: etenāti ca uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Saṅghato vā hi bhikkhuno piṇḍapāto uppajjati uddissavasena
tika-s0402t:1269_2: vā. Tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbabhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ. Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā
tika-s0402t:1269_3: uddesena dātabbabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ. Nimantetvā dātabbabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ. Salākāya
tika-s0402t:1269_4: dātabbabhattaṃ salākabhattaṃ. Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ dātabbabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1269_5: Uposathe uposathe dātabbabhattaṃ uposathikaṃ. Pāṭipadadivase dātabbabhattaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1269_6: Āgantukānaṃ dātabbabhattaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ. Dhuragehe eva ṭhapetvā dātabbabhattaṃ
tika-s0402t:1269_7: dhurabhattaṃ. Kuṭiṃ uddissa dātabbabhattaṃ kuṭibhattaṃ. Gāmavāsiādīhi vārena dātabbabhattaṃ
tika-s0402t:1269_8: vārabhattaṃ. Vihāraṃ uddissa dātabbabhattaṃ vihārabhattaṃ. Sesāni pākaṭāneva.
tika-s0402t:1270_0: Vitakketi “kattha nu kho ahaṃ ajja piṇḍāya carissāmī”ti. “Sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti
tika-s0402t:1270_1: therena vutte “asukagāme, bhante”ti kāmametaṃ paṭivacanadānaṃ, yena pana cittena
tika-s0402t:1270_2: cintetvā taṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha “ettakaṃ cintetvā”ti. Tato paṭṭhāyāti vitakkamāḷake
tika-s0402t:1270_3: ṭhatvā vitakkitakālato paṭṭhāya. Tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hotīti idaṃ
tika-s0402t:1270_4: tiṇṇampi ariyavaṃsikānaṃ vasena gahetabbaṃ, na ekacārikasseva. Sabbopi hi ariyavaṃsiko
tika-s0402t:1270_5: ekavārameva vitakketuṃ labhati, na tato paraṃ. Paribāhiroti ariyavaṃsikabhāvato bahibhūto.
tika-s0402t:1270_6: Svāyaṃ vitakkasantoso kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena na kuppati visujjhati ca. Ito paresupi
tika-s0402t:1270_7: eseva nayo. Tenevāha “kammaṭṭhānasīsena gantabba”nti. Gahetabbamevāti aṭṭhānappayutto
tika-s0402t:1271_0: Etthāti etasmiṃ piṇḍapātappaṭiggahaṇe. Appanti attano yāpanappamāṇatopi appaṃ gahetabbaṃ
tika-s0402t:1271_1: dāyakassa cittārādhanatthaṃ. Pamāṇenevāti attano pamāṇeneva appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Pamāṇena
tika-s0402t:1271_2: gahetabbanti ettha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭiggahaṇasmiñhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Makkhetīti viddhaṃseti
tika-s0402t:1271_3: apaneti. Vinipāteti vināseti aṭṭhānaviniyogena. Sāsananti satthusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0402t:1271_4: na karoti na paṭipajjati. Sapadānacārinā viya dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ loluppavivajjanasantosoti
tika-s0402t:1272_0: Harāpetvāti adhikaṃ apanetvā. Āhāragedhato nissarati etenāti nissaraṇaṃ. Jighacchāya
tika-s0402t:1272_1: paṭivinodanatthaṃ katā, kāyassa ṭhitiādipayojanaṃ pana atthāpattito āgatamevāti āha
tika-s0402t:1272_2: “jighacchāya…pe… santoso nāmā”ti. Nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbaṃ tadahupīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:1272_3: Itarattha pana sikkhāpadeneva vāritaṃ. Sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhitenāti sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi
tika-s0402t:1273_0: Senāsanenāti sayanena āsanena ca. Yattha yattha hi mañcādike vihārādike ca seti,
tika-s0402t:1273_1: taṃ senaṃ. Yattha yattha pīṭhādike āsati, taṃ āsanaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ ekato katvā “senāsana”nti
tika-s0402t:1273_2: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “mañco”tiādi. Tattha mañco masārakādi. Tathā pīṭhaṃ. Mañcabhisi, pīṭhabhisīti
tika-s0402t:1273_3: duvidho bhisi. Vihāro pākāraparicchinno sakalo āvāso, “dīghamukhapāsādo”ti keci.
tika-s0402t:1273_5: “āyatacaturassapāsādo”ti keci. Hammiyanti muṇḍacchadanapāsādo. Guhāti kevalā pabbataguhā.
tika-s0402t:1273_6: Leṇaṃ dvārabandhaṃ. Aṭṭo bahalabhittikagehaṃ, yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi
tika-s0402t:1273_7: eva chadanaṃ hoti, “aṭṭalākārena karīyatī”tipi vadanti. Māḷo ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇo
tika-s0402t:1274_0: Piṇḍapāte vuttanayenevāti “sādako bhikkhu ‘ahaṃ kattha vasissāmī’ti vitakketī”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:1274_1: yathārahaṃ piṇḍapāte vuttanayeneva veditabbā. “Tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto
tika-s0402t:1274_2: hoti paribāhiro, senāsanaṃ kuhiṃ labhissāmīti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gantabba”nti
tika-s0402t:1275_0: Kasmā panettha paccayasantosaṃ dassentena bhagavatā gilānapaccayasantoso na gahitoti?
tika-s0402t:1275_1: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti dassento “gilānapaccayo pana piṇḍapāte eva paviṭṭho”ti
tika-s0402t:1275_2: āha, āharitabbatāsāmaññenāti adhippāyo. Yadi evaṃ tatthāpi piṇḍapāte viya vitakkasantosādayopi
tika-s0402t:1275_3: pannarasa santosā icchitabbāti? Noti dassento āha “tatthā”tiādi. Nanu cettha dvādaseva
tika-s0402t:1275_4: dhutaṅgāni viniyogaṃ gatāni, ekaṃ pana nesajjikaṅgaṃ na katthaci viniyuttanti āha
tika-s0402t:1275_5: “nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsaṃ bhajatī”ti. Ayañca attho aṭṭhakathāruḷho evāti
tika-s0402t:1276_0: Pathaviṃ pattharamāno viyātiādi ariyavaṃsadesanāya sudukkarabhāvadassanaṃ mahāvisayattā
tika-s0402t:1276_1: tassā desanāya. Yasmā nayasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ hoti, ariyamaggādhigamāya vitthārato
tika-s0402t:1276_2: pavattiyamānā desanā cittuppādakaṇḍe ayañca bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsakathā ariyamaggādhigamāya
tika-s0402t:1276_3: vitthārato pavattiyamānā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ…pe… desanaṃ ārabhī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1277_0: Paṭipakkhavidhamanato abhimukhabhāvena ramaṇaṃ āramaṇaṃ ārāmoti āha “abhiratīti attho”ti.
tika-s0402t:1277_1: Byadhikaraṇānampi padānaṃ vasena bhavati bāhiratthasamāso yathā “urasilomo kaṇṭhekāḷo”ti
tika-s0402t:1277_2: āha “bhāvanāya ārāmo assāti bhāvanārāmo”ti. Abhiramitabbaṭṭhena vā ārāmo, bhāvanā
tika-s0402t:1277_3: ārāmo assāti bhāvanārāmoti evampettha samāsayojanā veditabbā. Bhāvento ramatīti etena
tika-s0402t:1278_0: Kāmaṃ “nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsaṃ bhajatī”ti vuttaṃ bhāvanānuyogassa anucchavikattā,
tika-s0402t:1278_1: nesajjikaṅgavasena pana nesajjikassa bhikkhuno ekaccāhi āpattīhi anāpattibhāvoti
tika-s0402t:1278_2: tampi saṅgaṇhanto “terasannaṃ dhutaṅgāna”nti vatvā vinayaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabbanti
tika-s0402t:1278_3: icchitattā sallekhassa apariccajanavasena paṭipatti nāma vinaye ṭhitassevāti āha
tika-s0402t:1278_4: “terasannaṃ…pe… kathitaṃ hotī”ti. Kāmaṃ suttābhidhammapiṭakesupi tattha tattha sīlakathā
tika-s0402t:1278_5: āhaṭāyeva, yehi pana guṇehi sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti, tesu kathitesu yathā sīlakathābāhullaṃ
tika-s0402t:1278_6: vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti, evaṃ bhāvanākathābāhullaṃ suttapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakañca
tika-s0402t:1278_7: catutthena ariyavaṃsena kathitena kathitameva hotīti vuttaṃ “bhāvanārāmena avasesaṃ
tika-s0402t:1278_8: piṭakadvayaṃ kathita”nti. “So nekkhammaṃ bhāvento ramatī”ti nekkhammapadaṃ ādiṃ katvā
tika-s0402t:1278_9: tattha desanāya pavattattā sabbesampi vā samathavipassanāmaggadhammānaṃ yathāsakaṃ
tika-s0402t:1278_10: paṭipakkhato nikkhamanena nekkhammasaññitānaṃ tattha āgatattā so pāṭho nekkhammapāḷīti
tika-s0402t:1278_11: vuccatīti āha “nekkhamapāḷiyā kathetabbo”ti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbepi kusalā
tika-s0402t:1278_13: dasuttarasuttante āgatanayenāti vā attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:1279_0: Soti jāgariyaṃ anuyutto bhikkhu. Nekkhammanti kāmehi nikkhantabhāvato nekkhammasaññitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1279_1: paṭhamajjhānūpacāraṃ, so “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā āgato. Paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgabhāvanā
tika-s0402t:1279_2: hi idhādhippetā, tasmā “abyāpāda”ntiādīsupi evameva attho veditabbo. Saupāyānañhi
tika-s0402t:1279_3: aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānañca vasenettha
tika-s0402t:1279_4: desanā pavattāti. Tattha abyāpādanti mettā. Ālokasaññanti vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena
tika-s0402t:1279_7: “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttassa paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya bhāvanārāmataṃ
tika-s0402t:1279_8: pahānārāmatañca dassetvā idāni saha upāyena aṭṭhasamāpattīhi aṭṭhārasahi ca mahāvipassanāhi
tika-s0402t:1279_10: mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāya ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti. Tathā jhānasamāpattīsu
tika-s0402t:1279_11: anabhiratinimittena pāmojjena tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya jhānādīnaṃ samadhigamoti
tika-s0402t:1279_13: avijjāya heṭṭhānīvaraṇesu saṅgahadassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi paṭhamajjhānūpacāreyeva
tika-s0402t:1279_14: dukkhaṃ, catutthajjhānūpacāreyeva sukhaṃ pahīyati, atisayappahānaṃ pana sandhāyāha
tika-s0402t:1280_0: Aniccassa, aniccanti ca anupassanā aniccānupassanā, tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
tika-s0402t:1280_1: gahetvā pavattāya anupassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Niccasaññanti saṅkhatadhammesu niccā sassatāti
tika-s0402t:1280_2: pavattaṃ micchāsaññaṃ. Saññāsīsena diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-s0402t:1280_3: ito paresupi. Nibbidānupassananti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattaṃ anupassanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1280_4: Nandinti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Virāgānupassananti virajjanākārena pavattaṃ anupassanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1280_5: Nirodhānupassananti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanaṃ. “Te saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva,
tika-s0402t:1280_6: āyatiṃ samudayavasena na uppajjantī”ti evaṃ vā anupassanā nirodhānupassanā. Tenevāha
tika-s0402t:1280_7: “nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti no samudetī”ti. Muccitukāmatā hi ayaṃ balappattāti.
tika-s0402t:1280_8: Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā. Paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā
tika-s0402t:1280_9: hi ayaṃ. Ādānanti niccādivasena gahaṇaṃ. Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ekattaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1280_10: ghanasaññā. Āyūhanaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Avatthāvisesāpatti vipariṇāmo. Dhuvasaññanti thirabhāvaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1281_0: Nimittanti samūhaghanavasena, sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ saviggahataṃ.
tika-s0402t:1281_1: Paṇidhinti rāgādipaṇidhiṃ. Sā panatthato taṇhāvasena saṅkhāresu ninnatā. Abhinivesanti
tika-s0402t:1281_3: asāre sāranti gahaṇavipallāsaṃ. “Issarakuttādivasena loko samuppanno”ti abhiniveso
tika-s0402t:1281_4: sammohābhiniveso. Keci pana “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānantiādinā pavattasaṃsayāpatti
tika-s0402t:1281_6: ālayasammuditā”ti ca vacanato ālayo taṇhā, sāyeva cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu ca abhinivesavasena
tika-s0402t:1281_7: pavattiyā ālayābhinivesoti keci. Evaṃ ṭhitā te saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantīti pavattaṃ
tika-s0402t:1281_8: ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanā. Vaṭṭato vigatattā vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ, tattha ārammaṇasaṅkhātena
tika-s0402t:1281_9: anupassanena pavattiyā vivaṭṭānupassanā gotrabhu. Saṃyogābhinivesanti saṃyujjanavasena
tika-s0402t:1281_10: saṅkhāresu nivesanaṃ. Diṭṭhekaṭṭheti diṭṭhiyā sahajātekaṭṭhe pahānekaṭṭhe ca. Oḷāriketi
tika-s0402t:1281_11: uparimaggavajjhe kilese apekkhitvā vuttaṃ, aññathā dassanappahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehipi
tika-s0402t:1281_12: oḷārikāti. Aṇusahagateti aṇubhūte. Idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe apekkhitvā vuttaṃ. Sabbakileseti
tika-s0402t:1281_13: avasiṭṭhasabbakilese. Na hi paṭhamādimaggehipi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyantīti.
tika-s0402t:1282_0: Evanti paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyā yojanaṃ nigametvā dīghanikāyetiādinā dasuttarapariyāyena
tika-s0402t:1282_1: yojanaṃ dasseti. Ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramatīti ca
tika-s0402t:1282_2: nayidaṃ dasuttarasutte āgataniyāmena vuttaṃ, tattha pana “eko dhammo bhāvetabbo,
tika-s0402t:1282_3: eko dhammo pahātabbo”ti desanā āgatā. Evaṃ santepi yasmā atthato bhedo natthi, tasmā
tika-s0402t:1282_4: paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyaṃ āgatanīhāreneva “ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati,
tika-s0402t:1282_5: ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramatī”ti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesavāresupi.
tika-s0402t:1283_0: Evantiādinā dasuttarapariyāyena yojanaṃ nigametvā idāni satipaṭṭhānasuttantapariyāyena
tika-s0402t:1283_2: saṃkhipitvā yojanā katā, ekavīsatiyā pana ṭhānānaṃ vasenapi yojanā kātabbā. Idāni
tika-s0402t:1283_4: Aniccatotiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1284_0: Ukkaṇṭhitanti adhikusalesu dhammesu pantasenāsanesu ca ukkaṇṭhādiñca, ananuyogoti
tika-s0402t:1284_1: attho. Ariyavaṃsapūrako dhīro sīlavā bhikkhu ariyavaṃsaparipūraṇassa bhedaṃ anicchanto
tika-s0402t:1284_2: samāhito vipassako ca paccayaghātena aratiyā ratiyā ca sahitā abhibhavitā hotīti
tika-s0402t:1287_0: 29. Navame jhānādibhedo dhammo pajjati etenāti dhammapadaṃ, anabhijjhāva dhammapadaṃ
tika-s0402t:1287_2: Evaṃ sesesupi. Atthato pana anabhijjhādhammapadaṃ nāma alobho vā alobhasīsena adhigatajjhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni
tika-s0402t:1287_3: vā. Abyāpādo dhammapadaṃ nāma mettā vā mettāsīsena adhigatajjhānādīni vā. Sammāsatidhammapadaṃ
tika-s0402t:1287_4: nāma sūpaṭṭhitassati vā satisīsena adhigatajjhānādīni vā. Sammāsamādhidhammapadaṃ
tika-s0402t:1287_6: vā. Dasaasubhavasena vā adhigatajjhānādīni anabhijjā dhammapadaṃ. Catubrahmavihāravasena
tika-s0402t:1287_7: adhigatāni abyāpādo dhammapadaṃ. Dasānussati āhārepaṭikūlasaññāvasena adhigatāni
tika-s0402t:1287_9: Anabhijjhālūti anabhijjhāyanasīlo. Abhipubbo jhesaddo abhijjhāyanaṭṭho. Tenevāha
tika-s0402t:1287_11: pakatibhāvaṃ avijahantena. Sāvajjadhammasamuppattiyā hi cittassa anavajjabhāvo jahito hotīti.
tika-s0402t:1290_0: 30. Dasame abhiññātāti ediso ca ediso cāti abhilakkhaṇavasena ñātā. Tenāha “ñātā
tika-s0402t:1290_1: pākaṭā”ti. Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti ettha paṭisallānanti tehi tehi saddhivihārikaantevāsikaupāsakādisattehi
tika-s0402t:1290_2: ceva rūpārammaṇādisaṅkhārehi ca paṭinivattitvā apasakkitvā sallīnaṃ nilīyanaṃ, ekībhāvo
tika-s0402t:1290_3: pavivekoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo tato vuṭṭhito, so paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito nāma hoti. Bhagavā
tika-s0402t:1290_4: pana yasmā paṭisallānā uttamato phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāsi, tasmā vuttaṃ “paṭisallānā
tika-s0402t:1290_5: vuṭṭhitoti phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito”ti. Vatthukāmesūti rūpādīsu kilesakāmassa vatthubhūtesu
tika-s0402t:1290_6: kāmesu. Bahalarāganti thiramūladummocanīyatāhi ajjhosānena bahalabhūtaṃ kilesakāmaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1290_7: Sakāraṇāti yehi kāraṇehi paresaṃ vāde dosaṃ dassenti, tehi kāraṇehi sakāraṇā. Na
tika-s0402t:1290_8: hi lakkhaṇayuttena hetunā vinā paravādesu dosaṃ dassetuṃ sakkā.
tika-s0402t:1291_0: Evamādīti ettha ādisaddena “natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā”ti evamādiṃ
tika-s0402t:1291_1: saṅgaṇhāti, tasmā evamādivādino evaṃ hetuppaṭikkhepavādinoti attho. Ettha ca natthikadiṭṭhi
tika-s0402t:1291_2: vipākaṃ paṭibāhati, akiriyadiṭṭhi kammaṃ paṭibāhati, ahetukadiṭṭhi ubhayaṃ paṭibāhati.
tika-s0402t:1291_3: Tattha kammaṃ paṭibāhantena vipāko paṭibāhito hoti, vipākaṃ paṭibāhantenapi kammaṃ
tika-s0402t:1291_4: paṭibāhitaṃ. Iti sabbepete atthato ubhayapaṭibāhakā ahetuvādā ceva akiriyavādā ca
tika-s0402t:1292_0: Okkantaniyamāti ogāḷhamicchattaniyamā. Sajjhāyatīti taṃ diṭṭhidīpakaṃ ganthaṃ uggahetvā
tika-s0402t:1292_1: paṭhati. Vīmaṃsatīti tassa atthaṃ vicāreti. Tassātiādi vīmaṃsanākāradassanaṃ. Tasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:1292_3: ārammaṇe. Micchāsati santiṭṭhatīti “natthi hetū”tiādivasena anussavūpaladdhe atthe
tika-s0402t:1292_4: tadākāraparivitakkanehi saviggahe viya sarūpato cittassa paccupaṭṭhite cirakālaparicayena
tika-s0402t:1292_6: tatheva āsevantassa bahulīkarontassa micchāvitakkena samānīyamānā micchāvāyāmopatthambhitā
tika-s0402t:1292_7: ataṃsabhāvaṃ taṃsabhāvanti gaṇhantī micchāsatīti laddhanāmā taṃladdhisahagatā taṇhā
tika-s0402t:1292_8: santiṭṭhati. Cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hotīti yathāvuttavitakkādipaccayalābhena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe
tika-s0402t:1292_9: avaṭṭhitatāya anekaggataṃ pahāya cittaṃ ekaggaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti micchāsamādhinā.
tika-s0402t:1292_10: Sopi hi paccayavisesena laddhabhāvanābalo kadāci samādhānapaṭirūpakiccakaro hotiyeva
tika-s0402t:1293_0: Javanāni javantīti anekakkhattuṃ tenākārena pubbabhāgiyesu javanavāresu pavattesu
tika-s0402t:1293_1: sabbapacchime javanavāre satta javanāni javanti. Paṭhamajavane satekiccho hoti, tathā
tika-s0402t:1293_2: dutiyādīsūti dhammasabhāvadassanametaṃ, na pana tasmiṃ khaṇe tesaṃ satekicchabhāvāpādanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1293_3: kenaci sakkā kātuṃ. Tatthāti tesu tīsu micchādassanesu. Koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamatīti
tika-s0402t:1293_4: yassa ekasmiṃyeva abhiniveso āsevanā pavattā, so ekaṃyeva dassanaṃ okkamati. Yassa
tika-s0402t:1293_5: dvīsu tīsupi vā abhiniveso āsevanā pavattā, so dve tīṇi okkamati. Etena yā pubbe
tika-s0402t:1293_6: ubhayapaṭibāhikatāmukhena pavattā atthasiddhā sabbadiṭṭhikā, sā pubbabhāgiyā, micchāniyāmokkantiyā
tika-s0402t:1293_7: pana yathāsakaṃ paccayasamudāgamadiṭṭhito bhinnārammaṇānaṃ viya visesādhigamānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1293_8: ekajjhaṃ anuppattiyā abhikiṇṇā evāti dasseti. Ekasmiṃ okkantepi dvīsu tīsu okkantesupi
tika-s0402t:1293_9: niyatamicchādiṭṭhikova hotīti iminā tissannampi diṭṭhīnaṃ samānaphalataṃ samānabalañca
tika-s0402t:1293_10: dasseti. Tasmā tissopi cetanā ekassa uppannā aññamaññaṃ anubalappadāyikā honti.
tika-s0402t:1294_0: Kiṃ panesa etasmiññeva attabhāve niyato, udāhu aññasmimpīti? Etasmiññeva niyato.
tika-s0402t:1294_1: Akusalañhi nāmetaṃ abalaṃ, na kusalaṃ viya mahābalaṃ. Aññathā sammattaniyāmo viya
tika-s0402t:1294_2: accantiko siyā, āsevanavasena pana bhavantarepi taṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ rocetiyeva. Tenevāha
tika-s0402t:1294_3: “vaṭṭakhāṇuko nāmesa satto”ti. Tasmā “sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggo eva bālo”ti viya vaṭṭakhāṇujotanā,
tika-s0402t:1294_4: yādisehi pana paccayehi ayaṃ taṃ dassanaṃ okkanto puna kadāci micchattaniyāmo tappaṭikkhepapaccaye
tika-s0402t:1294_5: paṭicca tato sīsukkhepanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “yebhuyyenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1295_0: Attano nindābhayenāti “sammā diṭṭhiñca nāma te garahantī”tiādinā attano upari parehi
tika-s0402t:1295_1: vattabbanindābhayena. Ghaṭṭanabhayenāti tathā paresaṃ apasādanabhayena. Sahadhammena
tika-s0402t:1295_2: parena attano upari kātabbaniggaho upārambho, tato parittāso upārambhabhayaṃ. Taṃ
tika-s0402t:1295_3: pana atthato upavādabhayaṃ hotīti āha “upavādabhayenā”ti. Paṭippassaddhivasena abhijjhā
tika-s0402t:1295_4: vinayati etenāti abhijjhāvinayo, arahattaphalaṃ. Tenāha “abhijjhāvinayo vuccati arahatta”nti.
tika-s0402t:1300_0: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame cattāri cakkānīti ettha cakkaṃ nāma dārucakkaṃ, ratanacakkaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1300_1: dhammacakkaṃ, iriyāpathacakkaṃ, sampatticakkanti pañcavidhaṃ. Tattha “yaṃ panidaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1300_2: samma, rathakāracakkaṃ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṃ chārattūnehī”ti idaṃ dārucakkaṃ. “Pitarā
tika-s0402t:1300_3: pavattitaṃ cakkaṃ anuvattetī”ti idaṃ ratanacakkaṃ. “Mayā pavattitaṃ cakka”nti idaṃ
tika-s0402t:1300_5: cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī”ti idaṃ sampatticakkaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1300_6: Idhāpi etadeva adhippetanti āha “cattāri sampatticakkāni vattantī”ti. Anucchavike
tika-s0402t:1300_7: deseti puññakiriyāya sammāpaṭipattiyā anurūpadese. Sevanaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1300_8: Bhajanaṃ bhattivasena payirupāsanaṃ. Attano sammā ṭhapananti attano cittasantānassa
tika-s0402t:1300_9: yoniso ṭhapanaṃ. Saddhādīsu nivesananti āha “sace”tiādi. Idameva cettha pamāṇanti
tika-s0402t:1300_10: idameva pubbekatapuññatāsaṅkhātaṃ sampatticakkaṃ eva etesu sampatticakkesu pamāṇabhūtaṃ
tika-s0402t:1300_11: itaresaṃ kāraṇabhāvato. Tenāha “yena hī”tiādi. So eva ca katapuñño puggalo attānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1303_0: 32. Dutiye tassa dānameva dātabbanti pabbajitassa pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ pattacīvarādi,
tika-s0402t:1303_1: gihino gihiparikkhāraṃ vatthāvudhayānasayanādi dātabbaṃ. Sabbanti sabbaṃ upakāraṃ.
tika-s0402t:1303_2: Makkhetvā nāseti makkhibhāve ṭhatvā. Telena viya makkhetīti satadhotatelena makkheti
tika-s0402t:1303_3: viya. Atthavaḍḍhanakathāti hitāvahakathā. Kathāgahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ, paresaṃ
tika-s0402t:1303_4: hitāvaho kāyappayogopi atthacariyā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vacippayogavaseneva atthacariyā
tika-s0402t:1303_5: vuttā. Samānattatāti sadisabhāvo, samānaṭṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ, taṃ panassa samānaṭṭhapanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1303_6: attasadisatākaraṇamukhena ekasambhogatā. Attano sukhuppattiyaṃ tassa ca dukkhuppattiyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1303_7: tena dukkhena attanā ekasambhogatāti āha “samānasukhadukkhabhāvo”ti. Sā ca samānasukhadukkhatā
tika-s0402t:1304_0: Tattha jātiyā hīno bhogena adhiko dussaṅgaho hoti. Na hi sakkā tena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogo
tika-s0402t:1304_1: kātuṃ jātiyā hīnattā. Tassa tathā akariyamāne ca so kujjhati bhogena adhikattā, tasmā
tika-s0402t:1304_2: so dussaṅgaho. Bhogena hīno jātiyā adhikopi dussaṅgaho hoti. So hi “ahaṃ jātimā”ti
tika-s0402t:1304_3: bhogasampannena saddhi ekaparibhogaṃ icchati, tasmiṃ akariyamāne kujjhati. Ubhohipi
tika-s0402t:1304_4: hīno susaṅgaho hoti. Na hi so itarena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogaṃ icchati jātiyā hīnabhāvato,
tika-s0402t:1304_5: na akariyamāno kujjhati bhogena hīnabhāvato. Ubhohi sadisopi susaṅgahoyeva. Sadisabhāveneva
tika-s0402t:1304_6: itarena saha ekaparibhogassa paccāsīsāya, akaraṇe ca tassa kujjhanassa abhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1304_7: Bhikkhu dussīlo dussaṅgaho hoti. Na hi sakkā tena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogaṃ kātuṃ, akariyamāne
tika-s0402t:1304_8: ca kujjhati. Sīlavā pana susaṅgaho hoti. Sīlavā hi adīyamānepi kismiñci āmise akariyamānepi
tika-s0402t:1304_9: saṅgahe na kujjhati, aññaṃ attanā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ akarontampi na pāpakena cittena
tika-s0402t:1304_10: passati pesalabhāvato. Tato eva paribhogopi anena saddhiṃ sukaro hoti, tasmā gihi
tika-s0402t:1304_11: ce, ubhohi sadiso. Pabbajito ce, sīlavā puggalo. Evaṃ samānattatāya saṅgahetabbo.
tika-s0402t:1304_12: Tenevāha “so sace gahaṭṭhassa jātiyā pabbajitassa sīlena sadiso hoti, tassāyaṃ samānattatā
tika-s0402t:1307_0: 33. Tatiye sīhoti parissayasahanato paṭipakkhahananato ca “sīho”ti laddhanāmo migādhipati.
tika-s0402t:1307_1: Cattāroti samānepi sīhajātibhāve vaṇṇavisesādisiddhena visesena cattāro sīhā. Te
tika-s0402t:1307_2: idāni nāmato vaṇṇato āhārato dassetvā idhādhippetasīhaṃ nānappakārato vibhāvetuṃ
tika-s0402t:1307_3: “tiṇasīho”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tiṇabhakkho sīho tiṇasīho purimapade uttarapadalopena yathā
tika-s0402t:1307_5: “kāḷagāvisadiso, paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇagāvisadiso”ti ca. Rattakambalassa viya kesaro kesarakalomo
tika-s0402t:1307_6: etassa atthīti kesarī. Lākhāparikammakatehi viya pādapariyantehīti ca yojanā.
tika-s0402t:1308: Kammānubhāvasiddhaadhipaccamahesakkhatāhi sabbamigagaṇassa rājā. Suvaṇṇaguhato vātiādi “sīhassa vihāro kiriyā evaṃ hotī”ti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1309_0: Samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvāti sabbabhāgehi samameva bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā. Ākaḍḍhitvāti
tika-s0402t:1309_1: purato ākaḍḍhitvā. Abhiharitvāti abhimukhaṃ haritvā. Saṅghātanti vināsaṃ. Vīsatiyaṭṭhikaṃ ṭhānaṃ usabhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1310_0: Samasīhoti samajātiko samappabhāvo ca sīho. Samānosmīti desanāmattaṃ, samappabhāvatāya
tika-s0402t:1310_1: eva na bhāyati. Sakkāyadiṭṭhibalavatāyāti “ke aññe amhehi uttaritarā, atha kho mayameva
tika-s0402t:1310_2: mahābalā”ti evaṃ balātimānanimittāya ahaṃkārahetubhūtāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavabhāvena.
tika-s0402t:1310_3: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattāti nirahaṃkārattā attasinehassa suṭṭhu samugghātattā na bhāyati.
tika-s0402t:1311: Tathā tathāti sīhasadisatādinā tena tena pakārena attānaṃ kathesīti vatvā tamatthaṃ vivaritvā dassetuṃ “sīhoti kho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1312_0: Katamahābhinīhārassa lokanāthassa bodhiyā niyatabhāvappattiyā ekantabhāvī buddhabhāvoti
tika-s0402t:1312_1: katvā “tīsu pāsādesu nivāsakālo, magadharañño paṭiññādānakālo, pāyāsassa paribhuttakālo”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:1312_2: abhisambodhito purimāvatthāpi sīhasadisā katvā dassitā. Bhāvini bhūtūpacāropi hi
tika-s0402t:1312_3: lokavohāro. Vijjābhāvasāmaññato dvivijjaṃ itaravijjampi ekajjhaṃ gahetvā paṭiccasamuppādasammasanato
tika-s0402t:1312_4: taṃ puretarasiddhaṃ viya katvā āha “tisso vijjā sodhetvā”ti. Anulomapaṭilomato pavattañāṇassa
tika-s0402t:1313_0: Tattha viharantassāti ajapālanigrodhamūle viharantassa. Ekādasame divaseti sattasattāhato
tika-s0402t:1313_1: paraṃ ekādasame divase. Acalapallaṅketi isipatane dhammacakkappavattanatthaṃ nisinnapallaṅke.
tika-s0402t:1313_2: Tampi hi kenaci appaṭivattiyaṃ dhammacakkappavattanatthaṃ nisajjāti katvā vajirāsanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1313_3: viya acalapallaṅkaṃ vuccati. Imasmiñca pana padeti “dveme, bhikkhave, antā”tiādinayappavatte
tika-s0402t:1313_4: ca imasmiṃ saddhammakoṭṭhāse. Dhammaghoso…pe… dasasahassilokadhātuṃ paṭicchādesi
tika-s0402t:1313_5: “sabbattha ṭhitā suṇantū”ti adhiṭṭhānena. Soḷasahākārehīti dukkhapariññā, samudayappahānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1313_6: nirodhasacchikiriyā, maggabhāvanāti ekekasmiṃ magge cattāri cattāri katvā soḷasahi ākārehi.
tika-s0402t:1314_0: Paṭhamena nayena abhisambodhito purimatarāvatthāpi avassaṃbhāvitāya gahetvā sīhasadisataṃ
tika-s0402t:1314_1: dassetvā idāni abhisambuddhāvatthāsu eva sīhasadisataṃ dassetuṃ “aparo nayo”tiādi
tika-s0402t:1314_2: āraddhaṃ. Aṭṭhahi kāraṇehīti “tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1314_3: āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato, tathadassitāya
tika-s0402t:1314_4: tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato, abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato”ti
tika-s0402t:1314_5: evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi tathāgatasādhakehi kāraṇehi. Yadipi bhagavā bodhipallaṅke nisinnamatteva
tika-s0402t:1314_6: abhisambuddho na jāto, tathāpi tāya nisajjāya nisinnova panujja sabbaṃ parissayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1314_7: abhisambuddho jāto. Tathā hi taṃ “aparājitapallaṅka”nti vuccati, tasmā “yāva bodhipallaṅkā
tika-s0402t:1314_8: vā”ti vatvā tena aparitussanto “yāva arahattamaggañāṇā vā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:1315_0: Iti sakkāyoti ettha itisaddo nidassanattho. Tena sakkāyo sarūpato parimāṇato paricchedato
tika-s0402t:1315_1: ca dassitoti āha “ayaṃ sakkāyo”tiādi. “Ayaṃ sakkāyo”ti iminā pañcupādānakkhandhā
tika-s0402t:1315_2: sarūpato dassitā. “Ettako sakkāyo”ti iminā te parimāṇato dassitā. Tassa ca parimāṇassa
tika-s0402t:1315_3: ekantikabhāvaṃ dassentena “na ito bhiyyo sakkāyo atthī”ti vuttaṃ. Sabhāvatoti salakkhaṇato.
tika-s0402t:1315_4: Sarasatoti sakiccato. Pariyantatoti parimāṇapariyantato. Paricchedatoti yattake ṭhāne
tika-s0402t:1315_5: tassa pavattitassa paricchindanato. Parivaṭumatoti pariyosānappavattito. Sabbepi
tika-s0402t:1315_6: pañcupādānakkhandhā dassitā honti yathāvuttena vibhāgena. Ayaṃ sakkāyassa samudayo
tika-s0402t:1315_7: nāmāti ayaṃ āhārādisakkāyassa samudayo nāma. Tenāha “ettāvatā”tiādi. Atthaṅgamoti
tika-s0402t:1315_8: nirodho. “Āhārasamudayā āhāranirodhā”ti ca asādhāraṇameva taṃ gahetvā sesesu ādi-saddena saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0402t:1316_1: Khīṇāsavattāti anavasesaṃ sāvasesañca āsavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā. Anāgāmīnampi hi bhayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1316_2: cittutrāsañca na hotīti. Ñāṇasaṃvego bhayatupaṭṭhānapaññā. Itarāsaṃ pana devatānanti
tika-s0402t:1316_3: akhīṇāsavadeve sandhāya vadati. Bhoti dhammālapanamattanti sabhāvakathanamattaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1317_0: Cakkanti satthu āṇācakkaṃ. Taṃ pana dhammato āgatanti dhammacakkaṃ. Tattha ariyasāvakānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1317_1: paṭivedhadhammato āgatanti dhammacakkaṃ. Itaresaṃ desanādhammato āgatanti dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1317_2: Duvidhepi ñāṇaṃ padhānanti ñāṇasīsena vuttaṃ “paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1317_3: Idāni taṃ ñāṇaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmā tassa
tika-s0402t:1317_4: ñāṇassa paṭividdhattā bhagavā tāni saṭṭhi nayasahassāni veneyyānaṃ dassetuṃ samattho
tika-s0402t:1317_5: ahosi, tasmā tāni saṭṭhi nayasahassāni tena ñāṇena saddhiṃyeva siddhānīti katvā dassento
tika-s0402t:1317_6: “saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi paṭivijjhī”ti āha. Tiparivaṭṭanti “idaṃ dukkha”nti ca
tika-s0402t:1317_7: “pariññeyya”nti ca “pariññāta”nti ca evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ, taṃyeva dvādasākāraṃ. Tanti
tika-s0402t:1317_8: desanāñāṇaṃ. Esa bhagavā. Appaṭipuggaloti paṭinidhibhūtapuggalarahito. Ekasadisassāti nibbikārassa.
tika-s0402t:1320_0: 34. Catutthe aggesu pasādāti seṭṭhesu pasādā. Aggā vā pasādāti seṭṭhabhūtā pasādā.
tika-s0402t:1320_1: Seṭṭhavacano hettha aggasaddo. Purimasmiṃ atthavikappe aggasaddena buddhādiratanattayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1320_2: vuccati. Tesu bhagavā tāva asadisaṭṭhena, guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena, asamasamaṭṭhena ca
tika-s0402t:1320_3: aggo. So hi mahābhinīhāraṃ dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ pavicayañca ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhāraguṇehi
tika-s0402t:1320_4: ceva buddhaguṇehi ca payojanehi ca sesajanehi asadisoti asadisaṭṭhenapi aggo. Ye
tika-s0402t:1320_5: cassa te guṇā mahākaruṇādayo, tehi sesasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi sabbasattuttamatāya
tika-s0402t:1320_6: aggo. Ye pana purimakā sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi asamā, tehi saddhiṃ ayameva rūpakāyaguṇehi
tika-s0402t:1320_7: ceva dhammakāyaguṇehi ca samoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi aggo. Tathā dullabhapātubhāvato
tika-s0402t:1321_0: “Ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ. Katamassa ekapuggalassa?
tika-s0402t:1321_1: Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsammuddhassa. Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati
tika-s0402t:1321_2: acchariyamanusso. Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujana…pe…
tika-s0402t:1321_3: sammāsambuddho. Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati adutiyo asahāyo
tika-s0402t:1321_4: appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo asamo asamasamo dvipadānaṃ aggo. Katamo ekapuggalo?
tika-s0402t:1322_1: ca aggā. Tathā hi tesaṃ svākkhātatādisuppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesehi aññe dhammasaṅghasadisā
tika-s0402t:1322_2: appataraṃ nihīnā vā natthi, kuto seṭṭhā. Sayameva tehi visiṭṭhaguṇatāya seṭṭhā. Tathā
tika-s0402t:1322_4: hi bhagavā dullabhapātubhāvo, tadaggena dhammasaṅghāpīti. Acchariyādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:1322_5: Evaṃ aggesu seṭṭhesu uttamesu pavaresu guṇavisiṭṭhesu pasādāti aggappasadā.
tika-s0402t:1323_0: Dutiyasmiṃ panatthe yathāvuttesu aggesu buddhādīsu uppattiyā aggabhūtā pasādā aggappasādā.
tika-s0402t:1323_1: Ye pana ariyamaggena āgatā aveccappasādā, te ekanteneva aggabhūtā pasādāti aggappasādā.
tika-s0402t:1323_2: Yathāha – “idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1323_3: Aggavipākattāpi cete aggappasādā. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko”ti.
tika-s0402t:1324_0: Apadā vātiādīsu vā-saddo samuccayattho, na vikappattho. Yathā “anuppanno vā kāmāsavo
tika-s0402t:1324_1: uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhatī”ti ettha anuppanno ca uppanno cāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1324_2: Yathā ca “bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāyā”ti ettha bhūtānañca
tika-s0402t:1324_3: sambhavesīnañcāti attho. Yathā ca “aggito vā udakato vā mithubhedato vā”ti ettha
tika-s0402t:1324_4: aggito ca udakato ca mithubhedato cāti attho, evaṃ “apadā vā…pe… aggamakkhāyatī”ti
tika-s0402t:1324_5: etthāpi apadā ca dvipadā cāti sampiṇḍanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “vā-saddo
tika-s0402t:1325_0: Rūpinoti rūpavanto. Na rūpinoti arūpino. Saññinoti saññavanto. Na saññinoti asaññino.
tika-s0402t:1325_1: “Apadā vā”tiādisabbapadehi kāmabhavo, rūpabhavo, arūpabhavo, ekavokārabhavo, catuvokārabhavo,
tika-s0402t:1325_2: pañcavokārabhavo, saññibhavo, asaññibhavo, nevasaññināsaññibhavoti navavidhepi bhave
tika-s0402t:1325_3: sattepi anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti. Ettha hi rūpiggahaṇena kāmabhavo, rūpabhavo,
tika-s0402t:1325_4: pañcavokārabhavo, ekavokārabhavo ca dassito, arūpiggahaṇena arūpabhavo, catuvokārabhavo
tika-s0402t:1325_5: ca dassito, saññibhavādayo pana sarūpeneva dassitā. Apadādiggahaṇena kāmabhavapañcavokārabhavasaññibhavānaṃ ekadesova dassito.
tika-s0402t:1326_0: Kasmā panettha yathā adutiyasutte “dvipadānaṃ aggo”ti dvipadā eva gahitā, evaṃ dvipadaggahaṇameva
tika-s0402t:1326_1: akatvā apadādiggahaṇaṃ katanti? Vuccate – adutiyasutte tāva seṭṭhataravasena dvipadaggahaṇameva
tika-s0402t:1326_2: kataṃ. Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahupadesu na uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1326_3: dvipadesuyeva uppajjati. Kataresu dvipadesu? Manussesu ceva devesu ca. Manussesu
tika-s0402t:1326_4: uppajjamāno sakalalokaṃ vase vattetuṃ samattho buddho hutvā uppajjati, devesu uppajjamāno
tika-s0402t:1326_5: dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vase vattanako mahābrahmā hutvā uppajjati, so tassa kappiyakārako
tika-s0402t:1326_6: vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati. Iti tatopi seṭṭhataravasenesa dvipadānaṃ aggoti tattha
tika-s0402t:1326_7: vuttaṃ. Idha pana anavasesapariyādānavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ “yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā
tika-s0402t:1326_8: apadā vā…pe… nevasaññināsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti. Niddhāraṇe
tika-s0402t:1326_9: cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro, aggo akkhāyatīti padavibhāgo. Tenevāha “guṇehi aggo”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1327_0: Aggo vipāko hotīti agge sammāsambuddhe pasannānaṃ yo pasādo aggo seṭṭho uttamakoṭibhūto
tika-s0402t:1327_1: vā, tasmā tassa vipākopi aggo seṭṭho uttamakoṭibhūto uḷāratamo paṇītatamo hoti. So
tika-s0402t:1327_2: pana pasādo duvidho lokiyalokuttarabhedato. Tesu lokiyassa tāva –
tika-s0402t:1333: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa. ;
tika-s0402t:1337_0: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho,
tika-s0402t:1337_1: devānaminda, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ
tika-s0402t:1337_2: upapajjanti. Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhiggaṇhanti dibbena āyunā, dibbena vaṇṇena,
tika-s0402t:1337_3: dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena ādhipateyyena, dibbehi rūpehi, dibbehi saddehi,
tika-s0402t:1337_4: dibbehi gandhehi, dibbehi rasehi, dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī”ti –
tika-s0402t:1338: Evamādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena pasādaphalavisesayogo veditabbo, tasmā so apāyadukkhavinivattanena saddhiṃ sampattibhavesu sukhavisesadāyakova daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1339: Lokuttaro pana sāmaññaphalavipākadāyako vaṭṭadukkhavinivattako. Sabbopi cāyaṃ pasādo paramparāya vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vinivattetiyeva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0402t:1340_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako attano saddhaṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:1340_1: samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1340_2: cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, ujugatacittassa pāmojjaṃ jāyati,
tika-s0402t:1340_3: pamuditassa pīti jāyati…pe… nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1341_0: Dhammāti sabhāvadhammā. Saṅkhatāti samecca sambhūya paccayehi katāti saṅkhatā, sapaccayā
tika-s0402t:1341_1: dhammā. Hetūhi paccayehi ca na kehici katā saṅkhatāti asaṅkhatā, apaccayo nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1341_2: Saṅkhatānaṃ pariyositabhāvena “asaṅkhatā”ti puthuvacanaṃ. Virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti
tika-s0402t:1341_3: tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ yo virāgasaṅkhāto asaṅkhatadhammo, so sabhāveneva
tika-s0402t:1341_5: aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaranti vuccati. Yadidanti nipāto, yo ayanti attho. Madanimmadanotiādīni
tika-s0402t:1341_6: sabbāni nibbānavevacanāni. Tenevāha “virāgotiādīni nibbānasseva nāmānī”ti. Rāgamadādayoti
tika-s0402t:1341_7: ādi-saddena mānamadapurisamadādike saṅgaṇhāti. Sabbā pipāsāti kāmapipāsādikā sabbā
tika-s0402t:1341_8: pipāsā. Sabbe ālayā samugghātaṃ gacchantīti kāmālayādikā sabbepi ālayā samugghātaṃ
tika-s0402t:1341_9: yanti. Vaṭṭānīti kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭāni. Taṇhāti aṭṭhasatappabhedā sabbāpi taṇhā.
tika-s0402t:1345: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, dhammaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce…pe… dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī”ti –
tika-s0402t:1346: Evamādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena dhamme pasādassa phalavisesayogo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1347_0: Saṅghā vā gaṇā vāti janasamūhasaṅkhātā yāvatā loke saṅghā vā gaṇā vā. Tathāgatasāvakasaṅghoti
tika-s0402t:1347_2: Aggamakkhāyatīti attano sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiādiguṇavisesena tesaṃ saṅghānaṃ aggo
tika-s0402t:1347_3: seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti vuccati. Yadidanti yāni imāni. Cattāri purisayugāni yugaḷavasena,
tika-s0402t:1347_4: paṭhamamaggaṭṭho paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷaṃ, yāva catutthamaggaṭṭho catutthaphalaṭṭhoti
tika-s0402t:1347_5: idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugāni. Aṭṭha purisapuggalāti purisapuggalavasena
tika-s0402t:1347_6: eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho, eko paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭha purisapuggalā. Ettha
tika-s0402t:1347_7: ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni, veneyyavasena panevaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1347_8: Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti yānimāni yugaḷavasena cattāri yugāni pāṭiyekkato aṭṭha
tika-s0402t:1347_9: purisapuggalā, esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho. Āhuneyyotiādīni vuttatthāneva. Idhāpi –
tika-s0402t:1350: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, saṅghaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda…pe… dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī”ti –
tika-s0402t:1351_0: Ādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena saṅghe pasādassa phalavisesayogo tassa aggavipākatā ca
tika-s0402t:1351_1: veditabbā. Tathā anuttariyapaṭilābho sattamabhavādito paṭṭhāya vaṭṭadukkhasamucchedo
tika-s0402t:1352_0: Gāthāsu aggatoti agge ratanattaye, aggabhāvato vā pasannānaṃ. Aggaṃ dhammanti aggasabhāvaṃ
tika-s0402t:1352_3: vijānantānaṃ. Evaṃ sādhāraṇato aggappasādavatthuṃ dassetvā idāni asādhāraṇato taṃ
tika-s0402t:1352_4: vibhāgena dassetuṃ “agge buddhe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pasannānanti aveccappasādena
tika-s0402t:1352_5: ca itarappasādena ca pasannānaṃ adhimuttānaṃ. Virāgūpasameti virāge upasame ca, sabbassa
tika-s0402t:1352_6: rāgassa sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantavirāgahetubhūte accantaupasamahetubhūte cāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1353_0: Aggasmiṃ dānaṃ dadatanti agge ratanattaye dānaṃ dadantānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajantānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1353_1: Tattha dharamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā, parinibbutaṃ
tika-s0402t:1353_2: bhagavantaṃ uddissa dhātucetiyādike upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā buddhe dānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1353_3: dadanti nāma. “Dhammaṃ pūjessāmā”ti dhammadhare puggale catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā
tika-s0402t:1353_4: pūjentā sakkarontā dhammañca ciraṭṭhitikaṃ karontā dhamme dānaṃ dadanti nāma. Tathā
tika-s0402t:1353_5: ariyasaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā taṃ uddissa itarasmimpi
tika-s0402t:1353_6: tathā paṭipajjantā saṅghe dānaṃ dadanti nāma. Aggaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti evaṃ ratanattaye
tika-s0402t:1353_7: pasannena cetasā uḷāraṃ pariccāgaṃ uḷārañca pūjāsakkāraṃ pavattentānaṃ divase divase
tika-s0402t:1353_8: aggaṃ uḷāraṃ kusalaṃ upacīyati. Idāni tassa puññassa aggavipākatāya aggabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0402t:1353_9: “aggaṃ āyū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āyūti dibbaṃ vā mānusaṃ vā aggaṃ uḷāraṃ paramaṃ āyu
tika-s0402t:1353_10: pavaḍḍhati uparūpari brūhati. Vaṇṇoti rūpasampadā. Yasoti parivārasampadā. Kittīti
tika-s0402t:1353_11: thutighoso. Sukhanti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ. Balanti kāyabalañceva ñāṇabalañca.
tika-s0402t:1354_0: Aggassa ratanattayassa dānaṃ dātā. Atha vā aggassa deyyadhammassa dānaṃ uḷāraṃ katvā
tika-s0402t:1354_1: tattha puññaṃ pavattetā. Aggadhammasamāhitoti aggena pasādadhammena dānādidhammena
tika-s0402t:1354_2: ca saṃhito samannāgato acalappasādayutto, tassa vā vipākabhūtehi bahujanassa piyamanāpatādidhammehi
tika-s0402t:1354_3: yutto. Aggappatto pamodatīti yattha yattha sattanikāye uppanno, tattha tattha aggabhāvaṃ
tika-s0402t:1354_4: seṭṭhabhāvaṃ adhigato, aggabhāvaṃ vā lokuttaramaggaphalaṃ adhigato pamodati abhiramati paritussatīti.
tika-s0402t:1357_0: 35. Pañcame ariye ñāyeti saṃkilesato ārakattā ariye niddose parisuddhe niyyānikadhammabhāvato
tika-s0402t:1357_1: ñāye kāraṇeti attho. Ñāyati nicchayena kamati nibbānaṃ, taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati
tika-s0402t:1357_2: etenātī ñāyo, ariyamaggo. So eva ca sampāpakahetubhāvato kāraṇanti vuccati. Idha
tika-s0402t:1357_3: pana saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo adhippetoti āha “sahavipassanake magge”ti. Gāthāsu
tika-s0402t:1360_0: 36. Chaṭṭhe ukkāhi dhāriyamānāhīti dīpikāhi dhāriyamānāhi, daṇḍadīpikāsu jāletvā
tika-s0402t:1360_1: dhāriyamānāsu māpitattāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tañhi nagaraṃ “maṅgaladivase sukhaṇe sunakkhattaṃ
tika-s0402t:1360_2: mā atikkamī”ti rattimpi ukkāsu dhāriyamānāsu māpitaṃ. Ukkāsu ṭhāti ukkaṭṭhā, ukkāsu
tika-s0402t:1360_4: veditabbā. Niruttinayena vā ukkāsu ṭhitāsu ṭhitā āsīti ukkaṭṭhā. Apare pana bhaṇanti
tika-s0402t:1360_5: “bhūmibhāgasampattiyā manussasampattiyā upakaraṇasampattiyā ca sā nagarī ukkaṭṭhaguṇayogato
tika-s0402t:1360_6: ukkaṭṭhāti nāmaṃ labhatī”ti. Setabyanti tassa nagarassa nāmaṃ. Taṃ pana kassapadasabalassa
tika-s0402t:1361_0: Vijjantarikāyāti vijjuniccharaṇakkhaṇe. Antaratoti hadaye. Antarāti ārambhanibbattīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1361_1: vemajjhe. Antarikāyāti antarāḷe. Ettha ca “tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya, etesaṃ antarā kappā
tika-s0402t:1361_2: gaṇanato asaṅkhyeyyā, antarantarā kathaṃ opapātetī”ti ca ādīsu viya kāraṇavemajjhesu
tika-s0402t:1361_3: vattamānā antarāsaddā eva udāharitabbā siyuṃ, na pana cittakkhaṇavivaresu vattamānā
tika-s0402t:1362_0: Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo siyā – yesu antarāsaddo vattati, tesu antarasaddopi vattatīti
tika-s0402t:1362_1: samānatthattā antarāsaddatthe vattamāno antarasaddo udāhaṭo. Antarāsaddo eva vā “yassantarato”ti
tika-s0402t:1362_2: ettha gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Antarāsaddo eva pana ikasaddena
tika-s0402t:1362_3: padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “antarikā”ti vuttoti evamettha udāharaṇodāharitabbānaṃ virodhābhāvo
tika-s0402t:1362_4: daṭṭhabbo. Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarāsaddayogena
tika-s0402t:1362_5: upayogavacanassa icchitattā. Tenevāha “antarāsaddena pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kata”nti.
tika-s0402t:1363_0: Sakalajambudīpe uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvāti parinibbute bhagavati dhātūnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1363_1: atthāya kusināranagaraṃ parivāretvā ṭhitehi sesarājūhi “amhākaṃ dhātuyo vā dentu
tika-s0402t:1363_2: yuddhaṃ vā”tiādinā kosinārakehi mallehi saddhiṃ kataṃ vivādaṃ vūpasametvā. So kira
tika-s0402t:1363_3: brāhmaṇo tesaṃ vivādaṃ sutvā “ete rājāno bhagavato parinibbutaṭṭhāne vivādaṃ karonti,
tika-s0402t:1363_4: na kho panetaṃ patirūpaṃ, alaṃ iminā kalahena, vūpasamessāmi na”nti gantvā unnate
tika-s0402t:1363_5: padese ṭhatvā dvebhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ doṇagajjitaṃ nāma avoca. Tattha paṭhamabhāṇavāre
tika-s0402t:1363_6: tāva ekapadampi te na jāniṃsu. Dutiyabhāṇavārapariyosāne ca “ācariyassa viya bho
tika-s0402t:1363_7: saddo, ācariyassa viya bho saddo”ti sabbe niravā ahesuṃ. Jambudīpatale kira kulaghare
tika-s0402t:1363_8: jāto yebhuyyena tassa na-antevāsiko nāma natthi, atha kho so attano vacanaṃ sutvā
tika-s0402t:1372_0: Imaṃ gāthādvayaṃ vatvā taṃ kalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo aṭṭhadhā bhājetvā adāsi, taṃ
tika-s0402t:1372_1: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “sakalajambudīpe uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo bhājessatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1373_0: Āsavenāti kammakilesakāraṇena āsavena. Ettha hi tebhūmakañca kammaṃ, avasesā ca akusalā
tika-s0402t:1373_1: dhammā “āsavā”ti vuttā. Devūpapattīti devesu uppatti nibbatti. Ettha ca yakkhagandhabbatāya
tika-s0402t:1373_2: vinimuttā sabbe devā devaggahaṇena gahitā. Gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo ākāsacārī. Ahanti
tika-s0402t:1376_0: 37. Sattame nibbānasantikeyeva caratīti kilesanibbānassa anupādāparinibbānassa ca
tika-s0402t:1376_1: santikeyeva carati “na cirasseva adhigamissatī”ti katvā. Gāthāya appamādaratoti samathavipassanāya
tika-s0402t:1376_2: appamajjane rato abhirato, appamādeneva rattindivaṃ vītināmentoti attho. Pamādaṃ
tika-s0402t:1376_3: bhayato passantoti nirayūpapattiādibhayahetuto pamādaṃ bhayato passanto. Abhabbo
tika-s0402t:1376_4: parihānāyāti so evarūpo samathavipassanādhammehi maggaphalehi vā parihānāya abhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1376_5: Samathavipassanāto hi sampattato na parihāyati, itarāni ca appattāni pāpuṇātīti.
tika-s0402t:1379_0: 38. Aṭṭhame antavā lokoti ekapassena vaḍḍhitaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ “loko”ti gāhena vā
tika-s0402t:1379_1: takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi. Lābhī hi jhānacakkhunā passitvā gaṇhāti, itaro takkamattena.
tika-s0402t:1379_2: Anantavāti samantato vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ “loko”ti gāhena vā takkena
tika-s0402t:1379_3: vā uppannadiṭṭhi. Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti jīvo sarīrañca ekameva vatthūti uppannadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0402t:1379_4: Vissaṭṭhānīti sakapariccajanavasena nissaṭṭhāni. Vantānīti idaṃ puna anādiyanabhāvadassanavasena
tika-s0402t:1379_5: vuttaṃ. Cattampi hi keci gaṇhanti, nayidamevanti dassanatthaṃ “vantānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1379_6: Na hi yaṃ yena vantaṃ, na so taṃ puna ādīyati. Vantampi kiñci sasantatilaggaṃ siyā,
tika-s0402t:1379_8: santatito vinimocanavasena chinnabandhanāni katānīti attho. Muttampi kiñci muttabandhanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1379_9: viya phalaṃ kuhiñci tiṭṭhati, na evamidanti dassanatthaṃ “pahīnānī”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā
tika-s0402t:1379_10: kiñci dunnissaṭṭhaṃ puna ādāya sammadeva nissaṭṭhaṃ “paṭinissaṭṭha”nti vuccati, evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1379_11: vipassanāya nissaṭṭhāni ādinnasadisāni maggena pahīnāni paṭinissaṭṭhāni nāma hontīti
tika-s0402t:1379_12: dassanatthaṃ “paṭinissaṭṭhānī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “yathā na puna cittaṃ ārohanti,
tika-s0402t:1380_0: Kāmesanāti kāmānaṃ esanā, kāmasaṅkhātā vā esanā kāmesanā. Vuttañhetaṃ “tattha katamā
tika-s0402t:1380_1: kāmesanā? Yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmapipāsā kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1380_2: ayaṃ vuccati kāmesanā”ti, tasmā kāmarāgo “kāmesanā”ti veditabbo. Tenevāha “kāmesanā…pe…
tika-s0402t:1380_3: anāgāmimaggena pahīnā”ti. Bhavānaṃ esanā bhavesanā. Vuttampi cetaṃ “tattha katamā
tika-s0402t:1380_4: bhavesanā? Yo bhavesu bhavacchando…pe… bhavajjhosānaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhavesanā”ti,
tika-s0402t:1380_5: tasmā bhavesanarāgo rūpārūpabhavapatthanāti veditabbo. Tenevāha “bhavesanā pana arahattamaggena pahīyatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1381_0: Brahmacariyassa esanā brahmacariyesanā. Sā ca maggabrahmacariyassa, diṭṭhigatikasammatabrahmacariyassa
tika-s0402t:1381_1: ca gavesanavasena dvippakārāti āha “brahmacariyaṃ esissāmī”tiādi. Diṭṭhigatikasammatassa
tika-s0402t:1381_2: brahmacariyassa esanāpi hi brahmacariyesanāti vuccati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-s0402t:1382_0: “Tattha katamā brahmacariyesanā? Sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti
tika-s0402t:1382_1: vā, anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā,
tika-s0402t:1382_2: hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na
tika-s0402t:1382_3: ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti
tika-s0402t:1382_4: vā, yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāraṃ diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ
tika-s0402t:1382_5: diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo
tika-s0402t:1382_6: micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyesaggāho, ayaṃ vuccati brahmacariyesanā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1383_0: Tasmā diṭṭhigatikasammatassa brahmacariyassa esanā diṭṭhabrahmacariyesanāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1383_2: ca rāgadiṭṭhiyo esanāti dassitaṃ hoti. Na kevalañca rāgadiṭṭhiyo eva esanā, tadekaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1384_0: “Tattha katamā kāmesanā? Kāmarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1384_1: ayaṃ vuccati kāmesanā. Tattha katamā bhavesanā? Bhavarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ
tika-s0402t:1384_2: vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhavesanā. Tattha katamā brahmacariyesanā? Antaggāhikā
tika-s0402t:1384_3: diṭṭhi tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati brahmacariyesanā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1386_0: “Kāmesanā”tiādigāthāya pana brahmacariyesanā sahāti brahmacariyesanāya saddhiṃ. Vibhattilopena
tika-s0402t:1386_1: hi ayaṃ niddeso. Karaṇatthe vā etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “brahmacariyesanāya
tika-s0402t:1386_2: saddhiṃ kāmesanā bhavesanāti tisso esanā”ti. Tāsu brahmacariyesanaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ
tika-s0402t:1386_3: “itisaccaparāmāso, diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samussayā”ti vuttaṃ. Tassattho – iti evaṃ saccanti
tika-s0402t:1386_4: parāmāso itisaccaparāmāso. Idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti diṭṭhiyā pavattiākāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1386_6: bhikkhave, vajjaṃ vadāmī”ti. Tā eva ca uparūpari vuddhiyā mānalobhādikilesasamussayanena
tika-s0402t:1386_7: vaṭṭadukkhasamussayanena ca samussayā, “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti micchābhinivisamānā
tika-s0402t:1386_8: sabbānatthahetukā kilesadukkhūpacayato hetubhūtā ca diṭṭhiyo brahmacariyesanāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:1386_9: hoti. Etena pavattiākārato nibbattito ca brahmacariyesanā dassitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1387_0: Sabbarāgavirattassāti sabbehi kāmabhavarāgehi virattassa. Tato eva taṇhākkhayasaṅkhāte
tika-s0402t:1387_1: nibbāne vimuttattā taṇhākkhayavimuttino arahato. Esanā paṭinissaṭṭhāti kāmesanā,
tika-s0402t:1387_2: bhavesanā sabbaso nissaṭṭhā pahīnā. Diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatāti brahmacariyesanāsaṅkhātā
tika-s0402t:1387_3: diṭṭhiṭṭhānā ca paṭhamamaggeneva samugghātitā. Evampi imissā gāthāya atthavaṇṇanā
tika-s0402t:1390_0: 39. Navame anukulayaññanti anukulaṃ kulānukkamaṃ upādāya dātabbadānaṃ. Tenāha “amhākaṃ…pe…
tika-s0402t:1390_1: kulānukulavasena yajitabba”nti. Vaṃsaparamparāya pacchā duggatapurisehi padātabbadānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1390_2: Evarūpaṃ kulaṃ sīlavante uddissa nibaddhadānaṃ, tasmiṃ kule daliddānipi na upacchindanti.
tika-s0402t:1390_3: Tatridaṃ vatthu – anāthapiṇḍikassa ghare pañca salākabhattasatāni dīyiṃsu. Dantamayasalākānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1390_4: pañcasatāni ahesuṃ. Atha taṃ kulaṃ anukkamena dāliddiyena abhibhūtaṃ. Ekā tasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:1390_5: kule dārikā ekasalākato uddhaṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhi. Sāpi pacchā sātavāhanaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā
tika-s0402t:1390_6: khalaṃ sodhetvā laddhadhaññena taṃ salākaṃ adāsi. Eko thero rañño ārocesi. Rājā taṃ
tika-s0402t:1390_7: ānetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sā tato paṭṭhāya puna pañcapi salākasatāni pavattesi.
tika-s0402t:1391_0: Assamedhantiādīsu porāṇakarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ, purisamedhaṃ, sammāpāsaṃ, vācāpeyyanti
tika-s0402t:1391_1: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ, yehi rājāno lokaṃ saṅgaṇhiṃsu. Tattha nipphannasassato
tika-s0402t:1391_2: dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ sassamedhaṃ nāma, sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho. Mahāyodhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1391_3: chamāsikabhattavetanānuppadānaṃ purisamedhaṃ nāma, purisasaṅgaṇhane medhāvitāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1391_4: Daliddamanussānaṃ hatthe lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1391_5: sammāpāsaṃ nāma. Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti, tasmā
tika-s0402t:1391_6: sammāpāsanti vuccati. “Tāta, mātulā”tiādinā pana saṇhavācābhaṇanaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ nāma,
tika-s0402t:1391_7: peyyavajjaṃ piyavacanatāti attho. Evaṃ catūhi vatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva
tika-s0402t:1391_8: hoti phītañca pahūtaannapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ, manussā mudā modanā ure putte naccentā
tika-s0402t:1391_9: apārutagharadvārā viharanti. Idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato niraggaḷanti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1391_10: Ayaṃ porāṇikā paveṇī. Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni
tika-s0402t:1391_11: imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattentā ummūlaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhantiādike
tika-s0402t:1391_12: pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā brāhmaṇadhammiyasutte –
tika-s0402t:1393: Te tattha mante ganthetvā, okkākaṃ tadupāgamu”nti. ;
tika-s0402t:1394_0: Idāni tehi parivattetvā ṭhapitamatthaṃ dassento “assamedha”ntiādimāha. Tattha medhantīti
tika-s0402t:1394_1: vadhenti. Dvīhi pariyaññehīti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi
tika-s0402t:1394_3: pasusatānaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa. Tathā hi vadanti –
tika-s0402t:1397_0: Sammanti yugacchidde pakkhipitabbadaṇḍakaṃ. Pāsantīti khipanti. Saṃhārimehīti sakaṭehi
tika-s0402t:1397_1: vahitabbehi. Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinaditīre pathaviyā vivare
tika-s0402t:1397_2: dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi, andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā “ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo”ti
tika-s0402t:1397_3: saññāya tattha sammāpāsayaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti. Tena vuttaṃ “nimuggokāsato pabhutī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1397_4: Ayūpo appakadivaso yāgo, sayūpo bahudivasaṃ neyyo satrayāgoti. Mantapadābhisaṅkhatānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1397_6: Sāragabbhakoṭṭhāgārādīsu natthi ettha aggaḷanti niraggaḷo. Tattha kira yaññe attano
tika-s0402t:1398_0: Mahārambhāti bahupasughātakammā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vividhā yattha haññare”ti vakkhamānattā
tika-s0402t:1398_1: “mahākiccā mahākaraṇīyā”ti paṭhamo atthavikappo vutto. Dutiyo pana atthavikappo “mahārambhāti
tika-s0402t:1398_2: papañcavasena ajeḷakā”tiādi vuttanti adhippāyena “apicā”tiādinā āraddho. Nirārambhāti
tika-s0402t:1398_3: etthāpi vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Nanu ca pāṇātipātādiakusalakammassa appamattakampi
tika-s0402t:1398_4: phalaṃ nupalabbhati, tasmā tassa nipphalabhāvaṃ avatvā “na te honti mahapphalā”ti
tika-s0402t:1398_5: kasmā vuttanti āha “niravasesatthe”tiādi. Anugataṃ kulanti anukulaṃ, kulānugatanti
tika-s0402t:1398_6: attho. Ye niccabhattādiṃ pubbapurisehi paṭṭhapitaṃ aparāparaṃ anupacchindantā manussā
tika-s0402t:1398_7: dadanti, te anukulaṃ yajanti nāma. Tenevāha “ye aññe anukulaṃ yajantī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1401_0: 40. Dasame pāṇasamārambharahitanti pāṇaghātarahitaṃ. Abyābajjhaṃ sukhaṃ lokaṃ, paṇḍito
tika-s0402t:1401_2: pana vattabbaṃ natthi. Jhānasamāpattivasena sukhabahulattā sukhaṃ ekantasukhaṃ brahmalokaṃ
tika-s0402t:1401_3: jhānapuññena, itarapuññena pana tadaññasampattibhavasaṅkhātaṃ sukhaṃ lokaṃ paṇḍito
tika-s0402t:1406_0: 41. Pañcamassa paṭhame diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāyāti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sukhavihāratthāya,
tika-s0402t:1406_1: nikkilesatāya nirāmisena sukhena viharaṇatthāyāti attho. Iminā cattāri phalasamāpattijjhānāni
tika-s0402t:1406_2: khīṇāsavassa āsavakkhayādhigamato aparabhāge adhigatarūpārūpajjhānāni ca kathitāni.
tika-s0402t:1406_4: rūpagatassa dibbassa itarassa ca dassanaṭṭhena idha “ñāṇadassana”nti adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1406_5: Ālokasaññaṃ manasi karotīti divā vā rattiṃ vā sūriyadīpacandamaṇiukkāvijjulatādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1406_6: āloko divā rattiñca upaladdho, yathāladdhavaseneva ālokaṃ manasi karoti citte ṭhapeti,
tika-s0402t:1406_7: tathā ca naṃ manasi karoti, yathāssa subhāvitālokakasiṇassa viya kasiṇāloko yathicchakaṃ
tika-s0402t:1406_8: yāvadicchakañca so āloko rattiyaṃ upatiṭṭhati, yena tattha divāsaññaṃ ṭhapeti, divā
tika-s0402t:1406_9: viya vigatathinamiddho hoti. Tenāha “yathā divā tathā ratti”nti.
tika-s0402t:1407_0: Yathā divā ālokasaññā manasi katā, tatheva naṃ rattimpi manasi karotīti yathā divā
tika-s0402t:1407_1: diṭṭho āloko, tatheva taṃ rattiṃ manasi karoti. Dutiyapadeti “yathā rattiṃ tathā
tika-s0402t:1407_2: divā”ti imasmiṃ vākye. Esa nayoti iminā yathā rattiyaṃ candālokādi āloko diṭṭho,
tika-s0402t:1407_3: evameva rattiṃ diṭṭhākāreneva divā taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti citte ṭhapetīti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1407_4: atidisati. Iti vivaṭena cetasāti evaṃ apihitena cittena, thinamiddhāpidhānena apihitacittenāti
tika-s0402t:1407_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Apariyonaddhenāti samantato anaddhena asañchāditena. Kiñcāpītiādinā
tika-s0402t:1407_6: attanā vuttamevatthaṃ samattheti. Ālokasadisaṃ kataṃ “yathā divā tathā ratti”ntiādinā.
tika-s0402t:1408_0: Sattaṭṭhānikassāti “abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī”tiādinā vuttassa sattaṭṭhānikassa
tika-s0402t:1408_1: satisampajaññassa atthāya. Pariggahitavatthārammaṇatāyāti vatthuno ārammaṇassa ca
tika-s0402t:1408_2: yāthāvato viditabhāvena. Yathā hi sappaṃ pariyesantena tassa āsaye vidite sopi vidito
tika-s0402t:1408_3: gahito eva ca hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā, evaṃ vedanāya āsayabhūte
tika-s0402t:1408_4: vatthumhi ārammaṇe ca vidite ādikammikassapi vedanā viditā gahitā eva hoti salakkhaṇato
tika-s0402t:1408_5: sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattā. Pageva pariññātavatthukassa khīṇāsavassa.
tika-s0402t:1408_6: Tassa hi uppādakkhaṇepi ṭhitikkhaṇepi bhaṅgakkhaṇepi vedanā viditā pākaṭā honti “tā
tika-s0402t:1408_7: vedanā evaṃ uppajjitvā”tiādinā. Na kevalañca vedanā eva, idha vuttā saññādayopi avuttā
tika-s0402t:1408_8: cetanādayopi viditāva uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti ca nirujjhanti ca. Nidassanamattañhetaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1408_9: yadidaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vedanāsaññāvitakkaggahaṇaṃ. Tena anavasesato sabbadhammānampi uppādādito
tika-s0402t:1409_0: Apica vedanāya uppādo vidito hoti, upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti, atthaṅgamo vidito hoti.
tika-s0402t:1409_1: Kathaṃ vedanāya uppādo vidito hoti? Avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo, taṇhāsamudayā
tika-s0402t:1409_2: kammasamudayo, phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa
tika-s0402t:1409_3: samudayaṃ passati. Evaṃ vedanāya uppādo vidito hoti. Kathaṃ vedanāya upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ
tika-s0402t:1409_4: hoti? Aniccato manasikaroto khayatupaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti, dukkhato manasikaroto
tika-s0402t:1409_5: bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti, anattato manasikaroto suññatupaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1409_6: Evaṃ vedanāya upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti. Iti khayato bhayato suññato jānāti. Kathaṃ
tika-s0402t:1409_7: vedanāya atthaṅgamo vidito hoti? Avijjānirodhā vedanānirodho…pe… evaṃ vedanāya atthaṅgamo
tika-s0402t:1409_8: vidito hoti. Imināpi nayenettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1410_0: Iti rūpanti ettha itisaddo anavasesato rūpassa sarūpanidassanatthoti tassa idaṃ rūpanti
tika-s0402t:1410_1: etena sādhāraṇato sarūpanidassanamāha, ettakaṃ rūpanti etena anavasesato, na ito
tika-s0402t:1410_2: paraṃ rūpaṃ atthīti tabbinimuttassa aññassa abhāvaṃ. Iti vedanātiādīsupi ayaṃ vedanā,
tika-s0402t:1410_3: ettakā vedanā, ito paraṃ vedanā natthi. Ayaṃ saññā…pe… ime saṅkhārā…pe… idaṃ viññāṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1410_4: ettakaṃ viññāṇaṃ, ito paraṃ viññāṇaṃ natthīti evamattho daṭṭhabboti āha “vedanādīsupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0402t:1411_0: Ñāṇena jānitvā paroparāni. Paroparānīti parāni ca oparāni ca. Uttamādhamānīti parattabhāvasakattabhāvādīni
tika-s0402t:1411_1: uttamādhamāni. Calitanti taṇhādiṭṭhivipphanditaṃ. Anīghoti rāgādiīgharahito. Atāri
tika-s0402t:1411_2: soti so evarūpo arahā jātijaraṃ atari.
tika-s0402t:1414_0: 42-44. Dutiye etesaṃ pañhānanti ekaṃsabyākaraṇādīnaṃ catunnaṃ pañhānaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:1414_1: ṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ jānātīti “cakkhuṃ anicca”nti puṭṭhe “anicca”nti ekaṃseneva byākātabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1414_2: “Aniccā nāma cakkhu”nti puṭṭhe pana “na kevalaṃ cakkhumeva, sotampi anicca”nti evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1414_3: vibhajitvā byākātabbaṃ. “Yathā cakkhuṃ tathā sotaṃ, yathā sotaṃ tathā cakkhu”nti
tika-s0402t:1414_5: hī”ti byākātabbaṃ. “Aniccaṭṭhena pucchāmī”ti vutte “āmā”ti byākātabbaṃ. “Taṃ jīvaṃ
tika-s0402t:1414_6: taṃ sarīra”ntiādīni puṭṭhena pana “abyākatametaṃ bhagavatā”ti ṭhapetabbo, esa pañho
tika-s0402t:1414_7: na byākātabboti evaṃ jānātīti attho. Atthasamāgamenāti atthassa paṭilābhena laddhabbena.
tika-s0402t:1414_8: Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti samayo, paṭilābho. Samayo eva abhisamayo, abhimukhabhāvena
tika-s0402t:1414_9: vā samayo abhisamayoti evamettha padattho veditabbo. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Tatiyacatutthāni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0402t:1417_0: 45-46. Pañcame ekokāseti cakkavāḷassa pariyantasaññite ekasmiṃ okāse. Bhummanti “yatthā”ti
tika-s0402t:1417_1: idaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Sāmaññato vuttampi “so lokassa anto”ti vacanato visiṭṭhavisayameva
tika-s0402t:1417_2: hoti. “Na jāyati, na mīyatī”ti vatvā puna “na cavati, na upapajjatī”ti kasmā vuttanti
tika-s0402t:1417_3: āha “idaṃ aparāparaṃ…pe… gahita”nti. Padagamanenāti padasā gamanena. Satthā saṅkhāralokassa
tika-s0402t:1417_4: antaṃ sandhāya vadati upari sabbāni pakāsetukāmo. Saṅkhāralokassa hi anto nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1418_0: Daḷhaṃ thiraṃ dhanu etassāti daḷhadhanvā, so eva “daḷhadhammā”ti vutto. Tenāha “daḷhadhanū”ti.
tika-s0402t:1418_3: “sikkhito”ti vutte dhanusikkhāya sikkhitoti viññāyati. Sikkhā ca ettakena kālena
tika-s0402t:1418_4: sikkhantassa ukkaṃsagatā hotīti āha “dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito”ti. Usabhappamāṇeti
tika-s0402t:1418_5: vīsati yaṭṭhiyo usabhaṃ, tasmiṃ usabhappamāṇe padese. Vālagganti vālakoṭiṃ. Katahatthoti
tika-s0402t:1418_6: paricitahattho. Katasarakkhepoti thiralakkhe ca calalakkhe ca paresaṃ dassanavasena
tika-s0402t:1418_7: sarakkhepassa katāpī. Tenāha “dassitasippo”ti, “katayoggo”ti keci. Asanti etenāti
tika-s0402t:1418_8: asanaṃ, kaṇḍo. Tālacchādinti tālacchāyaṃ. Sā pana ratanamattā vidatthicaturaṅgulā.
tika-s0402t:1419_0: Puratthimā samuddāti ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe puratthimā samuddā. Samuddasīsena puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ
tika-s0402t:1419_1: vadati. Pacchimasamuddoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Nippapañcatanti adantakāritaṃ. Sampatteti
tika-s0402t:1419_2: tādisena javena gacchantena sampatte. Anotatteti etthāpi “sampatte”ti padaṃ ānetvā
tika-s0402t:1419_3: sambandho, tathā “nāgalatādantakaṭṭha”nti etthāpi. Tadāti yadā so lokantagavesako
tika-s0402t:1419_4: ahosi, tadā. Dīghāyukakāloti anekavassasahassāyukakālo. Cakkavāḷalokassāti sāmaññavasena
tika-s0402t:1419_5: ekavacanaṃ, cakkavāḷalokānanti attho. Imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe nibbattipubbaparicayasiddhāya nikantiyā.
tika-s0402t:1420: Sasaññimhi samanaketi na rūpadhammamattake, atha kho pañcakkhandhasamudāyeti dasseti. Samitapāpoti samucchinnasaṃkilesadhammo. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1423_0: 47. Sattame suvidūravidūra-saddānaṃ samānatthānaṃyeva ekattha gahaṇaṃ idha niddeso
tika-s0402t:1423_1: dūrāsannabhāvassa apekkhāsiddhattā idhādhippetassa dūrabhāvassa kenaci pariyāyena
tika-s0402t:1423_2: anāsannabhāvadassanatthaṃ katanti āha “kenaci pariyāyena anāsannāni hutvā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1426_0: 48. Aṭṭhame vākkaraṇacāturiyato vacanaguṇahetūnaṃ pūriyā porī, poriyaṃ bhavāti porī,
tika-s0402t:1426_1: tāya poriyā. Tenāha “paripuṇṇavācāyā”ti, akkharapadaparipuṇṇāya vācāyāti attho. Apalibuddhāyāti
tika-s0402t:1426_2: pittādīhi na vibaddhāya ananubundhitāya. Anelagalāyāti anelāya agalāya niddosāya
tika-s0402t:1426_3: agaḷitapadabyañjanāya ca. Therassa hi kathayato padaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā na parihāyati.
tika-s0402t:1426_4: Tenāha “anelagalāyāti niddosāya ceva agaḷitāya cā”tiādi. Tattha niddosāyāti atthato
tika-s0402t:1426_5: ca byañjanato ca vigatadosāya. Apatitapadabyañjanāyāti avirahitapadabyañjanāya. Atha
tika-s0402t:1426_6: vā anelagalāyāti na elaṃ dosaṃ galatīti anelagalā. Avicchinnavācāya anelagalāya yathā
tika-s0402t:1426_7: dandhamanussā mukhena kheḷaṃ gaḷantena vācaṃ bhāsanti, na evarūpāya. Atha kho niddosāya
tika-s0402t:1426_8: visadavācāyāti attho. Vivaṭṭappakāsinī vācā na kadāci vivaṭṭamuttāti katvā āha “vivaṭṭapariyāpannāyā”ti,
tika-s0402t:1426_9: vivaṭṭaṃ amuñcitvā pavattāyāti attho. Vivaṭṭappakāsinī hi vācā vivaṭṭaṃ paricchijja
tika-s0402t:1426_10: āpādentī pavattati. Navalokuttaradhammo sabbadhammehi samussitaṭṭhena abbhuggataṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:1426_11: ca dhajo nāmāti āha “abbhuggataṭṭhenā”tiādi. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t:1429_0: 49. Navame aniccādīni vatthūni niccantiādinā viparītato asantīti vipallāsā, saññāya
tika-s0402t:1429_1: vipallāso saññāvipallāso. Itaresupi tīsu eseva nayo. Evamete catunnaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasena
tika-s0402t:1429_2: cattāro, tesu vatthūsu saññādīnaṃ vasena dvādasa honti. Tesu aṭṭha sotāpattimaggena
tika-s0402t:1429_3: pahīyanti. Asubhe subhanti saññācittavipallāsā sakadāgāmimaggena tanukā honti, anāgāmimaggena
tika-s0402t:1429_4: pahīyanti. Dukkhe sukhanti saññācittavipallāsā arahattamaggena pahīyantīti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1432_0: 50. Dasame upakkiliṭṭhabhāvakaraṇenāti malīnabhāvakaraṇena. Pañcavidhāya surāya catubbidhassa
tika-s0402t:1432_1: ca merayassāti ettha pūvasurā, piṭṭhasurā, odanasurā, kiṇṇapakkhittā, sambhārasaṃyuttāti
tika-s0402t:1432_2: pañca surā. Pupphāsavo, phalāsavo, madhvāsavo, guḷāsavoti cattāro āsavā, catubbidhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1432_3: merayaṃ nāma. Tattha pūve bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā pūvasurā.
tika-s0402t:1432_4: Evaṃ sesasurāpi. Kiṇṇāti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati. Ye surā “modakā”tipi vuccanti,
tika-s0402t:1432_5: te pakkhipitvā katā kiṇṇapakkhittā. Dhātakiāsavādinānāsambhārehi saṃyojitā sambhārasaṃyuttā.Madhukatālanāḷikerādipuppharaso
tika-s0402t:1432_6: ciraparivāsito pupphāsavo. Panasādiphalaraso phalāsavo. Muddikāraso madhvāsavo. Ucchuraso guḷāsavo.
tika-s0402t:1439_0: 51. Dutiyassa paṭhame puññābhisandāti vā puññanadiyo. Avicchedena niccaṃ pavattiyamānāni
tika-s0402t:1439_1: hi puññāni abhisandanaṭṭhena “puññābhisandā”ti vuttā. Aparimitanti āḷhakagaṇanāya
tika-s0402t:1439_2: aparimitaṃ, yojanavasena panassa parimāṇaṃ atthi. Tathā hi heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā upari
tika-s0402t:1439_3: ākāsena parato cakkavāḷapabbatena majjhe tattha tattha ṭhitehi dīpapabbatapariyantehi
tika-s0402t:1439_4: paricchinnattā yojanato sakkā pamāṇaṃ kātuṃ. Bheravārammaṇehīti saviññāṇakāviññāṇakehi
tika-s0402t:1442: 52. Dutiye sotāpannassa saddhā adhippetāti sotāpannassa maggenāgatā saddhā adhippetā.
tika-s0402t:1445_0: 53-54. Tatiye yathākammaṃ tā tā gatiyo aranti upagacchantīti ariyā, sattā. Ime pana
tika-s0402t:1445_1: kucchitā ariyāti kadariyā. Thaddhamaccharino, thaddhena maccharena samannāgatāti
tika-s0402t:1445_2: attho. Thaddhamacchariyasadisañhi kucchitaṃ sabbadā nihīnaṃ natthi sabbaguṇānaṃ ādibhūtassa
tika-s0402t:1445_4: thaddhamaccharino”ti. Ekacco hi attano vasanaṭṭhāne bhikkhū hatthaṃ pasāretvāpi na
tika-s0402t:1445_5: vandati. Aññattha gato vihāraṃ pavisitvā sakkaccaṃ vanditvā madhurappaṭisanthāraṃ
tika-s0402t:1445_6: karoti “kiṃ, bhante, amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ nāgacchatha, sampanno padeso, paṭibalāhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1445_7: ayyānaṃ yāgubhattādīhi upaṭṭhānaṃ kātu”nti. Bhikkhu “saddho ayaṃ upāsako”ti yāgubhattādīhi saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0402t:1446_0: Atheko thero tassa gāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya carati. So taṃ disvā aññena vā gacchati,
tika-s0402t:1446_1: gharaṃ vā pavisati. Sacepi sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchati, hatthena vanditvā “ayyassa bhikkhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1446_2: detha, ahaṃ ekena kammena gacchāmī”ti pakkamati. Thero sakalagāmaṃ caritvā tucchapattova
tika-s0402t:1446_3: nikkhamati. Idaṃ tāva mudumacchariyaṃ nāma. Yena adāyakopi dāyako viya paññāyati.
tika-s0402t:1446_4: Idha pana thaddhamacchariyaṃ adhippetaṃ. Yena samannāgato bhikkhūsu piṇḍāya paviṭṭhesu
tika-s0402t:1446_5: “therā ṭhitā”ti vutte “kiṃ mayhaṃ pādā rujjantī”tiādīni vatvā silāthambho viya khāṇuko
tika-s0402t:1446_6: viya ca thaddho hutvā tiṭṭhati, sāmīcimpi na karoti, kuto dānaṃ. Ayamidha adhippeto.
tika-s0402t:1446_7: Tena vuttaṃ “thaddhamaccharinoti thaddhena maccharena samannāgatāti attho”ti. Maccharaṃ
tika-s0402t:1447_0: Paribhāsakāti bhikkhū gharadvāre ṭhite disvā “kiṃ tumhe kasitvā āgatā vapitvā lāyitvā,
tika-s0402t:1447_1: mayaṃ attanopi na labhāma, kuto tumhākaṃ, sīghaṃ nikkhamathā”tiādīhi santajjakā.
tika-s0402t:1447_2: Yācakānaṃ vacanassa atthaṃ jānantīti ettha kiñcāpi bhikkhū gharadvāre ṭhitā tuṇhī
tika-s0402t:1447_3: honti, atthato pana “bhikkhaṃ dethā”ti vadanti nāma ariyāya yācanāya. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0402t:1447_4: “uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā”ti. Tatra ye “mayaṃ pacāma, ime na pacanti,
tika-s0402t:1447_5: pacamāne patvā alabhantā kuhiṃ labhissatī”ti deyyadhammaṃ saṃvibhajanti, te vadaññū
tika-s0402t:1447_6: yācakānaṃ vacanassa atthaṃ jānanti nāma ñatvā kattabbakaraṇato. Catutthaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1450_0: 55-56. Pañcame anuggaṇhanatthanti nakulamātā nakulapitāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ saṅgahatthāya.
tika-s0402t:1450_1: Nakulassa dārakassa pitā nakulapitā. Nakulamātāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sesamettha
tika-s0402t:1453_0: 57-60. Sattame āyubhāgapaṭilābhinī hotīti āyukoṭṭhāsassa paṭilābhinī hoti. Tividhalokanti
tika-s0402t:1453_1: sattasaṅkhārabhājanasaṅkhātaṃ tividhaṃ lokaṃ. Viditaṃ katvāti vibhūtaṃ katvā. Lokavidūnanti
tika-s0402t:1453_2: karaṇatthe sāmivacananti āha “buddhehi pasatthā”ti. Aṭṭhamanavamadasamāni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0402t:1458_0: 61-64. Dutiyassa paṭhame ye aniṭṭhā na honti, te iṭṭhāti adhippetāti āha “aniṭṭhapaṭikkhepena
tika-s0402t:1458_1: iṭṭhā”ti. Iṭṭhāti ca pariyiṭṭhā vā hotu mā vā, iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtāti attho. Gavesitampi
tika-s0402t:1458_2: hi iṭṭhanti vuccati, taṃ idha nādhippetaṃ. Maneti manasmiṃ. Kantāti vā kamanīyā,
tika-s0402t:1458_3: kāmetabbāti attho. Manaṃ appāyantīti iṭṭhabhāvena manaṃ vaḍḍhenti. Kammasādhano idha
tika-s0402t:1458_4: bhoga-saddoti āha “bhogāti bhuñjitabbā”tiādi. Dhammūpaghātaṃ katvā kusaladhammaṃ
tika-s0402t:1458_6: sukhadukkhesu uppannesu anussaritabbattāti attho. Sandiṭṭhasambhattehīti ettha tattha
tika-s0402t:1458_7: tattha saṅgamma diṭṭhamattā nātidaḷhamittā sandiṭṭhā, suṭṭhu bhattā sinehavanto daḷhamittā sambhattā.
tika-s0402t:1459: Visamalobhanti balavalobhaṃ. Sukhitanti sañjātasukhaṃ. Pīṇitanti dhātaṃ suhitaṃ. Tathābhūto pana yasmā balasampanno hoti, tasmā “balasampannaṃ karotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1460_0: Sobhane kāyikavācasikakamme ratoti sūrato ukārassa dīghaṃ katvā, tassa bhāvo soraccaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1460_1: kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo. So pana atthato susīlabhāvoti āha “khantisoracce niviṭṭhāti
tika-s0402t:1460_2: adhivāsanakkhantiyañca susīlatāya ca niviṭṭhā”ti. Ekamattānanti ekaṃ cittanti attho.
tika-s0402t:1460_3: Rāgādīnañhi pubbabhāgiyaṃ damanādi paccekaṃ icchitabbaṃ, na maggakkhaṇe viya ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1460_4: paṭisaṅkhānamukhena pajahanato. Ekamattānanti vā vivekavasena ekaṃ ekākinaṃ attānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1460_6: uparūparikāmabhūmīsu. Kammassa phalaṃ aggaṃ nāma. Taṃ panettha uccagāmīti āha “uddhamaggamassā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1460_7: Suvagge niyuttā, suvaggappayojanāti vā sovaggikā. Dasannaṃ visesānanti dibbaāyuvaṇṇayasasukhaādhipateyyānañceva
tika-s0402t:1460_8: iṭṭharūpādīnañca phalavisesānaṃ. Vaṇṇaggahaṇena cettha sako attabhāvavaṇṇo gahito,
tika-s0402t:1463_0: 65. Pañcame paminoti uḷāratādivisesaṃ etenāti pamāṇaṃ, rupakāyo pamāṇaṃ etassāti
tika-s0402t:1463_1: rūpappamāṇo. Tato eva rūpe pasannoti rūpappasanno. Ghosoti cettha thutighoso. Lūkhanti
tika-s0402t:1463_2: paccayalūkhatā. Dhammāti sīlādayo guṇadhammā adhippetā. Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1464_0: “Katamo ca puggalo rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno? Idhekacco puggalo ārohaṃ vā passitvā
tika-s0402t:1464_1: pariṇāhaṃ vā passitvā saṇṭhānaṃ vā passitvā pāripūriṃ vā passitvā tattha pamāṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1464_2: gahetvā pasādaṃ janeti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno.
tika-s0402t:1465_0: “Katamo ca puggalo ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno? Idhekacco puggalo paravaṇṇanāya parathomanāya
tika-s0402t:1465_1: parapasaṃsanāya paravaṇṇahārikāya tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasādaṃ janeti. Ayaṃ vuccati
tika-s0402t:1466_0: “Katamo ca puggalo lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno? Idhekacco puggalo cīvaralūkhaṃ vā
tika-s0402t:1466_1: passitvā pattalūkhaṃ vā passitvā senāsanalūkhaṃ vā passitvā vividhaṃ vā dukkarakārikaṃ
tika-s0402t:1466_2: passitvā tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasādaṃ janeti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno.
tika-s0402t:1467_0: “Katamo ca puggalo dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno? Idhekacco puggalo sīlaṃ vā passitvā
tika-s0402t:1467_1: samādhiṃ vā passitvā paññaṃ vā passitvā tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasādaṃ janeti. Ayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1468_0: Tattha ārohanti uccataṃ. Sā ca kho tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle pamāṇayuttā daṭṭhabbā. Pariṇāhanti
tika-s0402t:1468_1: nātikisathūlatāvasena pīṇataṃ. Saṇṭhānanti tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ susaṇṭhitataṃ
tika-s0402t:1468_3: paripuṇṇataṃ avikalataṃ. Tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvāti tasmiṃ rūpe rūpasampattiyaṃ pamāṇabhāvaṃ
tika-s0402t:1468_4: upādāya. Pasādaṃ janetīti adhimokkhaṃ janeti uppādeti.
tika-s0402t:1469_0: Paravaṇṇanāyāti “asuko ediso ca ediso cā”ti parassa guṇavacanena. Parathomanāyāti
tika-s0402t:1469_1: parammukhā parassa silāghuppādakena abhitthavanena parena thutivasena, gāthādiupanibandhanena
tika-s0402t:1469_2: vuttāya thomanāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Parapasaṃsanāyāti parammukhā parassa guṇasaṃkittanena.
tika-s0402t:1469_3: Paravaṇṇahārikāyāti paramparavaṇṇahārikāya paramparāya parassa kittanasaddassa upasaṃhārena.
tika-s0402t:1470_1: lūkhabhāvaṃ. Vividhaṃ vā dukkarakārikanti dhutaṅgādivasena pavattanānāvidhaṃ dukkaracariyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1470_2: Sīlaṃ vā passitvāti sīlapāripūrivasena visuddhaṃ kāyavacīsucaritaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā passitvā,
tika-s0402t:1470_3: jhānādiadhigamasuddhisamādhiṃ vā vipassanābhiññāsaṅkhātaṃ paññaṃ vā passitvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1471_0: Evametasmiṃ catuppamāṇe lokasannivāse buddhesu appasannā mandā, pasannā bahukā. Rūpappamāṇassa
tika-s0402t:1471_1: hi buddharūpato uttari pasādāvahaṃ rūpaṃ nāma natthi. Ghosappamāṇassa buddhānaṃ kittighosato
tika-s0402t:1471_2: uttari pasādāvaho ghoso nāma natthi. Lūkhappamāṇassa kāsikāni vatthāni mahārahāni
tika-s0402t:1471_3: kañcanabhājanāni tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike sabbasampattiyutte pāsādavare pahāya paṃsukūlacīvaraselamayapattarukkhamūlādisenāsanasevino
tika-s0402t:1471_4: buddhassa bhagavato lūkhato uttari pasādāvahaṃ aññaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthi. Dhammappamāṇassa
tika-s0402t:1471_5: sadevake loke asādhāraṇasīlādiguṇassa tathāgatassa sīlādiguṇato uttari pasādāvaho
tika-s0402t:1471_6: añño sīlādiguṇo nāma natthi. Iti bhagavā imaṃ catuppamāṇikaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ muṭṭhinā
tika-s0402t:1472: Pamāṇiṃsūti pamāṇaṃ aggahesuṃ. Niyakajjhatte tassa guṇaṃ na jānātīti tassa abbhantare pavattamānaṃ sīlādiguṇaṃ na jānāti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t:1475_0: 67. Sattame daṭṭhavisānevāti avadhāraṇena diṭṭhavisādayo nivatteti. Kaṭṭhamukhādayo
tika-s0402t:1475_1: hi cattāro āsīvisā daṭṭhaviso, diṭṭhaviso, phuṭṭhaviso, vātavisoti paccekaṃ catubbidhā
tika-s0402t:1475_2: hontīti visavegavikāravasena soḷasa vuttā. Tesu daṭṭhavisānaṃyeva idha gahaṇaṃ, na
tika-s0402t:1478_0: 68. Aṭṭhame kāle sampatteti gabbhassa paripākagatattā vijāyanakāle sampatte. Potakanti
tika-s0402t:1478_1: assatariyā puttaṃ. “Phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hantī”tiādigāthāya kukkujakeneva pattavaṭṭipasavassa
tika-s0402t:1478_2: ucchinnattā phaluppatti kadaliyā parābhavāya hotīti āha “phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hantī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1478_3: Kukkujakaṃ nāma kadaliyā pupphanāḷaṃ. Tathā phalapākapariyosānattā osadhīnaṃ “phalaṃ
tika-s0402t:1478_4: veḷuṃ naḷa”nti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha piṇḍattho – yathā attano phalaṃ kadaliveḷunaḷe
tika-s0402t:1478_5: vināseti, gabbho ca assatariṃ, evaṃ attano kammabhūto sakkāro asappurisaṃ vināsetīti.
tika-s0402t:1481_0: 69. Navame padahati etehīti padhānāni. Uttamavīriyāni seṭṭhavīriyāni visiṭṭhassa
tika-s0402t:1481_1: atthassa sādhanato. Kilesānaṃ saṃvaratthāyāti yathā abhijjhādayo na uppajjanti, evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1481_2: satiyā upaṭṭhānena kilesānaṃ saṃvaraṇatthāya. Pajahanatthāyāti kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vinodanatthāya.
tika-s0402t:1481_3: Padhānanti tasseva pajahanassa sādhanavasena pavattavīriyaṃ. Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1481_4: brūhanatthāyāti bojjhaṅgasaṅkhātānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ vaḍḍhanatthāya. Padhānanti tasseva
tika-s0402t:1484_0: 70. Dasame visamanti bhāvanapuṃsakametaṃ. Tenāha “visamā hutvā”ti. Asamayenāti akāle.
tika-s0402t:1484_1: Bhummatthe hetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Pakaṭṭhaṃ padhānaṃ añjasaṃ etesanti pañjasā, añjasaṃ
tika-s0402t:1484_2: pagatā paṭipannāti vā pañjasā, pakatimaggagāmino. Na pañjasā apañjasā, amaggappaṭipannā.
tika-s0402t:1484_3: Te pana yasmā maggato apagatā nāma honti, tasmā vuttaṃ “maggato apagatā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1485_0: Gāthāsu pana evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Gunnaṃ ce taramānānanti gāvīsu mahoghaṃ
tika-s0402t:1485_1: tarantīsu. Jimhaṃ gacchati puṅgavoti yadi yūthapati usabho kuṭilaṃ gacchati. Sabbā
tika-s0402t:1485_2: tā jimhaṃ gacchantīti sabbā tā gāviyo kuṭilameva gacchanti. Kasmā? Nette jimhaṃ gate
tika-s0402t:1485_3: sati tassa kuṭilagatattā. So hi tāsaṃ paccayiko upaddavaharo ca. Evamevanti yathā
tika-s0402t:1485_4: cetaṃ, evameva yo manussesu padhānasammato, yadi so adhammacārī siyā, ye tassa anujīvino,
tika-s0402t:1485_5: sabbepi adhammikā honti. Sāmisampadā hi pakatisampadaṃ sampādeti. Yasmā etadevaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1485_6: tasmā sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti adhammiko.
tika-s0402t:1490_0: 71-72. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame yavati tena phalaṃ missitaṃ viya hotīti yoni, ekantikaṃ
tika-s0402t:1490_1: kāraṇaṃ. Assāti yathāvuttassa bhikkhuno. Paripuṇṇanti avikalaṃ anavasesaṃ. Āsave
tika-s0402t:1490_2: khepetīti āsavakkhayo, aggamaggo. Idha pana arahattaphalaṃ adhippetanti āha “arahattatthāyā”ti. Dutiyaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1493_0: 73-75. Tatiye pañhatthāya abhinītoti pañhakaraṇatthāya abhimukhaṃ nīto. Alambitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1493_1: katvāti alambaṃ katvā, ayameva vā pāṭho, vipalambaṃ akatvāti attho. Avajānātīti avaññaṃ
tika-s0402t:1493_2: karoti, nindatīti attho. Catutthapañcame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1496_0: 76. Chaṭṭhe nagaraṃ pavisitukāmā uyyānato upecca vattanti gacchanti etenāti upavattanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1496_1: Yatheva hi kalambanaditīrato rājamātuvihāradvārena thūpārāmaṃ gantabbaṃ hoti, evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1496_2: hiraññavatikāya pārimatīrato sālavanaṃ uyyānaṃ, yathā anurādhapurassa thūpārāmo dakkhiṇapacchimadisāya,
tika-s0402t:1496_3: evaṃ taṃ uyyānaṃ kusinārāya dakkhiṇapacchimadisāya hoti. Yathā thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena
tika-s0402t:1496_4: nagaraṃ pavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati, evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti
tika-s0402t:1496_5: pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā, tasmā taṃ “upavattana”nti vuccati. Antareti
tika-s0402t:1496_6: dvinnaṃ sālarukkhānaṃ vemajjhe. Tattha hi paññāpiyamānassa mañcassa ekā sālapanti
tika-s0402t:1496_7: sīsabhāge hoti, ekā pādabhāge. Tatrapi eko taruṇasālo sīsabhāgassa āsanno hoti, eko
