tika-s0402t:1496_8: pādabhāgassa. Apica yamakasālā nāma mūlakhandhaviṭapapattehi aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbitvā
tika-s0402t:1497_0: Dveḷhakanti dvidhāgāho, anekaṃsaggāhoti attho. Vimatīti saṃsayāpattīti āha “vinicchituṃ
tika-s0402t:1497_1: asamatthatā”ti. Taṃ vo vadāmīti taṃ saṃsayavantaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vo tumhe vadāmīti.
tika-s0402t:1497_2: Nikkaṅkhabhāvapaccakkhakaraṇanti buddhādīsu tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nikkaṅkhabhāvassa paccakkhakāriyā
tika-s0402t:1497_3: yāthāvato tamatthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇameva. Etthāti etasmiṃ atthe.
tika-s0402t:1500_0: 77. Sattame lokacintāti lokasannivesappaṭisaṃyuttā vīmaṃsā. Tenāha “kena nu kho candimasūriyā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1500_1: Nāḷikerādayoti ādi-saddena avuttānaṃ osadhitiṇavanappatiādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Evarūpā lokacintāti
tika-s0402t:1503_0: 78. Aṭṭhame dānasaṅkhātāya dakkhiṇāyāti deyyadhammasaṅkhātāya dakkhiṇāya. Visuddhi
tika-s0402t:1503_1: nāma mahājutikatā. Sā pana mahapphalatāya veditabbāti āha “mahapphalabhāvenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1503_2: Visujjhatīti na kilissati, amalinā mahājutikā mahāvipphārā hotīti attho. Sucidhammoti
tika-s0402t:1503_3: rāgādiasucividhamanena sucisabhāvo. Lāmakadhammoti hīnasabhāvo pāpakiriyāya. Akusaladhammā
tika-s0402t:1503_4: hi ekantanihīnā. Jūjako sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo na hoti, tassa mahābodhisattassa attano
tika-s0402t:1503_5: puttadānaṃ dānapāramiyā matthakaṃ gaṇhantaṃ mahāpathavikampanasamatthaṃ jātaṃ. Svāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1503_6: dāyakaguṇoti āha “vessantaramahārājā kathetabbo”tiādi. Uddharatīti bahulaṃ pāpakammavasena
tika-s0402t:1503_7: laddhabbavinipātato uddharati, tasmā natthi mayhaṃ kiñci cittassa aññatthattanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:1504_0: Petadakkhiṇanti pete uddissa dātabbadakkhiṇaṃ. Pāpitakāleyevāti “idaṃ dānaṃ asukassa
tika-s0402t:1504_1: petassa hotū”ti taṃuddisanavasena pattiyā pāpitakāleyeva. Assāti petassa. Pāpuṇīti
tika-s0402t:1504_2: phalasampattilabhāpanavasena pāpuṇi. Ayañhi pete uddissa dāne dhammatā. Tadā kosalarañño
tika-s0402t:1504_3: pariccāgavasena ativiya dānajjhāsayataṃ buddhappamukhassa ca saṅghassa ukkaṃsagataguṇavisiṭṭhataṃ
tika-s0402t:1507_0: 79-80. Navame taṃsadisāti yādisā vaṇijjā payuttā ayathādhippāyā aññā vā sampajjati,
tika-s0402t:1507_1: tādisāvāti attho. Chedaṃ gacchatīti vināsaṃ pāpuṇāti. Adhippāyato parā visiṭṭhāti
tika-s0402t:1507_2: parādhippāyo. Tenevāha “ajjhāsayato adhikataraphalā hotī”ti. Cīvarādinā paccayena
tika-s0402t:1507_3: vadeyyāsīti cīvarādipaccayahetu maṃ vadeyyāsi pattheyyāsi. Atha vā yadā cīvarādinā
tika-s0402t:1507_4: paccayena attho hoti, tadā maṃ yāceyyāsīti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Dasamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1512_0: 81-86. Catutthassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva. Pañcame “nīce kule paccājāto”tiādikena
tika-s0402t:1512_1: appakāsabhāvena tamatīti tamo, tena tamena yuttoti tamo puggalo vuccati. Tathā hi
tika-s0402t:1512_2: taṃyogato puggalassa tabbohāro yathā “maccherayogato maccharo”ti, tasmā tamoti appakāsabhāvena
tika-s0402t:1512_3: tamo tamabhūto andhakāraṃ viya jāto, andhakārattaṃ vā pattoti attho. Vuttalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1512_4: tamameva paramparato ayanaṃ gati niṭṭhā etassāti tamaparāyaṇo. Ubhayenapi tamaggahaṇena
tika-s0402t:1512_5: khandhatamo kathito, na andhakāratamo. Khandhatamoti ca sampattirahitā khandhapavattiyeva
tika-s0402t:1512_6: daṭṭhabbā. “Ucce kule paccājāto”tiādikena pakāsabhāvena jotetīti joti, tena jotināyuttotiādi
tika-s0402t:1512_7: sabbaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Itare dveti jotitamaparāyaṇo, jotijotiparāyaṇoti itare dve puggale.
tika-s0402t:1513_1: nesādā, māgavikamacchabandhādayo. Rathesu cammena nahaṇakaraṇato rathakārā, cammakārā.
tika-s0402t:1513_2: Puiti karīsassa nāmaṃ, taṃ kusenti apanentīti pukkusā, pupphachaḍḍakā. Dubbaṇṇoti
tika-s0402t:1513_3: virūpo. Okoṭimakoti ārohābhāvena heṭṭhimako, rassakāyoti attho. Tenāha “lakuṇḍako”ti.
tika-s0402t:1513_4: Laku viya ghaṭikā viya ḍeti pavattatīti lakuṇḍako, rasso. Kaṇati nimīlatīti kāṇo.
tika-s0402t:1513_5: Taṃ panassa nimīlanaṃ ekena akkhinā dvīhipi vāti āha “ekacchikāṇo vā ubhayacchikāṇo
tika-s0402t:1513_6: vā”ti. Kuṇanaṃ kuṇo, hatthavekallaṃ, so etassa atthīti kuṇī. Khañjo vuccati pādavikalo.
tika-s0402t:1513_7: Heṭṭhimakāyasaṅkhāto sarīrassa pakkho padeso hato assāti pakkhahato. Tenāha “pīṭhasappī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1513_8: Padīpe padīpane etabbaṃ netabbanti padīpeyyaṃ, telakapālādiupakaraṇaṃ. Vuttanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1514_0: Āgamanavipattīti āgamanaṭṭhānavasena vipatti “āgamo etthā”ti katvā. Pubbuppannapaccayavipattīti
tika-s0402t:1514_1: paṭhamuppannapaccayavasena viparāvatti. Caṇḍālādisabhāvā hissa mātāpitaro paṭhamuppannapaccayo.
tika-s0402t:1514_2: Pavattapaccayavipattīti pavatte sukhapaccayavipatti. Tādise nihīnakule uppannopi
tika-s0402t:1514_3: koci vibhavasampanno siyā, ayaṃ pana duggato durūpo. Ājīvupāyavipattīti ājīvanupāyavasena
tika-s0402t:1514_4: vipatti. Sukhena hi jīvikaṃ pavattetuṃ upāyabhūtā hatthisippādayo imassa natthi,
tika-s0402t:1514_5: pupphachaḍḍanasilākoṭṭanādikammaṃ pana katvā jīvikaṃ pavatteti. Tenāha “kasiravuttike”ti.
tika-s0402t:1514_8: vināso anupaladdhi. Joti ceva jotiparāyaṇabhāvo ca sukkapakkho. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1517: 87. Sattame ma-kāro padasandhikaro “aññamañña”ntiādīsu viya. Niccalasamaṇoti thirasamaṇo. Abhisiñcitabboti abhisekoti kammasādhano abhisekasaddo. Tenāha “abhisekaṃ kātuṃ yutto”ti.
tika-s0402t:1518_0: Bākulatthero viyāti thero hi mahāyasassī, tassa puttadhītaro nattupanattakā sukhumasāṭakehi
tika-s0402t:1518_1: cīvarāni kāretvā rajāpetvā samugge pakkhipitvā pahiṇanti. Therassa nahānakāle nahānakoṭṭhake
tika-s0402t:1518_2: ṭhapenti. Thero tāni nivāseti ceva pārupati ca. Tenevetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1519_0: Khadiravanamagge sīvalitthero viyāti satthari kira taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanne devatā “amhākaṃ
tika-s0402t:1519_1: ayyassa sīvalittherassa sakkāraṃ karissāmā”ti cintetvā ekekayojane vihāraṃ kāretvā
tika-s0402t:1519_2: ekayojanato uddhaṃ gantuṃ adatvā pātova uṭṭhāya dibbāni yāguādīni gahetvā “amhākaṃ
tika-s0402t:1519_3: ayyo sīvalitthero kahaṃ nisinno”ti vicaranti. Thero attano abhihaṭaṃ buddhappamukhassa
tika-s0402t:1519_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa dāpesi. Evaṃ satthā saparivāro tiṃsayojanikaṃ kantāraṃ sīvalittherassa
tika-s0402t:1520: Aṭṭhakanāgarasutte ānandatthero viyāti aṭṭhakanāgarako kira gahapati therassa dhammadesanāya pasīditvā pañcasatagghanakaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā adāsi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1521_0: Pilindavacchatthero viyāti therassa kira iddhānubhāvena pasannā manussā sappiādīni
tika-s0402t:1521_1: bahūni bhesajjāni abhihariṃsu. Pakatiyāpi ca āyasmā pilindavaccho lābhī hoti pañcannaṃ
tika-s0402t:1521_2: bhesajjānaṃ, laddhaṃ laddhaṃ parisāya vissajjeti. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ “gilānapaccayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1522_0: Tiṇṇampi sannipātena nibbattānīti pittādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi visamānaṃ sannipātena jātāni.
tika-s0402t:1522_1: Atisītādibhāvena utūnaṃ pariṇāmoti āha “atisītaatiuṇhaututo jātānī”ti. Purimaututo
tika-s0402t:1522_2: visadiso utu utupariṇāmo, tato jātāni utupariṇāmajāni, visabhāgaututo jātānīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1522_3: Jaṅgaladesavāsīnañhi anūpadese vasantānaṃ visabhāgova utu uppajjati, anūpadesavāsīnañca
tika-s0402t:1522_4: jaṅgaladeseti. Evaṃ malayasamuddatīrādivasenapi utuvisabhāgatā uppajjatiyeva. Tato
tika-s0402t:1523_0: Attano pakaticariyānaṃ visamaṃ kāyassa pariharaṇavasena visamaparihārajāni. Tāni
tika-s0402t:1523_3: opakkamikāni, ayaṃ coroti vā pāradārikoti vā gahetvā jaṇṇukakapparamuggarādīhi nippothanaupakkamaṃ
tika-s0402t:1523_4: paccayaṃ katvā uppannānīti attho. Tenāha “vadhabandhanādiupakkamena nibbattānī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1523_5: Kevalanti bāhiraṃ paccayaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ, tena vināti attho. Tenāha “pubbekatakammavipākavaseneva jātānī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1526_0: 88-90. Aṭṭhame sotāpanno catūhi vātehi indakhīlo viya parappavādehi akampiyo acalasaddhāya
tika-s0402t:1526_1: samannāgatattā sāsane laddhappatiṭṭho samaṇamacalo nāmāti āha “sāsane laddhappatiṭṭhattā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1526_2: Thaddhabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso samucchinnattāti cittassa thaddhabhāvakarānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1526_3: uddhambhāgiyakilesānaṃ sabbaso abhāvā samaṇasukhumālo nāma sukhumālabhāvappattito.
tika-s0402t:1534_1: vattabbe “appaṭivānī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vīriyappavāhe vattamāne antarā eva paṭigamanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1534_2: nivattanaṃ paṭivānaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti paṭivānī, na paṭivānī appaṭivānī, tassa bhāvo
tika-s0402t:1534_3: appaṭivānitā, anivattanāti attho. Appaṭivānīti vā itthiliṅgavasenevāyaṃ niddeso.
tika-s0402t:1534_4: Antarāyeva paṭigamanaṃ nivattanaṃ paṭivānī, na paṭivānī appaṭivānī, anivattanāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1537_0: 94. Catutthe saṇṭhapetabbanti sammadeva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Yathā pana ṭhapitaṃ saṇṭhapitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1537_1: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “sannisādetabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sannisādetabbanti samādhippaṭipakkhe
tika-s0402t:1537_2: kilese sannisīdāpentena cittaṃ gocarajjhatte sannisīdāpetabbanti. Ekodi kātabbanti
tika-s0402t:1537_3: abyaggabhāvāpādanena ekaggaṃ kātabbaṃ. Samādahitabbanti yathā ārammaṇe suṭṭhu appitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1537_4: hoti, evaṃ sammā sammadeva ādahitabbaṃ, suṭṭhu āropetabbaṃ samāhitaṃ kātabbanti attho.
tika-s0402t:1540_0: 95-96. Pañcame chavālātanti chavānaṃ daḍḍhaṭṭhāne alātaṃ. Tenevāha “susāne alāta”nti.
tika-s0402t:1540_1: Majjhaṭṭhāne gūthamakkhitanti pamāṇena aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu ādittaṃ majjhe
tika-s0402t:1540_2: gūthamakkhitaṃ. Kaṭṭhatthanti kaṭṭhena kātabbakiccaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1543_2: vācā assāti kalyāṇavāco. Tenāha “sundaravacano”ti. Kalyāṇaṃ madhuraṃ vākkaraṇaṃ udāhāraghoso
tika-s0402t:1543_3: assāti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo. Guṇaparipuṇṇabhāvena pūre puṇṇabhāve bhavāti porī, tāya
tika-s0402t:1543_4: poriyā. Tenāha “guṇaparipuṇṇāyā”ti. Pure bhavattā poriyā nāgarikitthiyā sukhumālattanena
tika-s0402t:1543_5: sadisāti porī, tāya poriyā. “Sukhumālattanenā”ti iminā tassā vācāya mudusaṇhabhāvo
tika-s0402t:1543_6: vutto. Apalibuddhāyāti pittasemhādīhi na paliveṭhitāya. Adosāyāti sandiddhavilambitādidosarahitāya
tika-s0402t:1543_8: anelagalāyāti imasseva atthavacanaṃ. Anelagalāyāti hi anelāya ceva agalāya cāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1543_9: Atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ samatthāyāti ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā bhāsitatthassa
tika-s0402t:1550_0: 101-2. Tatiyapaṇṇāsakassa paṭhame gajjitāti thanitā. Tattha gajjitvā novassanabhāvo
tika-s0402t:1550_1: nāma pāpako. Manussā hi yadā devo gajjati, tadā “suvuṭṭhitā bhavissatī”ti bījāni
tika-s0402t:1550_2: nīharitvā vapanti. Atha deve avassante khette bījāni khetteyeva nassanti, gehe bījāni
tika-s0402t:1550_3: geheyeva nassantīti dubbhikkhaṃ hoti. Nogajjitvā vassanabhāvopi pāpako. Manussā hi
tika-s0402t:1550_4: imasmiṃ kāle “dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissatī”ti ninnaṭṭhānesuyeva vappaṃ karonti. Atha devo
tika-s0402t:1550_5: vassitvā sabbabījāni mahāsamuddaṃ pāpeti, dubbhikkhameva hoti. Gajjitvā vassanabhāvo
tika-s0402t:1550_6: pana bhaddako. Tadā hi subhikkhaṃ hoti. Nogajjitvā novassanabhāvo ekantapāpakova.
tika-s0402t:1550_7: Bhāsitā hoti no kattāti “idāni ganthadhuraṃ pūressāmi, vāsadhuraṃ pūressāmī”ti kathetiyeva,
tika-s0402t:1550_8: na uddesaṃ gaṇhāti, na kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāveti.
tika-s0402t:1551_0: Kattā hoti no bhāsitāti “ganthadhuraṃ pūressāmi, vāsadhuraṃ vā”ti na bhāsati, sampatte
tika-s0402t:1551_1: pana kāle samattaṃ sampādeti. Iminā nayena itarepi veditabbā. Atha vā sabbaṃ panetaṃ
tika-s0402t:1551_2: paccayadāyakeheva kathitaṃ. Eko hi “asukadivase nāma dānaṃ dassāmī”ti saṅghaṃ nimanteti,
tika-s0402t:1551_3: sampatte kāle no karoti. Ayaṃ puggalo puññena parihāyati, bhikkhusaṅgho pana lābhena
tika-s0402t:1551_4: parihāyati. Aparo saṅghaṃ animantetvā sakkāraṃ katvā “bhikkhū ānessāmī”ti na labhi,
tika-s0402t:1551_5: sabbe aññattha nimantitā honti. Ayampi puññena parihāyati, saṅghopi lābhena parihāyati.
tika-s0402t:1551_6: Aparo paṭhamaṃ saṅghaṃ nimantetvā pacchā sakkāraṃ katvā dānaṃ deti, ayaṃ kiccakārī
tika-s0402t:1551_7: hoti. Aparo neva saṅghaṃ nimanteti, na dānaṃ deti, ayaṃ pāpapuggaloti veditabbo. Dutiyaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1554_0: 103. Tatiye rittakoti anto ritto. Pihitamukhoti pidahitvā ṭhapito. Apārutamukhoti
tika-s0402t:1554_1: vivaritvā ṭhapito, upamitapuggalesu panettha antoguṇasāravirahito ca tuccho, bāhirasobhanatāya
tika-s0402t:1554_2: pihito puggaloti veditabbo. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:1557_0: 104. Catutthe udakarahado jaṇṇukamattepi udake sati paṇṇarasasambhinnavaṇṇattā vā
tika-s0402t:1557_1: bahalattā vā udakassa apaññāyamānatalo uttāno gambhīrobhāso nāma hotīti āha “purāṇapaṇṇarasa…pe…
tika-s0402t:1557_2: gambhīrobhāso nāmā”ti. Tiporisacatuporise pana udake sati acchattā udakassa paññāyamānatalo
tika-s0402t:1557_3: gambhīro uttānobhāso nāma hotīti āha “acchavippasannamaṇivaṇṇaudako uttānobhāso nāmā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1557_4: Ubhayakāraṇasambhavato pana itare dve veditabbā. Puggalepi kilesussadabhāvato guṇagambhīratāya
tika-s0402t:1557_5: ca abhāvato guṇagambhīrānaṃ sadisehi abhikkamanādīhi yutto uttāno gambhīrobhāso nāma.
tika-s0402t:1560_0: 105-6. Pañcame āmakaṃ hutvāti anto āmaṃ hutvā. Pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇīti anto pakkaṃ bahi
tika-s0402t:1560_1: āmasadisaṃ. Tattha yathā ambe apakkabhāvo āmatā hoti, evaṃ puggalepi puthujjanatā.
tika-s0402t:1560_2: Yathā ca tattha pakkasadisatā pakkavaṇṇitā, evaṃ puggalepi ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādisadisatā
tika-s0402t:1560_3: pakkavaṇṇitāti iminā nayena sesā veditabbā. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1563_0: 107. Sattame āvāṭaṃ khanatīti attano āsayaṃ bilakūpaṃ khanati. Na ca tattha vasatīti
tika-s0402t:1563_1: tattha avasitvā kismiñcideva ṭhāne vasati, evaṃ biḷārādiamittavasaṃ gacchati. Vasitā
tika-s0402t:1563_2: no gādhaṃ kattāti sayaṃ na khanati, parena kate bile vasati, evaṃ jīvitaṃ rakkhati.
tika-s0402t:1563_3: Tatiyā dvepi karontī jīvitaṃ rakkhati. Catutthī dvepi akarontī amittavasaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0402t:1563_4: Imāya pana upamāya upamitesu puggalesu paṭhamo yathā sā mūsikā gādhaṃ khanati, evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1563_5: navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ uggaṇhāti. Yathā pana sā tattha na vasati, kismiñcideva ṭhāne
tika-s0402t:1563_6: vasantī amittavasaṃ gacchati, tathā ayampi pariyattivasena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā catusaccadhammaṃ
tika-s0402t:1563_8: vasaṃ gacchati. Dutiyo yathā mūsikā gādhaṃ na khanati, evaṃ navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1563_9: na uggaṇhāti. Yathā pana parena khanite bile vasantī jīvitaṃ rakkhati, evaṃ parassa
tika-s0402t:1563_10: kathaṃ sutvā catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vasaṃ atikkamati. Iminā
tika-s0402t:1566_0: 108. Aṭṭhame balībaddo tāva yo attano gogaṇaṃ ghaṭṭeti ubbejeti, paragoṇe pana sūrato
tika-s0402t:1566_1: sukhasīlo hoti, ayaṃ sagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo nāma. Puggalopi attano parisaṃ
tika-s0402t:1566_2: ghaṭṭento vijjhanto pharuse samudācaranto, paraparisāya pana soraccaṃ nivātavuttitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1566_3: āpajjanto sagavacaṇḍo nāmāti iminā nayena sesāpi veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1569_0: 109. Navame rukkho tāva pheggu sāraparivāroti vanajeṭṭhakarukkho sayaṃ pheggu hoti,
tika-s0402t:1569_1: parivārarukkhā panassa sārā honti. Iminā nayena sesā veditabbā. Puggalesu pana sīlasāravirahitato
tika-s0402t:1572_0: 110. Dasame yassa visaṃ pajjalitatiṇukkāya aggi viya sīghaṃ abhiruhitvā akkhīni gahetvā
tika-s0402t:1572_1: khandhaṃ gahetvā sīsaṃ gahetvā ṭhitanti vattabbataṃ āpajjati maṇisappādīnaṃ visaṃ
tika-s0402t:1572_2: viya, mantaṃ pana parivattetvā kaṇṇavātaṃ datvā daṇḍakena pahaṭamatte otaritvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-s0402t:1572_3: tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ āgataviso na ghoraviso nāma. Yassa pana visaṃ saṇikaṃ abhiruhati,
tika-s0402t:1572_4: āruḷhāruḷhaṭṭhāne pana āsittaudakaṃ viya hoti udakasappādīnaṃ viya, dvādasavassaccayenapi
tika-s0402t:1572_5: kaṇṇaviddhakhandhapiṭṭhikādīsu paññāyati, mantaparivattanādīsu ca kariyamānesu sīghaṃ
tika-s0402t:1572_6: na otarati, ayaṃ ghoraviso na āgataviso nāma. Yassa pana visaṃ sīghaṃ abhiruhati,
tika-s0402t:1572_7: na sīghaṃ otarati aneḷakasappādīnaṃ visaṃ viya, ayaṃ āgataviso ca ghoraviso ca. Aneḷakasappo
tika-s0402t:1572_8: nāma mahāāsīviso. Yassa visaṃ mandaṃ hoti, ohāriyamānampi sukheneva otarati nīlasappadhamanisappādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1572_9: visaṃ viya, ayaṃ neva āgataviso na ghoraviso. Nīlasappo nāma sākhavaṇṇo rukkhaggādīsu vicaraṇasappo.
tika-s0402t:1577: 111-117. Dutiyassa paṭhame assadammeti dammanayogge asse. Sāretīti sikkhāpeti pavatteti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Dutiyādīni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0402t:1580_0: 118-120. Aṭṭhame saddhassāti buddhādīsu pasannacittassa vattasampannassa, yassa pāto
tika-s0402t:1580_1: vuṭṭhāya cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni sabbavattāni katāneva paññāyanti. Dassanīyānīti dassanārahāni.
tika-s0402t:1580_2: Saṃvego nāma sahottappaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Abhijātiṭṭhānādīnipi tassa uppattihetūni bhavantīti
tika-s0402t:1580_3: sikkhāpento āha “saṃvegajanakānī”ti. Ṭhānānīti kāraṇāni, padesaṭṭhānāni vā. Navamadasamāni suviññeyyāni.
tika-s0402t:1585_0: 121. Tatiyassa paṭhame attānaṃ anuvadantassa uppajjanakabhayanti attānaṃ anuvadantassa
tika-s0402t:1585_1: pāpakammino uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇe paṭicca uppajjanakabhayanti agārikānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1585_2: vasena vuttaṃ, anagārikānaṃ pana vinayadaṇḍaṃ paṭicca uppajjanakabhayampi daṇḍabhayanteva
tika-s0402t:1588_0: 122. Dutiye kodhūpāyāsassetaṃ adhivacananti ettha kujjhanaṭṭhena kodho, sveva cittassa
tika-s0402t:1588_1: kāyassa ca atippamaddanamathanuppādanehi daḷhaāyāsaṭṭhena upāyāso. Anekavāraṃ pavattitvā
tika-s0402t:1588_2: attanā samavetaṃ sattaṃ ajjhottharitvā sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā ūmisadisatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:1588_3: Yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo ūmīsu osīditvā marati, evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane kodhūpāyāse
tika-s0402t:1588_4: osīditvā vibbhamati, tasmā kodhūpāyāso “ūmibhaya”nti vutto. Odarikattassetaṃ adhivacananti
tika-s0402t:1588_5: yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo kumbhīlena khādito marati, evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane odarikattena
tika-s0402t:1588_6: odarikabhāvena āmisagedhena micchājīvena jīvikakappanena nāsitasīlādiguṇatāya khāditadhammasarīro
tika-s0402t:1589_0: Anupaṭṭhitāya satiyāti kāyagataṃ satiṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā. Asaṃvutehīti apihitehi. Pañcannetaṃ
tika-s0402t:1589_1: kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo āvaṭṭe nimujjitvā marati,
tika-s0402t:1589_2: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito pañcakāmaguṇāvaṭṭe nimujjitvā vibbhamati. Kāmarāgābhibhūto
tika-s0402t:1589_3: hi satto ito ca etto, etto ca itoti evaṃ manāpiyarūpādivisayasaṅkhāte āvaṭṭe attānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1589_4: saṃsāretvā yathā tato bahibhūte nekkhamme cittampi na uppādeti, evaṃ āvaṭṭetvā byasanāpādanena
tika-s0402t:1590_0: Anuddhaṃsetīti kilameti vilolati. Rāgānuddhaṃsitenāti rāgena anuddhaṃsitena. Mātugāmassetaṃ
tika-s0402t:1590_1: adhivacananti. Yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo caṇḍamacchaṃ āgamma laddhappahāro marati,
tika-s0402t:1590_2: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane mātugāmaṃ ārabbha uppannakāmarāgo vibbhamati, tasmā mātugāmo
tika-s0402t:1590_3: “susukābhaya”nti vutto. Mātugāmo hi yonisomanasikārarahitaṃ adhīrapurisaṃ itthikuttabhūtehi
tika-s0402t:1590_4: attano hāsabhāvavilāsehi abhibhuyya gahetvā dhīrajātikampi attano rūpādīhi sampalobhanavasena
tika-s0402t:1590_5: anavasesaṃ attano upakāradhamme sīlādike sampādetuṃ asamatthaṃ karonto anayabyasanaṃ pāpeti.
tika-s0402t:1591_0: Imāni pana cattāri bhayāni bhāyitvā yathā udakaṃ anorohantassa udakaṃ nissāya udakapipāsāvinayanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1591_1: sarīrasuddhipariḷāhūpasamo kāyautuggāhāpananti, evamādi ānisaṃso natthi, evamevaṃ
tika-s0402t:1591_2: imāni cattāri bhayāni bhāyitvā sāsane apabbajantassapi imaṃ sāsanaṃ nissāya saṅkhepato
tika-s0402t:1591_3: vaṭṭadukkhūpasamo, vitthārato pana sīlānisaṃsādivasena anekavidho ānisaṃso natthi.
tika-s0402t:1591_4: Yathā pana imāni cattāri bhayāni abhāyitvā udakaṃ orohantassa vuttappakāro ānisaṃso
tika-s0402t:1591_5: hoti, evaṃ imāni abhāyitvā sāsane pabbajantassapi vuttappakāro ānisaṃso hoti. Mahādhammarakkhitatthero
tika-s0402t:1591_6: panāha “cattāri bhayāni bhāyitvā udakaṃ anotaranto sotaṃ chinditvā paratīraṃ pāpuṇituṃ
tika-s0402t:1591_7: na sakkoti, abhāyitvā otaranto sakkoti, evamevaṃ bhāyitvā sāsane apabbajantopi taṇhāsotaṃ
tika-s0402t:1591_8: chinditvā nibbānapāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkoti, abhāyitvā pabbajanto sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1594_0: 123. Tatiye brahmakāyikānaṃ devānanti ettha brahmānaṃ kāyo samūhoti brahmakāyo, tappariyāpannatāya
tika-s0402t:1594_1: tattha gatāti brahmakāyikā. Etāya ca sabbassapi brahmakāyassa samaññāya bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1594_2: Ābhassarānaṃ devānantiādinā pana dutiyajjhānabhūmikādīnaṃ upari gahitattā gobalībaddaññāyena
tika-s0402t:1594_3: tadavasiṭṭhānaṃ ayaṃ samaññā, tasmā “brahmakāyikānaṃ devāna”nti paṭhamajjhānabhūmikānaṃyeva
tika-s0402t:1594_4: gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Saha byayati gacchatīti sahabyo, sahavattanako. Tassa bhāvo sahabyatā,
tika-s0402t:1594_5: sahapavattīti āha “sahabhāvaṃ upagacchatī”ti. Kappo āyuppamāṇanti ettha yadipi brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1594_6: āyuno antaraṃ atthi, ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena panetaṃ vuttanti dassento “paṭhamajjhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1595_0: Dve kappā āyuppamāṇanti ettha pana hīnajjhānena nibbattānaṃ vasena ayaṃ paricchedo
tika-s0402t:1595_1: katoti dassetuṃ “dutiyajjhānaṃ vuttanayeneva tividhaṃ hotī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Cattāro
tika-s0402t:1595_2: kappāti ettha pana ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena catusaṭṭhi kappā vattabbāti dassento “yaṃ
tika-s0402t:1595_3: heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ‘kappo dve kappā’ti, kampi āharitvā attho veditabbo”ti āha. Kathaṃ
tika-s0402t:1595_4: panettha ayamattho labbhatīti āha “kappoti ca guṇassapi nāma”nti. Tattha paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0402t:1595_5: vutto kappo, tato ekena guṇena, ekasmiṃ vāre gaṇanāyāti attho. Dve kappā hontīti
tika-s0402t:1595_6: ekavāragaṇanāya kappassa dviguṇitattā dve mahākappā hontīti attho. Dutiyenāti dutiyavāragaṇanāya.
tika-s0402t:1595_7: Cattāroti dutiyavāragaṇanāya dvīsu kappesu dviguṇitesu cattāro mahākappā hontīti
tika-s0402t:1595_8: attho. Puna te cattāro kappāti vuttanayena dve vāre guṇetvā ye cattāro kappā dassitā,
tika-s0402t:1595_9: puna te cattāro kappā catugguṇā hontīti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – dve vāre guṇetvā
tika-s0402t:1595_10: ye cattāro kappā dassitā, tesu catukkhattuṃ guṇitesu catusaṭṭhi kappā sampajjantīti.
tika-s0402t:1595_11: Tathā hi cattāro ekasmiṃ vāre guṇitā aṭṭha honti, puna te aṭṭha dutiyavāre guṇitā
tika-s0402t:1595_12: soḷasa honti, puna te soḷasa tatiyavāre guṇitā dvattiṃsa honti, puna te dvattiṃsa
tika-s0402t:1595_13: catutthavāre guṇitā catusaṭṭhi honti. Tenevāha “imehi catūhi guṇehi guṇitā ekena
tika-s0402t:1595_14: guṇena aṭṭha hontī”tiādi. Ettha ca heṭṭhā uposathasutte –
tika-s0402t:1596: “Yāni mānusakāni paññāsa vassāni, cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo”ti –
tika-s0402t:1598_0: “Tayome, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo? Idha, bhikkhave,
tika-s0402t:1598_1: ekacco puggalo sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā…pe… ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1598_2: sahabyataṃ upapajjati. Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ, bhikkhave, devānaṃ vīsati kappasahassāni āyuppamāṇa”nti –
tika-s0402t:1599_0: Ādinā arūpāvacarānaṃyeva āyuppamāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Idha pana rūpāvacarānameva āyuppamāṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1599_1: dassitaṃ. Vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ pana “manussānaṃ kittakaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, vassasataṃ appaṃ
tika-s0402t:1599_2: vā bhiyyo”tiādinā devamanussānañceva rūpārūpāvacarasattānañca āyuppamāṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1600_0: Tattha sammāsambuddhena manussānaṃ devānañca āyuṃ paricchindamānena catūsu apāyesu
tika-s0402t:1600_1: bhummadevesu ca āyu na paricchinnaṃ. Taṃ kasmāti? Niraye tāva kammameva pamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1600_2: Yāva kammaṃ na khīyati, tāva paccanti. Tathā sesaapāyesu. Bhummadevānampi kammameva
tika-s0402t:1600_3: pamāṇaṃ. Tattha nibbattā hi keci sattāhamattaṃ tiṭṭhanti, keci aḍḍhamāsaṃ, kappaṃ
tika-s0402t:1600_4: tiṭṭhamānāpi atthiyeva. Tattha manussesu gihibhāve ṭhitāyeva sotāpannāpi honti, sakadāgāmiphalaṃ
tika-s0402t:1600_5: anāgāmiphalaṃ arahattampi pāpuṇanti, tesu sotāpannādayo yāvajīvaṃ tiṭṭhanti, khīṇāsavā
tika-s0402t:1600_6: pana parinibbāyanti vā pabbajanti vā. Kasmā? Arahattaṃ nāma seṭṭhaguṇaṃ, gihiliṅgaṃ
tika-s0402t:1600_7: hīnaṃ, taṃ hīnatāya uttamaṃ guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkoti, tasmā te parinibbātukāmā vā
tika-s0402t:1600_8: honti pabbajitukāmā vā. Bhummadevā pana arahattaṃ pattāpi yāvajīvaṃ tiṭṭhanti, chasu
tika-s0402t:1600_9: kāmāvacaresu devesu sotāpannasakadāgāmino yāvajīvaṃ tiṭṭhanti, anāgāminā rūpabhavaṃ
tika-s0402t:1600_10: gantuṃ vaṭṭati khīṇāsavena parinibbātuṃ. Kasmā? Nilīyanokāsassa abhāvā. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaresu
tika-s0402t:1600_11: sabbepi yāvajīvaṃ tiṭṭhanti, tattha rūpāvacare nibbattā sotāpannasakadāgāmino na
tika-s0402t:1600_12: puna idhāgacchanti, tattheva parinibbāyanti. Ete hi jhānaanāgāmino nāma.
tika-s0402t:1601_0: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnaṃ pana kiṃ niyameti? Paguṇajjhānaṃ. Yadevassa paguṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1601_1: tena upapajjati. Sabbesu paguṇesu kiṃ niyameti? Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti.
tika-s0402t:1601_2: Ekaṃseneva hi so nevasaññānāsaññāyatane upapajjati. Navasu brahmalokesu nibbattaariyasāvakānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1601_3: tatrūpapattipi uparūpapattipi, na heṭṭhūpapatti. Puthujjanānaṃ pana tatrūpapattipi
tika-s0402t:1601_4: hoti, uparūpapattipi, heṭṭhūpapattipi. Pañcasu suddhāvāsesu catūsu ca arūpesu ariyasāvakānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1601_5: tatrūpapattipi hoti uparūpapattipi. Paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbatto anāgāmī nava brahmaloke
tika-s0402t:1601_6: sodhetvā matthake ṭhito parinibbāti. Vehapphalaṃ, akaniṭṭhaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti
tika-s0402t:1601_7: ime tayo devalokā seṭṭhabhavā nāma. Imesu tīsu ṭhānesu nibbattaanāgāmino neva uddhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1601_8: gacchanti, na adho, tattha tattheva parinibbāyantīti idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1604_0: 124-6. Catutthe te dhammeti te “rūpagata”ntiādinā nayena vutte rūpādayo dhamme. Aniccatoti
tika-s0402t:1604_1: iminā niccappaṭikkhepato tesaṃ aniccatamāha, tato eva ca udayavayavantato vipariṇāmato
tika-s0402t:1604_2: tāvakālikato ca te aniccāti jotitaṃ hoti. Yañhi nibbattaṃ hoti, taṃ udayavayaparicchinnaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1604_3: Jarāya maraṇena ca tadeva viparītaṃ, ittarakkhaṇameva ca hotīti. Dukkhatoti iminā
tika-s0402t:1604_4: sukhappaṭikkhepato tesaṃ dukkhatamāha. Tato eva ca abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato dukkhavatthuto
tika-s0402t:1604_5: ca te dukkhāti jotitaṃ hoti. Udayavayavantatāya hi te abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato nirantaradukkhatāya
tika-s0402t:1604_6: dukkhasseva ca adhiṭṭhānabhūtā. Paccayayāpanīyatāya rogamūlatāya ca rogato. Dukkhatāsūlayogato
tika-s0402t:1604_8: Pīḷājananato, antotudanato, dunnīharaṇato ca sallato. Avaḍḍhiāvahanato aghavatthuto
tika-s0402t:1604_9: ca aghato. Aseribhāvajananato ābādhapadaṭṭhānatāya ca ābādhato. Avasavattanato avidheyyatāya
tika-s0402t:1604_11: suññato. Attappaṭikkhepaṭṭhena anattato. Rūpādidhammā hi na ettha attā atthīti anattā.
tika-s0402t:1604_12: Evaṃ sayampi attā na hontīti anattā. Tena abyāpārato nirīhato tucchato anattāti dīpitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1604_13: hoti. Lakkhaṇattayameva sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ ekādasahi padehi vibhajitvā gahitanti
tika-s0402t:1607_0: 127. Sattame vattamānasamīpe vattamāne viya voharitabbanti “okkamatī”ti āha “okkanto
tika-s0402t:1607_1: hotīti attho”ti. Dasasahassacakkavāḷapattharaṇo samujjalabhāvena uḷāro. Devānubhāvanti
tika-s0402t:1607_2: devānaṃ pabhānubhāvaṃ. Devānañhi pabhaṃ so obhāso adhibhavati, na deve. Tenāha “devāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:1607_3: Rukkhagacchādinā kenaci na haññatīti aghā, asambādhā. Tenāha “niccavivarā”ti. Asaṃvutāti
tika-s0402t:1607_4: heṭṭhā upari kenaci apihitā. Tenāha “heṭṭhāpi appatiṭṭhā”ti. Tattha pi-saddena yathā
tika-s0402t:1607_5: heṭṭhā udakassa pidhāyikā sandhārikā pathavī natthi asaṃvutā lokantarikā, evaṃ uparipi
tika-s0402t:1607_6: cakkavāḷesu devavimānānaṃ abhāvato asaṃvutā appatiṭṭhāti dasseti. Andhakāro ettha
tika-s0402t:1607_7: atthīti andhakārā. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na jāyati ālokassa abhāvato, na cakkhuno. Tathā
tika-s0402t:1607_8: hi “tenobhāsena aññamaññaṃ sañjānantī”ti vuttaṃ. Jambudīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāya
tika-s0402t:1607_9: pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati, aparagoyānavāsīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1607_10: uggamanavasena. Evaṃ sesadīpesupīti āha “ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyantī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1607_11: Ito aññathā dvīsu eva dīpesu paññāyanti. Ekekāya disāya navanavayojanasatasahassāni
tika-s0402t:1607_12: andhakāravidhamanampi imināva nayena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pabhāya nappahontīti attano pabhāya
tika-s0402t:1608_0: Byāvaṭāti khādanatthaṃ gaṇhituṃ upakkamantā. Viparivattitvāti vivaṭṭitvā. Chijjitvāti
tika-s0402t:1608_1: mucchāpavattiyā ṭhitaṭṭhānato muccitvā, aṅgapaccaṅgachedanavasena vā chijjitvā. Accantakhāreti
tika-s0402t:1608_2: ātapasantapābhāvena atisītabhāvaṃ sandhāya accantakhāratā vuttā siyā. Na hi taṃ kappasaṇṭhānaudakaṃ
tika-s0402t:1608_3: sampattikaramahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ pathavisandhārakaṃ kappavināsakaudakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavitumarahati,
tika-s0402t:1608_4: tathā sati pathavīpi vilīyeyya, tesaṃ vā pāpakammaphalena petānaṃ pakatiudakassa
tika-s0402t:1608_5: pubbakheḷabhāvāpatti viya tassa udakassa khārabhāvāpatti hotīti vuttaṃ “accantakhāre udake”ti.
tika-s0402t:1611_0: 128. Aṭṭhame ālīyanti āramitabbaṭṭhena sevīyantīti ālayā, pañca kāmaguṇā. Āramantīti
tika-s0402t:1611_1: ratiṃ vindanti kīḷanti laḷanti. Ālīyanti vā allīyantā abhiramaṇavasena sevantīti
tika-s0402t:1611_2: ālayā, taṇhāvicaritāni. Tehi ālayehi ramantīti ālayārāmā. Yatheva hi susajjitaṃ pupphaphalabharitarukkhādisampannauyyānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1611_3: paviṭṭho rājā tāya sampattiyā ramati, sammudito āmoditappamodito hoti, na ukkaṇṭheti,
tika-s0402t:1611_4: sāyampi nikkhamituṃ na icchati, evamimehi kāmālayataṇhālayehi sattā ramanti, saṃsāravaṭṭe
tika-s0402t:1611_5: pamuditā anukkaṇṭhitā vasanti. Tena tesaṃ bhagavā duvidhampi ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ
tika-s0402t:1614_0: 129-130. Navame paṭisanthāradhammanti pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ, upagatānaṃ pana
tika-s0402t:1614_1: bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca pucchāvissajjanavasena ceva cittarucivasena ca yathākālaṃ
tika-s0402t:1614_2: dhammaṃ desetiyeva, upāsakaupāsikānaṃ pana upanisinnakakathāvasena. Dasamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1619_1: Bhavapaṭilābhiyānīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Yehīti yehi saṃyojanehi hetubhūtehi, karaṇabhūtehi
tika-s0402t:1619_2: vā. Nanu ca sotāpannassapi orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, kasmā pana sakadāgāmīyeva
tika-s0402t:1619_3: idha gahitoti āha “sakadāgāmissāti idaṃ appahīnasaṃyojanesu ariyesu uttamakoṭiyā
tika-s0402t:1619_5: gahitanti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena gahitaṃ. Sakadāgāmito parañhi appahīnaorambhāgiyasaṃyojano
tika-s0402t:1619_6: ariyo nāma natthi. Nanu ca sakadāgāmissa pahīnānipi orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni atthi
tika-s0402t:1619_8: appahīnānī”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “orambhāgiyesu ca appahīnaṃ upādāyā”tiādi. Yasmā
tika-s0402t:1619_9: kāmarāgabyāpādasaṃyojanāni sakadāgāmissa appahīnāni, tasmā tāni appahīnāni upādāya
tika-s0402t:1619_10: “orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnānī”ti vuttaṃ, na sabbesaṃ appahīnattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:1622_0: 132. Dutiye paṭibhānaṃ vuccati ñāṇampi ñāṇassa upaṭṭhitavacanampi, taṃ idha adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1622_1: atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttañca paṭibhānamassāti yuttappaṭibhāno. Pucchānantarameva sīghaṃ
tika-s0402t:1622_2: byākātuṃ asamatthatāya nomuttappaṭibhānamassāti nomuttappaṭibhāno. Iminā nayena sesā
tika-s0402t:1622_3: veditabbā. Ettha pana paṭhamo kañci kālaṃ vīmaṃsitvā yuttameva pekkhati tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero
tika-s0402t:1622_4: viya. So pana pañhaṃ puṭṭho pariggahetvā yuttappattakāraṇameva katheti. Dutiyo pucchānantarameva
tika-s0402t:1622_5: yena vā tena vā vacanena paṭibāhati, vīmaṃsitvāpi ca yuttaṃ na pakkheti catunikāyikapiṇḍatissatthero
tika-s0402t:1622_6: viya. So pana pañhaṃ puṭṭho pañhapariyosānampi nāgameti, yaṃ vā taṃ vā kathetiyeva,
tika-s0402t:1622_7: vacanatthaṃ panassa vīmaṃsiyamānaṃ katthaci na lagati. Tatiyo pucchāsamakālameva
tika-s0402t:1622_8: yuttaṃ pekkhati, taṃkhaṇaṃyeva ca naṃ byākaroti tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero viya. So
tika-s0402t:1622_9: pana pañhaṃ puṭṭho sīghameva katheti, yuttappattakāraṇo ca hoti. Catuttho puṭṭho
tika-s0402t:1622_10: samāno neva yuttaṃ pekkhati, na yena vā tena vā paṭibāhituṃ sakkoti, tibbandhakāranimuggo
tika-s0402t:1625_0: 133-4. Tatiye ugghaṭitaññūti ettha ugghaṭanaṃ nāma ñāṇugghaṭanaṃ, ñāṇena ugghaṭitamatteyeva
tika-s0402t:1625_1: jānātīti attho. Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhāre udāhaṭamatteyeva. Dhammābhisamayo hotīti
tika-s0402t:1625_2: catusaccadhammassa ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:1625_3: nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ
tika-s0402t:1625_4: gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo “ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati. Vipañcitaṃ vitthāritameva atthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1625_5: jānātīti vipañcitaññū. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṃkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena
tika-s0402t:1625_6: atthe bhājiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo “vipañcitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1625_7: Uddesādīhi netabboti neyyo. Anupubbena dhammābhisamayoti anukkamena arahattappatti.
tika-s0402t:1625_8: Byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assāti padaparamo. Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti
tika-s0402t:1625_9: tena attabhāvena jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkotīti
tika-s0402t:1628_0: 135-8. Pañcame sāvajjoti sadoso. Sāvajjena kāyakammenāti sadosena pāṇātipātādinā
tika-s0402t:1628_1: kāyakammena. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa
tika-s0402t:1628_2: sadosattā gūthakuṇapādibharito padeso viya “sāvajjo”ti vuccati. Sāvajjena bahulanti
tika-s0402t:1628_3: yassa sāvajjameva kāyakammaṃ bahulaṃ hoti, appaṃ anavajjaṃ. So “sāvajjena bahulaṃ
tika-s0402t:1628_4: kāyakammena samannāgato appaṃ anavajjenā”ti vuccati. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Ko pana
tika-s0402t:1628_5: evarūpo hotīti? Yo gāmadhammatāya vā nigamadhammatāya vā kadāci karahaci uposathaṃ
tika-s0402t:1628_6: samādiyati, sīlāni pūreti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammesu
tika-s0402t:1628_7: sāvajjasseva bahulatāya anavajjassa appatāya “vajjabahulo”ti vuccati. Yathā hi ekasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:1628_8: padese dubbaṇṇāni duggandhāni pupphāni rāsikatānassu, tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ adhimuttakavassikapāṭalāni
tika-s0402t:1628_9: patitāni bhaveyyuṃ, evarūpo ayaṃ puggalo veditabbo. Yathā pana ekasmiṃ padese adhimuttakavassikapāṭalāni
tika-s0402t:1628_10: rāsikatānassu, tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ duggandhāni badarapupphādīni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-s0402t:1628_11: Evarūpo tatiyo puggalo veditabbo. Catuttho pana tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa niddosattā
tika-s0402t:1628_12: ca catumadhurabharitasuvaṇṇavāti viya daṭṭhabbo. Chaṭṭhādīni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0402t:1631_0: 139-140. Navame appañca bhāsatīti sampattaparisāya thokameva katheti. Asahitañcāti
tika-s0402t:1631_1: kathento ca pana na atthayuttaṃ kālayuttaṃ katheti. Parisā cassa na kusalā hotīti
tika-s0402t:1631_2: sotuṃ nisinnaparisā cassa yuttāyuttaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ siliṭṭhāsiliṭṭhaṃ na jānātīti
tika-s0402t:1631_3: attho. Evarūpoti ayaṃ evaṃjātiko bāladhammakathiko evaṃjātikāya bālaparisāya dhammakathikotveva
tika-s0402t:1631_4: nāmaṃ labhati. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Ettha ca dveyeva janā sabhāvadhammakathikā,
tika-s0402t:1631_5: na itare. Itare pana dhammakathikānaṃ anto paviṭṭhattā evaṃ vuttā. Dasamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1639_0: 147-150. Sattame paramatthato avijjamānasabhāvassa kālassa bhāvanādiyogo na sambhavatīti
tika-s0402t:1639_1: āha “kālāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle dhammassavanādivasena pavattānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ etaṃ
tika-s0402t:1639_2: adhivacana”nti. Kālasahacaritā hi kusalā dhammā idha kāla-saddena gahitā aparassa
tika-s0402t:1649_0: 156-158. Chaṭṭhe saṃvaṭṭanaṃ vinassanaṃ saṃvaṭṭo, saṃvaṭṭato uddhaṃ tathā ṭhāyī saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī.
tika-s0402t:1649_1: Vivaṭṭanaṃ nibbattanaṃ, vaḍḍhanaṃ vā vivaṭṭo. “Tejosaṃvaṭṭo, āposaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti
tika-s0402t:1649_2: evaṃ saṃvaṭṭasīmānukkamena saṃvaṭṭesu vattabbesu tathā avatvā āposaṃvaṭṭo, tejosaṃvaṭṭo,
tika-s0402t:1649_4: apare. Āpena saṃvaṭṭo āposaṃvaṭṭo. Saṃvaṭṭasīmāti saṃvaṭṭanamariyādā. Saṃvaṭṭatīti
tika-s0402t:1649_5: vinassati. Sadāti sabbakālaṃ, tīsupi saṃvaṭṭakālesūti attho. Ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ
tika-s0402t:1649_6: vinassatīti ettha buddhakkhettaṃ nāma tividhaṃ hoti jātikkhettaṃ, āṇākkhettaṃ, visayakkhettañca.
tika-s0402t:1650_0: Tattha jātikkhettaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ hoti, tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇādīsu
tika-s0402t:1650_1: kampati. Āṇākkhettaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ, yattha ratanasuttaṃ khandhaparittaṃ
tika-s0402t:1650_2: dhajaggaparittaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ moraparittanti imesaṃ parittānaṃ ānubhāvo vattati.
tika-s0402t:1650_3: Visayakkhettaṃ anantāparimāṇaṃ, yaṃ “yāvatā vā panākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ
tika-s0402t:1650_4: yaṃ tathāgato ākaṅkhati, taṃ taṃ jānāti. Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ
tika-s0402t:1650_5: vinassati, tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikkhettaṃ vinaṭṭhameva hoti, vinassantañca ekatova
tika-s0402t:1650_6: vinassati, saṇṭhahantañca ekatova saṇṭhahati. Sesamettha visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu
tika-s0402t:1653_0: 159. Navame evaṃ pavattaṃ paccuppannataṇhaṃ nissāyāti “kudāssu nāmāhampi āsavānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1653_1: khayā”tiādinā nayena anuttare vimokkhe pihaṃ uppādentassa uppannataṇhaṃ nissāya.
tika-s0402t:1653_2: Kathaṃ pana lokuttaradhamme ārabbha āsā uppajjatīti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1653_3: na ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tattha pihā pavattati avisayattā puggalassa ca anadhigatabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1653_4: Anussavūpaladdhe pana anuttaravimokkhe uddissa pihaṃ uppādento tattha pihaṃ uppādeti
tika-s0402t:1653_5: nāma. Nākaḍḍhatīti kammapathabhāvaṃ appattatāya paṭisandhiṃ na deti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t:1656_0: 160. Dasame vaḷañjentīti sajjhāyanti ceva vācuggataṃ karontā dhārenti ca. Avigatataṇhatāya
tika-s0402t:1656_1: taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahumpi ādiyantīti bahulā, te eva bāhulikā yathā “venayiko”ti.
tika-s0402t:1656_2: Te pana yasmā paccayabahulabhāvā yuttappayuttā nāma honti, tasmā āha “paccayabāhullāya
tika-s0402t:1656_3: paṭipannā”ti. Sithilaṃ gaṇhantīti sāthalikā, sikkhāya ādaragāravābhāvena sithilaṃ
tika-s0402t:1656_4: adaḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti attho. Sithilanti ca bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, sithila-saddena vā
tika-s0402t:1656_5: samānatthassa sāthalasaddassa vasena sāthalikāti padasiddhi veditabbā. Avagamanatoti
tika-s0402t:1656_6: adhogamanato, orambhāgiyabhāvatoti attho. Nibbīriyāti ujjhitussāhā tadadhigamāya
tika-s0402t:1661: 161. Dutiyassa paṭhame dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññātiādīsu pāḷiyā āgatanayena attho veditabbo. Tathā hi –
tika-s0402t:1662_0: “Tattha katamā dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā paññā? Kicchena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassa
tika-s0402t:1662_1: dandhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassa yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā…pe… amoho dhammavicayo
tika-s0402t:1662_2: sammādiṭṭhi, ayaṃ vuccati dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā paññā. Tattha katamā dukkhapaṭipadā
tika-s0402t:1662_3: khippābhiññā paññā? Kicchena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassa khippaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassa
tika-s0402t:1662_4: yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā…pe… sammādiṭṭhi, ayaṃ vuccati dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā
tika-s0402t:1662_5: paññā. Tattha katamā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā paññā? Akicchena akasirena samādhiṃ
tika-s0402t:1662_6: uppādentassa dandhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassa yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā…pe… sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0402t:1662_7: ayaṃ vuccati sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā paññā. Tattha katamā sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā
tika-s0402t:1662_8: paññā? Akicchena akasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassa khippaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassa
tika-s0402t:1662_9: yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā…pe… sammādiṭṭhi, ayaṃ vuccati sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā
tika-s0402t:1663_0: Tattha kicchena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassāti pubbabhāge āgamanakāle kicchena
tika-s0402t:1663_1: kasirena dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese vikkhambhetvā lokuttarasamādhiṃ
tika-s0402t:1663_2: uppādentassa. Dandhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassāti vikkhambhitesu kilesesu vipassanāparivāse
tika-s0402t:1663_3: ciraṃ vasitvā taṃ lokuttarasamādhisaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ dandhaṃ saṇikaṃ abhijānantassa
tika-s0402t:1663_4: paṭivijjhantassa, pāpuṇantassāti attho. Ayaṃ vuccatīti yā esā evaṃ uppajjati, ayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1663_5: kilesavikkhambhanappaṭipadāya dukkhattā, vipassanāparivāsapaññāya ca dandhattā maggakāle
tika-s0402t:1663_6: ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi paññā āgamanavasena “dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāmā”ti
tika-s0402t:1663_7: vuccati. Upari tīsu padesupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1666_0: 162. Dutiye akatābhinivesoti akatādhikāro. Rūpānaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi paricchinditvā gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1666_1: rūpapariggaho. Tīsu addhāsu kilamatīti pubbante aparante pubbantāparanteti evaṃ tīsu
tika-s0402t:1666_2: padesesu kilamati. Pañcasu ñāṇesūti rūpapariggahādīsu pañcasu ñāṇesu. Navasu vipassanāñāṇesūti
tika-s0402t:1669: 163. Tatiye “yathā etaṃ, tathā ida”nti iminā nayenāti etena –
tika-s0402t:1670: “Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
tika-s0402t:1671: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, kāye chandaṃ virājaye”ti. ; –
tika-s0402t:1672_0: Imaṃ desanānayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tassattho – yathā idaṃ saviññāṇakāsubhaṃ āyuusmāviññāṇānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1672_1: anapagamā carati tiṭṭhati nisīdati sayati, tathā etaṃ etarahi susāne sayitaṃ aviññāṇakampi
tika-s0402t:1672_2: pubbe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anapagamā ahosi. Yathā ca etaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1672_3: apagamā na carati na tiṭṭhati na nisīdati na seyyaṃ kappeti, tathā idaṃ saviññāṇakampi
tika-s0402t:1672_4: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā bhavissati. Yathā ca idaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ netarahi susāne mataṃ
tika-s0402t:1672_5: seti na uddhumātakādibhāvamupagataṃ, tathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīrampi pubbe ahosi.
tika-s0402t:1672_6: Yathā panetaṃ etarahi aviññāṇakāsubhaṃ matakasusāne seti uddhumātakādibhāvañca upagataṃ,
tika-s0402t:1672_7: tathā idaṃ saviññāṇakampi bhavissatīti. Tattha yathā idaṃ tathā etanti attanā matasarīrassa
tika-s0402t:1672_8: samānabhāvaṃ karonto bāhire dosaṃ pajahati. Yathā etaṃ tathā idanti matasarīrena
tika-s0402t:1672_9: attano samānabhāvaṃ karonto ajjhattike rāgaṃ pajahati. Yenākārena ubhayaṃ samaṃ karoti,
tika-s0402t:1673_0: Bahiddhā diṭṭhānanti bahiddhā susānādīsu diṭṭhānaṃ uddhumātakādidasannaṃ asubhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1673_1: “Navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasenā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu antimajīvikābhāvato piṇḍapātassa
tika-s0402t:1673_3: evamādīhipi ākārehi āhārepaṭikūlatā paccavekkhitabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ – “antamidaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-s0402t:1673_4: jīvikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ atipāpoyaṃ lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolyo vicarati pattapāṇīti.
tika-s0402t:1673_5: Aladdhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ paritassati, laddhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ gadhito mucchito ajjhopanno
tika-s0402t:1673_6: anādīnavadassāvī anissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatīti. Bhutto ca āhāro kassaci kadāci maraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1674_0: Kaṭukīṭakādayo dvattiṃsakulappabhedā kimiyo naṃ upanissāya jīvantīti? Vuccate – antimajīvikābhāvo
tika-s0402t:1674_1: tāva cittasaṃkilesavisodhanatthaṃ kammaṭṭhānābhinivesanato pageva manasi kātabbo
tika-s0402t:1674_2: “māhaṃ chavālātasadiso bhaveyya”nti. Tathā piṇḍapātassa alābhalābhesu paritassanagedhādisamuppattinivāraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1674_3: pageva anuṭṭhātabbaṃ suparisuddhasīlassa paṭisaṅkhānavato tadabhāvato. Bhattasammado
tika-s0402t:1674_4: anekantiko paribhoge antogadhovāti veditabbo. Kimikulasaṃvaddhanaṃ pana saṅgahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1674_5: saṅgahitameva vā “navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasenā”ti ettha niyamassa akatattā. Iminā
tika-s0402t:1674_6: vā nayena itaresampettha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yathāsambhavamettha paṭikūlatāpaccavekkhaṇassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0402t:1675_0: Evañca katvā visuddhimagge dasahi ākārehi paṭikūlatā veditabbā. Seyyathidaṃ – gamanato,
tika-s0402t:1675_1: pariyesanato, paribhogato, āsayato, nidhānato, aparipakkato, paripakkato, phalato,
tika-s0402t:1675_2: nissandato, sammakkhanatoti. Evaṃ dasannaṃ vasena pāṭikulyavacanenapi idha “navanna”nti
tika-s0402t:1675_3: vacanaṃ na virujjhati, sammakkhanassa paribhogādīsu labbhamānabhāvā visuṃ taṃ aggahetvā
tika-s0402t:1675_4: na vadanti. Visuddhimagge pana sammakkhanaṃ paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi nissandavasena
tika-s0402t:1676: Ukkaṇṭhitasaññāya samannāgatoti tīsu bhavesu aruccanavasena pavattāya vipassanāpaññāya samannāgato. Nibbidānupassanā hesā saññāsīsena vuttā. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1679_0: 164-166. Catutthe padhānakaraṇakāle sītādīni nakkhamati na sahatīti akkhamā. Khamati
tika-s0402t:1679_1: sahati abhibhavatīti khamā. Indriyadamanaṃ damā. “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:1679_2: nayena vitakkasamanaṃ samāti āha “akusalavitakkānaṃ vūpasamanapaṭipadā”ti. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1679_3: sabbesampi kilesānaṃ samanavasena pavattā paṭipadā samā. Pañcamachaṭṭhāni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0402t:1682_2: vutto, sāriputtattherassa pana heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ sukhapaṭipadadandhābhiññabhāvo,
tika-s0402t:1682_3: arahattamaggassa ca sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiññabhāvo dassito. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ visuddhimagge
tika-s0402t:1682_4: “buddhānaṃ pana cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiññāva ahesuṃ, tathā dhammasenāpatissa.
tika-s0402t:1682_5: Mahāmoggallānattherassa pana paṭhamamaggo sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiñño ahosi, upari
tika-s0402t:1682_6: tayo dukkhapaṭipadadandhābhiññā”ti. Yañca vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “tathāgatassa hi
tika-s0402t:1682_7: sāriputtattherassa ca cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiññāva ahesuṃ, mahāmoggallānattherassa
tika-s0402t:1682_8: pana paṭhamamaggo sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiñño upari tayo dukkhapaṭipadakhippābhiññā”ti,
tika-s0402t:1682_9: taṃ sabbaṃ aññamaññaṃ nānulometi. Imāya pāḷiyā imāya ca aṭṭhakathāya na sameti, tasmā
tika-s0402t:1682_10: vīmaṃsitabbametaṃ. Taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ vā matena tattha tattha tathā tathā vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1685_0: 169. Navame sasaṅkhārena dukkhena kasirena adhimattapayogaṃ katvāva kilesaparinibbānadhammoti
tika-s0402t:1685_1: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī. Asaṅkhārena appayogena adhimattapayogaṃ akatvāva kilesaparinibbānadhammoti
tika-s0402t:1685_2: asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī. Dhammānusārī puggalo hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena
tika-s0402t:1685_3: akasirena akilamantova vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti. Saddhānusārī puggalo pana dukkhena
tika-s0402t:1685_4: kasirena kilamanto hutvā vikkhambhetuṃ, tasmā dhammānusārissa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe
tika-s0402t:1685_5: kilesacchedakaṃ ñāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ hutvā vahati. Yathā nāma tikhiṇena
tika-s0402t:1685_6: asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ hoti, atisīghaṃ vahati, saddo na
tika-s0402t:1685_7: suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṃ na hoti, evarūpā dhammānusārino pubbabhāgabhāvanā hoti.
tika-s0402t:1685_8: Saddhānusārino pana pubbabhāgakkhaṇe kilesacchedakaṃ ñāṇaṃ dandhaṃ atikhiṇaṃ asūraṃ
tika-s0402t:1685_9: hutvā vahati. Yathā nāma kuṇṭhena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1685_10: hoti, atisīghaṃ na vahati, saddo suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṃ icchitabbaṃ hoti, evarūpā
tika-s0402t:1685_11: saddhānusārino pubbabhāgabhāvanā hoti. Evaṃ santepi nesaṃ kilesakkhaye nānattaṃ natthi,
tika-s0402t:1688_0: 170. Dasame samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvetīti idaṃ samathayānikassa vasena
tika-s0402t:1688_1: vuttaṃ. So hi paṭhamaṃ upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā uppādeti, ayaṃ samatho.
tika-s0402t:1688_2: So tañca taṃsampayutte ca dhamme aniccādīhi vipassati, ayaṃ vipassanā, iti paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0402t:1688_3: samatho, pacchā vipassanā. Tena vuccati “samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1688_4: Vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvetīti idaṃ pana vipassanāyānikassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1688_5: So taṃ vuttappakāraṃ samathaṃ asampādetvā pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccādīhi vipassati.
tika-s0402t:1688_6: Paṭhamo lokuttaramaggo nibbattatīti sotāpattimaggaṃ sandhāya vadati, lokiyamaggavaseneva
tika-s0402t:1688_7: vā imissā pāḷiyā attho veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Maggo sañjāyati, pubbabhāgiyo lokiyamaggo
tika-s0402t:1688_8: uppajjati. Āsevati nibbidānupassanāvasena. Bhāveti muccitukamyatāvasena. Bahulīkaroti
tika-s0402t:1688_9: paṭisaṅkhānupassanāvasena. Āsevati vā bhayatupaṭṭhānādiñāṇavasena. Bhāveti muccitukamyatādiñāṇavasena.
tika-s0402t:1688_10: Bahulīkaroti vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāvasena. Saṃyojanāni pahīyanti. Anusayā byantī
tika-s0402t:1689_0: Dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasanti obhāsādīsu ariyadhammoti pavattaṃ uddhaccaṃ vikkhepo
tika-s0402t:1689_1: dhammuddhaccaṃ, tena dhammuddhaccena vipassanāvīthito uggamanena virūpaṃ gahitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1690_0: “Dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasaṃ hoti, aniccato manasi karoti, obhāso uppajjati, obhāso
tika-s0402t:1690_1: dhammoti obhāsaṃ āvajjati, tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṃ, tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso
tika-s0402t:1690_2: aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti. Dukkhato…pe… anattato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0402t:1690_3: nappajānāti. Tathā aniccato manasikaroto ñāṇaṃ uppajjati…pe… pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1690_4: adhimokkho paggaho upaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhā nikanti uppajjati, nikanti dhammoti nikantiṃ
tika-s0402t:1690_5: āvajjati, tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṃ, tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1690_6: yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti. Dukkhato…pe… anattato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1695_0: 171. Tatiyassa paṭhame kāyasañcetanāhetūti kāyakammanimittaṃ, kāyikassa kammassa
tika-s0402t:1695_1: kaṭattā upacitattāti attho. Esa nayo sesasañcetanādvayepi. Uddhaccasahagatacetanā
tika-s0402t:1695_2: pavattivipākaṃ detiyevāti “vīsatividhā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā vacīsañcetanā manosañcetanāti
tika-s0402t:1695_3: ettha kāmāvacarakusalākusalavasena vīsati cetanā labbhanti. Idaṃ tathā-saddena upasaṃharati.
tika-s0402t:1695_4: Apicettha nava mahaggatacetanāpi labbhantīti iminā navahi rūpārūpakusalacetanāhi
tika-s0402t:1695_5: saddhiṃ manodvāre ekūnatiṃsāti tīsu dvāresu ekūnasattati cetanā hontīti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1695_6: Avijjāpaccayāvāti idaṃ tāpi cetanā avijjāpaccayāva hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāvuttā
tika-s0402t:1695_7: hi ekūnasattati cetanā kusalāpi avijjāpaccayā honti, pageva itarā appahīnāvijjasseva
tika-s0402t:1696_0: Yasmā yaṃ taṃ yathāvuttaṃ cetanābhedaṃ kāyasaṅkhārañceva vacīsaṅkhārañca manosaṅkhārañca
tika-s0402t:1696_1: parehi anussāhito sāmampi asaṅkhārikacittena karoti, parehi kāriyamāno sasaṅkhārikacittenapi
tika-s0402t:1696_2: karoti, “idaṃ nāma kammaṃ karontopi tassa evarūpo nāma vipāko bhavissatī”ti evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1696_3: kammaṃ vipākañca jānantopi karoti, mātāpitūsu cetiyavandanādīni karontesu anukaronto
tika-s0402t:1696_4: dārako viya kevalaṃ kammaññeva vijjānanto “imassa pana kammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti vipākaṃ
tika-s0402t:1696_5: ajānantopi karoti, tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ “sāmaṃ vā ta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Parehi anāṇattoti
tika-s0402t:1697_0: Nanu ca khīṇāsavo cetiyaṃ vandati, dhammaṃ bhaṇati, kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti, kathamassa
tika-s0402t:1697_1: kāyakammādayo na hontīti? Avipākattā. Khīṇāsavena hi katakammaṃ neva kusalaṃ hoti
tika-s0402t:1697_2: nākusalaṃ, avipākaṃ hutvā kiriyāmatte tiṭṭhati. Tenassa te kāyādayo na honti. Tenevāha
tika-s0402t:1698_0: Khiḍḍāya padussantīti khiḍḍāpadosino, khiḍḍāpadosino eva khiḍḍāpadosikā. Khiḍḍāpadoso
tika-s0402t:1698_1: vā etesaṃ atthīti khiḍḍāpadosikā. Te kira puññavisesādhigatena mahantena attano sirivibhavena
tika-s0402t:1698_2: nakkhattaṃ kīḷantā tāya sampattiyā mahantatāya “āhāraṃ paribhuñjimhā na paribhuñjimhā”tipi
tika-s0402t:1698_3: na jānanti. Atha ekāhārātikkamato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva
tika-s0402t:1698_4: na tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā? Kammajatejassa balavatāya karajakāyassa mandatāya. Manussānañhi
tika-s0402t:1698_5: kammajatejo mando, karajakāyo balavā. Tesaṃ tejassa mandatāya kāyassa balavatāya
tika-s0402t:1698_6: sattāhampi atikkamitvā uṇhodakaacchayāguādīhi sakkā karajakāyaṃ upatthambhetuṃ. Devānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1698_7: pana tejo balavā hoti uḷārapuññanibbattattā uḷāragarusiniddhasudhāhārajīraṇato ca.
tika-s0402t:1698_8: Karajaṃ mandaṃ mudusukhumālabhāvato. Te ekaṃ āhāravelaṃ akkamitvāva saṇṭhāpetuṃ na
tika-s0402t:1698_9: sakkonti. Yathā nāma gimhānaṃ majjhanhike tattapāsāṇe ṭhapitaṃ padumaṃ vā uppalaṃ
tika-s0402t:1698_10: vā sāyanhasamaye ghaṭasatenapi siñciyamānaṃ pākatikaṃ na hoti vinassatiyeva, evameva
tika-s0402t:1698_11: pacchā nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva na tiṭṭhanti. Katame pana te devāti?
tika-s0402t:1698_12: “Ime nāmā”ti aṭṭhakathāya vicāraṇā natthi, “āhārūpacchedena ātape khittamālā viyā”ti
tika-s0402t:1698_13: vuttattā ye keci kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvino devā evaṃ karonti, te evaṃ cavantīti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1698_14: Abhayagirivāsino panāhu “nimmānaratiparanimmitavasavattino te devā, khiḍḍāya padussanamatteneva
tika-s0402t:1698_15: hete khiḍḍāpadosikāti vuttā”ti. Ko panettha devānaṃ āhāro, kā āhāravelāti? “Sabbesampi
tika-s0402t:1698_16: kāmāvacaradevānaṃ sudhā āhāro, sā heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamā
tika-s0402t:1698_17: hoti. Taṃ yathāsakaṃ divasavaseneva divase divase bhuñjanti. Keci pana badarappamāṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1698_18: sudhāhāraṃ paribhuñjanti. So jivhāyaṃ ṭhapitamattoyeva yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1698_19: pharati, tesaṃyeva divasavasena sattadivasaṃ yāpanasamatthova hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1699_0: Issāpakatattā paduṭṭhena manasā padussantīti manopadosikā. Usūyavasena vā manaso
tika-s0402t:1699_1: padoso manopadoso, so etesaṃ atthi vināsahetubhūtoti manopadosikā. Akkuddho rakkhatīti
tika-s0402t:1699_2: kuddhassa so kodho itarasmiṃ akkujjhante anupādāno ekavārameva uppattiyā anāsevano
tika-s0402t:1699_3: cāvetuṃ na sakkoti, udakantaṃ patvā aggi viya nibbāyati, tasmā akkuddho taṃ cavanato
tika-s0402t:1699_4: rakkhati. Ubhosu pana kuddhesu bhiyyo bhiyyo aññamaññamhi parivaḍḍhanavasena tikhiṇasamudācāro
tika-s0402t:1699_5: nissayadahanaraso kodho uppajjamāno hadayavatthuṃ nidahanto accantasukhumālaṃ karajakāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1699_6: vināseti, tato sakalopi attabhāvo antaradhāyati. Tenāha “ubhosu panā”tiādi. Tathā
tika-s0402t:1700_0: Katame tena devā daṭṭhabbāti ettha tenāti paccatte karaṇavacananti āha “katame nāma
tika-s0402t:1700_1: te devā daṭṭhabbā”ti. Karaṇattheyeva vā etaṃ karaṇavacananti dassento āha “tena vā
tika-s0402t:1703_1: pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Atthoti cettha saṅkhepato hetuphalaṃ. Tañhi
tika-s0402t:1703_2: hetuvasena araṇīyaṃ gantabbaṃ pattabbaṃ, tasmā “attho”ti vuccati. Pabhedato pana
tika-s0402t:1703_3: yaṃ kiñci paccayasamuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ, bhāsitattho, vipāko, kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā
tika-s0402t:1703_4: “attho”ti veditabbā, taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1703_5: atthapaṭisambhidā. Tenāha “pañcasu atthesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇa”nti. Ācikkhāmītiādīsu
tika-s0402t:1703_6: ādito kathento ācikkhati nāma, uddisatīti attho. Tameva uddesaṃ pariyosāpento deseti.
tika-s0402t:1703_7: Yathāuddiṭṭhamatthaṃ uddisanavasena pakārehi ñāpento ñāpeti. Pakārehi eva tamatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1703_8: patiṭṭhāpento paṭṭhapeti. Yathāuddiṭṭhaṃ paṭiniddisanavasena vivarati. Vivaṭaṃ vibhajati.
tika-s0402t:1703_9: Vibhattaatthaṃ hetūdāharaṇadassanehi pākaṭaṃ karonto uttāniṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:1704_2: ca saṅkhepato paccayo. So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca, tasmā
tika-s0402t:1704_3: “dhammo”ti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu, ariyamaggo, bhāsitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1704_4: kusalaṃ, akusalanti ime pañca dhammā “dhammo”ti veditabbā, taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa
tika-s0402t:1704_5: tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Niruttippabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1704_6: niruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – atthe
tika-s0402t:1704_7: ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti, taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa
tika-s0402t:1705_0: Evamayaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā saddārammaṇā nāma jātā, na paññattiārammaṇā. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:1705_1: Yasmā saddaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānanti. Paṭisambhidāppatto hi “phasso”ti
tika-s0402t:1705_2: vutte “ayaṃ sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti, “phassā”ti vā “phassa”nti vā vutte pana “ayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1705_3: asabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Aññaṃ panesa nāmākhyātaupasaggabyañjanasaddaṃ
tika-s0402t:1705_4: jānāti na jānātīti? Yadaggena saddaṃ jānitvā “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṃ asabhāvaniruttī”ti
tika-s0402t:1705_5: jānāti, tadaggena tampi jānissatīti. Taṃ pana “nayidaṃ paṭisambhidākicca”nti paṭikkhipitvā
tika-s0402t:1706_0: Tissadattatthero kira bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṃ gahetvā “aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu katarabhāsāya
tika-s0402t:1706_1: kathemī”ti pavāresi. Taṃ pana tena attano uggahe ṭhatvā pavāritaṃ, na paṭisambhidāya
tika-s0402t:1706_2: ṭhitena. So hi mahāpaññatāya taṃ taṃ bhāsaṃ kathāpetvā uggahetvā evaṃ pavāresi. “Bhāsaṃ
tika-s0402t:1706_3: nāma sattā uggaṇhantī”ti vatvā panettha idaṃ kathitaṃ. Mātāpitaro hi daharakāle kumārake
tika-s0402t:1706_4: mañce vā pīṭhe vā nipajjāpetvā taṃ taṃ kathayamānā tāni tāni kiccāni karonti. Dārakā
tika-s0402t:1706_5: tesaṃ taṃ taṃ bhāsaṃ vavatthāpenti “iminā idaṃ vutta”nti. Gacchante gacchante kāle
tika-s0402t:1706_6: sabbampi bhāsaṃ jānanti. Mātā damiḷī, pitā andhako. Tesaṃ jāto dārako sace mātukathaṃ
tika-s0402t:1706_7: paṭhamaṃ suṇāti, damiḷabhāsaṃ bhāsissati. Sace pitukathaṃ paṭhamaṃ suṇāti, andhakabhāsaṃ
tika-s0402t:1706_8: bhāsissati. Ubhinnampi pana kathaṃ assuṇanto māgadhabhāsaṃ bhāsissati. Yopi agāmake
tika-s0402t:1706_9: mahāaraññe nibbatto, tattha añño kathento nāma natthi. Sopi attano dhammatāya vacanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1706_10: samuṭṭhāpento, māgadhabhāsameva bhāsissati. Niraye, tiracchānayoniyaṃ, pettivisaye,
tika-s0402t:1706_11: manussaloke, devaloketi sabbattha māgadhabhāsāva ussannā, sesā oṭṭakirātaandhakayonakadamiḷabhāsādikā
tika-s0402t:1706_12: aṭṭhārasa bhāsā parivattanti, kālantarena aññathā honti ca nassanti ca.
tika-s0402t:1707_1: Sā hi katthaci kadāci parivattantīpi na sabbattha sabbadā sabbathāva parivattati,
tika-s0402t:1707_2: kappavināsepi tiṭṭhatiyeva. Sammāsambuddhopi hi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tantiṃ āropento
tika-s0402t:1707_3: māgadhabhāsāya eva āropesi. Kasmā? Evañhi āharituṃ sukhaṃ hoti. Māgadhabhāsāya hi
tika-s0402t:1707_4: tantiṃ āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ sotapathāgamanameva papañco.
tika-s0402t:1707_5: Tena saṅghaṭitamatteneva nayasatena nayasahassena attho upaṭṭhāti. Aññāya bhāsāya
tika-s0402t:1707_6: tantiṃ āruḷhakaṃ sodhetvā uggahetabbaṃ hoti, bahumpi uggahetvā pana puthujjanassa
tika-s0402t:1707_7: paṭisambhidāppatti nāma natthi, ariyasāvako nopaṭisambhidāppatto nāma natthi.
tika-s0402t:1708_1: ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Atthadhammādivisayesu hi tīsu ñāṇesu “imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānī”ti
tika-s0402t:1708_2: evaṃ pavattañāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Imā pana catasso paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ
tika-s0402t:1708_3: gacchanti, pañcahi kāraṇehi visadā hontīti veditabbā. Katamesu dvīsu? Sekkhabhūmiyañca
tika-s0402t:1708_6: asekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedagatā. Ānandattherassa, cittassa gahapatino, dhammikassa upāsakassa,
tika-s0402t:1708_7: upālissa gahapatino, khujjuttarāya upāsikāyāti evamādīnaṃ paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1708_8: pabhedagatāti imāsu dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṃ gacchanti. Pabhedo nāma maggehi adhigatānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1709_0: Katamehi pañcahi kāraṇehi paṭisambhidā visadā hontīti? Adhigamena, pariyattiyā, savanena,
tika-s0402t:1709_1: paripucchāya, pubbayogena. Tattha adhigamo nāma arahattaṃ. Tañhi pattassa paṭisambhidā
tika-s0402t:1709_2: visadā honti. Savanaṃ nāma dhammassavanaṃ. Sakkaccaṃ suṇantassa hi paṭisambhidā visadā
tika-s0402t:1709_3: honti. Paripucchā nāma aṭṭhakathā. Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṃ kathentassa hi paṭisambhidā
tika-s0402t:1709_4: visadā honti. Pubbayogo nāma pubbayogāvacaratā haraṇapaccāharaṇanayena parihaṭakammaṭṭhānatā.
tika-s0402t:1710_0: Etesu pana pariyatti, savanaṃ, paripucchāti imāni tīṇi pabhedasseva balavakāraṇāni,
tika-s0402t:1710_1: pubbayogo adhigamassa balavapaccayo. Pabhedassa hoti na hotīti? Hoti, na pana yathā
tika-s0402t:1710_2: adhigamassa balavapaccayo hoti, tathā pabhedassa. Pariyattisavanaparipucchā hi pubbe
tika-s0402t:1710_3: hontu vā mā vā, pubbayogena pana pubbe ceva etarahi ca saṅkhārasammasanaṃ vinā paṭisambhidādhigamo
tika-s0402t:1710_4: nāma natthi. Ime pana dvepi ekato hutvā paṭisambhidā upatthambhetvā visadā hontīti.
tika-s0402t:1713_0: 173-4. Tatiye phassāyatanānanti ettha ākaraṭṭho āyatanasaddoti āha “phassākarāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:1713_2: āyatanaṭṭho labbhatiyeva. Mā-iti paṭisedhe nipāto. Svāyaṃ channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1713_3: asesaṃ virāganirodhā atthaññaṃ vacanaṃ kiñcīti sandhāyāhāti āha “mā bhaṇīti attho”ti.
tika-s0402t:1713_4: Pañcaphassāyatanāni niruddhānīti cakkhādīnañca tattha abhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati. Chaṭṭhassāti
tika-s0402t:1716_1: vijjāya, aṭṭhavidhāya vā. Aṭṭhavidhāpi hi vijjā vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca
tika-s0402t:1716_2: saha abhiññā pariggahetvā vuttā. Pannarasadhammabhedena caraṇena samannāgatoti sīlasaṃvaro,
tika-s0402t:1716_3: indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, jāgariyānuyogo, saddhā, hirī, ottappaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1716_4: bāhusaccaṃ, vīriyaṃ, sati, paññā, cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti evaṃ pannarasabhedena
tika-s0402t:1716_5: caraṇadhammena samannāgato. Imeyeva hi pannarasa dhammā yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako
tika-s0402t:1716_6: gacchati amataṃ disaṃ, tasmā “caraṇa”nti vuttā. Chaṭṭhe natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1719_0: 177. Sattame pathavīdhāturevesāti duvidhāpesā thaddhaṭṭhena, kakkhaḷaṭṭhena, pharusaṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:1719_1: ekalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu evāti ajjhattikaṃ bāhirāya saddhiṃ yojetvā dasseti. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:1719_2: Bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā acetanābhāvo pākaṭo, na ajjhattikāya, tasmā bāhirāya saddhiṃ
tika-s0402t:1719_3: ekasadisā acetanāyevāti gaṇhantassa sukhapariggāhā hoti, yathā kiṃ? Dantena goṇena
tika-s0402t:1719_4: saddhiṃ yojito adanto katipāhameva visukāyati vipphandati, atha na cirasseva damathaṃ
tika-s0402t:1719_5: upeti, evaṃ ajjhattikaṃ bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisāti gaṇhantassa katipāhameva acetanabhāvena
tika-s0402t:1719_6: upaṭṭhāti, atha na cirenevassā acetanabhāvo pākaṭo hoti dhātumattatāya dassanato.
tika-s0402t:1719_7: Netaṃ mama…pe… daṭṭhabbanti taṃ ubhayampi “na etaṃ mama, na esohamasmi, na eso me
tika-s0402t:1719_8: attā”ti evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathābhūtanti yathāsabhāvaṃ. Tañhi
tika-s0402t:1719_9: aniccādisabhāvaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti attho. Yasmā “netaṃ
tika-s0402t:1719_10: mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti passanto neva katthaci attānaṃ passati, na taṃ
tika-s0402t:1719_11: parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve
tika-s0402t:1719_12: upanetabbaṃ passati, tasmā vuttaṃ “catukoṭikasuññatā nāma kathitā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1722_0: 178. Aṭṭhame santanti aṅgasantatāya ceva ārammaṇasantatāya ca kamanīyaṃ manoharaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1722_1: Cetovimuttinti rūpārūpāvacaraṃ cittavimuttiṃ. Tenevāha “aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ
tika-s0402t:1722_2: samāpatti”nti. Lepamakkhitenāti lākhāmakkhitena. Pāripanthike asodhetvāti kāmacchandādipāripanthike
tika-s0402t:1722_3: asodhetvā. Yo hi kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandaṃ na suṭṭhu vikkhambhetvā
tika-s0402t:1722_5: thinamiddhaṃ na suṭṭhu paṭivinodetvā samathanimittamanasikārādivasena uddhaccakukkuccaṃ
tika-s0402t:1722_6: na samūhataṃ katvā aññepi samādhiparipanthe dhamme na suṭṭhu sodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati.
tika-s0402t:1722_7: So asodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya asuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya ca khippameva
tika-s0402t:1722_8: nikkhamati. Yo pana samādhiparipanthe dhamme suṭṭhu visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0402t:1722_9: so suvisodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya suparisuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya
tika-s0402t:1723_0: Āyamukhānīti naditaḷākakandarapadarādito āgamanamaggā. Te ca kandarāyevāti āha “catasso
tika-s0402t:1723_1: pavisanakandarā”ti. Apāyamukhānīti apagamanamaggā. Apenti apagacchanti etehīti hi
tika-s0402t:1723_2: apāyā, te eva mukhānīti apāyamukhāni. Tāni ca udakanikkhamanacchiddānīti āha “apavāhanacchiddānī”ti,
tika-s0402t:1727_0: “Katamā hānabhāginī paññā? Paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā
tika-s0402t:1727_1: samudācaranti hānabhāginī paññā, tadanudhammatā sati santiṭṭhati ṭhitibhāginī paññā.
tika-s0402t:1727_2: Avitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti visesabhāginī paññā. Nibbidāsahagatā
tika-s0402t:1729_0: Tattha paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhinti yvāyaṃ appaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī,
tika-s0402t:1729_1: taṃ. Kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācarantīti tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā
tika-s0402t:1729_2: hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti tudanti codenti. Tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1729_3: vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā hāyati parihāyati, tasmā “hānabhāginī paññā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0402t:1729_4: Tadanudhammatāti tadanurūpasabhāvā. Sati santiṭṭhatīti idaṃ micchāsatiṃ sandhāya
tika-s0402t:1729_5: vuttaṃ, na sammāsatiṃ. Yassa hi paṭhamajjhānānurūpasabhāvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ santato
tika-s0402t:1729_6: paṇītato disvā assādayamānā abhinandamānā nikanti uppajjati, tassa nikantivasena
tika-s0402t:1729_7: paṭhamajjhānapaññā neva hāyati na vaḍḍhati, ṭhitikoṭṭhāsikā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “ṭhitibhāginī
tika-s0402t:1729_8: paññā”ti. Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato manasikaroto
tika-s0402t:1729_9: ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā. Samudācarantīti paguṇato paṭhamajjhānato
tika-s0402t:1729_10: vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya tudanti codenti, tassa upari dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1729_11: saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa uppattipadaṭṭhānatāya
tika-s0402t:1730_0: Nibbidāsahagatāti taṃyeva paṭhamajjhānalābhiṃ jhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ nibbidāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0402t:1730_1: vipassanāñāṇena sahagatā. Vipassanāñāṇañhi jhānaṅgabhede vattante nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati,
tika-s0402t:1730_2: tasmā “nibbidā”ti vuccati. Samudācarantīti nibbānasacchikiriyatthāya tudanti codenti.
tika-s0402t:1730_3: Virāgūpasañhitāti virāgasaṅkhātena nibbānena upasaṃhitā. Vipassanāñāṇañhi sakkā iminā
tika-s0402t:1730_4: maggena virāgaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikātunti pavattito “virāgūpasaṃhita”nti vuccati. Taṃsampayuttasaññāmanasikārāpi
tika-s0402t:1730_5: virāgūpasaṃhitā eva nāma. Tassa tesaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā
tika-s0402t:1733_0: 180. Dasame mahāokāseti mahante okāse mahantāni dhammassa patiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni. Yesu
tika-s0402t:1733_1: patiṭṭhāpito dhammo nicchīyati asandehato. Kāni pana tāni? Āgamanavisiṭṭhāni suttotaraṇādīni.
tika-s0402t:1733_2: Dutiyavikappe apadisīyantīti apadesā, mahantā apadesā etesanti mahāpadesā. “Sammukhā
tika-s0402t:1733_3: metaṃ, āvuso, bhagavato suta”ntiādinā kenaci ābhatassa dhammoti vinicchayane kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1733_4: Kiṃ pana tanti? Tassa yathābhatassa suttotaraṇādi eva. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cattāroti?
tika-s0402t:1733_5: Yasmā dhammassa dve sampadāyo satthā sāvako ca. Tesu sāvakā saṅghagaṇapuggalavasena
tika-s0402t:1733_6: tividhā. Evamimamhā mayāyaṃ dhammo paṭiggahitoti apadisitabbānaṃ bhedena cattāro.
tika-s0402t:1733_7: Tenāha “sammukhā metaṃ, āvuso, bhagavato suta”ntiādi. Tathā ca vuttaṃ nettiyaṃ “cattāro
tika-s0402t:1733_8: mahāpadesā buddhāpadeso, saṅghāpadeso, gaṇāpadeso, puggalāpadeso. Ime cattāro mahāpadesā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1733_9: Buddho apadeso etassāti buddhāpadeso. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tenāha “buddhādayo…pe… mahākāraṇānī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1734_0: Neva abhinanditabbanti na sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, ganthassa sampaṭicchanaṃ nāma savananti
tika-s0402t:1734_1: āha “na sotabba”nti. Padabyañjanānīti padāni ca byañjanāni ca, atthapadāni byañjanapadāni
tika-s0402t:1734_2: cāti attho. Pajjati attho etehīti padāni, akkharādīni byañjanapadāni. Pajjitabbato
tika-s0402t:1734_3: padāni, saṅkāsanādīni atthapadāni. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ padasaṅkhātāni byañjanānīti byañjanapadāneva
tika-s0402t:1734_4: vuttānī”ti keci. Atthaṃ byañjentīti byañjanāni, byañjanapadāni. Tehi byañjitabbato
tika-s0402t:1734_5: byañjanāni, atthapadānīti ubhayasaṅgahato. Imasmiṃ ṭhāneti tenābhatasuttassa imasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:1734_6: padese. Pāḷi vuttāti kevalo pāḷidhammo vutto. Attho vuttoti pāḷiyā attho vutto niddiṭṭho.
tika-s0402t:1734_7: Anusandhi kathitoti yathāraddhadesanāya uparidesanāya ca anusandhānaṃ kathitaṃ, sambandho
tika-s0402t:1734_8: kathito. Pubbāparaṃ kathitanti pubbena paraṃ avirujjhanañceva visesaṭṭhānañca kathitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1734_9: pakāsitaṃ. Evaṃ pāḷidhammādīni sammadeva sallakkhetvā gahaṇaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahaṇanti
tika-s0402t:1734_10: āha “suṭṭhu gahetvā”ti. Sutte otāretabbānīti ñāṇena sutte ogāhetvā tāretabbāni. Taṃ
tika-s0402t:1734_11: pana ogāhetvā taraṇaṃ tattha otaraṇaṃ anuppavesanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “otaritabbānī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1735_0: “Kiṃ pana taṃ suttaṃ, ko vā vinayo”ti vicāraṇāyaṃ ācariyānaṃ matibhedamukhena tamatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1735_1: dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vinayoti vibhaṅgapāṭhamāha. So hi mātikāsaññitassa
tika-s0402t:1735_2: suttassa atthe sūcanato “sutta”nti vattabbataṃ arahati. Vividhanayattā visiṭṭhanayattā
tika-s0402t:1735_3: ca vinayo, khandhakapāṭho. Evanti evaṃ suttavinayesu pariggayhamānesu vinayapiṭakampi
tika-s0402t:1735_4: na pariyādiyati parivārapāḷiyā asaṅgahitattā. Suttantābhidhammapiṭakāni vā suttaṃ
tika-s0402t:1735_6: vinayoti evaṃ suttavinayavibhāge vuccamānepi. Na tāva pariyādiyantīti na tāva anavasesato
tika-s0402t:1735_7: pariggayhanti. Kasmāti ceti āha “asuttanāmakañhī”tiādi. Yasmā suttanti imaṃ nāmaṃ
tika-s0402t:1735_8: anāropetvā saṅgītaṃ jātakādibuddhavacanaṃ atthi, tasmā vuttanayena tīṇi piṭakāni
tika-s0402t:1735_9: na pariyādiyantīti. Suttanipātaudānaitivuttakāni dīghanikāyādayo viya suttanti nāmaṃ
tika-s0402t:1735_10: āropetvā asaṅgītānīti adhippāyenettha jātakādīhi saddhiṃ tānipi gahitāni. Buddhavaṃsacariyāpiṭakānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1735_11: panettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ maggitabbaṃ, kiṃ vā etena magganena. Sabbopāyaṃ vaṇṇanānayo
tika-s0402t:1736_0: Kiṃ atthīti asuttanāmakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ natthiyevāti dasseti. Taṃ sabbaṃ paṭikkhipitvāti
tika-s0402t:1736_2: Vineti etena kileseti vinayo, kilesavinayanūpāyo, so eva kāraṇanti āha “vinayo pana kāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0402t:1737_2: mahicchabhāvāya. Asantuṭṭhiyāti asantuṭṭhabhāvāya. Kosajjāyāti kusītabhāvāya. Saṅgaṇikāyāti
tika-s0402t:1737_3: kilesasaṅgaṇikavihārāya. Ācayāyāti tividhavaṭṭācayāya. Virāgāyāti sakalavaṭṭato virajjanatthāya.
tika-s0402t:1737_4: Visaṃyogāyāti kāmarāgādīhi visaṃyujjanatthāya. Anupādānāyāti sabbassapi kammabhavassa
tika-s0402t:1737_5: aggahaṇāya. Appicchatāyāti paccayappicchatādivasena sabbaso icchāya apagamāya. Santuṭṭhiyāti
tika-s0402t:1737_6: dvādasavidhasantuṭṭhabhāvāya. Vīriyārambhāyāti kāyikassa ceva cetasikassa ca vīriyassa
tika-s0402t:1737_8: Apacayāyāti sabbassapi vaṭṭassa apacayanāya, nibbānāyāti attho. Evaṃ yo pariyattidhammo
tika-s0402t:1737_10: kāraṇaṃ hutvā virāgādibhāvāya saṃvattati, ekaṃsato eso dhammo, eso vinayo sammadeva
tika-s0402t:1737_11: apāyādīsu apatanavasena dhāraṇato kilesānaṃ vinayanato ca. Satthu sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0402t:1737_12: ovādānurūpappavattibhāvato etaṃ satthusāsananti ca jāneyyāsīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1738_0: Catusaccatthasūcanaṃ suttanti āha “sutteti tepiṭake buddhavacane”ti. Tepiṭakañhi
tika-s0402t:1738_1: buddhavacanaṃ saccavinimuttaṃ natthi. Rāgādivinayakāraṇaṃ yathā tena suttapadena
tika-s0402t:1738_2: pakāsitanti āha “vinayeti etasmiṃ rāgādivinayakāraṇe”ti. Sutte otaraṇañcettha tepiṭakabuddhavacanapariyāpannatāvaseneva
tika-s0402t:1738_3: veditabbaṃ, na aññathāti āha “suttappaṭipāṭiyā katthaci anāgantvā”ti. Challiṃ uṭṭhapetvāti
tika-s0402t:1738_4: arogassa mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato upakkamena challikāya sakalikāya papaṭikāya vā
tika-s0402t:1738_5: uṭṭhāpanaṃ viya arogassa sāsanadhammassa tiṭṭhato byañjanamattena tappariyāpannaṃ
tika-s0402t:1738_6: viya hutvā challisadisaṃ pubbāparaviruddhatādidosaṃ uṭṭhapetvā paridīpetvā. Tādisāni
tika-s0402t:1738_7: pana ekaṃsato guḷhavessantarādipariyāpannāni hontīti āha “guḷhavessantara…pe… paññāyantīti
tika-s0402t:1738_8: attho”ti. Rāgādivinayeti rāgādivinayanatthena atadākāratāya apaññāyamānāni chaḍḍetabbāni
tika-s0402t:1745_0: 184. Catutthe socatīti citte uppannabalavasokena socati, cittasantāpena anto nijjhāyatīti
tika-s0402t:1745_1: attho. Kilamatīti tasseva sokassa vasena kāye ca uppannadukkhena kilamati. Paridevatīti
tika-s0402t:1745_2: sokuddehakavasena taṃ taṃ vippalapanto vācāya paridevati. Urattāḷinti urattāḷaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1745_3: uraṃ tāḷetvāti attho. Tenāha “uraṃ tāḷetvā”ti. Kaṅkhāvicikicchāti ettha “ekamevidaṃ
tika-s0402t:1745_4: pañcamaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ. Kiṃ nu kho ida”nti ārammaṇaṃ kaṅkhanato kaṅkhā, “idameva vara”nti
tika-s0402t:1748_0: 185. Pañcame etthāti etasmiṃ suññatānupassanādhikāre. Kvacīti katthaci ṭhāne, kāle,
tika-s0402t:1748_1: dhamme vā. Atha vā kvacīti ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā vā. Attano attānanti sakattānaṃ “ayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1748_2: kho, bho brahmā, mahābrahmā…pe… vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna”ntiādinā parehi parikappitaṃ
tika-s0402t:1748_3: attānañca kassaci kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento “kassacī”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0402t:1748_4: parassāti parajāti paro purisoti vā evaṃ gahitassa. Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-saddo
tika-s0402t:1748_5: aṭṭhānappayuttoti āha “mama-saddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā”ti. Parassa cāti attano aññassa.
tika-s0402t:1748_6: Paro puriso nāma atthi mamatthāya ṭhito. Tassa vasena mayhaṃ sabbaṃ ijjhatīti ekaccadiṭṭhigatikaparikappitavasena
tika-s0402t:1748_7: paraṃ attānaṃ tañca attano kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento “na ca kvacanī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:1748_8: Ettha ca nāhaṃ kvacanīti sakaattano sabbhāvaṃ na passati. Na kassaci kiñcanatasminti
tika-s0402t:1748_9: sakaattano eva kassaci attaniyataṃ na passati. Na ca mamāti etaṃ dvayaṃ yathārahaṃ
tika-s0402t:1748_10: sambandhitabbaṃ, atthi-padaṃ paccekaṃ. Na ca kvacani parassa attā atthīti parassa
tika-s0402t:1748_11: attano abhāvaṃ passati. Tassa parassa attano mama kiñcanatā natthīti parassa attano
tika-s0402t:1748_12: anattaniyataṃ passati. Evaṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā khandhānaṃ attattaniyasuññatā-suddhasaṅkhārapuñjatā-catukoṭikasuññatāpariggaṇhanena
tika-s0402t:1751_0: 186. Chaṭṭhe ākaḍḍhīyatīti cittavasiko loko tattha tattha upakaḍḍhīyati. Tesaṃyevettha
tika-s0402t:1751_1: gahaṇaṃ veditabbanti ye apariññātavatthukā cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1751_2: Na hi pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti, cittaṃ pana attano
tika-s0402t:1751_3: vase vattenti. Saha sīlenāti cārittavārittasīlena saddhiṃ. Pubbabhāgapaṭipadanti
tika-s0402t:1751_4: dhutaṅgamādiṃ katvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ, tāva pavattetabbaṃ samathavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0402t:1754_0: 187. Sattame vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmattoti ettha vassakāroti tassa brāhmaṇassa
tika-s0402t:1754_1: nāmaṃ. Mahatiyā issariyamattāya samannāgato mahāmatto. Issariyamattāyāti ca issariyappamāṇenāti
tika-s0402t:1754_2: attho, issariyena ceva vittūpakaraṇena cāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo, upabhogūpakaraṇānipi
tika-s0402t:1754_3: hi loke “mattā”ti vuccanti. Magadharañño, magadharaṭṭhe vā mahāmattoti magadhamahāmatto.
tika-s0402t:1754_4: Tudisaññito gāmo nivāso etassāti todeyyo. Tenevāha “tudigāmavāsikassā”ti. Tudigāmavāsitā
tika-s0402t:1754_5: cassa tattha adhipatibhāvenāti daṭṭhabbā. So hi taṃ gāmaṃ soṇadaṇḍo viya, campaṃ
tika-s0402t:1754_6: kūṭadanto viya, khāṇumataṃ adhipatibhāvena ajjhāvasati. Mahaddhano hoti pañcacattālīsakoṭivibhavo.
tika-s0402t:1754_7: Parisatīti parisāyaṃ, janasamūheti attho. Tenāha “sannipatitāya parisāyā”ti. Abhippasannoti
tika-s0402t:1754_8: ettha abhikkamanattho abhi-saddoti āha “atikkamma pasanno”ti, pasādanīyaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1754_9: atikkamitvā appasādanīyaṭṭhāne pasannoti adhippāyo. Taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ atthaṃ passatīti
tika-s0402t:1754_10: atthadasā, alaṃ samatthā paṭibalā atthadasā alamatthadasā, alamatthadase atisayantīti
tika-s0402t:1754_11: alamatthadasatarā. Tenāha “atthe passituṃ samatthā”tiādi. Neva sappurisaṃ na asappurisaṃ
tika-s0402t:1754_12: jānāti sappurisadhammānaṃ asappurisadhammānañca yāthāvato ajānanato. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1757_0: 188. Aṭṭhame nibbattivasena nirayaṃ arahati, nirayasaṃvattaniyena vā kammunā niraye
tika-s0402t:1757_1: niyuttoti nerayiko. Avīcimhi uppajjitvā tattha āyukappasaññitaṃ antarakappaṃ tiṭṭhatīti
tika-s0402t:1757_2: kappaṭṭho. Nirayūpapattiṃ pariharaṇavasena tikicchituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti atekiccho. Apariyādinnāvāti
tika-s0402t:1757_3: aparikkhīṇāyeva. Sace hi eko bhikkhu kāyānupassanaṃ pucchati, añño vedanānupassanaṃ…pe…
tika-s0402t:1757_4: cittānupassanaṃ. “Iminā puṭṭhe ahaṃ pucchāmī”ti eko ekaṃ na oloketi, evaṃ santepi
tika-s0402t:1757_5: tesaṃ vāro paññāyati eva, buddhānaṃ pana vāro na paññāyati. Vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ
tika-s0402t:1757_6: chāyaṃ atikkamanato puretaraṃyeva bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ, navavidhena
tika-s0402t:1757_7: vedanānupassanaṃ, soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ, pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ katheti.
tika-s0402t:1757_8: Tiṭṭhantu vā evaṃ cattāro. Sace hi aññe cattāro sammappadhānesu, aññe iddhipādesu,
tika-s0402t:1757_9: aññe pañcindriyesu, aññe pañcabalesu, aññe sattabojjhaṅgesu, aññe aṭṭhamaggaṅgesu
tika-s0402t:1757_10: pañhe puccheyyuṃ, tampi bhagavā katheyya. Tiṭṭhantu vā ete aṭṭha. Sace aññe sattatiṃsa
tika-s0402t:1757_11: janā bodhipakkhiyesu pañhe puccheyyuṃ, tampi bhagavā tāvadeva katheyya. Kasmā? Yāvatā
tika-s0402t:1757_12: hi lokiyamahājane ekaṃ padaṃ kathente tāva ānandatthero aṭṭha padāni katheti. Ānandatthere
tika-s0402t:1757_13: pana ekaṃ padaṃ kathenteyeva bhagavā soḷasa padāni katheti. Kasmā? Bhagavato hi jivhā
tika-s0402t:1757_14: mudu, dantāvaraṇaṃ suphusitaṃ, vacanaṃ agaḷitaṃ, bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:1758_0: Tattha dhammadesanāti tantiṭṭhapanā. Dhammapadabyañjananti ettha dhammoti pāḷi. Pajjati
tika-s0402t:1758_1: attho etenāti padaṃ. Vākyañca padeneva saṅgahitaṃ. Atthaṃ byañjetīti byañjanaṃ, akkharaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1758_2: Tañhi padavākyaṃ paricchijjamānaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ byañjeti pakāseti. Etena aparāparehi
tika-s0402t:1758_3: padabyañjanehi sucirampi kālaṃ kathentassa tathāgatassa na kadāci tesaṃ pariyādānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1758_4: atthīti dasseti. Guṇadhaṃsīti guṇadhaṃsanasīlo. Pagabboti vācāpāgabbiyena samannāgato.
tika-s0402t:1764_0: 190. Dasame tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti āmeḍitavacanaṃ byāpanicchāvasena vuttanti āha
tika-s0402t:1764_1: “yato yato anuviloketī”ti. Anuviloketvāti ettha anu-saddopi byāpanicchāvacanamevāti
tika-s0402t:1764_2: anu anu viloketvāti attho, pañcapasādappaṭimaṇḍitāni akkhīni ummīletvā tato tato
tika-s0402t:1764_3: viloketvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Alanti yuttaṃ, opāyikanti attho “alameva nibbinditu”ntiādīsu
tika-s0402t:1764_4: viya. Puṭabandhanena pariharitvā asitabbaṃ puṭosaṃ sambalaṃ a-kārassa o-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0402t:1769_0: 191. Pañcamassa paṭhame sotānugatānanti pasādasotaṃ anugantvā gatānaṃ, paguṇānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1769_1: vācuggatānanti attho. Evaṃbhūtā ca pasādasotaṃ odahitvā ñāṇasotena suṭṭhu vavatthapitā
tika-s0402t:1769_2: nāma hontīti āha “pasādasota”ntiādi. Ekaccassa hi uggahitapubbavacanaṃ taṃ taṃ paguṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1769_3: niccharitaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthapitaṃ na hoti. “Asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti
tika-s0402t:1769_4: vutte “sajjhāyitvā saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā jānissāmī”ti vadanti. Ekaccassa taṃ
tika-s0402t:1769_5: taṃ paguṇaṃ bhavaṅgasotasadisaṃ hoti “asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti vutte
tika-s0402t:1769_6: uddharitvā tameva katheti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “ñāṇasotena vavatthapitāna”nti.
tika-s0402t:1769_7: Itthiliṅgādīni tīṇi liṅgāni. Nāmādīni cattāri padāni. Paṭhamādayo satta vibhattiyo.
tika-s0402t:1770_0: Vaḷañjetīti pāḷiṃ anusandhiṃ pubbāparavasena vācuggataṃ karonto dhāreti. Vacasā paricitāti
tika-s0402t:1770_2: dasavaggāni gatānī”tiādinā sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitāti attho. Vaggādivasena
tika-s0402t:1770_3: hi idha vacasā paricayo adhippeto, na pana suttekadesassa suttamattassa vacasā paricayo.
tika-s0402t:1770_4: Manasā anu anu pekkhitā bhāgaso nijjhāyitā viditā manusānupekkhitā. Yassa vācāya
tika-s0402t:1770_5: sajjhāyitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ manasā cintentassa tattha tattha pākaṭaṃ hoti, mahādīpaṃ
tika-s0402t:1770_6: jāletvā ṭhitassa rūpagataṃ viya vibhūtaṃ hutvā paññāyati. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1770_7: Suppaṭividdhāti nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvato paṭividdhā. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t:1773_0: 192. Dutiye saṃvāsenāti sahavāsena. Sīlaṃ veditabbanti “ayaṃ susīlo vā dussīlo vā”ti
tika-s0402t:1773_1: saha vasantena upasaṅkamantena jānitabbo. Tañca kho dīghena addhunā, na ittaranti
tika-s0402t:1773_2: tañca sīlaṃ dīghena kālena veditabbaṃ, na ittarena. Dvīhatīhañhi saṃyatākāro ca saṃvutindriyākāro
tika-s0402t:1773_3: ca na sakkā dassetuṃ. Manasi karotāti tampi “sīlamassa pariggahessāmī”ti manasikarontena
tika-s0402t:1773_4: paccavekkhanteneva sakkā jānituṃ, na itarena. Paññavatāti tampi sappaññeneva paṇḍitena.
tika-s0402t:1773_5: Bālo hi manasikarontopi jānituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0402t:1776: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhi, vāṇijo so na brāhmaṇo”ti. –
tika-s0402t:1777_0: Ettha hi byavahāro nāma. “Cattāro ariyavohārā, cattāro anariyavohārā”ti ettha cetanā.
