tika-s0402t:1777_1: “Saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro”ti ettha paññatti. “Vohāramattena so vohareyyā”ti
tika-s0402t:1777_2: ettha kathāvohāro. Idhāpi esova adhippeto. Ekaccassa hi sammukhākathā parammukhākathāya
tika-s0402t:1777_3: na sameti parammukhākathā sammukhākathāya. Tathā purimakathā pacchimakathāya, pacchimakathā
tika-s0402t:1777_4: ca purimakathāya. So kathaneneva sakkā jānituṃ “asuci eso puggalo”ti. Sucisīlassa
tika-s0402t:1777_5: pana purimaṃ pacchimena, pacchimañca purimena sameti. Sammukhākathitaṃ parammukhākathitena
tika-s0402t:1777_6: sameti, parammukhākathitañca sammukhākathitena, tasmā kathanena sakkā sucibhāvo jānitunti pakāsento evamāha.
tika-s0402t:1778_0: Thāmoti ñāṇathāmo. Yassa hi ñāṇathāmo natthi, so uppannesu upaddavesu gahetabbaṃ
tika-s0402t:1778_1: gahaṇaṃ kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ apassanto advārakagharaṃ paviṭṭho viya carati. Tenāha “āpadāsu,
tika-s0402t:1779_0: Sākacchāyāti saṃkathāya. Duppaññassa hi kathā udake geṇḍu viya uppilavati. Paññavato
tika-s0402t:1779_1: kathentassa paṭibhānaṃ anantaṃ hoti. Udakavipphanditeneva hi maccho khuddako vā mahanto vāti ñāyati.
tika-s0402t:1780_0: Ñātivināsoti corarogabhayādīhi ñātīnaṃ vināso. Bhogānaṃ byasanaṃ bhogabyasanaṃ, rājacorādivasena
tika-s0402t:1780_1: bhogavināsoti attho. Tenāha “dutiyapadepi eseva nayo”ti. Pañhummaggoti pañhagavesanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1780_2: ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa vīmaṃsananti attho. Atappakanti atittikaraṭṭhena atappakaṃ
tika-s0402t:1783: 193. Tatiye karaṇassa uttaraṃ kiriyaṃ karaṇuttariyaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t:1786: 194. Catutthe puggalassa pārisuddhiyā padhānabhūtāni vā aṅgāni pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t:1789_0: 195. Pañcame pihitattāti akusalassa pavesanadvāraṃ pidahitvā ṭhitattā. Kāyena saṃvaritabbañhi
tika-s0402t:1789_1: apihitena dvārena pavattanakaṃ pāpadhammaṃ saṃvaritvā ṭhito kāyena saṃvuto nāma.
tika-s0402t:1789_2: Khayavirāgenāti accantakhayasaṅkhātena virajjanena, anuppādanirodhenāti attho. Kiṃ
tika-s0402t:1789_3: vijjā pubbe uppannāti? Ubhayametaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Pahānābhisamayabhāvanābhisamayānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1789_4: abhinnakālattā padīpujjalanena andhakāraṃ viya vijjuppādena avijjā niruddhāva hoti,
tika-s0402t:1789_5: vattabbaṃ vā hetuphalattamupacāravasena. Yathā hi padīpujjalanahetuko andhakāravigamo,
tika-s0402t:1789_6: evaṃ vijjuppādahetuko avijjānirodho. Hetuphaladhammā ca samānakālāpi pubbāparakālā
tika-s0402t:1789_7: viya voharīyanti yathā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti paccayādānuppajjanakiriyā.
tika-s0402t:1789_8: Cittassa kāyassa ca vihananato vighāto, dukkhaṃ. Paridahanato pariḷāho.
tika-s0402t:1790_0: Niccavihārāti sabbadā pavattanakavihārā. Ṭhapetvā hi samāpattivelaṃ bhavaṅgavelañca
tika-s0402t:1790_1: khīṇāsavā iminā chaḷaṅgupekkhāvihārena sabbakālaṃ viharanti. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti
tika-s0402t:1790_2: cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti hi nissayavohārena vuttaṃ. Sasambhārakathā
tika-s0402t:1790_3: hesā yathā “dhanunā vijjhatī”ti, tasmā nissayasīsena nissitassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1790_4: Rāgavasena na somanassajāto hotīti gehasitapemavasenapi javanakkhaṇe somanassajāto
tika-s0402t:1790_5: na hoti maggena samucchinnattā, na domanassajāto pasādaññathattavasenapi. Upekkhako
tika-s0402t:1790_6: majjhatto hutvā viharatīti asamapekkhanena mohaṃ anuppādento ñāṇupekkhāvaseneva upekkhako
tika-s0402t:1790_7: viharati majjhatto. Khīṇāsavo hi iṭṭhepi aniṭṭhepi majjhattepi ārammaṇe yo asamapekkhanena
tika-s0402t:1790_8: samasamā ayonisogahaṇe akhīṇāsavānaṃ moho uppajjati, taṃ anuppādento maggeneva tassa
tika-s0402t:1790_9: samugghātitattā ñāṇupekkhāvaseneva upekkhako viharati, ayañcassa paṭipatti sativepullapattiyā
tika-s0402t:1791_0: Ettha ca “chasu dvāresu upekkhako viharatī”ti iminā chaḷaṅgupekkhā kathitā. “Sampajāno”ti
tika-s0402t:1791_1: vacanato pana cattāri ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato.
tika-s0402t:1791_4: dasa cittāni labbhanti. Arajjanādussanavasena pavatti hi tesampi sādhāraṇāti. Nanu
tika-s0402t:1791_5: cettha “upekkhako viharatī”ti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena imesaṃ satatavihārānaṃ āgatattā
tika-s0402t:1791_6: somanassaṃ kathaṃ labbhatīti? Āsevanatoti. Kiñcāpi hi khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi ārammaṇe
tika-s0402t:1791_7: majjhatte viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano parisuddhappakatibhāvāvijahanato,
tika-s0402t:1791_8: kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārabhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tassa
tika-s0402t:1791_9: yāthāvato sabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ hutvā pavattateva,
tika-s0402t:1792_0: Kāyoti pañcadvārakāyo, so anto avasānaṃ etissāti kāyantikā, taṃ kāyantikaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:1792_1: – “yāva pañcadvārakāyo pavattati, tāva pavatta”nti. Jīvitantikanti etthāpi eseva
tika-s0402t:1792_2: nayo. Pacchā uppajjitvāti etasmiṃ attabhāve manodvārikavedanāto pacchā uppajjitvā
tika-s0402t:1792_3: tato paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati, tato eva atthasiddhamatthaṃ sarūpeneva dassetuṃ “manodvārikavedanā
tika-s0402t:1792_4: paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pacchā nirujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tameva saṅkhepena vuttaṃ vivarituṃ
tika-s0402t:1792_5: “sā hī”tiādimāha. Yāva tettiṃsavassāni paṭhamavayo. Paññāsavassakāleti paṭhamavayato
tika-s0402t:1792_6: yāva paññāsavassakālā, tāva. Ṭhitā hotīti vaḍḍhihāniyo anupagantvā samarūpeneva ṭhitā
tika-s0402t:1792_7: hoti. Mandāti mudukā atikhiṇā. Tadāti asītinavutivassakāle vadantepi tathāciraparicitepīti
tika-s0402t:1792_8: adhippāyo. Bhaggāti tejobhaggena bhaggā dubbaṇṇā. Hadayakoṭiṃyevāti cakkhādivatthūsu
tika-s0402t:1792_9: appavattitvā tesaṃ ādiantakoṭibhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃyeva. Tāvāti yāva vedanā vattati, tāva.
tika-s0402t:1793_0: Vāpiyāti mahātaḷākena. Pañcaudakamaggasampannanti pañcahi udakassa pavisananikkhamanamaggehi
tika-s0402t:1793_1: yuttaṃ. Tato tato vissandamānaṃ sabbaso puṇṇattā. Paṭhamaṃ deve vassantetiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1793_2: Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāyāti imaṃ yathāvuttaṃ pariyosānappattaṃ manodvārikavedanaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0402t:1794_0: Kāyassa bhedāti attabhāvassa vināsanato. Parato agantvāti paralokavasena agantvā.
tika-s0402t:1794_1: Vedanānaṃ sītibhāvo nāma saṅkhāradarathapariḷāhābhāvo. So panāyaṃ sabbaso appavattivasenevāti
tika-s0402t:1795_0: Attabhāvaṃ nāsetukāmassa daḷhaṃ uppannaṃ saṃvegañāṇaṃ sandhāyāha “kudālo viya paññā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1795_1: Tato nibbattitajjhānasamādhiṃ sandhāya “piṭakaṃ viya samādhī”ti. Tannissāya pavattetabbavipassanārambhañāṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1795_2: sandhāya “khanitti viya vipassanā”ti ca vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1798_0: 196. Chaṭṭhe kāyadaḷhibahulataṃ tapatīti tapo, attakilamathānuyogavasena pavattaṃ
tika-s0402t:1798_1: vīriyaṃ. Tena kāyadaḷhibahulatānimittassa pāpassa jigucchanaṃ virajjanaṃ tapojigucchāti
tika-s0402t:1798_3: manasāpi tameva sārato gahetvā vicaranti, kāyenapi tameva allīnā nānappakāraṃ attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā
tika-s0402t:1798_4: viharantīti attho. Aparisuddhakāyasamācārāti aparisuddhena pāṇātipātādinā kāyasamācārena
tika-s0402t:1798_8: tadā pana te cetanāpakkhikā vā abbohārikā vāti, manosamācāravāre eva abhijjhādivasena
tika-s0402t:1798_9: yojanā katā. Atha vā dvārantare pavattānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ vacīsamācārādibhāvābhāvo
tika-s0402t:1798_10: viya dvārantare pavattānampi abhijjhādīnaṃ kāyasamācārādibhāvo asiddho, manosamācārabhāvo
tika-s0402t:1798_11: eva pana siddhoti katvā manosamācāravāre eva abhijjhādayo uddhaṭā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
tika-s0402t:1801_1: ājīvena samannāgatā. Idañca sāsane pabbajitānaṃyeva vasena vuttaṃ, “yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti
tika-s0402t:1801_2: pana vacanato bāhirakavasena gahaṭṭhavasena ca yojanā veditabbā. Gahaṭṭhānampi hi
tika-s0402t:1802_0: Ñāṇadassanāyāti ettha ñāṇadassananti maggañāṇampi vuccati phalañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi
tika-s0402t:1802_1: paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi vipassanāñāṇampi. “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, ñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1802_2: bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti hi ettha maggañāṇaṃ “ñāṇadassana”nti vuttaṃ. “Ayamañño
tika-s0402t:1802_3: uttarimanussadhammo alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1802_4: “Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādi sattāhakālakato āḷāro kālāmo”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1802_5: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi, akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jātī”ti ettha paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1802_6: “Ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharatī”ti ettha vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Idha pana ñāṇadassanāyāti
tika-s0402t:1802_8: vijjhatīti avirādhitaṃ katvā vijjhati. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t:1805_0: 197. Sattame appesakkhāti appānubhāvā. Sā pana appesakkhatā ādhipateyyasampattiyā
tika-s0402t:1805_1: parivārasampattiyā ca abhāvena pākaṭā hoti. Tattha parivārasampattiyā abhāvaṃ dassento
tika-s0402t:1805_2: “appaparivārā”ti āha. Issarāti ādhipateyyasaṃvattanakammabalena īsanasīlā. Sā panassā
tika-s0402t:1805_3: issaratā vibhavasampattipaccayā pākaṭā jātāti aḍḍhatāpariyāyabhāvena vadanto “aḍḍhāti
tika-s0402t:1805_4: issarā”ti āha. Mahantaṃ dhanametissā bhūmigatañceva vaḷañjanakañcāti mahaddhanā.
tika-s0402t:1805_5: Idha pana vaḷañjanakeneva dhanena mahaddhanataṃ dassento “vaḷañjanakadhanena mahaddhanā”ti
tika-s0402t:1805_6: āha. Īsatīti īsā, abhibhūti attho. Mahatī īsā mahesā, suppatiṭṭhitamahesatāya pana
tika-s0402t:1805_7: parehi mahesoti akkhātabbatāya mahesakkhā. Yasmā pana so mahesakkhābhāvo ādhipateyyaparivārasampattiyā
tika-s0402t:1806_0: Saṇṭhānapāripūriyā adhikaṃ rūpamassāti abhirūpā. Saṇṭhānapāripūriyāti ca hatthapādādisarīrāvayavānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1806_1: susaṇṭhitatāyāti attho. Avayavapāripūriyā hi samudāyapāripūrisiddhi. Rūpanti ca sarīraṃ
tika-s0402t:1806_2: “rūpavanteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu viya. Dassanayuttāti surūpabhāvena passitabbayuttā,
tika-s0402t:1806_3: dissamānā cakkhūni piyāyatīti aññakiccavikkhepaṃ hitvāpi daṭṭhabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1806_4: Dissamānāva somanassavasena cittaṃ pasādetīti pāsādikā. Tenāha “dassanena pāsādikā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1806_5: Pokkharatāti vuccati sundarabhāvo, vaṇṇassa pokkharatā vaṇṇapokkharatā, tāya vaṇṇasampattiyāti
tika-s0402t:1806_6: attho. Porāṇā pana pokkharanti sarīraṃ vadanti, vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇameva. Tesaṃ matena vaṇṇañca
tika-s0402t:1806_7: pokkharañca vaṇṇapokkharāni, tesaṃ bhāvo vaṇṇapokkharatā. Iti paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti
tika-s0402t:1806_8: uttamaparisuddhena vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānasampattiyā cāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Tenevāha
tika-s0402t:1806_9: “vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānena cā”ti. Tattha vaṇṇenāti vaṇṇadhātuyā. Sarīraṃ nāma
tika-s0402t:1806_10: sannivesavisiṭṭho karacaraṇagīvāsīsādiavayavasamudāyo, so ca saṇṭhānamukhena gayhatīti
tika-s0402t:1807_0: Abhisajjatīti kujjhanavaseneva kuṭilakaṇṭako viya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samuṭṭhāne makaradanto
tika-s0402t:1807_1: viya lagati. Yañhi kodhassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūte ārammaṇe upanāhassa paccayabhūtaṃ
tika-s0402t:1807_2: kujjhanavasena abhisajjanaṃ, taṃ idhādhippetaṃ, na lubbhanavasena. Kuppatītiādīsu
tika-s0402t:1807_3: pubbuppatti kopo, tato balavataro byāpādo laddhāsevanatāya cittassa byāpajjanato.
tika-s0402t:1807_4: Sātisayaṃ laddhāsevanatāya tato byāpādatopi balavatarā paccatthikabhāvena thāmappatti
tika-s0402t:1807_5: patitthiyanā. Annaṃ pānantiādīsu adīyato annaṃ, khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyañca. Pātabyato
tika-s0402t:1807_6: pānaṃ, yaṃkiñci pānaṃ. Vasitabbato acchādetabbato vatthaṃ, nivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ. Yanti
tika-s0402t:1807_7: tenāti yānaṃ, chattupāhanavayhasivikādi yaṃkiñci gamanapaccayaṃ. Chattampi hi vassātapadukkhanivāraṇena
tika-s0402t:1807_8: maggagamanasādhananti katvā “yāna”nti vuccati. Mālanti yaṃkiñci sumanamālādipupphaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1810_0: 198. Aṭṭhame āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvo. Idha pana yo paro na hoti, so
tika-s0402t:1810_1: attā, taṃ attānaṃ. Paranti attato aññaṃ. Diṭṭheti paccakkhabhūte. Dhammeti upādānakkhandhadhamme.
tika-s0402t:1810_2: Tattha hi attā bhavati, attasaññādiṭṭhi bhavatīti attabhāvasamaññā. Tenāha “diṭṭheva
tika-s0402t:1810_3: dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve”ti. Chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā jighacchāhetutāya. Anto tāpanakilesānanti
tika-s0402t:1811: Paresaṃ hananaghātanādinā rodāpanato luddo. Tathā vighātakabhāvena kāyacittānaṃ vidālanato dāruṇo. Thaddhahadayo kakkhaḷo. Bandhanāgāre niyutto bandhanāgāriko.
tika-s0402t:1812_0: Khattiyābhisekenāti khattiyānaṃ kātabbaabhisekena. Santhāgāranti santhāravasena kataṃ
tika-s0402t:1812_1: agāraṃ yaññāgāraṃ. Sappitelenāti sappimissena telena. Yamakasnehena hi esā tadā kāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1812_2: abbhañjati. Vacchabhāvaṃ taritvā ṭhito vacchataro. Parikkhepakaraṇatthāyāti navamālāhi
tika-s0402t:1812_3: saddhiṃ dabbhehi vediyā parikkhipanatthāya. Yaññabhūmiyanti avasesayaññaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0402t:1813_0: Dūrasamussāritamānasseva sāsane sammāpaṭipatti sambhavati, na mānajātikassāti āha
tika-s0402t:1813_2: honti nimittassa avaṭṭhānato, na tathā kulavijjāmadāti khattiyabrāhmaṇakulānaṃ pabbajitānampi
tika-s0402t:1813_3: jātivijjā nissāya mānajappanaṃ duppajahanti āha “yebhuyyena hi…pe… mānaṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1813_4: Vijātitāyāti nihīnajātitāya. Patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkontīti suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ
tika-s0402t:1813_5: na sakkonti. Sīlavasena hi sāsane patiṭṭhahanti. Patiṭṭhātunti vā saccappaṭivedhena
tika-s0402t:1813_6: lokuttarāya patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhātuṃ. Yebhuyyena hi upanissayasampannā sujātāyeva honti, na dujjātā.
tika-s0402t:1814_0: Parisuddhanti rāgādīnaṃ accantameva pahānadīpanato nirupakkilesatāya sabbaso visuddhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1814_1: Saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti pothujjanikasaddhāvasena saddahati. Viññujātikānañhi dhammasampattiggahaṇapubbikā
tika-s0402t:1814_4: yassa pana purisassa anekā pajāpatiyo honti, tattha kiṃ vattabbanti ekāyapi saṃvāso
tika-s0402t:1814_5: sambādhoti dassanatthaṃ “dve”ti vuttaṃ. Rāgādinā sakiñcanaṭṭhena, khettavatthuādinā
tika-s0402t:1814_6: sapalibodhaṭṭhena rāgarajādīnaṃ āgamanapathatāpi uppajjanaṭṭhānatā evāti dvepi vaṇṇanā
tika-s0402t:1814_7: ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Alagganaṭṭhenāti asajjanaṭṭhena appaṭibaddhabhāvena.
tika-s0402t:1814_9: dassetvā idāni kusalappavattiyāyeva aṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvena tesaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1815_0: Saṅkhepakathāti visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāraṃ akatvā saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā. Ekampi divasanti
tika-s0402t:1815_1: ekadivasamattampi. Akhaṇḍaṃ katvāti dukkaṭamattassapi anāpajjanena akhaṇḍitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0402t:1815_2: Kilesamalena amalinanti taṇhāsaṃkilesādivasena asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ katvā. Paridahitvāti
tika-s0402t:1815_3: nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca. Agāravāso agāraṃ uttarapadalopena, tassa vaḍḍhiāvahaṃ agārassa hitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1816_0: Bhogakkhandhoti bhogarāsi bhogasamudāyo. Ābandhanaṭṭhenāti putto nattātiādinā pemavasena
tika-s0402t:1816_1: saparicchedavasena bandhanaṭṭhena. Amhākameteti ñāyantīti ñātī, pitāmahapituputtādivasena
tika-s0402t:1816_2: parivattanaṭṭhena parivaṭṭo. Sāmaññavācīpi sikkhā-saddo ājīvasaddasannidhānato uparivuccamānavisesāpekkhāya
tika-s0402t:1816_3: ca visesaniviṭṭhova hotīti vuttaṃ “yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā”ti. Sikkhitabbaṭṭhena
tika-s0402t:1816_4: sikkhā, saha ājīvanti etthāti sājīvo. Sikkhanabhāvenāti sikkhāya sājīve ca sikkhanabhāvena.
tika-s0402t:1816_5: Sikkhaṃ paripūrentoti sīlasaṃvaraṃ paripūrento. Sājīvañca avītikkamantoti “nāmakāyo,
tika-s0402t:1816_6: padakāyo, niruttikāyo, byañjanakāyo”ti vuttaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ bhagavato ca vacanaṃ avītikkamanto
tika-s0402t:1816_7: hutvāti attho. Idameva ca “sikkhana”nti vuttaṃ, tattha sājīvānaṃ avītikkamo sikkhāpāripūriyā
tika-s0402t:1816_8: paccayo. Tato hi yāva maggā sikkhāpāripūrī hotīti.
tika-s0402t:1817_0: Anuppadātāti anubalappadātā, anuvattanavasena vā padātā. Kassa pana anuvattanaṃ padānañcāti?
tika-s0402t:1817_2: pana anuvattanavasena sandhānassa padānaṃ ādhānaṃ ārakkhanaṃ vā daḷhakaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1817_3: tena vuttaṃ “dve jane samagge disvā”tiādi. Āramanti etthāti ārāmo, ramitabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1817_4: Yasmā pana ā-kārena vināpi ayamattho labbhati, tasmā vuttaṃ “samaggarāmotipi pāḷi, ayamevattho”ti.
tika-s0402t:1821_0: Imissā gāthāya. Sīlañhettha nelaṅganti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – “citto gahapati, nelaṅganti
tika-s0402t:1821_1: kho, bhante, sīlānametaṃ adhivacana”nti. Sukumārāti appharusatāya mudukā. Purassa
tika-s0402t:1821_2: esāti ettha pura-saddo tannivāsivācako daṭṭhabbo – “gāmo āgato”tiādīsu viya. Tenevāha
tika-s0402t:1821_3: “nagaravāsīna”nti. Manaṃ appāyati vaḍḍhetīti manāpo. Tena vuttaṃ “cittavuḍḍhikarā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1822_0: Kālavādītiādi samphappalāpā paṭiviratassa paṭipattidassanaṃ. Atthasaṃhitāpi hi vācā
tika-s0402t:1822_1: ayuttakālappayogena atthāvahā na siyāti anatthaviññāpanavācaṃ anulometi, tasmā samphappalāpaṃ
tika-s0402t:1822_2: pajahantena akālavāditā pariharitabbāti vuttaṃ “kālavādī”ti. Kālena vadantenapi ubhayānatthasādhanato
tika-s0402t:1822_3: abhūtaṃ parivajjetabbanti āha “bhūtavādī”ti. Bhūtañca vadantena yaṃ idhalokaparalokahitasampādakaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1822_4: tadeva vattabbanti dassetuṃ “atthavādī”ti vuttaṃ. Atthaṃ vadantenapi lokiyadhammasannissitameva
tika-s0402t:1822_5: avatvā lokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vattabbanti dassanatthaṃ “dhammavādī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1822_6: Yathā ca attho lokuttaradhammasannissito hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “vinayavādī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1822_7: Pañcannañhi saṃvaravinayānaṃ pañcannañca pahānavinayānaṃ vasena vuccamāno attho nibbānādhigamanahetubhāvato
tika-s0402t:1822_8: lokuttaradhammasannissito hotīti. Evaṃ guṇavisesayuttova attho vuccamāno desanākosalle
tika-s0402t:1822_9: sati sobhati, kiccakaro ca hoti, na aññathāti dassetuṃ “nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā”ti
tika-s0402t:1822_10: vuttaṃ. Idāni taṃ desanākosallaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kālenā”tiādimāha. Pucchādivasena hi
tika-s0402t:1822_13: kathāya ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ pare yāthāvato dhamme patiṭṭhāpento “desanākusalo”ti vuccatīti
tika-s0402t:1823_0: Evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā satta mūlasikkhāpadāni vibhajitvā abhijjhādippahānaṃ indriyasaṃvarajāgariyānuyogehi
tika-s0402t:1823_1: vibhāvetuṃ tampi nīharitvā ācārasīlasseva vibhajanavasena pāḷi pavattāti tadatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1823_2: vivarituṃ “bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bījānaṃ gāmo samūho bījagāmo.
tika-s0402t:1823_3: Bhūtānaṃ jātānaṃ nibbattānaṃ rukkhagacchalatādīnaṃ samūho bhūtagāmo. Nanu ca rukkhādayo
tika-s0402t:1823_4: cittarahitatāya na jīvā, cittarahitatā ca paripphandābhāvato chinne viruhanato visadisajātibhāvato
tika-s0402t:1823_5: catuyoniapariyāpannato ca veditabbā, vuddhi pana pavāḷasilālavaṇānampi vijjatīti
tika-s0402t:1823_6: na tesaṃ jīvabhāve kāraṇaṃ, visayaggahaṇañca nesaṃ parikappanāmattaṃ supanaṃ viya
tika-s0402t:1823_7: ciñcādīnaṃ, tathā dohaḷādayo, atha kasmā bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirati icchitāti?
tika-s0402t:1823_8: Samaṇasāruppato tannivāsisattānurakkhaṇato ca. Tenevāha – “jīvasaññino hi moghapurisa
tika-s0402t:1824_0: Mūlameva bījaṃ mūlabījaṃ, mūlaṃ bījaṃ etassātipi mūlabījaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:1824_2: viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-saddo tadatthasaṃsiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci
tika-s0402t:1824_3: pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-saddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “bījabīja”nti
tika-s0402t:1824_4: “rūparūpaṃ, dukkhadukkha”nti ca yathā. Kasmā panettha bījagāmabhūtagāmaṃ uddharitvā
tika-s0402t:1824_5: bījagāmo eva niddiṭṭhoti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, nanu avocumhā “mūlameva
tika-s0402t:1824_6: bījaṃ mūlabījaṃ, mūlaṃ bījaṃ etassātipi mūlabīja”nti. Tattha purimena bījagāmo niddiṭṭho,
tika-s0402t:1824_7: dutiyena bhūtagāmo. Duvidhopesa mūlabījañca mūlabījañca mūlabījanti sāmaññaniddesena,
tika-s0402t:1824_8: ekasesanayena vā uddiṭṭhoti veditabbo. Tenevāha “pañcavidhassā”tiādi. Nīlatiṇarukkhādikassāti
tika-s0402t:1824_9: allatiṇassa ceva allarukkhādikassa ca. Ādi-saddena osadhigacchalatādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0402t:1825_0: Ekaṃ bhattaṃ ekabhattaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti ekabhattiko. So pana rattibhojanenapi siyāti
tika-s0402t:1825_1: tannivattanatthaṃ āha “rattūparato”ti. Evampi aparaṇhabhojīpi siyā ekabhattikoti
tika-s0402t:1825_2: tannivattanatthaṃ “virato vikālabhojanā”ti vuttaṃ. Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā
tika-s0402t:1825_3: ayaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma, tadañño vikālo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1825_4: pana dutiyapadena rattibhojanassa paṭikkhittattā “atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā
tika-s0402t:1826_0: Dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchantīti iti-saddena evaṃpakāre dasseti. Aññehi gāhāpane
tika-s0402t:1826_1: upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti “neva taṃ uggaṇhāti, na uggahāpeti,
tika-s0402t:1826_2: na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatī”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā tividhaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyena, vācāya,
tika-s0402t:1826_3: manasāti. Tattha kāyena paṭiggahaṇaṃ uggaṇhanaṃ, vācāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ uggahāpanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1826_4: manasā paṭiggahaṇaṃ sādiyananti tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā paṭiggahaṇāti
tika-s0402t:1826_5: vuttanti āha “neva taṃ uggaṇhātī”tiādi. Esa nayo āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇātiādīsupi.
tika-s0402t:1826_7: bhikkhave, pañca vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ, macchavasaṃ, susukāvasaṃ, sūkaravasaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1826_8: gadrabhavasa”nti vuttattā idaṃ odissa anuññātaṃ nāma. Tassa pana “kāle paṭiggahita”nti
tika-s0402t:1826_9: vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭati sati paccayeti āha “aññatra odissa anuññātā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1827_0: Sāruppena vañcanaṃ rūpakūṭaṃ, patirūpena vañcanāti attho. Aṅgena attano sarīrāvayavena
tika-s0402t:1827_1: vañcanaṃ aṅgakūṭaṃ. Gaṇhanavasena vañcanaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ. Paṭicchannaṃ katvā vañcanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1827_2: paṭicchannakūṭaṃ. Akkamatīti nippīḷeti, pubbabhāge akkamatīti sambandho. Hadayanti
tika-s0402t:1827_3: nāḷiādimānabhājanānaṃ abbhantaraṃ. Telādīnaṃ nāḷiādīhi minanakāle ussāpitā sikhāyeva
tika-s0402t:1827_4: sikhābhedo, tassā hāpanaṃ. Kecīti sārasamāsācariyā uttaravihāravāsino ca.
tika-s0402t:1828_0: Vadhoti muṭṭhippahārakasātāḷanādīhi hiṃsanaṃ, viheṭhananti attho. Viheṭhanatthopi
tika-s0402t:1828_1: hi vadha-saddo dissati “attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī”tiādīsu. Yathā hi apaṭiggahabhāvasāmaññe
tika-s0402t:1828_3: vibhāgena vuttā, evaṃ parassaharaṇabhāvato adinnādānabhāvasāmaññe satipi tulākūṭādayo
tika-s0402t:1828_4: adinnādānavisesabhāvadassanatthaṃ vibhāgena vuttā. Na evaṃ pāṇātipātapariyāyassa
tika-s0402t:1828_5: vadhassa puna gahaṇe payojanaṃ atthi, tattha sayaṃkāro, idha paraṃkāroti ca na sakkā
tika-s0402t:1828_6: vattuṃ “kāyavacippayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā chappayogā”ti vacanato, tasmā yathāvutto
tika-s0402t:1828_7: evamettha attho yutto. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vadhoti māraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Tampi pothanameva
tika-s0402t:1828_8: sandhāyāti ca sakkā viññātuṃ māraṇasaddassa vihiṃsanepi dissanato.
tika-s0402t:1829_1: parikkhārānaṃ tappayojanatā sambhavatīti dassento “te sabbepī”tiādimāha. Etepīti
tika-s0402t:1829_2: navaparikkhārikādayopi appicchā ca santuṭṭhā ca. Na hi tattakena mahicchatā asantuṭṭhitā hotīti.
tika-s0402t:1830_0: Catūsu disāsu sukhaṃ viharati, tato eva sukhavihāraṭṭhānabhūtā catasso disā assa
tika-s0402t:1830_1: santīti cātuddiso. Tattha cāyaṃ satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena nappaṭihaññatīti appaṭigho.
tika-s0402t:1830_2: Dvādasavidhassa santosassa vasena santussanato santussamāno. Itarītarenāti uccāvacena
tika-s0402t:1830_3: parissayānaṃ bāhirānaṃ sīhabyagghādīnaṃ, abbhantarānañca kāmacchandādīnaṃ kāyacittūpaddavānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1830_4: abhibhavanato parissayānaṃ sahitā. Bandhanabhāvakarabhayābhāvena acchambhi. Eko asahāyo.
tika-s0402t:1830_5: Tato eva khaggamigasiṅgasadisatāya khaggavisāṇakappo careyyāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1831_0: Chinnapakkho, asañjātapakkho vā sakuṇo gantuṃ na sakkotīti pakkhi-saddena visesetvā
tika-s0402t:1831_1: sakuṇo pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti āha “pakkhayutto sakuṇo”ti. Yassa sannidhikāraparibhogo kiñci
tika-s0402t:1831_2: ṭhapetabbaṃ sāpekkhāṭhapanañca natthi, tādiso ayaṃ bhikkhūti dassento “ayamettha
tika-s0402t:1831_3: saṅkhepattho”tiādimāha. Ariyanti apenti tato dosā, tehi vā ārakāti ariyoti āha “ariyenāti
tika-s0402t:1831_4: niddosenā”ti. Ajjhattanti attani. Niddosasukhanti nirāmisasukhaṃ kilesavajjarahitattā.
tika-s0402t:1832_0: Yathāvutte sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhitasseva indriyasaṃvaro icchitabbo tadadhiṭṭhānato
tika-s0402t:1832_1: tassa ca paripālakabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato
tika-s0402t:1832_2: bhikkhū”ti. Sesapadesūti “na nimittaggāhī hotī”tiādipadesu. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho
tika-s0402t:1832_3: – na nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ
tika-s0402t:1832_4: nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti, diṭṭhamatteyeva saṇṭhāti. Nānubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ anu
tika-s0402t:1832_6: ākāraṃ na gaṇhāti. Yaṃ tattha bhūtaṃ, tadeva gaṇhāti. Yatvādhikaraṇamenantiādimhi
tika-s0402t:1832_7: yaṃkāraṇā yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu etaṃ puggalaṃ satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1832_8: asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo dhammā anvassaveyyuṃ
tika-s0402t:1832_9: anuppabandheyyuṃ. Tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena
tika-s0402t:1832_10: pidahanatthāya paṭipajjati. Evaṃ paṭipajjantoyeva ca “rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye
tika-s0402t:1832_11: saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti vuccati. Sotena saddaṃ sutvātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Evamidaṃ saṅkhepato
tika-s0402t:1832_13: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1833_0: Abhikkamanaṃ abhikkanto, purato gamanaṃ. Paṭikkamanaṃ paṭikkanto, paccāgamanaṃ. Tadubhayampi
tika-s0402t:1833_1: catūsu iriyāpathesu labbhati. Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma,
tika-s0402t:1833_2: paṭinivattento paṭikkamati nāma. Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato oṇamanto abhikkamati
tika-s0402t:1833_3: nāma, pacchato apanāmento paṭikkamati nāma. Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho
tika-s0402t:1833_4: saṃsaranto abhikkamati nāma, pacchimaṃ aṅgappadesaṃ paccāsaṃsaranto paṭikkamati nāma.
tika-s0402t:1834_0: Sātthakasampajaññantiādīsu samantato pakārehi, pakaṭṭhaṃ vā savisesaṃ jānātīti sampajāno,
tika-s0402t:1834_1: sampajānassa bhāvo sampajaññaṃ, tathāpavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena saha
tika-s0402t:1834_2: atthena vattatīti sātthakaṃ, abhikkantādisātthakassa sampajaññaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1834_3: Sappāyassa attano upakārāvahassa sampajaññaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ. Abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare,
tika-s0402t:1834_4: aññatthāpi pavattesu avijahitakammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1834_5: Abhikkamādīsu asammuyhanameva sampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Tattha abhikkamanacitte
tika-s0402t:1834_6: uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā “kinnu me ettha gatena attho atthi natthī”ti atthānatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1834_7: pariggahetvā atthapariggahaṇaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Tattha ca atthoti cetiyadassanabodhidassanasaṅghadassanatheradassanaasubhadassanādivasena
tika-s0402t:1834_8: dhammato vaḍḍhi. Cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṃ, saṅghadassanena
tika-s0402t:1834_9: saṅghārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0402t:1834_10: There disvā tesaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhāya asubhaṃ disvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā
tika-s0402t:1834_11: tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā etesaṃ dassanaṃ “sātthaka”nti
tika-s0402t:1834_12: vuttaṃ. Keci pana “āmisatopi vaḍḍhi atthoyeva taṃ nissāya brahmacariyānuggahāya paṭipannattā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1835_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1835_1: Seyyathidaṃ – cetiyadassanaṃ tāva sātthaṃ. Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare
tika-s0402t:1835_2: parisā sannipatanti, attano vibhavānurūpaṃ itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni
tika-s0402t:1835_3: viya sañcaranti. Tatra cassa iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobho, aniṭṭhe paṭigho, asamapekkhane
tika-s0402t:1835_4: moho uppajjati, kāyasaṃsaggāpattiṃ vā āpajjati, jīvitabrahmacariyānaṃ vā antarāyo
tika-s0402t:1835_5: hoti. Evaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ asappāyaṃ hoti, vuttappakāraantarāyābhāve sappāyaṃ. Bodhidassanepi
tika-s0402t:1835_6: eseva nayo. Saṅghadassanampi sātthaṃ. Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ
tika-s0402t:1835_7: dhammassavanaṃ karontesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca
tika-s0402t:1835_8: hoti. Evaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ asappāyaṃ, antarāyābhāve sappāyaṃ. Mahāparisāparivārānaṃ therānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1835_9: dassanepi eseva nayo. Asubhadassanampi sātthaṃ maggaphalādhigamahetubhāvato. Dantakaṭṭhatthāya
tika-s0402t:1835_10: sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā gatadaharabhikkhuno vatthupettha kathetabbaṃ. Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ
tika-s0402t:1835_11: purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ, mātugāmassa ca purisāsubhaṃ. Sabhāgameva sappāyanti
tika-s0402t:1836_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthakasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cittaruciyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1836_1: kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvāva gamanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:1837_0: Abhikkamādīsu pana asammuyhanaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Taṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ – idha bhikkhu
tika-s0402t:1837_1: abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu “attā abhikkamati,
tika-s0402t:1837_2: attanā abhikkamo nibbattito”ti vā, “ahaṃ abhikkamāmi, mayā abhikkamo nibbattito”ti
tika-s0402t:1837_3: vā sammuyhanti, tathā asammuyhanto “abhikkamāmī”ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena
tika-s0402t:1837_4: saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati, iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena
tika-s0402t:1837_5: ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo abhikkamati, tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapaduddharaṇe
tika-s0402t:1837_6: pathavīdhātu, āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti
tika-s0402t:1837_7: balavatiyo. Tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu. Vossajjane tejodhātu, vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo
tika-s0402t:1837_8: omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā balavatiyo. Tathā sannikkhepanasannirumbhanesu.
tika-s0402t:1837_9: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tathā atiharaṇe
tika-s0402t:1837_10: pavattā vītiharaṇaṃ, vītiharaṇe pavattā vossajjanaṃ, vossajjane pavattā sannikkhepanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1837_11: sannikkhepane pavattā sannirumbhanaṃ na pāpuṇanti. Tattha tattheva pabbapabbaṃ sannisandhi
tika-s0402t:1837_12: odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilaṃ viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti. Tattha ko
tika-s0402t:1837_13: eko abhikkamati, kassa vā ekassa abhikkamanaṃ? Paramatthato hi dhātūnaṃyeva gamanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1837_14: dhātūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ, dhātūnaṃ nisajjanaṃ, dhātūnaṃ sayanaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiñhi koṭṭhāse saddhiṃ rūpena –
tika-s0402t:1840_0: Evaṃ abhikkamādīsu asammuyhanaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ nāmāti. Paccayasampattinti paccayapāripūriṃ.
tika-s0402t:1840_1: Ime cattāroti sīlasaṃvaro, santoso, indriyasaṃvaro, satisampajaññanti ime cattāro
tika-s0402t:1840_2: araññavāsassa sambhārā. Vattabbataṃ āpajjatīti “asukassa bhikkhuno araññe tiracchānagatānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1840_3: viya vanacarakānaṃ viya ca nivāsamattameva, na araññavāsānucchavikā kāci sammāpaṭipattī”ti
tika-s0402t:1840_4: apavādavasena vattabbataṃ, āraññakehi vā tiracchānagatehi vanacarakavisabhāgajanehi
tika-s0402t:1840_5: vippaṭipattivasena vatthabbataṃ āpajjati. Bheravasaddaṃ sāventi, tāvatā apalāyantānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1840_6: hatthehi sīsaṃ…pe… karonti. Kāḷakasadisattā kāḷakaṃ, vītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ thullavajjaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1840_7: Tilakasadisattā tilakaṃ, micchāvitakkasaṅkhātaṃ aṇumattavajjaṃ. Tanti pītiṃ. Vibhūtabhāvena
tika-s0402t:1841_0: Vivittanti janavivittaṃ. Tenāha “suñña”nti. Taṃ pana janasaddanigghosābhāvena veditabbaṃ
tika-s0402t:1841_1: saddakaṇṭakattā jhānassāti āha “appasaddaṃ appanigghosanti attho”ti. Etadevāti nissaddataṃyeva.
tika-s0402t:1841_2: Vihāro pākāraparicchinno sakalo āvāso. Aḍḍhayogo dīghapāsādo, “garuḷasaṇṭhānapāsādo”tipi
tika-s0402t:1841_3: vadanti. Pāsādo caturassapāsādo. Hammiyaṃ muṇḍacchadanapāsādo. Aṭṭo paṭirājūnaṃ paṭibāhanayoggo
tika-s0402t:1841_4: catuppañcabhūmako patissayaviseso. Māḷo ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇavanto patissayaviseso.
tika-s0402t:1841_5: Aparo nayo – vihāro nāma dīghamukhapāsādo. Aḍḍhayogo ekapassacchadanakasenāsanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1841_6: Tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti, itarapasse nīcā. Etena taṃ ekapassacchadanakaṃ
tika-s0402t:1841_7: hoti. Pāsādo nāma āyatacaturassapāsādo. Hammiyaṃ muṇḍacchadanaṃ candikaṅgaṇayuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1841_8: Guhā nāma kevalā pabbataguhā. Leṇaṃ dvārabaddhaṃ pabbhāraṃ. Maṇḍapoti sākhāmaṇḍapo.
tika-s0402t:1841_9: Āvasathabhūtaṃ senāsanaṃ viharitabbaṭṭhena vihārasenāsanaṃ. Masārakādi mañcapīṭhaṃ
tika-s0402t:1841_10: tattha attharitabbabhisi upadhānañca mañcapīṭhasambandhato mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ. Cimilikādi
tika-s0402t:1841_11: bhūmiyaṃ santharitabbatāya santhatasenāsanaṃ. Abhisaṅkhatābhāvato kevalaṃ sayanassa
tika-s0402t:1841_12: nisajjāya ca okāsabhūtaṃ rukkhamūlādi paṭikkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ. Senāsanaggahaṇena
tika-s0402t:1841_13: gahitamevāti “vivittaṃ senāsana”nti iminā senāsanaggahaṇena gahitameva sāmaññajotanābhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1842_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “arañña”nti vuttanti āha “imassa panā”tiādi. Bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena
tika-s0402t:1842_1: āgatanti idaṃ vinaye tathā āgataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, abhidhammepi pana “araññanti nikkhamitvā
tika-s0402t:1842_2: bahi indakhilā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti āgatameva. Tattha hi yaṃ na gāmappadesantogadhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1842_3: taṃ araññanti nippariyāyavasena tathā vuttaṃ. Dhutaṅganiddese yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1842_4: tasmā tattha vuttanayena gahetabbanti adhippāyo. Rukkhamūlanti rukkhasamīpaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0402t:1842_5: “yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti, ettāvatā
tika-s0402t:1842_6: rukkhamūla”nti. Sela-saddo avisesato pabbatapariyāyoti katvā vuttaṃ “pabbatanti sela”nti,
tika-s0402t:1842_7: na silāmayameva. Paṃsumayādiko hi tividhopi pabbato evāti. Vivaranti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1842_8: mitho āsannatare ṭhitānaṃ ovarakādisadisaṃ vivaraṃ. Ekasmiṃyeva vā pabbate. Umaṅgasadisanti
tika-s0402t:1842_9: suduṅgāsadisaṃ. Manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānanti pakatisañcāravasena manussehi na sañcaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1842_12: Vanapatthanti na manussūpacārānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”nti imaṃ pāḷippadesaṃ
tika-s0402t:1842_13: saṅgaṇhāti. Acchannanti kenaci chadanena antamaso rukkhasākhāyapi na chāditaṃ. Nikkaḍḍhitvāti
tika-s0402t:1843_1: Pallaṅkanti ettha pari-saddo samantatoti etasmiṃ atthe, tasmā vāmoruṃ dakkhiṇoruñca
tika-s0402t:1843_2: samaṃ ṭhapetvā ubho pāde aññamaññaṃ sambandhe katvā nisajjā pallaṅkanti āha “samantato
tika-s0402t:1843_3: ūrubaddhāsana”nti. Ūrūnaṃ bandhanavasena nisajjā pallaṅkaṃ. Ābhujitvāti ca yathā
tika-s0402t:1843_4: pallaṅkavasena nisajjā hoti, evaṃ ubho pāde ābhujite samiñjite katvā. Taṃ pana ubhinnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1843_5: pādānaṃ tathāsambandhatākaraṇanti āha “bandhitvā”ti. Heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1843_6: nisajjāvacaneneva bodhitanti ujuṃ kāyanti ettha kāya-saddo uparimakāyavisayoti āha
tika-s0402t:1843_7: “uparimasarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti. Taṃ pana ujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ sarūpato payojanato
tika-s0402t:1843_8: ca dassetuṃ “aṭṭhārasā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na paṇamantīti na oṇamanti. Na paripatatīti
tika-s0402t:1843_9: na vigacchati vīthiṃ na laṅgheti, tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesasampattiyā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1843_10: vuddhiṃ phātiṃ gacchati. Parimukhanti ettha pari-saddo abhi-saddena samānatthoti
tika-s0402t:1843_12: purakkhatvāti attho. Samīpattho vā pari-saddoti dassento “mukhasamīpe vā katvā”ti
tika-s0402t:1843_13: āha. Ettha ca yathā “vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatī”tiādinā bhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1843_14: dassitaṃ, evaṃ nisīdatīti iminā alīnānuddhaccapakkhiyo santo iriyāpatho dassito.
tika-s0402t:1843_15: “Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā”ti iminā nisajjāya daḷhabhāvo. “Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti
tika-s0402t:1844_1: viya. Paṭipakkhato niggamanaṭṭho hi niyyānaṭṭho, tasmā pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satinti
tika-s0402t:1844_2: sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā, paramasatinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1845_0: Abhijjhāyati gijjhati abhikaṅkhati etāyāti abhijjhā, lobho. Lujjanaṭṭhenāti bhijjanaṭṭhena,
tika-s0402t:1845_1: khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanaṭṭhenāti attho. Vikkhambhanavasenāti ettha vikkhambhanaṃ anuppādanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1845_2: appavattanaṃ paṭipakkhena suppahīnattā. Pahīnattāti ca pahīnasadisataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:1845_3: jhānassa anadhigatattā. Tathāpi nayidaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya sabhāvato vigatābhijjhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1845_4: atha kho bhāvanāvasena. Tenāha “na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenā”ti. Eseva nayoti yathā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1845_5: sabhāvena vigatābhijjhaṃ abyāpannañca na bhāvanāya vikkhambhitattā, na evamidaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1845_6: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ bhāvanāya parisodhitattā abyāpannaṃ vigatathinamiddhaṃ anuddhataṃ
tika-s0402t:1845_7: nibbicikicchañcāti attho. Purimapakatinti parisuddhapaṇḍarasabhāvaṃ. “Yā tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0402t:1845_8: cittassa akalyatā”tiādinā thinassa, “yā tasmiṃ samaye kāyassa akalyatā”tiādinā ca
tika-s0402t:1845_9: middhassa abhidhamme niddiṭṭhattā vuttaṃ “thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ, middhaṃ cetasikagelañña”nti.
tika-s0402t:1845_10: Satipi hi aññamaññaṃ avippayoge cittakāyalahutādīnaṃ viya cittacetasikānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0402t:1845_11: taṃtaṃvisesassa yā tesaṃ akalyatādīnaṃ visesapaccayatā, ayametesaṃ sabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1846_0: Atikkamitvāti vikkhambhanavasena pajahitvā. Kathamidaṃ kathamidanti pavattiyā kathaṃkathā,
tika-s0402t:1846_1: vicikicchā, sā etassa atthīti kathaṃkathī, na kathaṃkathīti akathaṃkathī, nibbicikiccho.
tika-s0402t:1846_2: Lakkhaṇādibhedatoti ettha ādi-saddena paccayaparihānappahāyakādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1846_3: Tepi hi pabhedato daṭṭhabbāti. Ucchinditvā pātentīti ettha ucchindanaṃ pātanañca
tika-s0402t:1846_4: tāsaṃ paññānaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppajjituṃ appadānameva. Iti mahaggatānuttarapaññānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1846_5: ekaccāya ca parittapaññāya anuppattihetubhūtā nīvaraṇadhammā itarāya ca samatthataṃ
tika-s0402t:1849_0: 199-200. Navame tayo bhave ajjhottharitvā ṭhitaṃ “ajjhattikassa upādāya aṭṭhārasa
tika-s0402t:1849_1: taṇhāvicaritānī”tiādinā vuttaṃ taṃ taṃ attano koṭṭhāsabhūtaṃ jālametissā atthīti
tika-s0402t:1849_2: jālinī. Tenāha “tayo vā bhave”tiādi. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave, ārammaṇe
tika-s0402t:1849_3: vā. Apicātiādinā niddesanayena visattikāpadassa atthaṃ dassento niddesapāḷiyā ekadesaṃ
tika-s0402t:1850_0: “Visattikāti kenaṭṭhena visattikā? Visatāti visattikā, visaṭāti visattikā, visālāti
tika-s0402t:1850_1: visattikā, visakkatīti visattikā, visaṃharatīti visattikā, visaṃvādikāti visattikā,
tika-s0402t:1850_2: visamūlāti visattikā, visaphalāti visattikā. Visaparibhogāti visattikā. Visālā vā
tika-s0402t:1850_3: pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe kule gaṇe āvāse lābhe yase pasaṃsāya
tika-s0402t:1850_5: arūpadhātuyā kāmabhave rūpabhave arūpabhave saññibhave asaññibhave nevasaññināsaññibhave
tika-s0402t:1850_6: ekavokārabhave catuvokārabhave pañcavokārabhave atīte anāgate paccuppanne diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu
tika-s0402t:1851_0: Tattha visatāti vitthatā rūpādīsu tebhūmakadhammabyāpanavasena. Visaṭāti purimavacanameva
tika-s0402t:1851_1: ta-kārassa ṭa-kāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Visālāti vipulā. Visakkatīti parisahati. Ratto
tika-s0402t:1851_2: hi rāgavatthunā parena tāḷiyamānopi sahati, vipphandanaṃ vā “visakkana”nti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1851_3: Visaṃharatīti tathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ dassentī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito
tika-s0402t:1851_4: cittaṃ saṃharati saṃkhipati. Visaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, taṃ harati upanetīti attho. Aniccādiṃ
tika-s0402t:1851_5: niccādito gaṇhantī visaṃvādikā hoti. Dukkhanibbattakassa kammassa hetubhāvato visamūlā,
tika-s0402t:1851_6: visaṃ vā dukkhadukkhādibhūtā vedanā mūlaṃ etissāti visamūlā. Dukkhasamudayattā visaṃ
tika-s0402t:1851_7: phalaṃ etissāti visaphalā. Taṇhāya rūpādikassa dukkhassa paribhogo hoti, na amatassāti
tika-s0402t:1851_8: sā visaparibhogā vuttā. Sabbattha niruttivasena padasiddhi veditabbā. Yo panettha
tika-s0402t:1851_9: padhāno attho, taṃ dassetuṃ puna “visaṭā vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1852_0: Tantaṃ vuccati vatthavinanatthaṃ tantavāyehi daṇḍake āsañcitvā pasāritasuttavaṭṭi
tika-s0402t:1852_1: “tanīyatī”ti katvā, taṃ pana suttaṃ santānākulatāya nidassanabhāvena ākulameva gahitanti
tika-s0402t:1852_2: āha “tantaṃ viya ākulajāto”ti. Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “yathā
tika-s0402t:1852_3: nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samānetunti pubbenāparaṃ samaṃ katvā ānetuṃ, avisamaṃ ujuṃ kātunti
tika-s0402t:1852_4: attho. Tantameva vā ākulaṃ tantākulaṃ, tantākulaṃ viya jāto bhūtoti tantākulakajāto.
tika-s0402t:1852_5: Vinanato gulāti itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmassa tantavāyassa guṇṭhikaṃ nāma ākulabhāvena
tika-s0402t:1852_6: aggato vā mūlato vā duviññeyyameva khalibaddhatantasuttanti āha “gulāguṇṭhikaṃ vuccati
tika-s0402t:1853_0: Sakuṇikāti paṭapadasakuṇikā. Sā hi rukkhasākhāsu olambanakuṭavā hoti. Tañhi sā kuṭavaṃ
tika-s0402t:1853_1: tato tato tiṇahīrādike ānetvā tathā vinati, yathā te pesakārakañjiyasuttaṃ viya aggena
tika-s0402t:1853_2: vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ vivecetuṃ vā na sakkā. Tenāha “yathā”tiādi. Tadubhayampi
tika-s0402t:1853_4: vuttanayeneva. Kāmaṃ muñjapabbajatiṇāni yathājātānipi dīghabhāvena patitvā araññaṭṭhāne
tika-s0402t:1853_5: aññamaññaṃ vinandhitvā ākulabyākulāni hutvā tiṭṭhanti, tāni pana na tathā dubbiveciyāni
tika-s0402t:1853_6: yathā rajjubhūtānīti dassetuṃ “yathā tānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-s0402t:1854_0: Apāyāti avaḍḍhikā, sukhena, sukhahetunā vā virahitāti attho. Dukkhassa gatibhāvatoti
tika-s0402t:1854_1: āpāyikassa dukkhassa pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato. Sukhasamussayatoti abbhudayato. Vinipatitattāti
tika-s0402t:1854_2: virūpaṃ nipātattā, yathā tenattabhāvena sukhasamussayo na hoti, evaṃ nipatitattā.
tika-s0402t:1854_3: Itaroti saṃsāro. Nanu “apāya”ntiādinā vuttopi saṃsāro evāti? Saccametaṃ, nirayādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1855_0: Khandhānañca paṭipāṭīti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ hetuphalabhāvena aparāparappavatti.
tika-s0402t:1855_1: Abbocchinnaṃ vattamānāti avicchedena vattamānā. Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ “apāya”ntiādinā
tika-s0402t:1855_2: vuttaṃ sabbaṃ apāyadukkhañca vaṭṭadukkhañca. Mahāsamudde vātakkhittā nāvā viyāti
tika-s0402t:1855_4: upamā. Yante yuttagoṇo viyāti idaṃ pana avasībhāvadassanatthañceva duppamokkhabhāvadassanatthañcāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1856_1: pana visesaṃ akatvā gahaṇaṃ samūhaggāhoti daṭṭhabbo. Visesaṃ akatvāti ca anupanidhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1856_2: samato asamato ca upanidhānanti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvāti attho. Itthanti hi anupanidhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1856_3: kathitaṃ. Evaṃ aññathāti pana samato asamato ca upanidhānaṃ. Aññaṃ ākāranti parasantānagataṃ ākāraṃ.
tika-s0402t:1857_0: Atthīti sadā saṃvijjatīti attho. Sīdatīti nassati. Saṃsayaparivitakkavasenāti “kiṃ
tika-s0402t:1857_1: nu kho ahaṃ siyaṃ, na siya”nti evaṃ parivitakkavasena. Patthanākappanavasenāti “api
tika-s0402t:1857_2: nāma sādhu panāhaṃ siya”nti evaṃ patthanāya kappanavasena. Suddhasīsāti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1857_3: sādhāraṇā sīsā. “Itthaṃ evaṃ aññathā”ti vuttassa visesassa anissitattā “suddhasīsā”ti
tika-s0402t:1857_4: vuttā. Tattha diṭṭhisīsehi diṭṭhiyā gahitāya tadavinābhāvinī taṇhā dassitā, catūhi
tika-s0402t:1857_5: sīsehi dvādasahi ca sīsamūlakehi mānadiṭṭhīhi ayameva taṇhā dassitāti āha “evamete…pe…
tika-s0402t:1857_6: taṇhāvicaritadhammā veditabbā”ti. Nanu ca mānadiṭṭhiggāhopi idhādhippeto, yato “taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena
tika-s0402t:1857_7: samūhaggāho”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā kathaṃ taṇhāvicaritānīti idaṃ vacanaṃ?
tika-s0402t:1857_8: Vuccate – diṭṭhimānesupi taṇhāvicaritānīti vacanaṃ aññamaññaṃ vippayogīnaṃ diṭṭhimānānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1857_9: taṇhāya avippayogānaṃ taṃmūlakattā tappadhānatāya katanti veditabbaṃ. Dasamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1864_0: 201-210. Pañcamassa paṭhame asappurisoti lāmakapuriso. Pāṇaṃ atipātetīti pāṇātipātī.
tika-s0402t:1864_1: Adinnaṃ ādiyatīti adinnādāyī. Kāmesu micchā caratīti kāmesumicchācārī. Musā vadatīti
tika-s0402t:1864_3: samādapetīti yathā pāṇaṃ atipāteti, tathā naṃ tattha gahaṇaṃ gaṇhāpeti. Sesesupi
tika-s0402t:1864_4: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo yasmā sayaṃkatena ca dussīlyena samannāgato,
tika-s0402t:1864_5: yañca samādapitena kataṃ, tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādo, tasmā “asappurisena asappurisataro”ti
tika-s0402t:1864_6: vuccati. Sappurisoti uttamapuriso. Sappurisena sappurisataroti attanā ca katena susīlyena
tika-s0402t:1864_7: samannāgatattā yañca samādapito karoti, tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādattā uttamapurisena
tika-s0402t:1864_8: uttamapurisataro. Ettha ca parena kataṃ dussīlyaṃ susīlyaṃ vā āṇattiyā attanā ca
tika-s0402t:1864_9: vacippayogena katanti āṇāpanavasena pasutapāpassa puññassa vā dāyādo “tato upaḍḍhassa
tika-s0402t:1869_1: cirena cintetvā karaṇavasena cintākavi veditabbo. Kiñci sutvā sutena assutaṃ anusandhetvā
tika-s0402t:1869_2: karaṇavasena sutakavi, kiñci atthaṃ upadhāretvā tassa saṅkhipanavitthāraṇādivasena
tika-s0402t:1869_3: atthakavi yaṃkiñci parena kataṃ kabbaṃ nāṭakaṃ vā disvā taṃsadisameva aññaṃ attano
tika-s0402t:1873_0: 232. Catutthassa paṭhame kāḷakanti malīnaṃ, cittassa appabhassarabhāvakaranti attho.
tika-s0402t:1873_1: Taṃ panettha kammapathappattameva adhippetanti āha “dasaakusalakammapatha”nti. Kaṇhābhijātihetuto
tika-s0402t:1873_2: vā kaṇhaṃ. Tenāha “kaṇhavipāka”nti. Apāyūpapatti manussesu ca dobhaggiyaṃ kaṇhavipāko,
tika-s0402t:1873_3: yaṃ tassa tamabhāvo vutto. Nibbattanatoti nibbattāpanato. Paṇḍarakanti odātaṃ, cittassa
tika-s0402t:1873_4: pabhassarabhāvakaranti attho. Sukkābhijātihetuto vā sukkaṃ. Tenāha “sukkavipāka”nti.
tika-s0402t:1873_5: Saggūpapatti manussasobhaggiyañca sukkavipāko, yaṃ tassa jotibhāvo vutto. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena
tika-s0402t:1873_6: pana “sagge nibbattanato”ti vuttaṃ, nibbattāpanatoti attho. Missakakammanti kālena
tika-s0402t:1873_7: kaṇhaṃ kālena sukkanti evaṃ missakavasena katakammaṃ. Sukhadukkhavipākanti vatvā
tika-s0402t:1873_8: tattha sukhadukkhānaṃ pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ “missakakammaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kammassa
tika-s0402t:1873_10: kammakkhayakarakammassa idha sukkapariyāyopi icchitoti āha “ubhaya…pe… ayamettha
tika-s0402t:1873_11: attho”ti. Tattha ubhayavipākassāti yathādhigatassa ubhayavipākassa. Sampattibhavapariyāpanno
tika-s0402t:1873_12: hi vipāko idha sukkaṃ sukkavipākoti adhippeto, na accantaparisuddho ariyaphalavipāko.
tika-s0402t:1876_0: 233. Dutiye sabyābajjhanti vā sadukkhaṃ, attanā uppādetabbena dukkhena sadukkhanti
tika-s0402t:1876_1: attho, dukkhasaṃvattanikanti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāyasaṅkhārādīsu kāyadvāre gahaṇādivasena
tika-s0402t:1876_2: copanappattā dvādasa akusalacetanā abyābajjhakāyasaṅkhāro nāma. Vacīdvāre hanusaṃcopanavasena
tika-s0402t:1876_3: vacībhedappavattikā tāyeva dvādasa vacīsaṅkhāro nāma. Ubhayacopanaṃ appatvā raho
tika-s0402t:1876_4: cintentassa manodvāre pavattā manosaṅkhāro nāma. Iti tīsupi dvāresu kāyaduccaritādibhedā
tika-s0402t:1876_5: akusalā cetanāva saṅkhārāti veditabbā. Abhisaṅkharotīti āyūhati, taṃ pana āyūhanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1876_6: paccayasamavāyasiddhito saṅkaḍḍhitvā piṇḍanaṃ viya hoti. Sadukkhaṃ lokanti apāyalokamāha.
tika-s0402t:1876_7: Vipākaphassāti phassasīsena tattha vipākappavattamāha. Vemānikapetāti idaṃ bāhullato
tika-s0402t:1876_8: vuttaṃ, itaresampi vinipātikānaṃ kālena sukhaṃ, kālena dukkhaṃ hoti. Tassa pahānāyāti
tika-s0402t:1876_9: tassa yathāvuttassa kammassa anuppattidhammatāpādanāya. Yā cetanāti yā apacayagāminicetanā.
tika-s0402t:1879_0: 234-240. Tatiye purimāni, bhante, divasāni purimatarānīti ettha hiyyo divasaṃ purimaṃ
tika-s0402t:1879_1: nāma, tato paraṃ purimataranti āha “atītānantaradivasato paṭṭhāyā”tiādi. Iti imesu
tika-s0402t:1879_2: dvīsu pavattito yathākkamaṃ purimapurimatarabhāvo dassito. Evaṃ santepi yadettha
tika-s0402t:1879_3: “purimatara”nti vuttaṃ, tato pabhuti yaṃ yaṃ oraṃ, taṃ taṃ purimaṃ. Yaṃ yaṃ paraṃ,
tika-s0402t:1879_4: taṃ taṃ purimataraṃ orapārabhāvassa viya purimatarabhāvassa ca apekkhāsiddhattā.
tika-s0402t:1882_0: 241-2. Dasame sesapadesupīti “idha dutiyo samaṇo”tiādīsu sesapadesupi. Yathā hi “vivicceva
tika-s0402t:1882_1: kāmehī”ti ettha kato niyamo “vivicca akusalehī”ti etthāpi katoyeva hoti sāvadhāraṇaatthassa
tika-s0402t:1882_3: nippariyāyato samaṇabhāvoti tesaṃ vasenettha cattāro samaṇā desitā. Imasmiñhi ṭhāne
tika-s0402t:1882_4: cattāro phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva adhippetā samitapāpasamaṇaggahaṇato. Kasmā panettha mahāparinibbāne
tika-s0402t:1882_5: viya maggaṭṭhā tadatthāya paṭipannāpi na gahitāti? Veneyyajjhāsayato. Tattha hi maggādhigamatthāya
tika-s0402t:1882_6: vipassanāpi ito bahiddhā natthi, kuto maggaphalānīti dassentena bhagavatā “ñāyassa
tika-s0402t:1882_7: dhammassa padesavattī, ito bahiddhā samaṇopi natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Idha pana niṭṭhānappattameva
tika-s0402t:1882_8: taṃtaṃsamaṇabhāvaṃ gaṇhantena phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva gahitā, maggaṭṭhato phalaṭṭho savisesaṃ
tika-s0402t:1882_9: dakkhiṇeyyoti. Svāyamattho dvīsu suttesu desanābhedeneva viññāyatīti. Rittāti vivittā.
tika-s0402t:1883_0: Pavadanti etehīti pavādā. Diṭṭhigatikānaṃ nānādiṭṭhidīpakasamayāti āha “cattāro sassatavādā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1883_1: Tattha cattāro sassatavādāti lābhivasena tayo, takkivasena ekoti evaṃ cattāro sassatavādā.
tika-s0402t:1883_2: Pubbenivāsañāṇalābhī titthiyo mandapañño anekajātisatasahassamattaṃ anussarati, majjhapañño
tika-s0402t:1883_3: dasa saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappāni, tikkhapañño cattālīsa saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappāni, na tato
tika-s0402t:1883_4: paraṃ. So evaṃ anussaranto “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti abhivadati, takkī pana takkapariyāhataṃ
tika-s0402t:1883_5: vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti abhivadati. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:1883_6: “lābhivasena tayo, takkivasena ekoti evaṃ cattāro sassatavādā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1884_0: Sattesu saṅkhāresu ca ekaccaṃ sassatanti pavatto vādo ekaccasassatavādo. So pana
tika-s0402t:1885_0: Cattāro antānantikāti ettha amati gacchati ettha vosānanti anto, mariyādā. Tappaṭisedhena
tika-s0402t:1885_1: ananto. Anto ca ananto ca antānanto sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesena vā “nāmarūpapaccayā
tika-s0402t:1885_2: saḷāyatana”ntiādīsu viya. Antānantasahacarito vādo antānanto yathā “kuntā carantī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1885_3: Antānantasannissayo vā yathā “mañcā ghosantī”ti. So etesaṃ atthīti antānantikā. “Antavā
tika-s0402t:1885_4: attā ca loko ca, anantavā attā ca loko ca, antavā ca anantavā ca attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0402t:1885_5: nevantavā nānantavā”ti evaṃ pavattavādā cattāro. Avaḍḍhitakasiṇassa taṃ kasiṇaṃ attāti
tika-s0402t:1885_6: ca lokoti ca gaṇhantassa vasena paṭhamo vutto, dutiyo vaḍḍhitakasiṇassa vasena vutto,
tika-s0402t:1885_7: tatiyo tiriyaṃ vaḍḍhetvā uddhamadho avaḍḍhitakasiṇassa, catuttho takkivasena vutto.
tika-s0402t:1885_8: Ettha ca yuttaṃ tāva purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vādānaṃ antañca anantañca antānantañca ārabbha
tika-s0402t:1885_9: pavattavādattā antānantikattaṃ, pacchimassa pana tadubhayanisedhanavasena pavattavādattā
tika-s0402t:1885_11: hi antānantavisayo eva taṃ ārabbha pavattattā.
tika-s0402t:1886_0: Na maratīti amarā. Kā sā? “Evantipi me no”tiādinā nayena pariyantarahitā diṭṭhigatikassa
tika-s0402t:1886_1: diṭṭhi ceva vācā ca. Vividho khepoti vikkhepo, amarāya diṭṭhiyā, vācāya vā vikkhepoti
tika-s0402t:1886_2: amarāvikkhepo, so etassa atthīti amarāvikkhepiko. Atha vā amarā nāma macchajāti,
tika-s0402t:1886_3: sā ummujjanādivasena udake sandhāvamānā gāhaṃ na gacchati, evamevaṃ ayampi vādo ito
tika-s0402t:1886_4: cito ca sandhāvati, gāhaṃ na upagacchatīti amarāvikkhepoti vuccati, so etesaṃ atthīti
tika-s0402t:1887_0: Adhicca yathicchakaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ kassaci buddhipubbaṃ vā vinā samuppannoti
tika-s0402t:1887_1: attalokasaññitānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhicca pavattiākārārammaṇaṃ dassanaṃ tadākārasannissayena
tika-s0402t:1887_2: pavattito tadākārasahacaritatāya ca “adhiccasamuppanna”nti vuccati yathā “mañcā ghosanti”,
tika-s0402t:1887_3: “kuntā carantī”ti ca. Taṃ etesaṃ atthīti adhiccasamuppannikā. Lābhivasena takkivasena
tika-s0402t:1888_0: Saññīti pavatto vādo saññivādo, so etesaṃ atthīti saññivādā. Rūpicatukkaṃ ekantasukhacatukkanti
tika-s0402t:1888_1: imesaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasa saññivādā. Imesuyeva purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1888_2: vasena aṭṭha saññivādā, aṭṭha nevasaññināsaññivādā veditabbā. Kevalañhi tattha “saññī
tika-s0402t:1888_3: attā”ti gaṇhantānaṃ tā diṭṭhiyo, idha asaññīti ca nevasaññīnāsaññīti ca.
tika-s0402t:1889: Satta ucchedavādāti manussattabhāve kāmāvacaradevattabhāve rūpāvacarattabhāve catubbidhārūpattabhāve ca ṭhatvā sattassa ucchedapaññāpanavasena satta ucchedavādā.
tika-s0402t:1890_1: ca diṭṭhadhamme nibbūtipaññāpanavādā. Diṭṭhadhammoti paccakkhadhammo vuccati, tattha
tika-s0402t:1890_2: tattha paṭiladdhattabhāvassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Diṭṭhadhamme nibbānaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1890_3: imasmiṃyeva attabhāve dukkhavūpasamanti attho. Taṃ vadantīti diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā.
tika-s0402t:1891_0: Ñāyati kamati paṭivijjhatīti ñāyo, so eva nibbānasampāpakahetutāya dhammoti āha “ñāyassa
tika-s0402t:1891_1: dhammassā”ti. Ito bahiddhā samaṇopi natthītiādīsu kasmā panete aññattha natthīti?
tika-s0402t:1891_2: Akkhettatāya. Yathā hi na āragge sāsapo tiṭṭhati, na udakapiṭṭhe aggi jalati, na
tika-s0402t:1891_3: piṭṭhipāsāṇe bījāni viruhanti, evamevaṃ bāhiresu titthāyatanesu na ime samaṇā uppajjanti,
tika-s0402t:1891_4: imasmiṃyeva sāsane uppajjanti. Kasmā? Sukkhettatāya. Sā pana nesaṃ akkhettatā sukkhettatā
tika-s0402t:1891_5: ca ariyamaggassa abhāvato bhāvato ca veditabbā. Tenāha bhagavā –
tika-s0402t:1892_0: “Yasmiṃ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati, samaṇopi
tika-s0402t:1892_1: tattha na upalabbhati, dutiyopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati, tatiyopi tattha samaṇo
tika-s0402t:1892_2: na upalabbhati, catutthopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati. Yasmiñca kho, subhadda,
tika-s0402t:1892_3: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha upalabbhati, dutiyopi
tika-s0402t:1892_4: tattha… tatiyopi tattha… catutthopi tattha samaṇo upalabbhati. Imasmiṃ kho, subhadda,
tika-s0402t:1892_5: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati. Idheva, subhadda, samaṇo, idha dutiyo
tika-s0402t:1892_6: samaṇo, idha tatiyo samaṇo, idha catuttho samaṇo, suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1893_0: Ariyamaggassa ca abhāvo bhāvo ca suparisuddhassa sīlassa suparisuddhāya samathavipassanābhāvanāya
tika-s0402t:1893_1: abhāvato bhāvato ca veditabbo. Tadubhayañca durakkhātasvākkhātabhāvahetukaṃ. So ca
tika-s0402t:1893_2: asammāsambuddhappaveditattā. Yasmā titthāyatanaṃ akkhettaṃ, sāsanaṃ khettaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0402t:1893_3: yathā surattahatthapādo bhāsurakesarabhāro sīho migarājā na susāne vā saṅkārakūṭe
tika-s0402t:1893_4: vā paṭivasati, tiyojanasahassavitthataṃ pana himavantaṃ ajjhogāhetvā maṇiguhāyameva
tika-s0402t:1893_5: vasati, yathā ca chaddanto nāgarājā na gocariyahatthikulādīsu navasu kulesu uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1893_6: yathā ca valāhako assarājā na gadrabhakule vā ghoṭakakule vā uppajjati, sindhutīre
tika-s0402t:1893_7: pana sindhavakuleyeva uppajjati, yathā ca sabbakāmadadaṃ manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ na
tika-s0402t:1893_8: saṅkārakūṭe vā paṃsupabbatādīsu vā uppajjati, vipulapabbatabbhantareyeva uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1893_9: yathā ca timirapiṅgalo maccharājā na khuddakapokkharaṇīsu uppajjati, caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre
tika-s0402t:1893_10: mahāsamuddeyeva uppajjati, yathā ca diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko supaṇṇarājā na gāmadvāre
tika-s0402t:1893_11: eraṇḍavanādīsu paṭivasati, mahāsamuddaṃ pana ajjhogāhetvā simbalidahavaneyeva paṭivasati,
tika-s0402t:1893_12: yathā ca dhataraṭṭho suvaṇṇahaṃso na gāmadvāre āvāṭakādīsu paṭivasati, navutihaṃsasahassaparivāro
tika-s0402t:1893_13: pana hutvā cittakūṭeyeva paṭivasati, yathā ca catuddīpissaro cakkavattirājā na nīcakule
tika-s0402t:1893_14: uppajjati, asambhinnajātiyakhattiyakuleyeva pana uppajjati, evamevaṃ imesu samaṇesu
tika-s0402t:1893_15: ekasamaṇopi na aññattha titthāyatane uppajjati, ariyamaggaparikkhate pana buddhasāsaneyeva
tika-s0402t:1893_16: uppajjati. Tenāha bhagavā – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi
tika-s0402t:1898_1: āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti imesu catūsu. Tattha dhammoti vā adhammoti vā
tika-s0402t:1898_2: aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo, idaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:1898_3: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā
tika-s0402t:1898_4: ceva codanā ca, idaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Mātikāya āgatā pañca, vibhaṅge dveti
tika-s0402t:1898_5: sattapi āpattikkhandhā, idaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1898_6: kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ, idaṃ kiccādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1901: 244-5. Dutiye bhassati niratthakabhāvena khipīyatīti bhasmaṃ, chārikā. Tassa puṭaṃ bhaṇḍikā bhasmapuṭaṃ. Tenāha “bhasmapuṭanti chārikābhaṇḍika”nti. Tatiyaṃ uttānatthameva.
tika-s0402t:1904_0: 246-9. Catutthe petāti peccabhāvaṃ gatā. Te pana yasmā idha katakālakiriyā kālena
tika-s0402t:1904_1: katajīvitucchedā honti, tasmā vuttaṃ “kālakatā vuccantī”ti, matāti attho. Atha vā
tika-s0402t:1904_2: peccabhavaṃ gatā, petūpapattivasena nibbattiṃ upagatāti attho. Tenāha “atha vā petavisaye
tika-s0402t:1904_3: nibbattā petā nāmā”ti. Ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti dukkhuppattito.
tika-s0402t:1905_0: Tejussadattāti iminā sīhassa abhīrukabhāvaṃ dasseti. Bhīrukā sesamigā attano āsayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1905_1: pavisitvā santāsapubbakaṃ yathā tathā sayanti, sīho pana abhīruko sabhāvato satokārī
tika-s0402t:1905_2: bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva sayati. Tenāha “dve purimapāde”tiādi. Dakkhiṇe
tika-s0402t:1905_3: purimapāde vāmassa purimapādassa ṭhapanavasena dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0402t:1905_4: Pacchimapāde vuttanayeneva idhāpi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ veditabbaṃ, ṭhitokāsasallakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:1905_5: abhīrukavaseneva. Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvātiādinā vuttasīhakiriyā anutrastappabujjhanā
tika-s0402t:1905_6: viya abhīrubhāvasiddhadhammatāvasenevāti veditabbā. Sīhavijambhanaṃ ativelaṃ ekākāre
tika-s0402t:1905_7: ṭhapitānaṃ sarīrāvayavānaṃ gamanādikiriyāsu yogyabhāvāpādanatthaṃ. Tikkhattuṃ sīhanādanadanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1906_0: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, tathāgataseyyāti iminā catutthajjhānaseyyā tathāgataseyyā
tika-s0402t:1906_1: nāmāti dasseti. Seti abyāvaṭabhāvena pavattati etthāti seyyā, catutthajjhānameva
tika-s0402t:1906_2: seyyā catutthajjhānaseyyā. Kiṃ pana taṃ catutthajjhānanti? Ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1906_3: Tattha hi ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavā anukkamena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā tathāgato
tika-s0402t:1906_4: jātoti. Tayidaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na seyyā, tathāpi yasmā “catutthajjhānasamanantarā
tika-s0402t:1906_5: bhagavā parinibbāyī”ti mahāparinibbāne āgataṃ, tasmā lokiyacatutthajjhānasamāpatti
tika-s0402t:1906_6: eva tathāgataseyyāti keci. Evaṃ sati parinibbānakālikāva tathāgataseyyā āpajjati,
tika-s0402t:1906_7: na ca bhagavā lokiyacatutthajjhānasamāpajjanabahulo vihāsi. Aggaphalavasena pavattaṃ
tika-s0402t:1906_8: panettha catutthajjhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha yathā sattānaṃ niddūpagamalakkhaṇā seyyā
tika-s0402t:1906_9: bhavaṅgacittavasena hoti, sā pana nesaṃ paṭhamajātisamanvayā yebhuyyavuttikā, evaṃ
tika-s0402t:1906_10: bhagavato ariyajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ aggaphalabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ tathāgataseyyāti
tika-s0402t:1909_0: 250-253. Aṭṭhame anariyānanti asādhūnaṃ nihīnānaṃ. Vohārāti saṃvohārā abhilāpā vā,
tika-s0402t:1909_1: “diṭṭhaṃ mayā”ti evaṃvāditā. Ettha ca taṃtaṃsamuṭṭhāpakacetanāvasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1915_0: 254-256. Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame paccanīkasamanato samatho, samādhīti āha “cittekaggatā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1915_1: Aniccādinā vividhenākārena dassanato vipassanā, saṅkhārapariggāhakañāṇaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0402t:1916_0: Dutiye anariyehi pariyesitabbattā anariyānaṃ pariyesanāti anariyapariyesanā. Sayaṃ
tika-s0402t:1916_1: lāmakatāya anariyānaṃ pariyesanāti vā anariyapariyesanā. Jarāsabhāvanti jīraṇapakatikaṃ. Tatiyaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1919: 257-263. Catutthe apasādetīti niggaṇhāti. Ussādetīti paggaṇhāti. Apasādanākāraṃ ussādanākārañca vibhāvetuṃ “katha”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Pañcamādīni uttānāneva. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
